text.body:
﻿
(9. tulyayogitā)
vivakṣitaguṇotkarṣaiḥ stutinindārthaṃ sahābhidhānaṃ tulyayogitā | sā stutyarthā yathā—(kāvyāda. 3.28)
śeṣo himagiristvaṃ ca mahānto guravaḥ sthirāḥ |
yadalaṅghitamaryādāścalantīṃ bibhṛtha kṣitim || 404 ||
nindārthā yathā—(kāvyāda. 2.332)
saṅgatāni mṛgākṣīṇāṃ taṭidvilasitāni ca |
kṣaṇadvayaṃ na tiṣṭhanti ghanārabdhānyapi svayam || 405 ||
(10. leśaḥ)
doṣasya guṇībhāvo guṇasya ca doṣībhāvo leśaḥ | tatra doṣasya guṇībhāvo yathā—(kāvyāda. 2.271)
capalo nirdayaścāsau janaḥ kiṃ tena me sakhi! |
āgaḥpramārjanāyaiva cāṭavo yena śikṣitāḥ || 406 ||
guṇasya doṣībhāvo yathā—(kāvyāda. 2.269)
yuvaiṣa guṇavān rājā yogyaste patirūrjitaḥ |
raṇotsave manaḥ saktaṃ yasya kāmotsavādapi || 407 ||
vyājastutirapi leśa eva | yathā—(kāvyāda. 2.345)
puṃsaḥ purāṇādācchidya śrīstvayā paribhujyate |
rājannikṣvākuvaṃśasya kimidaṃ tava yujyate || 408 ||
yathā ca—
indorlakṣma tripurajayinaḥ kaṇṭhamūlaṃ murāri— rdiṅnāgānāṃ ghanamadamaṣībhāñji gaṇḍasthalāni |
adyāpyurvīvalayatilaka! śyāmalim‍nānulip‍tā— nyābhāsante vada dhavalitaṃ kiṃ tvadīyairyaśobhiḥ || 409 ||
(11. apahnutiḥ)
padārthāpalāpo 'pahnutiḥ |
sā dvidhā— aupamyavatī, anaupamyā ca |
aupamyavatī yathā—(gāsa.1.70)
gihme davaggimasimaïliāiṁ dīsaṃti viṃjhasiharāiṃ |
āsasu paütthavaïe ṇa hoṃti ṇavapāusabbhāiṃ || 410 ||
(grīṣme davāg‍nimaṣīmalināni dṛśyante vindhyaśikharāṇi |
āśvasihi proṣitapatike! na bhavanti navaprāvṛḍabhrāṇi ||)
yathā ca—
na ketakīnāṃ vilasanti sūcayaḥ pravāsino hanta hasatyayaṃ vidhiḥ |
taḍillateyaṃ na cakāsti cañcalā puraḥ smarajyotiridaṃ vijṛmbhate || 411 ||
anaupamyā yathā—(kāvyāda. 2.266)
rājakanyānuraktaṃ māṃ romodbhedena rakṣakāḥ |
avagaccheyurā jñātamaho śītānilaṃ vanam || 412 ||
yathā ca—(kāvyāda. 2.367)
ānandāśru pravṛttaṃ me kathaṃ dṛṣṭvaiva kanyakām |
akṣi me puṣparajasā vātoddha‍ūtena dūṣitam || 413 ||
(12. aprastutapraśaṃsā)
astotavyasyābhinandanamaprastutapraśaṃsā | yathā—
kāmaṃ vaneṣu hariṇāstṛṇena jīvantyayat‍nasulabhena |
dhaniṣu na dainyaṃ vidadhati te kila paśavo, vayaṃ sudhiyaḥ || 414 ||
yathā vā—
paṅgo! vandyastvamasi na gṛhaṃ yāsi yo 'rthī pareṣāṃ
dhanyo 'ndha! tvaṃ dhanamadavatāṃ nekṣase yo mukhāni |
ślāghyo mūka! tvamapi kṛpaṇaṃ stauṣi nārthāśayā yaḥ
stotavyastvaṃ badhira! na giraṃ yaḥ khalānāṃ śṛṇoṣiḥ || 415 ||
(13. utprekṣā)
anyathāvasthitasyānyathotprekṣaṇam utprekṣā |
sā tridhā— dravyaviṣayā, guṇaviṣayā, kriyāviṣayā ca | tatra— dravyaviṣayā yathā—
dehasthā darpaṇe yasya paśyati pratimāmumā |
anyārdhārdhamivotpannamardhanārīśvarāntaram || 416 ||
guṇaviṣayā yathā—
pallaviaṃ via karapallavehiṃ || 417 || (10.393 ihaiva)
kriyāviṣayā yathā—
senāgajāḥ svakarapuṣkaralekhanībhirgaṇḍasthalānmadamaṣīṃ muhurādadānāḥ |
manye narendra! tava toyadhitīratālīpatrodareṣu vijayastutimālikhanti || 418 ||
matamutprekṣopamotprekṣāvayavaśca utprekṣaiva | teṣu—
mataṃ yathā—
yadetaccandrāntarjaladalavalīlāṃ prakurute tadācaṣṭe lokaḥ śaśa iti, na tanmāṃ prati tathā |
ahaṃ tvinduṃ manye tvadarivirahaklāntataruṇī— kaṭākṣolkāpāta—vraṇa—kiṇa—kalaṅkāṅkita—tanum || 419 ||
utprekṣopamā yathā—(bhāmahā. 2.92)
kiṃśukavyapadeśena tarumārudya sarvataḥ |
dagdhādagdhāmaraṇyānīṃ paśyatīva vibhāvasuḥ || 420 ||
utprekṣāvayavo yathā—(kusaṃ. 8.53)
aṅgulībhiriva keśasañcayaṃ saṃnigṛhya timiraṃ marīcibhiḥ |
kuḍ‍malīkṛtasarojalocanaṃ cumbatīva rajanīmukhaṃ śaśī || 421 ||
(14. arthāntaranyāsaḥ)
vastūpanyasya tatsādhanasamarthasya vastuno 'yasya nyasanamarthāntaranyāyaḥ | sa tridhā— sādharmyeṇa, vaidharmyeṇa, viparyayeṇa ca |
sādharmyeṇa yathā—(kāvyāda. 2.173)
payomucaḥ parītāpaṃ harantyete śarīriṇām |
nanvātmalābho mahatāṃ paraduḥkhopaśāntaye || 422 ||
vaidharmyeṇa yathā—(kirātā. 8.37)
priyeṇa saṃgrathya vipakṣasaṃnidhāvupāhitāṃ vakṣasi pīvarastane |
srajaṃ na kācidvijahau jalāvilāṃ vasanti hi premṇi guṇā na vastuni ||
viparyayeṇa yathā—(gāsa. 1.100)
jo jassa hiaadaïo dukkhaṃ deṃto vi so tahā tassa/suhaṃ dei |
daïaṇahadūmiāṇaṃ vi vaḍ‍ḍhaï thaṇāṇaṁ romañco || 424 ||
(yo yasya hṛdayadayito duḥkhaṃ dadadapi sa tathā tasya/sukhaṃ dadāti |
dayitanakhadūnayorapi vardhate stanayo romāñcaḥ ||)
ubhayanyāsaḥ, pratyanīkanyāsaḥ, pratīkanyāso 'pi cārthāntaranyāsa eva | tatra ubhayanyāso yathā—(seba. 3.9)
te viralā sappurisā je abhaṇaṃtā ghaḍaṃti kajjālāve |
thoa ccia te vi dumā je amuṇiakusumaṇiggamā deṃti phalaṃ || 425 ||
(te viralāḥ satpuruṣā ye 'bhaṇantā ghaṭayanti kāryālāpān |
stokā eva te 'pi drumā ye 'jñātakusumanirgamā dadati phalam ||)
pratyanīkanyāso yathā—
viralā uvaāri ccia ṇiravekkhā jalahara vva vaṭṭaṃti |
jhijjaṃti tāṇa virahe virala ccia sarippavāha vva || 426 ||
(viralā upakāriṇa eva nirapekṣā jaladharā iva vartante |
kṣīyante teṣāṃ virahe viralā eva saritpravāhā iva ||)
pratīkanyāso yathā—(śāku. 3.1)
kā kathā bāṇasandhāne jyāśabdenaiva dūrataḥ |
huṅkāreṇeva dhanuṣaḥ sa hi vigh‍nānapohati || 427 ||
(15. dīpakam)
jātyādivācinā padena sarvavākyopakāro dīpakam |
tattridhā— kriyādīpakaṃ, kārakadīpakaṃ, mālādīpakaṃ ca | tatra— kriyādīpakaṃ yathā—(kāvyāda. 2.106)
tvayā karṇotpalaṃ karṇe smareṇāstraṃ śarāsane |
mayā ca maraṇe cetastrayametat samaṃ kṛtam || 428 ||
kārakadīpakaṃ yathā—(kāvyāda. 2.98)
pavano dakṣiṇaḥ parṇaṃ jīrṇaṃ harati vīrudhām |
sa eva ca natāṅgīnāṃ mānabhaṅgāya kalpate || 429 ||
mālādīpakaṃ yathā—
imiṇā saraeṇa sasī sasiṇā vi ṇisā ṇisāi kumuavaṇaṃ |
kumaavaṇeṇa a puliṇaṃ puliṇeṇa a sohae haṃsaülaṃ || 430 ||
(anayā śaradā śaśī śaśināpi niśā niśayā kumudavanam |
kumudavanena ca pulinaṃ pulinena ca hasati haṃsakulam ||)
āvṛttirapi dīpakameva | sāpi tridhā — śabdāvṛttirarthāvṛttirubhayāvṛttiśca | śabdāvṛttiryathā—(kāvyāda. 2.118)
utkaṇṭhayati meghānāṃ mālā vṛndaṃ kalāpinām |
yūnāṃ cotkaṇṭhayatyadya mānasaṃ makaradhvajaḥ || 431 ||
arthāvṛttiryathā—
hṛṣyati cūteṣu ciraṃ tuṣyati bakuleṣu modate maruti |
iha hi madhau kalakūjiṣu pikeṣu ca prīyate kāmī || 432 ||
ubhayāvṛttiryathā—(māmā. 9.4)
jaya deva! bhuvanabhāvana! jaya bhagavan! nikhilavarada! nigamanidhe! |
jaya cārucandraśekhara! jaya madanāntaka! jayādiguro! || 433 ||
(16. parikaraḥ (ekāvalī ca) )
kriyāpadādīnāmupaskāraḥ parikaraḥ |
sa tridhā— kriyāparikaraḥ, kārakaparikaraḥ, vastuparikaraśca |
kriyāparikaro yathā—(seba. 4.57)
vavasiaṇiveiattho so māruiladdhapaccaāgaaharisaṃ |
suggīveṇa uratthalavaṇamālāmaliamahuaraṃ avaụ̄dho || 434 ||
(vyavasitaniveditārthaḥ sa mārutilabdhapratyayāgataharṣam |
sugrīveṇoraḥsthalavanamālāmṛditamadhukaramupagūḍhaḥ ||)
kārakaparikaro yathā—(seba. 11.54)
paḍiā a hatthasịdhiliaṇirohapaṃḍarasamūsasaṃtakavolā |
pelliavāmapaoharavisamuṇṇaadāhiṇatthaṇī jaṇaa—suā || 435 ||
(patitā ca hastaśithilitanirodhapāṇḍurasamucch‌vasatkapolā |
prerita/pīḍitavāmapayodharaviṣamonnatadakṣiṇastanī janakasutā ||)
vastuparikaro yathā—
devī putramasūta nṛtyata gaṇāḥ! kiṃ tiṣṭhatetyudbha‍uje harṣād bhṛṅgiriṭāvudāhṛtagirā cāmuṇḍayāliṅgite |
pāyād vo jitadevadundubhighanadhvānapravṛttastayo— ranyonyāṅganipātajarjaratarasthūlāsthijanmā ravaḥ || 436||
(ekāvalī)
ekāvalyapi parikaraviśeṣa eva |
sā tridhā— śabdaikāvalī, arthaikāvalī, ubhayaikāvalī ca |
śabdaikāvalī yathā—(na.ca. 6.29)
parvatabhedi pavitraṃ jaitraṃ narakasya bahumataṃ gahanam |
harimiva harimiva harimiva vahati payaḥ paśyata payoṣṇī || 437 ||
arthaikāvalī yathā—(kāvyāda. 2.107)
śuklaḥ śvetārciṣo vṛddha‍yai pakṣaḥ pañcaśarasya saḥ |
sa ca rāgasya rāgo 'pi yūnāṃ ratyutsavaśriyaḥ || 438 ||
ubhayaikāvalī yathā—(rudraṭā. 7.110)
salilaṃ vikāsikamalaṃ kamalāni sugandhimadhusamṛddhāni |
madhu līnālikulākulamalikulamapi madhuraraṇitamiha || 439 ||
(17. kramaḥ)
śabdārthobhayānāṃ paripāṭiḥ kramaḥ | teṣu— śabdaparipāṭiryathā—
tasyāḥ pravṛddhalīlābhirālāpasmitadṛṣṭibhiḥ |
jīyante vallakīkundasragindīvarasampadaḥ || 440 ||
arthaparipāṭiryathā—
pāyād vo racitatrivikramatanurdevaḥ sa daityāntako yasyākasmikavardhamānavapuṣastigmadyutermaṇḍalam |
maulau rat‍naruci śrutau parilasattāṭaṅkakānti kramā— jjātaṃ vakṣasi kaustubhābhamudare nābhīsarojopamam || 441 ||
ubhayaparipāṭiryathā—
paṅkaa paṅki vahelia kuvalaa khittaü hadahiṃ vālihiṃ bimba vivillio ghattio candu ṇahahi |
karaṇaaṇāharavaaṇahiṃ tahiṃ līlāvaïhiṃ ṇiasiṭhṭhi vi ucciṭhṭhīṇā iṃ paāvaïhiṃ || 442 ||
(paṅkajaṃ paṅke 'vahelya kuvalayaṃ kṣip‍tvā hrade vṛnte bimbaṃ viprakīrṇaṃ nirastaścandro nabhasi |
karanayanādharavadanaistatra līlāvatyāṃ nijasṛṣṭirapyutsṛṣṭā kiṃ prajāpatinā ||)
(18. paryāyaḥ)
miṣamuktiprakāro 'vasara iti paryāyastridhā | tatra miṣaṃ yathā—(kāvyāda. 2.168)
daśatyasau parabhṛtaḥ sahakārasya mañjarīm |
tamahaṃ vārayiṣyāmi yuvābhyāṃ svairamāsyatām || 443 ||
uktiprakāro yathā—(khapra.)
rājan rājasutā na pāṭhayati māṃ devyo 'pi tūṣṇīṃ sthitāḥ kubje bhojaya māṃ kumāra kuśalaṃ nādyājjuke bhujyate |
itthaṃ nātha śukastavāribhavane mukto 'dhvagaiḥ pañjarā— ccitrasthānavalokya veśmavalabhīṣvekaikamābhāṣate || 444 ||
avasaro yathā—(kusaṃ.4.25)
atha taiḥ paridevitākṣarairhṛdaye digdhaśarairivārditaḥ |
ratimabhyupapattumāturāṃ madhurātmānasadarśayatpuraḥ || 445 ||
(19. atiśayaḥ)
viśeṣasya vivakṣayā lokavṛttānatikrameṇātyukterabhidhānamatiśayaḥ. yathā—
aho viśālaṃ bhūpāla bhuvanatritayodaram |
māti mātumaśakyo 'pi yaśorāśiryadatra te || 446 ||(kāvyāda.2.219)
yathā vā—(kāvyāda. 2.217)
stanayorjaghanasyāpi madhye madhyaṃ priye! tava |
asti nāstīti sandeho na me 'dyāpi nivartate || 447 ||
(20. ākṣepaḥ)
vidhiniṣedhābhyāṃ pratiṣedhoktirākṣepaḥ | sa dvidhā— śuddhamiśrabhedāt | tatra— vidhyākṣepaḥ śuddho yathā—(kāvyāda. 2.141)
gaccha gacchasi cet kānta! panthānaḥ santu te śivāḥ |
mamāpi janma tatraiva bhūyād yatra gato bhavān || 448 ||
miśro yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.82)
alaṃ vivādena yathāśrutastvayā tathāvidhastāvadaśeṣamastu saḥ |
mamātra bhāvaikarasaṃ manaḥ sthitaṃ na kāmavṛttirvacanīyamīkṣate || 449 ||
niṣedhākṣepaḥ śuddho yathā—(kāvyāda. 2.123)
kutaḥ kuvalayaṃ karṇe karoṣi kalabhāṣiṇi! |
kimapāṅgamaparyāp‍tamasmin karmaṇi manyase || 450 ||
miśro yathā—
saccaṃ guruo giriṇo ko bhaṇaï jalāsaā ṇa gambhīrā |
dhīrehiṃ uvamāuṁ taha vi khu maha ṇa tthi ucchāho || 451 ||
(satyaṃ guravo girayaḥ ko bhaṇati jalāśayā na gambhīrāḥ |
dhīrairupamātuṃ tathāpi khalu mama nāstyutsāhaḥ ||)
rodho 'pi niṣedhākṣepa eva | yathā—
kiṃ jampieṇa dahamuha jampiasarisaṃ aṇivvahantassa bharaṃ |
ettia jampiasāraṃ ṇihaṇaṃ aṇṇe vi vajjadhārāsu vaā || 452 ||
(kiṃ jalpitena daśamukha jalpitasadṛśamanirvahato bharam |
etāvad jalpitasāraṃ nidhanamanye 'pi vajradhārāsu gatāḥ ||)
yathā ca—
paürajuāṇo gāmo mahumāso jovvaṇaṃ paī ṭhero |
juṇṇasurā sāhīṇā asaī mā hou kiṃ maraü || 453 ||
(pracurayuvā grāmo madhumāso yauvanaṃ patiḥ sthaviraḥ |
jīrṇasurā svādhīnā asatī mā bhavatu kiṃ mriyatām ||)
(21. viśeṣoktiḥ)
ādhikyena nyūnatayā votkarṣavivakṣā viśeṣoktiḥ | tatra— ādhikyena yathā—(vikra. 3.11)
ayaṃ tayā rathakṣobhādaṃsenāṃso nipīḍitaḥ |
ekaḥ kṛtī śarīre 'smin śeṣamaṅgaṃ bhuvo bharaḥ || 454 ||
nyūnatayā yathā—(kāvyāda. 2.324)
na kaṭhoraṃ na vā tīkṣṇaṃ śastraṃ kusumadhanvanaḥ |
tathāpi jitamevābhūdamunā bhuvanatrayam || 455 ||
(22. śleṣaḥ)
ekapadenānekārthābhidhānaṃ śleṣaḥ |
sa ṣọdhā —abhinnapado, bhinnapadaśca; abhinnakriyo bhinnakriyaśca; abhinnakārako bhinnakārakaśceti | teṣu —
abhinnapado yathā—(kāvyāda. 2.324)
asāvudayamārūḍhaḥ kāntimān raktamaṇḍalaḥ |
rājā harati lokasya hṛdayaṃ mṛdubhiḥ karaiḥ || 456 ||
bhinnapado yathā—(kāvyāda. 2.312)
doṣākareṇa saṃbadh‍nan nakṣatrapathavartinā |
rājñā pradoṣo māmitthamapriyaṃ kiṃ na bādhate || 457 ||
abhinnakriyo yathā—(kāvyāda. 2.316)
svabhāvamadhurāḥ s‍nigdhāḥ śaṃsantyo rāgamulbaṇam |
dṛśo dūtyaśca karṣanti kāntābhiḥ preṣitāḥ priyān || 458 ||
bhinnakriyo1 yathā—(kāvyāda. 2.317)
madhurā rāgavardhinyaḥ komalāḥ kokilāgiraḥ |
ākarṇyante madakalāḥ śliṣyante cāsitekṣaṇāḥ || 459 ||
abhinnakārako yathā—(kāvyāda. 2.319)
kṛṣṇārjunānuraktāpi dṛṣṭiḥ karṇāvalambinī |
yāti viśvasanīyatvaṃ kasya te kalabhāṣiṇi || 460 ||
1. bhinnakārako iti rāghavaḥ |
bhinnakārako yathā—(kāvyāda. 4.229)
gatirveṇī ca nāgena vapurūrū ca rambhayā |
oṣṭhau pāṇī pravālaiśca tasyāstulyatvamāyayuḥ || 461 ||
(23. bhāvikam)
svābhiprāyakathanamanyāpadeśo 'nyabhāvanā ca bhāvikam | teṣu— svabhiprāyakathanaṃ yathā—
ṇāvajjhaï duggejjhiā diṭhṭhammi jammi bhiuḍiā jattha ṇa avvāhārao ghippaï āhāsattae |
vicchuhaï ahiṇiṃta(da)e jattha ṇa so vaassiā taṃ me kahaü māṇaaṃ jaï me icchadu(hi) jīaaṃ || 462 ||
(nābaddha‍yate durgṛhītā dṛṣṭe yasmin bhrukuṭiko yatra nāvyāhāro gṛhyate ābhāṣamāṇe |
vikṣubhyate 'bhinindyate yatra na sa vayasyayā taṃ me kathaya mānaṃ yadi me icchasi jīvanam ||)
anyāpadeśo yathā—
āsāiamaṇṇāeṇa jettiaṃ cia vihīṇa |
oramasu vasaha eh‍iṇaṃ rakkhijjaï gahavaïcchettaṃ || 463 ||
(āsvāditamajñātena yāvat tāvadeva vrīhīṇām |
uparama vṛṣabhedānīṃ rakṣyate gṛhapatikṣetram ||)
anyabhāvanā yathā—(vajjāla 538)
daṃsaṇaliaṃ daḍhakaṃ vibandhaṇaṃ dīharaṃ supariṇāhaṃ |
hoi ghare sāhīṇaṃ musalaṃ ghaṇṇāṇa mahilāṇaṃ || 464 ||
(daṃśanavalitaṃ dṛḍhakaṃ vibandhanaṃ dīrdhaṃ supariṇāham |
bhavati gṛhe svādhīnaṃ musalaṃ dhanyānāṃ mahilānām ||)
udbhedo 'pi bhāvikameva | sa tridhā—avyakto vyakta ubhayātmakaśca |
avyakto yathā—(amaru. 105)
niḥśeṣacyutacandanaṃ stanataṭaṃ nirmṛṣṭarāgo 'dharo netre dūramanañjane pulakitā tanvī taveyaṃ tanuḥ |
mithyāvādini dūti bāndhavajanasyājñātapīḍāgame vāpīṃ s‍nātumito gatāsi na punastasyādhamasyāntikam || 465 ||
vyakto yathā—
atikomalamekato 'nyataḥ sarasāmbhoruhanālakarkaśam |
vahati sphuṭametadeva te vacanaṃ śākapalāśadeśyatām || 466 ||
ubhayarūpo yathā—
pramlānotpalakomale! sakhi! dṛśau nīlāñjanenāñcite karpūracchuraṇācca gaṇḍaphalake saṃvellitaḥ pāṇḍimā |
