yathā rājñaḥ puruṣa iti rājā puruṣaṃ bibharti iti kartṛkarmaṇorbharaṇakriyākṛtaḥ sambandhaḥ, pituḥ putra iti pitāputrayoḥ jananakṛtaḥ sambandhaḥ | vṛkṣasya śākheti vṛkṣe śākhā śākhāsu vā vṛkṣastiṣṭhatīti kartradhikaraṇayoḥ sthitikriyājanitaḥ saṃbandho bhavati |
astu tarhi kārakāṇāmavivakṣā śeṣaḥ |
tanna, sataḥ avivakṣā 'bhāvāt | na hi san ghaṭaḥ avivakṣātaḥ asan bhavati |
yathecchasi tathāstu |
astu tāvatkārakebhyo 'nyaḥ śeṣaḥ |
nanu coktaṃ kārakāṇāṃ sarvatra bhāvānna tato 'nyaḥ kaścidasti śeṣa iti?
astyeveti brūmaḥ |
yadā tāvatkārakādhikaraṇeṣu kriyākārakasambandhaḥ sambandhāntaraṃ janayati tadā bhavati sambandhaḥ kārakebhyo 'nyaḥ | tathā hi — 'rājñaḥ puruṣa ityatra kartṛkarmaṇoḥ bharaṇakriyākṛtena janyajanakalakṣaṇaḥ, vṛkṣasya śākhetyatra sthitikriyākṛtenāvayavā— vayavilakṣaṇa' iti, tatra ṣaṣṭhī bhaviṣyati |
evamanye 'pyaśrūyamāṇakriyāpadāḥ ṣaṣṭhyarthāḥ samunneyāḥ | śrūyamāṇakriyāpadāḥ khalvapi yathā naṭasya śṛṇoti, na granthikasyeti sambandhiśravaṇaṃ ṣaṣṭhyarthaḥ pratīyate | na māṣāṇāmaśnīyāditi pratiṣedho gamyate | 'na te sukhasya jānanti ye na vatsyanti nandane' iti sukhasaṃbandhitayā jñānapratiṣedho 'vadhāryate', evamiha (ākṣipeti padye) duṣkaro mukhaśriya ākṣepaḥ |
śrūyamāṇakriyāpadāḥ ṣaṣṭhyarthāḥ samunneyāḥ, kośadaṇḍasamagratvāt sukaratvaṃ vākyārthatvenāvabodhayannaravindānāṃ saṃbandhitayā na śeṣalakṣaṇāṃ ṣaṣṭhīṃ vigh‍nayati iti | tadetasmin darśana idamuktam— (vāpa. 3.7.156)
sambandhaḥ kārakebhyo 'nyaḥ kriyākārakapūrvakaḥ |
śrutāyāmaśrutāyāṃ vā kriyāyāṃ so 'bhidhīyate || 14 ||
tathā hi— (vāpa. 2.197)
janayitvā kriyā kācit sambandhaṃ vinivartate |
śrūyamāṇe kriyāśabde sambandho jāyate k‍vacit || 15 ||
evaṃ kārakebhyo 'nyaḥ śeṣa iti darśane kimeṣāmasti duṣkaramiti na ṣaṣṭhyanupapattiḥ | athavā punarastu kārakāṇāmavivakṣā śeṣaḥ |
nanu coktaṃ sataḥ kathamavivakṣā?
sato 'pyavivakṣā dṛśyate | yathā— anudarā kanyā, alomikā eḍaketi |
asato 'pi vivakṣā yathā— vindhyo vardhitakaḥ, samudraḥ kuṇḍiketi |
evamiha kimeṣāmasti duṣkaramiti sato 'pi karturavivakṣāyāṃ na tṛtīyā, api (tu) śeṣaṣaṣṭhyeva |
yadi tarhi śrūyamāṇakriyāpado 'pi kārakebhyo 'nyaḥ kārakavivakṣā vā śeṣaḥ, kimarthaṃ 'jño 'vidarthasya karaṇe' ityevamādiḥ ṣaṣṭhīvidhānārthaḥ sūtraprabandhaḥ pāṇineḥ?
na; tasya anyārthatvāt samāsapratiṣedhārthaḥ sa vārttikakṛtā vyākhyātaḥ 'pratipadavidhānā ca ṣaṣṭhī na samasyata' (2.2.10) iti | anyairapyuktam—
1kārakairvyapadiṣṭe ca śrūyamāṇakriyāpade |
śeṣe proktā punaḥ ṣaṣṭhī2 samāsasya nivṛttaye || 16 || (vāpa. 3.7.159)
evamiyamupamāśleṣārthāntaranyāsānāmupakāryopakāritayā pradhānaguṇabhāvena saṃsṛṣṭiḥ | yuktamidam | ayuktaṃ tu tulyakakṣyatayeti |
vākye padārthānāṃ samakakṣyatā pradhānānāṃ vā bhavedapradhānānāṃ vā?
na tāvat pradhānānām, parasparamanapekṣatvena sambandhābhāvāt |
nāpyapradhānānām, pradhānāpekṣatvena parasparānapekṣāyāmasambandhādeva | taduktaṃ 'asambandhaḥ samatvāt syād' (pūmī. 3.1.22) iti | tatkathamucyate tulyakakṣyateti? evaṃ manyate — 'yadotprekṣopamādayo 'laṅkārā vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicāryādinirvartanaparatayā rasāderaṅgatāṃ pratipadyante, tadā bhavatyeva tulyakakṣyate' ti | yathā—
limpatīva tamo 'ṅgāni varṣatīvāñjanaṃ nabhaḥ |
asatpuruṣaseveva dṛṣṭirniṣphalatāṃ gatā || 17 ||
(kāvyāda.2.226, mṛccha.1.34)
'atra limpatīva tamo 'ṅgāni varṣatīvāñjanaṃ nabha' iti dve utprekṣe | 'asatpuruṣaseveva dṛṣṭirniṣphalatāṃ gatā' ityupamā ca varṇanīyasya tamasa uddīpanavibhāvabhūtasya samatayaivotkarṣāpādakatvenāṅgabhāvamupagatā iti nāsti lakṣaṇānupapattiḥ | nanu ca—
1. kārakaiḥ = sādhanaiḥ aiyaraḥ | 2. śeṣe prok‍tā punaḥ = proktā pratipadaṃ — aiyara |
(ivārthāḥ)
ivavad‍vāyathāśabdā samānanibhasannibhāḥ |
tulyasaṅkāśanīkāśaprakāśapratirūpakāḥ || 18 || (kāvyāda. 2.57)
pratipakṣapratidvandvipratyanīkavirodhinaḥ |
sadṛksadṛśasaṃvādisajātīyānuvādinaḥ || 19 ||
pratibimbapraticchandasarūpasamasaprabhāḥ |
salakṣaṇasadṛkṣābhasapakṣopamitopamāḥ || 20 ||
(salohitasanābhisapiṇḍasabrahmacāriṇau |
savarṇatulitau śabdau prakhyapratinidhī api ||)
kalpadeśīyadeśyādyā ye ca nyūnārthavācinaḥ |
samāsaśca bahuvrīhiḥ śaśāṅkavadanādiṣu || 21 ||
spardhate jayati dveṣṭi druhyati pratigarjati |
ākrośatyavajānāti kadarthayati nindati || 22 ||
viḍambayati saṃrundhe hasatīrṣyatyasūyati |
tasya muṣṇāti saubhāgyaṃ tasya kāntiṃ vilumpati || 23 ||
tena sārdhaṃ vigṛh‍ṇāti tulāṃ tenādhirohati |
tatpadavyāṃ padaṃ dhatte tasya kakṣyāṃ vigāhate || 24 ||
tamanvetyanubadh‍nāti tacchīlaṃ tanniṣedhati |
tasya cānukarotīti śabdāḥ sādṛśyasūcakāḥ || 25 || (kāvyāda. 2.58–64)
tatkathamucyate 'limpatīva tamo 'ṅgāni varṣatīvāñjanaṃ nabha' iti dve utprekṣe, na tūpame, iti ? ivo hi vākyāntaraprayujyamāna upamānopameyayoḥ sādṛśyāvadyotane nirūḍhaśaktiḥ, sa ihāpi tadartha eva bhavitumarhatīti |
naivam | upamānopameyaśabdapratipannasya sādṛśyāvadyotanamivena kriyate | na ca limpatītyevamādau tamaso nabhaso vā dvitīyamupameyamupamānaṃ vāsti, yena tayoḥ sādṛśyāvadyotanāya ivaḥ prayujyate |
evaṃ tarhi ivaśrutisāmarthyāt tamaso nabhasaśca dvitīyamupamānadvayamupasthāpayiṣyate | yathā praviśa piṇḍīmiti praveśanakriyā svayogyaṃ karmopasthāpayati— praviśa gṛhaṃ, piṇḍīkarmāpi svayogyāṃ kriyāṃ piṇḍīṃ bhakṣayeti | evamihāpi ivaḥ tamasi nabhasi vopameye upamānamaparamupasthāpayiṣyatīti |
naivam | na hi tiṅantenopamānamasti |
kā punaratropapattiḥ ?
ucyate— satyupameye sati copamāne tayośca tulye dharme satyupamānopameyabhāvaḥ, nāsati | na ceha tamaso nabhaso vā saṃbandhyupamānamupameyaṃ vāsti, yadāśraya upamānopameyabhāvaḥ kalpyate |
nanu ca ivaśrutireva tamaso nabhasaśca yogyamupamānamupasthāpayiṣyati praviśapiṇḍīnyāyena | viṣama upanyāsaḥ | praveśanakriyā svasiddhaye sarvaṃ karmakārakamākṣipati | tatra prasiddhitaḥ pratyāsannaṃ gṛhameva gamyate | na caivamivasya kiṃcit sāmarthyamasti, yena svārthasiddhaye prasiddhamupamānaṃ tamaso nabhaso vā samupasthāpayati | upamānopameyabhāvamantareṇāpyasya prayogadarśanāt | yathā 'kathamivaitad bhaviṣyati' iti | astu tarhi limpatiṃtamasorvarṣatinabhasoścopamānopameyabhāvaḥ | bhavatvevam | kiṃ tu upamānopameyayostulyadharmo na dṛśyate, ya upamānopameyabhāvāya prabhavati | kimanyena lepanaṃ limpater, varṣaṇaṃ vā varṣateḥ, dharmiṇo 'nyaḥ kaścid dharmo bhavitumīṣṭe |
nanu ca yathā rāhoḥ śira iti bhedābhāve 'pyavayavāvayavibhāvaḥ tannibandhanā ca vyatirekaṣaṣṭhī, evaṃ limpaterlepanaṃ varṣateśca varṣaṇaṃ dharmo bhaviṣyatīti |
maivam | iha dvayaṃ cakāsti, dhāturlimpatirvarṣatiśca, tadartho lepanaṃ varṣaṇaṃ ca | tayoryadyupameyasya tamaso nabhaso vā limpatirvarṣatirvā dhāturupamānaṃ syāt tasya tena sādṛśyaṃ kiṃ syāt ?
atha yathāmī bhāvāḥ sarve sārūpyaṃ na dadhati evamasārūpyamapi na | tataścāstitvā— bhidheyatvajñeyatvādibhiḥ sarvatra pravartatāmupamānopameyabhāva iti nyāyāt tamaso limpatirnabhaso varṣatirupamānaṃ bhaviṣyati | yadyevaṃ limpatiriva tamaḥ varṣatiriva nabha iti prāp‍noti, na limpatīva varṣatīveti | tato lepanaṃ varṣaṇameva avaśiṣyate | tatkimastu tulyo dharma upamānadharmī vā ? yadi tulyo dharmaḥ mārgaṇīya upamānadharmī, yadyupamānadharmī mārgaṇīyastulyo dharmaḥ | sa ceha nāsti |
atha yathā rāhoḥ śira iti bhedābhāve 'pyavayavāvayavibhāvaḥ, tatheha dharmadharmibhāvo 'pi bhaviṣyati |
naivam | upamānopameyabhāvasya bhedasādṛśyapratipattinibandhanatvāt tadabhāve 'pi yastaṃ manyate sa kathaṃ nonmattaḥ syāt ? taduktam— (kāvyāda. 2.229)
'sa eva dharmo dharmī cetyanunmatto na bhāṣate' || 26 ||
astu tarhi tiṅvācyaḥ kartopamānamiti |
nyagbhūto 'sau kriyāpade |
kathaṃ punarasau kriyāpade nyagbhavati ?
śrūyatām ṣaḍarthāstiṅantena pratīyante— 'kriyā, kālaḥ, upagrahaḥ, sādhanaṃ, saṅkhyā, puruṣa' iti | teṣu kriyākālātmanepadanimittāni prakṛtirābhidhatte | pratyayaḥ, sādhanaṃ, saṅkhyāṃ, puruṣaṃ ca | eteṣāṃ tu kriyārthatvāt kriyā pradhānaṃ, kālātmanepadanimitte kriyāviśeṣaṇatvena, saṃkhyāpuruṣau sādhanaviśeṣaṇatvena tayoreva nyagbhavataḥ | sādhanaṃ punaḥ 'prakṛtipratyayau pratyayārthaṃ saha brūta iti nyāyāt pradhānabhūtamapi 'bhūtaṃ bhavyāyopa— diśyate' iti nyāyena kriyāsiddhāvupāttavyāpāraṃ parārthatayā kriyāyāṃ nyagbhavati | tenāyaṃ kartā svakriyāsiddhāvākulaḥ kathamupamānatvenopameyatvena vānyadapekṣituṃ kṣamate ? evaṃ tarhi yo 'ṅgāni limpati yo 'ñjanaṃ varṣati tena kriyopalakṣitena kartrā tulyaṃ tamo nabhaścetyarthaḥ pratipatsyate |
naivam | kriyopalakṣitasya karturupamānabhūtasya śabdanyāyabalād apratipatteḥ | taduktam— (kāvyāda. 1.75)
na hi pratītiḥ subhagā śabdanyāyavilaṅghinī || 27 ||
athādhyāhārādibhiridamapi syāt | tathāpi tulyadharmo mārgaṇīyaḥ | tadvadeva vipratipatteḥ | na ca candramukhādivadanabhidhīyamānasyāpi tulyaguṇasya saṃpratyayo bhavatīti vācyam |
yathenduriva te vaktramiti kāntiḥ pratīyate |
na tathā lepavarṣābhyāmanyadatra pratīyate || 28 || (kāvyāda. 2.232)
tadupaśleṣaṇārtho 'yaṃ limpatirdhvāntakartṛkaḥ |
aṅgakarmā ca puṃsaivamutprekṣyata itīṣyatām || 29 || (kāvyāda. 2.233)
evamañjanakarmāpi varṣatirvyomakartṛkaḥ |
kṣaraṇārthaśca vidudbhirutprekṣyata itīṣyatām || 30 ||1
manye śaṅke dhruvaṃ prāyo nūnamityevamādibhiḥ |
utprekṣā vyajyate śabdairivaśabdo 'pi tādṛśaḥ || 31 || (kāvyāda. 2.234)
ataḥ sthitametat | utprekṣādvayasyopamāyāśca tamovarṇanaparatayā tulyakakṣyatvenaiṣāṃ saṃsṛṣṭiriti | sā ca nānalaṅkārasaṅkara ityuktam |
1. śloka eṣa kāvyādarśe nopalabhyata iti rāghavaḥ, itaḥ 2.234 tamarūpeṇa yojya iti vayam |
(guṇarasādīnāmalaṅkāratvam)
tatrālaṅkārasaṅkaraḥ (alaṅkāra—)saṃsṛṣṭirityeva vaktavye nānāgrahaṇaṃ guṇarasādīnā— mapyalaṅkāratāpratipattyartham | teṣāmapi kāvyaśobhākaratvenālaṅkāratvāt | yadāha—
kāvyaśobhākarān dharmānalaṅkārān pracakṣate |
te cādyāpi vikalpyante kastān kārts‍nyena vakṣyati || 32 || (kāvyāda. 2.1,3)
api ca—
kāścinmārgavibhāgārthamuktāḥ prāgapyalaṅkriyāḥ |
sādhāraṇamalaṅkārajātamadya pradarśyate || 33 || (kāvyāda. 2.1,3)
tatra kāvyaśobhākarānityanena śleṣopamādivad guṇarasabhāvatadābhāsatatpraśamānapyu— pasaṃgṛh‍ṇāti | mārgavibhāgakṛd‍guṇānāmalaṅkriyā(yo)padeśena śleṣādīnāṃ guṇatvamivā— laṅkāratvamapi bodhayati | kiṃ ca—
śleṣaḥ prasādaḥ samatā mādhuryaṃ sukumāratā |
arthavyaktirudāratvamojaḥkāntisamādhayaḥ || 34 ||
iti vaidarbhamārgasya prāṇā daśa guṇāḥ smṛtāḥ |
teṣāṃ viparyayaḥ prāyo lakṣyate gauḍavartmani || 35 || (kāvyāda. 1.41,42).
iti śleṣādīnāṃ daśānāmeva mārgapravibhāgakāritāṃ bruvatā kāvyaśobhākaratvena guṇāntarāṇāmapyalaṅkāratvamuktaṃ bhavati | tadāha—'kastān kārts‍nyena vakṣyatī'ti |
yuktamidam, ayuktaṃ tu rasādīnāmalaṅkārateti, teṣāṃ guṇānāmivālaṅkāra— vyapadeśābhāvāt
nāyuktam, yuktotkarṣāṇām ūrjasvirasavatpreyasāmalaṅkāreṣūpadeśāt | tadyathā—
preyaḥ priyatarākhyānaṃ rasavad rasapeśalam |
ūrjasvi rụ̄dhāhaṅkāraṃ yuktotkarṣaṃ ca tattrayam || 36 || (kāvyāda. 2.275)
tatra ūrjasvi rụ̄dhāhaṅkāramityanenātmaviśeṣaniṣṭhasyotkṛṣṭādṛṣṭajanmano 'nekajanmā nubhavasaṃskārā ' 'sāditadrạdhim‍naḥ samagrātmaguṇasampadudayātiśayahetorahaṅkāraviśeṣasyopa saṃgrahādahaṅkārābhimānaśṛṅgārādyaparanām‍no rasasya mānamayavikārarūpeṇābhimānināṃ manasi jāgrataḥ pūrvāṃ koṭimupavarṇayati | yadāha—
sattvātmanāmamaladharmaviśeṣajanmā janmāntarānubhavanirmitavāsanotthaḥ |
sarvātmasampadudayātiśayaikaheturjāgarti ko 'pi hṛdi mānamayo vikāraḥ ||
aho aho namo mahyaṃ yadahaṃ vīkṣito 'nayā |
mugdhayā trastasāraṅgataralāyatanetrayā || 38 ||
tathā ca—
tiṣṭhantyā janasaṃkule 'pi sudṛśā sāyaṃ gṛhaprāṅgaṇe tatkālaṃ mayi nissahākulatanau bāhau mṛdu preṅkhati |
hrīnamrānanayaiva lolasaralaṃ niḥśvasya tatrāntare premārdrāḥ śaśikhaṇḍapāṇḍimamuṣo muktāḥ kaṭākṣacchaṭāḥ || 39 ||
rasavad rasapeśalamityanena vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicārisaṃyogād rasaniṣpattiriti ratyādirūpeṇānekadhā 'virbhavato 'bhivardhamānasya paraprakarṣagāminaḥ śṛṅgārasya madhyamāma— vasthāmavasthāpayati | yadāha—
ratyādayo 'rdhaśatamekavivarjitā hi bhāvāḥ pṛthagvidhavibhāvabhuvo bhavanti |
śṛṅgāratattvamabhitaḥ parivārayantaḥ sap‍tārciṣaṃ dyuticayā iva vardhayanti ||
tadyathā—
atrāntare kimapi vāgvibhavātivṛtta— vaicitryamullasitavibhramamutpalākṣyāḥ |
tad bhūrisāttvikavikāramapāstadhairya— mācāryakaṃ kimapi mānmathamāvirāsīt || 41 || (māmā. 1.29)
yathā ca— rāhoścandrakalāmivānanacarīmityādi' | (māmā. 5.28)
'preyaḥ priyatarākhyānami'tyanena ca samastabhāvamūrdhābhiṣiktāṃyā rateḥ paraprakarṣā— dhigamād bhāvanāpathātikrame bhāvarūpatāmullaṅghya premarūpeṇa pariṇatāyā upādānād bhāvāntarāṇāmapi paraprakarṣādhigame rasarūpeṇa pariṇatiriti jñāpayannahaṅkārasyottarāṃ koṭimupalakṣayati | yadāha—
ābhāvanodayamananyadhiyā janena yo bhāvyate manasi bhāvanayā sa bhāvaḥ |
yo bhāvanāpathamatītya vivarttamānaḥ sāhaṃkṛte hṛdi paraṃ svadate raso 'sau ||
tadyathā—
yadeva rocate mahyaṃ tadeva kurute priyā |
iti vetti na jānāti tat priyaṃ yat karoti sā || 43 ||
yathā ca—(u.rā.ca. 1.39)
advaitaṃ sukhaduḥkhayoranugataṃ sarvāsvavasthāsu yad viśrāmo hṛdayasya yatra jarasā yasminnahāryo rasaḥ |
kālenāvaraṇātyayāt pariṇate yat s‍nehasāre sthitaṃ bhadraṃ tasya sumānuṣasya kathamapyekaṃ hitaṃ prāpyate || 44 ||
'yuktotkarṣaṃ ca tattrayami'tyanenāyuktotkarṣāṇāṃ trayāṇāmapyūrjasvirasavatpreyasāṃ guṇatvameva, nālaṅkāratvamiti jñāpayati | tathā hyaurjityaṃ bhāvikatvaṃ preya' iti padaistrayo 'pyete guṇeṣūpadiṣṭāḥ |
kutaḥ punaretat, yadekadorjasvirasavatpreyasāmalaṅkāratvam, anyadā guṇatvam ?
ucyate—(mabhā. 5.2.94)
bhūmanindāpraśaṃsāsu nityayoge 'tiśāyane |
saṃsarge 'stivivakṣāyāṃ bhavanti matubādayaḥ || 45 || iti |
yathā— gomān deśaḥ, vācālo vaṭuḥ, vaggmī vipaścit, kṣīriṇo vṛkṣāḥ, balavān mallaḥ, daṇḍimatī śāleti | tatrorjasvirasavatoralaṅkāratvavivakṣāyāmatiśāyane bhūm‍ni vā matvarthīyaḥ | guṇatvavivakṣāyāṃ tu praśaṃsānityayogayorityāpi draṣṭavyam | nityo hi kāvye guṇayoga iva rasāviyogaḥ | guṇavato rasavataśca niścitaivāsya praśaṃsā, saṃsargastu guṇānāmavaśyopādānena | nindā punardoṣahānena bādhitā nāvatarati | preya ityayaṃ tvātiśāyanikaḥ | tadāha 'preyaḥ priyatarākhyānam' iti |
nanvalaṅkāreṣu guṇeṣu vā preya iti rūpābhedāt kathamalaṅkāratve tadutkarṣapratītiḥ ?
yathā 'yudhiṣṭhiraḥ śreṣṭhatamaḥ kuruṇām' iti | tatrātiśāyanikāntareṇa tadgatiriti cedihāpi yuktotkarṣaṃ ca tat trayamiti vākyāntareṇa bhaviṣyati | na vātiśāyanikāḥ svārthātiriktaṃ kimapi bruvate, api tu prakṛtyupāttameva prakarṣādikaṃ gamayanti, svārthikeṣu teṣāṃ vidhānāt |
atha rasavaditi kiṃ matvarthīyaḥ, uta vatiḥ ?
kiṃcātaḥ ?
yadi matvarthīyaḥ, matvarthānupapattestadabhāvaḥ | rasā hi sukhaduḥkhāvasthārūpāḥ | te ca śarīriṇāṃ caitanyavatām, na kāvyasya, tasya śabdārtharūpatayā acetanatvena bhūmanindādīnāmabhāvāt |
atha vatiḥ, vatyarthānupapattestadabhāvaḥ | 'tena tulyaṃ kriyā cedvatiḥ', 'tatra tasyeva' | na ca rasaistulyaṃ vartata iti rasavat | nāpi rasa ivātra rasasyevāsya kiñcidastīti |
yathecchasi tathāstu |
astu tāvanmatvarthīyaḥ |
nanu coktaṃ matvarthābhāvāt tadanupapattiḥ ? rasavato rāmāderyad vacanaṃ tad‍ rasamūlatvād rasavat, abhedasamadhyāropāc‍ca kavinā anukriyamāṇasya tasyānukaraṇamapi rasavat |
athavā punarastu vatiḥ |
nanu coktaṃ vatyarthānupapatterna vatiḥ |
atrāpi nānupapattiḥ | 'tadarham' (5.1.117) iti vacanād vatirbhaviṣyati | rasān pratipādayituṃ yadarhati tad rasavat | arhati ca rasavad rāmādivacanamanukriyamāṇamabheda— samadhyāropād rasān pratipādayitumiti rasavad bhavati |
nanu ca sarveṣāmapyupādeyānāṃ kāvyaśobhākaratvādalaṅkāratve vyavacchedyābhāvāt saṅkaraḥ saṃsṛṣṭirityetāvadeva vācyaṃ bhavati |
naivam; evaṃ sati vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicārisaṃyogād rasaniṣpattiriti vibhāvādisaṅkarasyāpi saṃsṛṣṭitvaṃ prāp‍noti | tadalaṅkāragrahaṇena nivartyate | na hi vibhāvādayo 'laṅakārāḥ, api tu bhāvarasatadābhāsānāmalaṅkārāṇāmabhiniṣpatti— hetavo 'rthaviśeṣāḥ |
nanvevamapyarthaguṇatvādamīṣāmapyalaṅkāratvaṃ prāp‍noti |
satyametat kintvanyaparatayā ta upādīyamānāstatraiva nyagbhavanti, na vākyārthapratītau padārthāḥ pṛthak sphurantīti |
tatra bhāvānāmalaṅkārairguṇairbhāvaiśca saṃkaro bhavati, na rasatadābhāsaiḥ, teṣāṃ tadaṅgatvāt | rasānāmalaṅkārairguṇai rasabhāvaiśca saṅkaro bhavati, na bhāvarasābhāsaiḥ, bhāvānāṃ rasāṅgatvādābhāsānāṃ tu rasavirodhāt | ābhāsānāmalaṅkārairguṇairābhāsaiśca. saṅkaro bhavati, na rasabhāvairvirodhibhāvāṅgabhāvābhyāmeveti |
nanu cāṅgāṅginoḥ saṃkaravyavahārābhāve kathamuktam—(kāvyāda. 2.260)
aṅgāṅgibhāvāvasthānaṃ sarveṣāṃ samakakṣyatā |
ityalaṅkārasaṃsṛṣṭerlakṣaṇīyā dvayī gatiḥ || 46 || iti |
udāhṛtaṃ ca ākṣipantyaravindānītyādi |
ucyate— yatra pṛthaksiddhayoruktibalādupakāryopakārakatvādināṅgāṅgibhāvo '— vasthāpyate tatraiva saṃsṛṣṭiḥ | yatra punarapṛthaksiddhayorevālaṅkārayoḥ (rasabhāvayoḥ) vāgārambhakatvenārabhyatvena vāvasthitayoḥ svābhāvika upaśleṣaḥ tatra saṃkaravyavahāro na pravartate | yathā anantara evodāharaṇe hetvarthāntaranyāsayoḥ; arthāntaranyāso hi hetunaivārabhyate | yadāha— (kāvyāda. 2.169)
jñeyaḥ so 'rthāntaranyāso vastu prastutya kiṃcana |
tatsādhanasamarthasya nyāso yo 'nyasya vastunaḥ || 47 ||
tatrārthāntaranyāsa iti lakṣyanirdeśaḥ | vastu prastutya kiṃcana, tatsādhanasamarthasya nyāso yo 'nyasya vastuna iti lakṣaṇanirdeśaḥ | vastu prastutyānyasya vastunaḥ etāvatyucyamāne ghaṭo 'stītyatrāpi prasaṅgaḥ, tadarthamāha tatsādhanasamarthasyeti | na caitad vācyaṃ dhūmo 'yamag‍nerityatrāpyarthāntaranyāsaḥ prasajet | yadyapi dhūmasyotpādyasya sādhanasamartho 'g‍niḥ, tathāpi 'kāvyaśobhākarān dharmānalaṅkārān pracakṣate' ityetadapi sarvālaṅkārasādhāraṇaṃ lakṣaṇamanusarttavyam | asmin sati sarvālaṅkārajātayo vakroktyabhidhānavācyā bhavanti | taduktam— (kāvyāda. 2.363)
'vakratvameva kāvyānāṃ parā bhūṣeti bhāmahaḥ |' (iti)
śleṣaḥ puṣṇāti sarvāsu prāyo vakroktiṣu śriyam || 48 || (iti ca)
nanvevaṃ sati vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicārisaṃyogād rasaniṣpattirityādinā na bhavitavyamevālaṅkāreṇa |
naivam |
trividhaḥ khalvalaṅkāravargaḥ — vakroktiḥ, svabhāvoktiḥ, rasoktiriti |
1. tatropamādyalaṅkāraprādhānye vakroktiḥ,
2. śleṣādiguṇaprādhānye svabhāvoktiḥ,
3. vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicārisaṃyogāt tu rasaniṣpattau rasoktiriti |
tatra dvividho vibhāvaḥ — ālambanavibhāva uddīpanavibhāvaśca |
tayorālambanavibhāva iṣṭāniṣṭasaṃdarśanādiḥ, yamālambya sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ cotpadyate | tena sukhaduḥkhaviṣayeṇānubhāvena smaraṇahetuḥ saṃskāro janyate |
saṃskāraprabodhahetavaḥ punaruddīpanavibhāvāḥ ṛtumālyavilepanādayaḥ | taiḥ pratibuddhasaṃskārasya smaraṇecchādveṣaprayat‍nāḥ tebhyo manovāg‌‍buddhiśarīrārambhāḥ te 'nubhūyamānatvādanubhāvāḥ | tairayamabhipravardhamāna īpsitamarthamāsādayan jihāsitaṃ jihānaḥ sukhātmakairvyabhicāribhiḥ harṣadhṛtismṛtimatiprabhṛtibhiḥ saṃsṛjyamānaḥ samāsāditottarottara— ratyādisthāyibhāvaḥ śṛṅgāraprabhava eva sambhogaśṛṅgārādirasarūpatāmadhigacchati | sa eva tvīpsitānavāp‍tau jihāsitasya ahānāt, duḥkhātmakairvyabhicāribhiścintautsukyā— veganirvedādibhiḥ saṃsṛjyamāno duḥkhātmakavipralambhaśṛṅgārādirasarūpatāmadhyāste | tatra—
(bhāvebhyo rasaniṣpattiḥ)
rateḥ śṛṅgāraniṣpattiryathā— (kāvyāda. 2.280)
mṛteti pretya saṅgantuṃ yayā me maraṇaṃ matam |
saiṣāvantī mayā labdhā kathamatraiva janmani || 49 ||
atrāvantyā vāsavadattāyā ālambanavibhāvabhūtāyāḥ sakāśādutpanne vatseśvarasya ratau sthāyibhāve tasyāḥ punarjīvanādibhiruddīpanavibhāvairuddīpyamane, samutpanneṣu harṣadhṛtismṛti— vitarkaprabhṛtiṣu sukhātmakeṣu vyabhicāriṣu sambhogaśṛṅgāratāṃ prāp‍te sthāyini yadetadanubhāvarūpaṃ mṛtetyādivacanaṃ vatseśvarasya tacchṛṅgārarasādupajāyamānaṃ rasavaducyate |
hāsāddhāsyaniṣpattiryathā— (kāvyāda. 2.289)
idamamlānamānāyā lag‍naṃ stanataṭe tava |
chādyatāmuttarīyeṇa navaṃ nakhapadaṃ sakhi ! || 50 ||
atra kāṃcitsakhīṃ pūrvaṃ bhartari parigṛhītamānāṃ tenaiva navanakhapadāṅkitastanīmālambana— vibhāvabhūtāmupālabhamānāyāḥ kasyāścit sakhyā utpanne hāsasthāyibhāve tadīyamāna— parigrahasmaraṇādibhiruddīpanavibhāvairuddīpyamāne samutpanneṣu śaṅkāvahitthaharṣagadgadādiṣu vyabhicāriṣu paraprakarṣādhigamād dhāsyarasatāmāpanne sthāyini yadetadamlānamānādivacanaṃ taddhāsyarasasamud‍bhūtaṃ rasavaducyate |
utsāhād vīraniṣpattiryathā—(kāvyāda. 2.284)
ajitvā sārṇavāmurvīmaniṣṭvā vividhairmakhaiḥ |
adattvā cārthamarthibhyo bhaveyaṃ pārthivaḥ katham || 51 ||
atra vasudhāvijayādeśalambanavibhāvādutpanne sthāyinyutsāhabhāve tejaḥsthairyadhairyādi—
bhiruddīpanavibhāvairuddīpyamāne samutpanneṣu smṛtimativitarkaprabhṛtiṣu vyabhicāriṣu paraprakarṣā— dhigamād vīrarasatāmāpanne sthāyini vīrarasātmanaḥ puṃso yadetadajitvetyādivacanaṃ tad vīrarasādupajāyamānaṃ rasavaducyate |
vismayādad‍bhutaniṣpattiryathā—(kāvyāda. 2.290)
aṃśukāni pravālāni puṣpaṃ hārādibhūṣaṇam |
phalaṃ madhūni harmyāṇi śākhā nandanaśākhinām || 52 ||
atra śākhināṃ pravālapuṣpaphalaśākhāsampattirnijaṃ rūpaṃ; nandanaśākhināṃ punaḥ pravālādisthāneṣu aṃśukahāramaṇimandirāṇi, tadetadāścaryameteṣāmataścaitebhya ālambana— vibhāvebhyaḥ kasyacid devabhūmigatasyotpanne vismayasthāyibhāve tadīyāvayavadarśanā— dibhiruddīpanavibhāvairuddīpyamāne samutpanneṣu harṣaromodgamasvedagadgadādiṣu vyabhicāriṣu paraprakarṣādhigamādad‍bhutarasatvamāpanne sthāyini yadetadaṃśukāni prāvālānītyādivacanaṃ tadad‍bhutarasādupajāyamānaṃ rasavaducyate |
krodhād raudraniṣpattiryathā— (kāvyāda. 2.282)
nigṛhya keśeṣvākṛṣṭā kṛṣṇā yena mamāgrataḥ |
so 'yaṃ duśśāsanaḥ pāpo labdhaḥ kiṃ jīvati kṣaṇam || 53 ||
atra duśśāsanālambanavibhāvāya krudhyato bhīmasenasya pūrvamutpanne krodhasthāyibhāve tadavāp‍teḥ smaryamāṇasamakṣakṛtadraupadīkeśakarṣaṇādibhiruddīpanavibhāvairuddīpyamāne samutpanneṣu asūyāvegavipathuśramādiṣu duḥkhātmakeṣu vyabhicāriṣu paraṃ prakarṣamadhirụ̄dhe raudrarasatāmāpanne sthāyinī yadetad bhīmasenasya nigṛhyetyādivacastad raudrarasādupajāyamānaṃ rasavaducyate |
bhayād bhayānakaniṣpattiryathā— (kāvyāda. 2.291)
idaṃ maghonaḥ kuliśaṃ dhārāsannihitānalam |
smaraṇaṃ yasya daityastrīgarbhapātāya kalpate || 54 ||
atra mahendrakuliśād dhārāsannihitānalādālambanavibhāvāt smaryamāṇādapi daityastrīṇāmutpanne bhayasthāyibhāve tad‍‌vidīrṇadānavamaraṇasmaraṇādibhiḥ uddīpanavibhāvairuddīpyamāne samutpanneṣu svedastambhavaivarṇyavepathuprabhṛtiṣu vyabhicāriṣu sthāyino bhayānakarasatāmāpannasya garbhapātādibhiranubhāvairvibhāvyamānasya svarūpasūcakaṃ yadetadidaṃ maghonaḥ kuliśamityādivacanaṃ tadapi tanmūlatvād rasavaducyate |
śokāt karuṇaniṣpattiryathā—(kāvyāda. 2.286)
yasyāḥ kusumaśayyāpi komalāṅgyā rujākarī |
sādhiśete kathaṃ devī hutāśanavatīṃ citām || 55 ||
atra cālambanavibhāvabhūtād devīmaraṇādutpanne śokasthāyibhāve citāniveśana— hutāśanajvālādibhiruddīpanavibhāvairuddīpyamāne samutpanneṣu nirvedaglānicintāstambhādiṣu vyabhicāriṣu paraprakarṣāt karuṇarasatāmāpanne sthāyini karuṇarasavato nāyakasya yadetad yasyāḥ kusumaśayyāpītyādivacanaṃ tat karuṇarasādupajāyamānamanubhāvarūpaṃ rasavaducyate |
jugupsāyā bībhatsaniṣpattiryathā—(kāvyāda. 2.288)
pāyaṃ pāyaṃ tavārīṇāṃ śoṇitaṃ pāṇisampuṭaiḥ |
kauṇapāssaha nṛtyanti kabandhairāntrabhūṣaṇāḥ || 56 ||
atrālambanavibhāvabhūtebhyaḥ kauṇapebhyaḥ kasyacid‍rājño vijayaśaṃsinaḥ puṃsa utpanne jugupsāsthāyibhāve śiraśchedavigalad‍rudhiradhārāpariplutapranartitakabandhāntrabhūṣaṇaśoṇita— pānādibhiruddīpanavibhāvairuddīpyamāne samutpanneṣu bhayāvegaśaṅkāvahitthādiṣu vyabhicāriṣu parāṃ koṭimadhirụ̄dhe bībhatsarasatāmāpanne sthāyini yadetat pāyaṃpāyamityādivacanaṃ tad bībhatsarasādupajāyamānaṃ rasavaducyate | evamete aṣṭāveva ratyādayo bhūmānamāpannāḥ śṛṅgāravīrādivyapadeśaṃ labhante |
(rasebhyo rasaniṣpattiḥ)
yathā caite bhāvebhyo rasāḥ rasebhyo bhāvāḥ tathā rasebhyaśca rasā bhavantīti bharatācāryaḥ | tatra—
śṛṅgārāddhāsyarasaniṣpattiryathā— (dra. atraiva 10.2)
sa eṣa bhuvanatrayaprathitasaṃyamaśśaṅkaro bibharti vapuṣādhunā virahakātaraḥ kāminīm |
anena kila nirjitā vayamiti priyāyāḥ karaṃ kareṇa parighaṭṭayan jayati jātahāsaḥ smaraḥ || 57 ||
vīrādadbhutaniṣpattiryathā—
sampratyeva hi gograhe yadabhavat tat tāvadākarṇyatā— metat te hṛdayaṃ spṛśāmi yadi vā sākṣī tavaivātmajaḥ |
ekaḥ pūrvamudāyudhaissubahubhirdṛṣṭastato 'nantaraṃ yāvanto vayamāhavapraṇayinaḥ tāvanta evārjunāḥ || 58 ||
raudrāt karuṇaniṣpattiryathā—(mavīca. 2.20)
sattvabhraṃśaviṣādibhiḥ kathamapi trastaiḥ kṣaṇaṃ vetribhi— rdṛṣṭo dṛṣṭinipātajihmitamukhairavyāhataprakramaḥ |
rāmānveṣaṇatatparaḥ parijanairunmuktahāhāravaṃ kanyāntaḥpurameva hā praviśati kruddho munirbhārgavaḥ || 59 ||
bībhatsād bhayānakaniṣpattiryathā—(mavīca.1.35)
āntraprotabṛhatkapālanalakakrūrak‍vaṇatkaṅkaṇa— prāyapreṅkhitabhūribhūṣaṇaravairāghoṣayantyambaram |
pītaccharditaraktakardamaghanaprāgbhāraghorollasad— vyālolastanabhārabhairavavapurbandhoṛtaṃ dhāvati || 60 ||
etac‍cāyuktaṃ, yato 'mī ratyādayaḥ paraṃ prakarṣamārụ̄dhā bhāvā eva, na rasāḥ, tathātve harṣādīnāmapi rasatvaprasaṅgāt | tadāha—
ratyādayo yadi rasāḥ syuratiprakarṣe harṣādibhiḥ kimaparāddhamatad‍‌vibhinnaiḥ |
na sthāyinasta iti ced bhayahāsaśoka— krodhādayo vada kiyac‍ciramulasanti || 61 ||
na cāṣṭāveveti niyamaḥ, yataḥ śāntaṃ preyāṃsamuddhatamūrjasvinaṃ ca kecid rasamācakṣate | tanmūlāśca kila nāyakānāṃ dhīrapraśāntadhīralalitadhīroddhatadhīrodātta— vyapadeśāḥ | teṣu —
dhīrapraśāntāśrayaḥ śānto yathā—
sarvāssampattayastasya santuṣṭaṃ yasya mānasam |
upānad‍gūḍhapādasya nanu carmāstṛtaiva bhūḥ || 62 ||
dhīralalitāśrayaḥ preyān yathā—
yadeva rocate mahyaṃ tadeva kurute priyā |
iti vetti na jānāti tat priyaṃ yat karoti sā || 63 ||
dhīroddhatāśraya uddhato yathā—(vesaṃ. 3.46)
dhṛtāyudho yāvadahaṃ tāvadanyaiḥ kimāyudhaiḥ |
yadvā na siddhamastreṇa mama tat kena setsyati || 64 ||
dhīrodāttāśraya ūrjasvī yathā—(kāvyāda. 2.293)
apakartāhamasmīti mā te manasi bhūd bhayam |
vimukheṣu na me khaṅgaḥ prahartuṃ jātu vāñchati || 65 ||
atra ca śamaprakṛtiḥ śāntaḥ, s‍nehaprakṛtiḥ preyān, garvaprakṛtiruddhataḥ, ahaṅkāraprakṛtiḥ punarūrjasvīti śṛṅgārādivadeteṣvapi vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicārisaṃyogo draṣṭavyaḥ |
anye tvāhuḥ — sarva eva ratyādayo vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicārisaṃyogādutpadyamānāḥ bhūmānamāpannā rasībhavanti | tathā hi— (rudraṭā. 12.4)
rasanād rasatvameṣāṃ madhurādīnāmivoktamācāryaiḥ |
nirvedādiṣvapi tat prakāmamastīti te 'pi rasāḥ || 66 ||
sarveṣāṃ ca tulye rasatve ratyādīnāmeva paraprakarṣagāmināṃ śṛṅgāravīrādivyapadeśa iti na ghaṭate | tathātve vā nāmamātraṃ bhidyate | taduktam—
vīrādbhutādiṣu ca yeha rasaprasiddhiḥ siddhā kuto 'pi vaṭayakṣavadāvibhāti |
loke gatānugatikatvavaśādupetā metāṃ nivartayitumeṣa pariśramo naḥ || 67 ||
yadi ca ratyādayaḥ prakarṣagāmino bhāvā eva rasāḥ, kathamucyate bhāvebhyo rasā iti ?
rasebhyo bhāvā ityapyayuktam | na hi bahavo rasāḥ, api tveka eva śṛṅgāro rasa ityagrato 'pi prabandhena pratipādayiṣyate |
yac‍coktaṃ rasebhyaśca rasā iti, tatra yadyālambanavibhāvabhūtebhya iti mataṃ, tadā
śṛṅgārāt tu bhaveddhāsyo raudrāt tu karuṇo rasaḥ |
vīrāc‍caivādbhuto nāma bībhatsāt tu bhayānakaḥ || 68 || (nāśā. 6.38)
iti niyamo na ghaṭate,
yataḥ śṛṅgārādanyato 'pi hāsya utpadyamāno dṛśyate, yathā—
hastālambitamakṣasūtravalayaṃ karṇāvataṃsīkṛtaṃ strastaṃ bhrūyugamunnamayya racitaṃ yajñopavītena ca |
sannaddhā jaghane ca valkalapaṭī pāṇiśca dhatte dhanuḥ dṛṣṭaṃ bho janakasya yogina idaṃ dāntaṃ viraktaṃ manaḥ || 69 ||(bārā.1.53)
śṛṅgārādapi na dṛśyate, yathā—(gāsa. 1.60)
cintāṇiadaïasamāgamammi kaamaṇṇuāiṁ bhariūṇa |
suṇṇaṃ kalahāantī sahīhi ruṇṇā ṇa ohasiā || 70 ||
(cintānītadayitasamāgame kṛtamanyukāni smṛtvā |
śūnyaṃ kalahāyamānā sakhībhī ruditā na upahasitā ||)
raudrādanyato 'pi karuṇo dṛśyate, yathā—
ārdraṃ nāgājinamavayavagranthimad bibhradaṃse rūpaṃ prāvṛḍghanaruci mahābhairavaṃ darśayitvā |
paśyan gaurīṃ bhayacalakarālambitaskandahastāṃ manye prītyā druta iva bhavān vajradeho 'bhijātaḥ || 71 ||
raudrādapi na dṛśyate, yathā—(kirātā. 3.21)
nirīkṣya saṃrambhanirastadhairyaṃ rādheyamārādhitajāmadagnyam |
asaṃstuteṣu prasabhaṃ bhayeṣu jāyeta mṛtyorapi pakṣapātaḥ || 72 ||
vīrādanyato 'pyad‍bhuto dṛśyate, yathā—
kāsukhahehu kotti āi ajjaṇṇa uppāo |
piasaṃgama sahaṇaṭṭāṇisasa saṃghāṇisuṃpuḍa jāi || 73 ||
vīrādapi na dṛśyate, yathā—(śāku. 2.15)
naitac‍citraṃ yadayamudadhiśyāmasīmāṃ dharitrī— mekaḥ kṛts‍nāṃ nagaraparighaprāṃśubāhurbhunakti |
āśaṃsante surayuvatayaḥ saktavairā hi daityai— rasyādhijye dhanuṣi vijayaṃ pauruhūte ca vajre || 74 ||
bībhatsādanyato 'pi bhayānako dṛśyate, yathā—(kirātā. 3.19)
yasminnanaiśvaryakṛtavyalīkaḥ parābhavaṃ prāp‍ta ivāntako 'pi |
dhunvan dhanuḥ kasya raṇe na kuryānmano bhayaikapravaṇaṃ sa bhīṣmaḥ || 75 ||
bībhatsādapi na dṛśyate, yathā—(mavīca. 5.29)
tatkrūradantakarapatranikṛttasattvasaṅghātanissaradasṛkplutakūrcaguccham |
vaktraṃ vapuśca vikṛtākṛti dīrghabāhorāryeṇa rākṣasakutūhalinā na dṛṣṭam ||
atha prakṛtibhūtebhya iti pakṣaḥ |
tatrāpi kiṃ śṛṅgārāddhāsyo jāyate ? uta śṛṅgāra eva hāsyo bhavati ?
kiṃ cātaḥ ?
yadi śṛṅgārāddhāsyo jāyate, tadiṣyata eva |
na hyaśṛṅgāriṇaḥ kaścidapi prakarṣagāmī aprakarṣagāmī vā bhāvaḥ sambhavati | śṛṅgārī hi 'ramate, utsahate, hasati, vismayate, jugupsate, śocate, bibheti, śāmyati, s‍nihyati, garvāyate, abhimanyata' iti |
atha ratiprakṛtireva śṛṅgāro hāsyarasībhavati, tanna ghaṭate, śṛṅgārasya hāsyavyapadeśābhāvāt | athocyate—
śṛṅgārānukṛtiryeha sa hāsyo rasa iṣyate || 77 || (nāśā. 6.39)
tarhi,
vīrasyānukṛtiryeha so 'pi hāsya itīṣyatām || 78 ||
etena 'raudrāttu karuṇo rasa' ityapi pratyuktam | na hi raudrāt karuṇo jāyate, nāpi raudraḥ karuṇo bhavati |
atha raudrasya yat karma karuṇassa nigadyate || 79 || (nāśā. 6.39)
tathāpi,
na raudrakarma karuṇaḥ kāraṇaṃ karuṇasya tat |
etena vīrakarmāpi na bhavedadbha‍uto rasaḥ || 80 ||
hetutvaṃ tu tadutpattau tasyāpi na nivāryate |
bībhatsadarśanād yaḥ syāt sa bhavet tu bhayānakaḥ || (nāśā. 6.40)
ityālambanahetubhyo vibhāvebhyo na bhidyate || 82 ||
ato yatkiṃcidetad 'bhāvebhyo rasā, rasebhyo bhāvā, rasebhyaśca rasā' iti |
kiṃ punariha nyāyyam ?
yathopavarṇitaṃ purastāt—
aprātikūlikatayā manaso mudāde— ryassaṃvido 'nubhavaheturihābhimānaḥ |
jñeyo rasaḥ sa rasanīyatayā ' 'tmaśakteḥ(/rak‍teḥ)1 ratyādibhūmani punarvitathā rasoktiḥ || 83 ||
etena rụ̄dhāhaṅkāratā2 rasasya pūrvā koṭiḥ | ratyādīnāmekonapañcāśato 'pi vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicārisaṃyogāt paraprakarṣādhigame rasavyapadeśārhatā rasasyaiva madhyamāvasthā | 'preyaḥ priyatarākhyānam' ityupalakṣaṇena yathā rateḥ premarūpeṇa pariṇatistathā bhāvāntarāṇāmapi paramaparipāke premarūpeṇa pariṇatau rasaikāyanamiti rasasya paramā kāṣṭheti pratiṣṭhitaṃ bhavati | tathā hi — yathorjasvinyapakartāhamiti yatte cetasi bhayaṃ, na me khaṅgaḥ parāṅmukheṣu kadācidapi prahartumutsahata iti rụ̄dho 'haṅkāraḥ pratīyate, saiṣāvantī mayātraiva janmani labdheti dhik te vṛthāpratijño mānaparigraha iti, urvīvijayādyakṛtvā kathaṃ pārthivo bhaveyamiti, na mayedṛśāḥ śākhinaḥ k‍vacidapi dṛṣṭā iti, anena me draupadī keśeṣvākṛṣṭeti, dhanyo maghavā yasyaitadāyudhamiti, sā me devī citāmadhyāsta iti, dhik kauṇapāḥ śoṇitamāntrabhūṣaṇāḥ pibantīti, asti me santoṣo manasa iti, yatheyaṃ me priyā tathāhamapyasyā yato madanukūlamevaiṣāpi ceṣṭata iti, mayi dhṛtāyudhe kimāyudhāntarairiti sarvatraivāhaṅkāraḥ pratīyate |
kathaṃ punarvibhāvānubhāvavyabhicārisaṃyogād rasaniṣpattiḥ ?
ucyate, yathendusannidhergaṇḍakaḥ syandate, yathārkasannidhessūryakānto jvalati, yathā karpūrasannidheḥ sphaṭiko vilīyate tathā tebhyastebhya ālambanavibhāvebhyastattadākāra— pariṇatendriyabuddha‍yupādhiyogino 'bhimānimanasaste te ratikrodhaśokādayo bhāvāḥ samutpadyante | te ratyādayo yathā—(māmā. 3.5)
āścaryamutpaladṛśo vadanāmalendusānnidhyato mama muhurjaḍimānametya |
jātyena candramaṇineva mahīdharasya sandhāryate dravamayo manaso vikāraḥ || 84 ||
1. dra. atraiva 1.8 ; 11.7 2. ahamityevāhaṅkāraḥ yathā omityeva oṅkāra iṃti 'kāraḥ' svārthaka eveti nātra garvadoṣaḥ |
krodhādayo yathā— (rāca. 19.89)
tenātha nātha durudāharaṇātapena saumyāpi nāma paruṣatvamabhiprapannā |
jajvāla tīkṣṇaviśadāḥ sahasod‌gi‍rantī vāgarciṣastapanakāntaśileva sītā || 85 ||
śokādayo yathā—(urāca. 1.28)
athedaṃ rakṣobhiḥ kanakahariṇacchadmavidhinā tathāvṛttaṃ pāpairvyathayati yathā kṣālitamapi |
janasthāne śūnye viśadakaruṇairāryacaritai— rapi grāvā rodityapi dalati vajrasya hṛdayam || 86 ||
atha yathendūdaye samudraḥ kṣubhyati, yathā 'pathyasevayā vyādhirabhivardhate, yathānāryasannidheḥ sādhuḥ sutarāṃ duḥkhākaroti, tathā tebhyastebhya uddīpanavibhāvebhya— stattadanubhavasaṃskārayogino manasastattad‍bhāvābhivṛddhaye te te vikārā upajāyante | te tatkṣobhe yathā—(raghu. 8.43)
vilalāpa sa bāṣpagad‍gadaṃ sahajāmapyapahāya dhīratām |
abhitap‍tamayo 'pi mārdavaṃ bhajate kaiva kathā śarīriṣu || 87 ||
tadabhivṛddhau yathā—(kusaṃ. 4.26)
tamudīkṣya ruroda sā bhṛśaṃ stanasaṃbādhamuro jaghāna ca |
svajanasya hi duḥkhamagrato vivṛtadvāramivopajāyate || 88 ||
tatprātikūlye yathā—(vikramo. 2.6)
idamasulabhavastuprārthanādurnivāraṃ prathamamapi mano me pañcabāṇaḥ kṣiṇoti |
kimuta malayavātonmūlitāpāṇḍupatrai— rupavanasahakārairdarśiteṣvaṅkureṣu || 89 ||
atha yathaikasyāpi bhūruhādeḥ kāṇḍaskandhaśākhāviṭapādayaḥ prakārāḥ, pallavapatrapuṣpaphalasampadādayo vikārāḥ, ekasyāpyambhasaḥ pravāhāvartabud‍budataraṅgādayo vivartāḥ, muktāphalaphenalavaṇakārakādayo vipariṇāmāḥ, ekasyāpi dhvanestāramadhyamandra— kruṣṭādayo bhedāḥ, varṇapadavākyakūjitādayo avacchedāḥ, ekasyāpi vāyoḥ pravahāvahaparivahādayaḥ skandhāḥ prāṇāpānavyānādayo 'nubandhāḥ tebhyastebhya upādhibhyo
jāyante, tathaikasyāpi ratikrodhaśokādestebhyastebhya upādhibhyaste te 'nubhāvā vyabhicāriṇaścābhyantarā bāhyāśca vyavasthāsamplavābhyāmupaplavante | tatrābhyantarā vyabhicāriṣu cintautsukyāvegavitarkādayaḥ, bāhyāḥ svedaromāñcāśruvaivarṇyādayaḥ; anubhāveṣvābhyantarāḥ smaraṇecchādveṣaprayat‍nāḥ, bāhyā manovāmbuddhiśarīrārambhāḥ, ta ubhaye apyanukriyamāṇāḥ sāttvikāṅgivācikacitrasāmānyābhinayavyapadeśaṃ labhante | teṣu
ratiprabhavā yathā—(kusaṃ. 3.68)
vivṛṇvatī śailasutāpi bhāvamaṅgaiḥ sphurad‍bālakadambakalpaiḥ |
sācīkṛtā cārutareṇa tasthau mukhena paryastavilocanena || 90 ||
krodhaprabhavā yathā—(pṛ. 835)
pratyagrārikṛtābhimanyunidhanaprod‍bhūtatīvrakrudhaḥ kīrṇā bāṣpakaṇaiḥ patanti dhanuṣi vrīḍājaḍā dṛṣṭayaḥ |
pārthasyākṛtaśātravapratikṛterantaḥ śucā muhyato hā vatseti giraḥ sphuranti, na punarniryānti kaṇṭhād bahiḥ || 91 ||
śokaprabhavā yathā—(māmā. 9.20)
mātarmātardalati hṛdayaṃ dhvaṃsate dehabandhaḥ śūnyaṃ manye jagadaviratajvālamantarjvalāmi |
sīdannandhe tamasi vidhuro majjatīvāntarātmā viṣvaṅ mohaḥ sthagayati kathaṃ mandabhāgyaḥ karomi || 92 ||
atha yathekṣubhyo rasaḥ, sarṣapebhyastailaṃ dhātubhyo hiraṇyaṃ, aśmabhyo lohaṃ, dadh‍no navanītaṃ, kāṣṭhato 'g‍nistebhyastebhyo yantrāg‍nimanthasaṃyogebhyo niṣpatanti tathā svebhyaḥ svebhyo vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicārisaṃyogebhyo ratikrodhaśokādibhyaste te rasā niṣpadyante |
yathā—(māmā. 5.28)
rāhoścandrakalāmivānanacarīṃ daivātsamāsādya me dasyorasya kṛpāṇapātaviṣayādācchindataḥ preyasīm |
ātaṅkād vikalaṃ, drutaṃ karuṇayā, vikṣobhitaṃ vismayāt, krodhena jvalitaṃ, mudā vikasitaṃ, cetaḥ kathaṃ vartate || 93 ||
atha yathā lavaṇāmlādayaḥ svasaṃyogino mṛdvīkādīnapyātmarūpatāṃ nayanta upacīyante, tathā ratyādijanmāno rasāḥ vibhāvādīnapyātmarūpatāṃ nayanta upacīyante | yathā—(gāsa. 4.89)
kassa bharisi tti bhaṇie ko me atthi tti jappamāṇāe |
uvvegaroirīe amhe vi ruāviā tīe || 94 ||
(kasya smarasīti bhaṇite ko me 'stīti jalpamānayā |
udvig‍narodanaśīlayā vayamapi roditāstayā ||)
atha yathā (vai.sū. 2.1.6) sarpirjatumadhūcchiṣṭādīnāṃ pārthivānāṃ ghanatuhinakarakādīnāmāpyānāṃ trapusīsarajatādīnāṃ taijasānāmag‍nisaṃyogād dravatā adbhissāmānyaṃ bhavati, tathā vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicāriṇāṃ rasasaṃyogād rasatā rasenaiva sāmānyaṃ bhavati | yathā—(raghu. 8.70)
vilapanniti kosalādhipaḥ karuṇārthagrathitaṃ priyāṃ prati |
akarot pṛthivīruhānapi strutaśākhārasabāṣpadurdinān || 95 ||
atha yathā oṣadhirasebhyo madhuniṣpattiḥ, yathā madhurādibhyaḥ ṣāḍavotpattiḥ, yathā guḍādibhya āsavotpattiḥ; tathā tebhyastebhyo rasasāmānyebhyaḥ rasaviśeṣābhinirvṛttiḥ bhavati | yathā—(rat‍nā. 4. 19)
yāto vikramabāhurātmasamatāṃ prāp‍teyamurvītale sāraṃ sāgarikā sasāgaramahīprāp‍tyekahetuḥ priyā |
devī prītimupāgatā ca bhaginīlābhājjitāḥ kosalāḥ kiṃ nāsti tvayi satyamātyavṛṣabhe yasmin karomi spṛhām || 96 ||
atha yathaikasyāpyagrerbhaumadivyaudaryādayo jātibhedāḥ dāhālokapākādayo 'rthakriyāḥ dhūmārciraṅgārādayo 'vasthāḥ saṃdṛśyante, tathaikasyāpi rasasya bhāvarasatadābhāsādayo jātibhedā utkaṇṭhābhiṣaṅganirvṛtyādayo 'rthakriyā utpādābhivṛddhisthairyādayo 'vasthāssa— mupalabhyante | tatra—
bhāvo yathā—(kusaṃ. 3.67)
harastu kiṃcitparivṛttarivṛttadhairyaścandrodayārambha ivāmburāśiḥ |
umāmukhe bimbaphalādharoṣṭhe vyāpārayāmāsa vilocanāni || 97 ||
raso yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.85)
taṃ vīkṣya vepathumatī sarasāṅgayāṣṭiḥ vikṣepa eva padam || 98 || ityādi |
ābhāso yathā—
āḥ sīte ! patigarvavibhramabharabhrāntabhramadvāndhava pradhvaṃsasmitakāntimat tava tadā jātaṃ yadetanmukham |
saṃpratyeṣa haṭhāt tadeva kurute keśoc‍cayākarṣaṇa— tryaśrottānitalolalocanapatadvāṣpaplutaṃ rāvaṇaḥ || 99 ||
utkaṇṭhā yathā—(kusaṃ. 6.95)
paśupatirapi tānyahāni kṛcchrādagamayadadrisutāsamāgamotkaḥ |
kamaparamavaśaṃ na viprakuryurvibhumapi taṃ yadamī spṛśanti bhāvāḥ || 100 ||
abhiṣaṅgo yathā—(māmā. 5.10)
līneva pratibimbiteva likhitevautkīrṇarūpeṇa ca pratyup‍teva ca vajralepaghaṭitevāntarnikhāteva ca |
sā naścetasi kīliteva viśikhaiścetobhuvaḥ pañcabhi— ścintāsantatitantujālanibiḍasyūteva lag‍nā priyā || 101 ||
nirvṛtiryathā—(māmā. 1.36)
jagati jayinaste te bhāvā navendukalādayaḥ prakṛtimadhurāḥ santyevānye mano madayanti ye |
mama tu yadiyaṃ yātā loke vilocanacandrikā nayanaviṣayaṃ janmanyekaḥ sa eva mahotsavaḥ || 102 ||
utpādo yathā—(mavīca. 1.21)
utpattirdevayajanād brahmavādī nṛpaḥ pitā |
suprasannojjvalā mūrtirasyāḥ s‍nehaṃ karoti me || 103 ||
abhavṛddhiryathā—
kānte talpamupāgate vigalitā nīvī svayaṃ bandhanāt tad vāsaḥ ślabhamekhalāguṇadhṛtaṃ kiṃcinnitambe sthitam |
etāvat sakhi vedmi sāmpratamahaṃ tasyāṅgasaṅge punaḥ ko 'sau kāsmi rataṃ ca kiṃ kathamiti svalpāpi me na smṛtiḥ || 104 ||
sthairyaṃ yathā—(urāca. 1.39)
advaitaṃ sukhaduḥkhayoranugataṃ sarvāsvavasthāsu yat || 105 ||
bhāvaviśeṣo yathā—(urā. 5.4)
śatrossāgaralaṅghanaṃ kimaparaṃ dvāroparodhaḥ pure dordaṇḍā api me ta eva kuliśakṣuṇṇāṅgadagranthayaḥ |
sarvaṃ soḍhamidaṃ vṛthaiva hi mayā sītāprasaktātmanā pāpo dhvastamanorathastu saralaṃ dṛṣṭo 'pi nāhaṃ tayā || 106 ||
(manoratho 'tra kartṛ)
rasaviśeṣo yathā—(amaruka. 38)
kopo yatra bhrukuṭiracanā vigraho yatra maunaṃ yatrānyonyasmitamanunayo dṛṣṭipātaḥ prasādaḥ |
tasya premṇastadidamadhunā vaiśasaṃ paśya jātaṃ tvaṃ pādānte luṭhasi na ca me manyumokṣaḥ khalāyāḥ || 107 ||
ābhāsaviśeṣo yathā—
āpṛṣṭāsi vyathayasi mano durbalā vāsaraśrī— rehyāliṅga kṣapaya rajanīmekikā cakravākī |
nānyāsakto na khalu kupito nānurāgacyuto vā daivādhīnastadiha bhavatīmasvatantrastyajāmi || 108 ||
(alaṅkārasaṅkaraḥ —6)
evamavasthāpite guṇarasatadābhāsabhāvānāmalaṅkāratve ṣaṭprakāro 'laṅkārasaṅkara sambhavati— guṇasaṅkaraḥ, rasasaṅkaraḥ, alaṅkārasaṅkaraḥ, guṇarasasaṅkaraḥ, guṇālaṅkārasaṅkaraḥ, rasālaṅkārasaṅkara iti |
(1. guṇasaṅkaraḥ)
nanu ca guṇānāṃ saṅkaravyavahāro nopapadyate, bahuṣvapi guṇeṣu guṇavadityeva vyapadeśāt |
naivam; trividhā guṇāḥ śabdaguṇā, arthaguṇā doṣaguṇāśca |
te tu pratyekaṃ dvidhā ullekhavanto nirullekhāśca | tatra —
śabdaguṇeṣu samādhimādhuryaudāryagāmbhīryādayaḥ sollekhāḥ|
śleṣaprasādasamatāsaukumāryādayo nirullekhāḥ |
arthaguṇeṣu śleṣaprasādarītikāntyādayaḥ sollekhāḥ, arthavyaktisaukṣmyagāmbhīryasammitatvādayo nirullekhāḥ |
doṣaguṇeṣu grāmpapunaruktatāpārthavyarthādayaḥ sollekhāḥ, śabdahīnasaṃśayāpakramavisandhyādayo nirullekhāḥ |
tatra sajātīyānāṃ sollekhānāmiva vijātīyānāṃ tu nirullekhānāmapi saṅkaraḥ pravartate | tatra sajātīyānāṃ —
śabdaguṇeṣu samādhyādīnāṃ yathā—
ṇavapallavesu lolaï gholaï viḍavesu valaï siharesu |
ṭhavaï thavaesu calaṇe vasaṃtalacchī asoassa || 109 ||
(navapallaveṣu lolati ghūrṇate viṭapeṣu valate śikhareṣu |
sbhagati stabakeṣu caraṇau vasantalakṣmīraśokasya ||)
atra anyadharmāṇāmanyatrāropaṇaṃ samādhiḥ, pṛthakpadatā mādhuryaṃ, bandhavikaṭatvamudāratā, dhvanimattā gāmbhīryamiti sajātīyāssaṅkīryante | yato vasantalakṣmīraśokasyeti padayoḥ śabdadhvanirapi parisphurati; yathā kasyacidaśokasya kāmino 'ṅgeṣu priyāṅganā savilāsaṃ ceṣṭate tathāsyeyamiti |
arthaguṇeṣu śleṣādīnāṃ yathā—
janaḥ puṇyairyāyājjaladhijalabhāvaṃ jalamucaḥ ||110||
atra saṃvidhānakasusūtratā śleṣaḥ, arthasya prākaṭyaṃ prasādaḥ, utpattyādi kriyākramo rītiḥ, dīp‍tarasatvaṃ kāntiḥ ityarthaguṇāssajātīyāssaṃkīryante |
doṣaguṇeṣu grāmyādīnāṃ yathā— (kāvyāda. 4.15)
hanyate sā varārohā smareṇākāṇḍavairiṇā |
hanyate cārusarvāṅgī hanyate mañjubhāṣiṇī || 111 ||
atra hanyata ityamaṅgalārthaṃ varārohetyaślīlārthaṃ hanyate hanyata iti punaruktaṃ cārusarvāṅgītyuktvā varāreheti vyartham, ata ete sajātīyāścatvāro 'pi doṣaguṇāḥ saṅkīryamāṇāḥ kasyacidunmattabhāṣiṇo anukampādyatiśayavivakṣāyāmabhyanujñāyante | yadāha—
anukampādyatiśayo yadi kaścid vivakṣyate |
na doṣaḥ punaruktādau pratyuteyamalaṅkriyā || 112 ||(kāvyāda. 4.14)
atha asajātīyānāṃ
śabdaguṇānām arthaguṇānāṃ ca saṅkaro yathā—
ko nāma nodayati nāstamupaiti ko vā lokottaraḥ punarayaṃ savitā jagatsu |
yatrodayāstamayabhāji rucāṃ nidhāne dvedhā bhavatyahariti kṣaṇadeti kālaḥ || 113 ||
atra yāvadarthapadatā sammitatvaṃ, bandhavikaṭatvamudāratā, ślāghyaviśeṣaṇayoga udāttatvamiti śabdaguṇāḥ; uktārthanirvahaṇaṃ praụdhiḥ, arthasya prākaṭyaṃ prasādaḥ, rụ̄dhāhaṅkāratairjityamityarthaguṇāśca saṅkīryante |
śabdaguṇānāṃ doṣaguṇānāṃ ca yathā—
ehyehi vatsa! raghunandana! pūrṇacandra! cumbāmi mūrdhani cirāya pariṣvaje tvām |
āropya vā hṛdi divāniśamud‍vahāmi vande 'thavā caraṇapuṣkarakadvayaṃ te || 114 || (mavīca. 1.55)
atra bhavato vākpravṛttirbhāvikatvaṃ, prasiddhārthapadatā prasādaḥ, preyārthapadopākhyānaṃ preya iti śabdaguṇāḥ, ehyehīti punaruktaṃ, vatsetyuktvā tvatpādābjadvayaṃ vanda iti viruddhaṃ, mūrdh‍ni cumbāmi hṛdi vahāmi pādau vanda iti kriyāsvanupayogāt pūrṇacandreti darśanādikriyopayogi vyarthaṃ ceti doṣaguṇāḥ parasparaṃ saṅkīryante | rasākṣepādau hi punaruktādayo na duṣyanti |
arthaguṇānāṃ doṣaguṇānāṃ ca yathā—
kiṃ dvāri daivahatike sahakārakeṇa saṃvardhitena viṣapādapa eṣa pāpaḥ |‍
asmin manāgapi vikāsavikārabhāji bhīmā bhavanti madanajvarasannipātāḥ || 115 ||
atra dīp‍tarasatvaṃ kāntiḥ, arthaprākaṭyaṃ prasādaḥ, aktārthanirvahaṇaṃ praụdhirityarthaguṇāḥ; daivahatike viṣapādapo 'yaṃ pāpa ityādyamaṅgalārthaṃ grāmyam, kimanena saṃvardhitenetyatra madanajvarasannipāta ityatra ca kartavyaprayojanādervirahiṇo draṣṭurityādeścā— dhyāhārādasampūrṇavākyatāyāmarthavyaktiviparyayaḥ, asmin vikāsavikārabhājīti vikāsaśabdasya puṣpaviṣayatvād vṛkṣe 'pi prayoge 'vācakatvādasamarthamiti doṣaguṇā mithaḥ saṅkīryante | yato rasākṣapāt parihāsaleśoktyoramaṅgalaṃ, praviśa piṇḍīṃdvāraṃ dvāramiti nyāyāt prasiddhādhyāhāraḥ, darī vadati, mañcāḥ krośantīti prayogadarśanādā— dhārādheyayorabhedopacāraśca viruddhalakṣaṇādibhiḥ prayujyamāno na doṣāyeti |
(2. rasasaṅkaraḥ —6)
astu nāma guṇānāṃ śabdārthadoṣaguṇabhedāt traividhye nirullekhatayā sollekhatayā ca saṅkaravyavahāraḥ, rasānāṃ tu vīrādbha‍utādīnāṃ nirastatvāt kathamivaikaḥ śrṛṅgāro anekasādhyaṃ saṅkaravyavahāraṃ vartayati ?
ucyate — yadyapi śrṛṅgāra evaiko rasaḥ; tathāpi tatprabhavā ye ratyādayaḥ; te 'pyuddīpanavibhāvairuddīpyamānāstadanupraveśādeva sañcāriṇāmanubhāvānāṃ ca nimittabhāva— mupayanto rasavyapadeśaṃ labhante | yathā —
hyabhimāno ratyādīnāṃ nimittaṃ cetasā rasyamāno rasaḥ tathā ratyādayo 'pi harṣadhṛticintautsukyādīnāṃ manovākkāyabuddhiśarīrārambhāṇāṃ ca nimittamabhimānānupraveśenaiva cetasā rasyamānā rasā ityucyante | yugapadabhidhāne ca saṅkaravyavahāraṃ kalpayanti | te tūtpattau bhāvāḥ, prakarṣe rasāḥ, viparyaye bhāvarasābhāsāḥ, pravilaye tatpraśamā iti prabhidyamānāḥ saṅkīryanta iti |
tatsaṅkaraḥ ṣọdhā — bhāvasaṅkara, rasasaṅkaḥ, bhāvābhāsasaṅkaraḥ, rasābhāsasaṅkaraḥ, bhāvapraśamasaṅkaraḥ, rasapraśamasaṅkara iti | teṣu
bhāvasaṅkaro yathā— (mavīca. 5.32)
nyakkāro hṛdi vajrakīla iva me tīvraḥ parispandate ghorāndhe tamasīva majjati manaḥ saṃmīlitaṃ lajjayā |
śokastātavipattito dahati māṃ nāstyeva yasmin kriyā marmāṇyeva punaśchinatti karuṇā sītāṃ varākīṃ prati || 116 ||
atrāmarṣalajjāśokaprītayaḥ samakakṣyatayā mithastilataṇḍulavat saṅkīryamāṇā rāmasya virahiṇo vāgārambhānubhāvoktiparatayā pratīyante |
rasasaṅkaro yathā—
kṣip‍to hastāvalagnaḥ prasabhamabhihato 'pyādadānoṃ 'śukāntaṃ || 117 || (pṛ.552)
atra śrṛṅgārakaruṇau haraprabhāvavarṇanāyāṃ mṛtpiṇḍe pāṃsūdakavat pradhānāṅgabhāvena saṃkīrtete |
bhāvābhāsasaṅkaro yathā—
āḥ sīte! patigarvavibhramabharabhrāntabhramadvāndhava॰ || 118 || (pṛ. 691)
atra krodhābhāse chāyādarśanyāyena ratyābhāsaḥ upalabhyate |
rasābhāsasaṅkaro yathā—
ekenārkaṃ pravitataruṣā pāṭalenāstasaṃsthaṃ paśyatyakṣṇā sajalataralenāpareṇātmakāntam |
ahnaśchede dayitavirahāśaṅkinī cakravākī dvau saṅkīrṇau racayati rasau nartakīva pragalbhā || 119 ||
atra narasiṃhajātāviva siṃhanarabhāgau nartakīcakravākyupamāne roṣaśokaprakarṣā— vābhāsamānau mithaḥ saṃkīryete |
bhāvapraśamasaṅkaro yathā—
dṛṣṭe locanavanmanāk॰ || 120 || (pṛ. 500)
atra kasyāścit sakhīvikhyātamānasaṃvidhānakāyā mānavatyāḥ priyadarśanā— lambanavibhāvādutpanne prakṛṣṭaratiprabhave praharṣasthāyibhāve tatpārś‍vopasarpaṇādibhiruddīpana— vibhāvairuddīpyamāne samutpadyamāneṣu pulakādiṣu sukhātmakeṣu vyabhicāriṣu nayanani— mīlanādhomukhyanīvīstraṃsanādibhiranubhāvaiḥ paraprakarṣāropaṇādānandarasatāmāpadyamāne sthāyini prabalavirodhibhāvāntarodayādetebhya eva kāraṇebhyaḥ pratikṣaṇamapacīyamānayorlajjāroṣayoḥ praśamau samakakṣyatayā kṣīranīravat saṅkīryamāṇau pratīyete |
rasapraśamasaṅkaro yathā—(urāca. 6.11)
virodho viśrāntaḥ prasarati raso nirvṛtighana— stadauddhatyaṃ kvāpi vrajati, vinayaḥ prahvayati mām |
jhaṭityasmin dṛṣṭe kimapi paravānasmi yadi vā mahārghastīrthānāmiva hi mahatāṃ ko 'pyatiśayaḥ || 121 ||
atra vīraiddhatyasvātantryarasānāmānandapraśamapāravaśyarasaistiraskriyamāṇānāṃ paṭa iva nīlādibhiḥ sitādīnāṃ praśame rāmadarśanaprabhāvodbhave lavasya vismayātiśayapraśamajanmani vāgārambhānubhāvopamādau citravarṇavat saṅkīryamāṇaḥ samupalabhyate |
(3. alaṅkārasaṅkaraḥ —6)
athālaṅkārasaṅkaraḥ| sa yadyapi vyaktāvyaktobhayātmatayā tilataṇḍulakādibhedaiḥ pradhānāṅgabhāvasamakakṣyatābhyāṃ purastāduktaḥ, tathāpi teṣāṃ guṇādisaṅkarasādhāraṇatvāt sampratyasādhāraṇaḥ prakāra ucyate |
sa ṣọdhā— 'śabdālaṅkārasaṅkaraḥ, arthālaṅkārasaṅkaraḥ, ubhayālaṅkārasaṅkaraḥ, śabdārthālaṅkārasaṅkaraḥ, śabdobhayālaṅkārasaṅkaraḥ, arthobhayālaṅkārasaṅkara' iti | teṣu
śabdālaṅkārasaṅkaro yathā—
haṃsālī bhayataralā sārāsarasā sarāsasārasarāsā |
ambaratalamārụ̄dhā sārāsarasā sarāsasārasarāsā || 122 ||(saka.)
atra saṃskṛtaprākṛtabhāṣāśleṣaḥ gatapratyāgataṃ citraṃ pādāvṛtti yamakaṃ varṇānuprāsaśceti catvāraḥ śabdālaṅkārāḥ saṅkīryante |
arthālaṅkārasaṅkaro yathā—
vāsāvasthitatāmracūḍavayasāmāyāmibhiḥ kūjitai— rdūrādapyanumīyamānavasatirgrāmo 'yamagrevaṇam |
yatrādīp‍takukūlakūṭavisaraddha‍ūmyāghanaṃ ghūrṇate sandhyāntollasadacchabhallapaṭalacchāyājaṭālaṃ tamaḥ || 123 || (saka.)
atra tāmracūḍavayasāṃ kūjitairityanumānaṃ, yatra tamo ghūrṇata iti jñāpakahetuḥ, ādīp‍takukūlakūṭavisaraddha‍ūmyāghanamiti sandhyāntollasadacchabhallapaṭalacchāyā— jaṭālamiti ca kārakahetuḥ, jāyamānapadārthasvarūpābhidhānaṃ jātirityarthālaṅkārā— ścatvāro mithaḥ saṅkīryante |
ubhayālaṅkārasaṅkaro yathā—
ṇa hu ṇavaraṃ dīvasihāsāricchaṃ caṃpaehiṃ paḍivaṇṇaṃ |
kajjalakajjaṃ pi kaaṃ uari bhamaṃtehiṃ bhamarehiṃ || 124 ||
(na khalu kevalaṃ dīpaśikhāsādṛśyaṃ campakaiḥ pratipannam |
kajjalakāryamapi kṛtamupari bhramadbhirbhramaraiḥ ||)
atra campakānāṃ pradīpaśikhābhirākārakāntibhyāmupamā, virahiṇīhṛdayadāhodyāna— dyotanārthakriyābhyāṃ sāmyaṃ, kajjalapaṭalānāmiva bhramarapaṭalānāmuparimelanānmelitaṃ, campakapradīpakalikayoriva bhramarakajjalapaṭalayorapyaupamyādisambandhāt samuccaya ityubhayālaṅkārāścatvāro mithaḥ saṅkīryante |
śabdārthālaṅkārasaṅkaro yathā—
sarvāśārudhi dagdhavīrudhi sadā sāraṅgabaddhakrudhi kṣāmakṣmāruhi mandamunmadhulihi svacchandakundadruhi |
śuṣyatstrotasi tap‍tabhūrirajasi jvālāyamānāmbhasi grīṣme māsi tatārkatejasi kathaṃ pāntha! vrajan jīvasi || 125 ||
atrāvantyā rītiḥ, padamudrā, vibhaktimudrā, anuprāsaśceti śabdālaṅkārāḥ; jātiḥ, kārakajñāpakahetū citraṃhetuścetyarthālaṅkārāḥ mithaḥ saṅkīryante|
śabdobhayālaṅkārasaṅkaro yathā—
stokastokamamūbhirambaratale tārāmirastaṃ gataṃ gacchatyastagireḥ śirastadanu ca cchāyādaridraḥ śaśī |
pratyāsannatarodayasya taraṇerbimbāruṇimnā tato mañjiṣṭhārasalohinī digapi ca prācī samunmīlati || 126 ||
atra cchāyādaridraḥ mañjiṣṭhārasalohinīti padamudrā, tārābhirastaṃ gataṃ prācī samunmīlatīti vibhaktimudrā, tadanu ca digapi ceti samuccayamudrā, stokastokamastaṃ gataṃ gacchatītyādiranuprāsaśca śabdālaṅkārāḥ, hetūpamāsamādhirarthakramaḥ, samuccayoktiścetyubhayālaṅkārā mithaḥ saṅkīryante |
arthobhayālaṅkārasaṅkaro yathā—
khaṃ vaste kalaviṅkakaṇṭhamalinaṃ kādambinīkambalaṃ carcā pārayatīva dardurakulaṃ kolāhalairunmadam |
gandhaṃ muñcati siktalājasurabhiṃ varṣeṇa dagdhā sthalī durlakṣo 'pi vibhāvyate kamalinīhāsena bhāsāṃ patiḥ || 127 ||
atra jātiranumānaṃ kārakajñāpakahetū cetyarthālaṅkārāḥ, rūpakamupamā hetūpamotprekṣopameti ca ubhayālaṅkārā mithaḥ saṅkīryante |
(4. guṇarasasaṅkaraḥ —6)
bhavatu nāma guṇānāṃ rasānāmalaṅkārāṇāṃ ca saṅkaraḥ; guṇarasasaṅkarastu kathaṃkāramupapanno bhavati? yato doṣadānamiva guṇopādānamapi niyamanirvartyam, alaṅkārayoga iva rasāviyogo 'pyavaśyavidheyaḥ |
kadācidalaṅkārayogo 'pi tyajyate, na tu rasāviyogo guṇayogaśca | vyabhicarita— sambandhā eva ca padārthāḥ padārthāntaraistilataṇḍulakṣīranīrādivat saṃsṛjyamānāḥ saṅkara— buddhimutpādayanto dṛśyante, nāvayavāvayavivajjātivyaktivaccāvyabhicaritasambandhā iti |
atrāpi brūmaḥ — yatra citravarṇavannarasiṃhavat pāṃsūdakavacca avayavāvayavinyāyena jātivyaktinyāyena cāpṛthakprayatnanirvartyānāṃ guṇarasānāṃ vākye sanniveśaḥ, tatraṃ saṅkaravyavahāro na pravartate | tadyathā— (kāvyāda. 1.51)
madhuraṃ rasavad‍ vāci vastunyapi rasasthitiḥ |
yena mādyanti dhīmanto madhuneva madhuvratāḥ || 128 ||
kāmaṃ sarvo 'pyalaṅkāro rasamarthe niṣiñcatu |
tathāpyagrāmyataivainaṃ bhāraṃ vahati bhūyasā || 129 || (kāvyāda. 1.62)
śrṛṅgāra eva madhuraḥ paraprahlādano rasaḥ |
tanmayaṃ kāvyamāśritya mādhuryaṃ pratitiṣṭhati || 130 || (dhva. 2.8)
śrṛṅgāre vipralambhākhye karuṇe ca prakarṣavat |
mādhuryamārdratāṃ yāti yatastatrādhikaṃ manaḥ || 131 || (dhva. 2.9)
raudrādayo rasā dīptyā lakṣyante kāvyavartinaḥ |
tadva‍yaktihetū śabdārthāvojo 'dhiṣṭhāya tiṣṭhati || 132 || (dhva. 2.10)
samarpakatvaṃ vākyasya yattu sarvarasān prati |
sa prasādo guṇo jñeyaḥ sarvasādhāraṇakriyaḥ || 133 || (dhva. 2.11)
seyaṃ guṇānāṃ rasārambhakatve saṅkarāprasiddhiḥ | evaṃ rasānāṃ guṇārambhakatve 'pi | tadyathā — rụ̄dhāhaṅkārataurjityaṃ, bhāvato vākyavṛttirbhāvikatvaṃ, krodhādāvapyatīvratā mādhuryam, āśayotkarṣaḥ udāttatvam, arthasyābhīṣṭatamatā preyaḥ, dīp‍tarasatvaṃ kāntiriti | yatra tu tilataṇḍulavat kṣīranīravacchāyādarśavacca tulyakakṣyatayaiva guṇarasānāṃ vākye pṛthakprayatnanirvartyānāṃ viniveśastatra saṅkaravyavahāraḥ pravartata eva |
sa ṣọdhā— guṇapradhānaḥ, rasapradhānaḥ; ubhayapradhānaḥ, ubhayāpradhānaḥ, guṇādhikaḥ, rasādhika iti | teṣu
guṇapradhāno yathā— (visā. 1.19)
atrāntare lalitahāralatānitambasaṃvāhanaskhalitavegataraṅgitāṅgī |
devī vyapāsya śayanaṃ dhṛtamānatanturantaḥpuraṃ gatavatī saha sauvidallaiḥ || 134 ||
atrārthaprākaṭyaudāryayorarthaśabdaguṇayoḥ prādhānyam, na ratikrodhayoriti guṇapradhānaḥ |
rasapradhāno yathā—(kirātā. 5.33)
asminnagṛhyata pinākabhṛtā salīlamārabdhavepathuradhīravilocanāyāḥ |
vinyastamaṅgalamahauṣadhirīśvarāyāḥ strastoragapratisareṇa kareṇa pāṇiḥ || 135 ||
atra ślāghyaviśeṣaṇayoga udāttatvam, bandhavikaṭatvamudāratā, arthaprākaṭyaṃ prasādaḥ, dīp‍tarasatvaṃ kāntiriti guṇāḥ, sādhvasavilāsānurāgasaṅgamarasairatiśayyanta iti rasapradhānaḥ |
ubhayapradhāno yathā—
āpātamātrarasike sarasīruhasya kiṃ bījamarpayitumicchasi vāpikāyām |
kālaḥ kalirjagadidaṃ na kṛtajñamajñe! sthitvā hariṣyati tavaiva mukhasya lakṣmīm || 136 ||
atra bhaṇitiviśeṣa uktiḥ, saṃvidhāne susūtratā śleṣa iti śabdaguṇayoḥ lāvaṇyavilāsavarṇanīyarasayośca tulyakakṣyatayā nirdeśa ityubhayapradhānaḥ |
ubhayāpradhāno yathā—
abhinavavadhūroṣasvāduḥ karīṣatanūnapāt॰ || 137 || (pṛ. 516)
atra svādukrūramasṛṇaklaibyamityanyadharmāṇāmanyatrāropaṇaṃ samādhiḥ, abhinava— vadhūroṣādīnāṃ caturṇāmapyarthānāṃ svādvādīnāṃ ca lakṣaṇādilakṣitānāṃ prākaṭyaṃ prasādaḥ, abhinavavadhūroṣasvāduḥ karīṣatanūnapāt iti viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyāṇāmupakramakrameṇa nirvahaṇaṃ rītiḥ, pādacatuṣṭye caturṇāmapyarthānāṃ vibhajya samatvena niveśaḥ sammitatvāmiti catvāro guṇāḥ, catvāraśca ratyamarṣaviṣādajugupsātmāno rasāḥ kālāvasthānivedanaparatvena pratīyanta ityubhayāpradhānaḥ |
guṇādhiko yathā—
ajananirastu vibhūterapūraṇirbhavatu sarvakāmānām |
mā yāciṣi mā seviṣi mā sahiṣi parābhavaṃ dhaninaḥ || 138 ||
atra sup‍tiṅvyutpattiḥ sauśabdyam, vākyānāṃ paripūrṇatvamarthavyaktiḥ, arthasya prākaṭyaṃ prasādaḥ, vibhūteranutpattau kāmā na pūryante, aparipūrṇakāmo yācate, yācamānastadanāp‍nuvan dhaninaḥ sevate, sevamānastu taiḥ paribhūyata ityutpattyādikriyākramo rītiriti guṇāścatvāraḥ, rasastu nirveda evaika iti guṇādhikaḥ |
rasādhiko yathā—
kamalamanambhasi kamale॰ || 139 || (pṛ. 336)
atra 'kamalamanambhasi kamale ca kuvalaye tāni kanakalatikāyām' ityanya— dharmāṇāmanyatrāropaṇaṃ samādhiḥ, 'sā ca sukumārasubhagetyutpātaparamparā keyami'— tyaślīlāmaṅgalārthau doṣaguṇāvapi, ślāghyaviśeṣaṇayoga udāttatvam, bandhavikaṭa— tvamudāratā, upakramābhedo rītiḥ, arthasya prākaṭyaṃ prasādaḥ, aniṣṭhuratā saukumāryaṃ, abhīṣṭatamatā preyaḥ, dīp‍tarasatvaṃ kāntiriti guṇā daśa, rasāstu ratyutkarṣaharṣadhṛtyutkaṇṭhā— vegavismayamativitarkacintācapalatāhāsotsāhastambhagadgadonmādavrīḍāvahitthabhayaśaṅkā viṃśatirvāgārambhānubhāve śrṛṅgāriṇaḥ priyācāṭukārasya kasyacit pratīyanta iti rasādhikaḥ |
nanu cānyadharmāṇāmanyatrāropaṇaṃ samādhiḥ | iha tu kamalamanambhasi ityādau dharmiṇa evādhyāse tadbhāvāpattau kathaṃ samadhitvopapattiḥ |
ucyate— anyasya ca dharmāṇāṃ cānyatrāropaṇaṃ samādhiriti | etena guṇālaṅkārasaṃkare 'pi ṣaṭprakārasyaiva samādheḥ prādhānyamabhihitaṃ bhavati | yadāha—
tadetat kāvyasarvasvaṃ samādhirnāma yo guṇaḥ |
kavisārthaḥ samagro 'pi tamevamanudhāvati || 140|| (kāvyāda. 1.100)
sa tridhā— ekadharmādhyāse 'nekadharmādhyāse dharmyadhyāse ca | tatra—
anekadharmādhyāse samādherubhayālaṅkāratvamuktam |
ekadharmādhyāse samādhistu dvidhā— śabdaguṇarūpo doṣaguṇarūpaśca |
śabdaguṇarūpo yathā—(kāvyāda. 1.94)
kumudāni nimīlanti kamalānyunmiṣanti ca |
iti netrakriyādhyāsāllabdhā tadvācinī śrutiḥ || 141 ||
doṣaguṇeṣu tu—(kāvyāda. 1.95)
niṣṭhyūtodgīrṇavāntādi gauṇavṛttivyapāśrayam |
atisundaram, anyattu grāmyakakṣāṃ vigāhate || 142 ||
tadyathā—(kāvyāda. 1.96)
padmānyarkāṃśuniṣṭh‌yūtāḥ pītvā pāvakavipruṣaḥ |
bhūyo vamantīva mukhairudgīrṇāruṇareṇubhiḥ || 143 ||
iti hṛdyam; ahṛdyaṃ tu niṣṭhīvati vadhūriti |
yugapannaikadharmāṇāmadhyāso 'laṅkṛtiryathā || 144 || (kāvyāda. 1.97)
gurugarbhabharaklāntāḥ stanantyo meghapaṅktayaḥ |
acalādhityakotsaṅgamimāḥ samadhiśerate || 145 || (kāvyāda. 1.98)
utsaṅgaśayanaṃ sakhyāḥ stananaṃ gauravaṃ klamaḥ |
itīha garbhiṇīdharmā bahavo 'nyatra darśitāḥ || 146 || (kāvyāda. 1.99)
(5. guṇālaṅkārasaṅkaraḥ —6)
dharmyadhyāsastu guṇālaṅkārasaṅkare pradhānaṃ bhavati | yato yadyapi guṇavatyeva vākye 'laṅkārayogaḥ, tathāpi kavacid guṇasya prādhānyaṃ kvacidalaṅkārasyeti pradhānāṅgabhāvena guṇālaṅkārayoḥ saṃkaravyavahāraḥ pravartate |
sa ṣọdhā— śabdaguṇapradhānaḥ, arthaguṇapradhānaḥ, doṣaguṇapradhānaḥ, śabdālaṅkārapradhānaḥ, arthālaṅkārapradhānaḥ, ubhayālaṅkārapradhānaḥ | teṣu—
śabdaguṇapradhāno yathā—
prāp‍taśrīreṣa kasmāt॰ || 147 || (pṛ. 332)
atra hetūtprekṣābhidhāne tvayītyādau pade viṣṇoḥ svarūpādhyāsena tad‍bhāvāpattau samādheriha prādhānyaṃ pratīyate |
nanu cāyamarthasya prākaṭyāt prasādo 'rthaguṇaḥ kasmānna bhavati?
atasminnapi tad‍vyapadeśena śabdaśakterādhikyāt |
nanu ca'tvayi iti, eṣa iti asya iti yuṣmadetadidamāṃ na kaścana viṣṇuvācī; sa kathaṃ varṇanīye adhyastamarthamabhidadhīta,
sarvanāmatvenaiṣāṃ sarvavācitvāt | sarvanāmāni hi sarvābhidhāyīnyapi prakaraṇādhi /?/gamyaṃ viśeṣameva bruvate | sa ca iha prāp‍taśrīrityevamādibhirabhivyaktamevāvagamyata iti |
arthaguṇapradhāno yathā—(de.pa.ghaṭastabe 18)
lakṣmīvaśīkaraṇacūrṇasahodarāṇi— tvatpādapaṅkajarajāṃsi ciraṃ jayanti |
yāni praṇāmamilitāni nṛṇāṃ lalāṭe lumpanti daivalikhitāni durakṣarāṇi || 148 ||
atra hetusāmyobhayālaṅkṛtyabhidhāne 'pi prādhānyenārthaprākaṭyamarthaguṇaḥ pratīyate |
doṣaguṇapradhāno yathā—(kirātā. 5.30)
yenāpaviddhasalilasphuṭanāgasadmā—devāsurairamṛtamambunidhirmamanthe |
vyāvartanairahipaterayamāhitāṅkaḥ khaṃ vyālikhanniva vibhāti sa mandarādriḥ || 149 ||
atra 'vyāvartanairahipaterayamāhitāṅkaḥ' iti jñāpakahetoḥ 'khaṃ vyālikhanniva' iti utprekṣāvayavācca, devāsurairiti nityavairavivakṣāyāṃ bahuvacanam, 'amṛtamambunidhirmamanthe' iti 'dvikarmakeṣu jiprabhṛtīnāmupasaṃkhyānam' iti amṛtaśabdād dvitīyā iti doṣaguṇayoḥ prādhānyaṃ pratīyate |
nanu cātrāpyarthasya prākaṭyāt prasādasya prādhānyaṃ kathaṃ na bhavati ?
tadviṣayasya jñāpakahetunāpahṛtatvāt so 'pi hṛrthālaṅkāra eva |
guṇālaṅkārayośca tulyakakṣyatāyāmalaṅkāraḥ pradhānaṃ bhavati, na guṇaḥ | gumairhi guṇabhūtairevālaṅkārāḥ prāya ārabhyante | tadyathā—
aspṛṣṭā doṣamātrābhiḥ samagraguṇagumphitā |
vipañcīsvarasaubhāgyā vaidarbhī rītiriṣyate || 150 ||
samastātyudbhaṭapadāmojaḥkāntisamanvitām |
gauḍīyeti vijānanti rītiṃ rītivicakṣaṇāḥ || 151 ||
āśliṣṭaślathabhāvāṃ tu purāṇacchāyayāśritām |
madhurāṃ sukumārāṃ ca pāñcālīṃ kavayo viduḥ || 152 ||
mādhuryamabhivāñchanti/ntaḥ prasādaṃ ca sumedhasaḥ |
samāsavanti bhūyāṃsi na padāni prayuñjate || 153 || (bhāmahā. 2.1)
lāṭīyāvantyayorvṛttyo1-rmāgadhyāṃ ca kvacit kvacit |
kecidojo 'bhidhitsantaḥ samasyanti bahūnyapi || (bhāmahā. 2.2)
pratītaśabdamojasvi suśliṣṭapadasandhi ca |
prasādi svābhidhānaṃ ca yamakaṃ kṛtināṃ matam || iti | (bhāmahā. 2.18)
mā bhūdalaṅkāratulyakakṣatayā arthaguṇasya prādhānyaṃ, śabdaguṇasya ślāghyaviśeṣaṇayoga udāttatvamityādeḥ kimiti prādhānyaṃ na bhavati ?
doṣaguṇānāmatīvollekhavattvena prādhānyāt |
1. vṛttyo = rītyoriti tu vak‍tavyam |
sā vāmanaprasiddhirlaṅghitanabhaso balidviṣo 'dyāpi |
matyariṇaḥ khalu lokā marmāṇyevānubadh‍nanti || 156 ||
doṣasya yo guṇībhāvaḥ sa tato 'pyadhikaṃ prakāśata iti |
śabdālaṅkārapradhāno yathā—(sa.ka.)
yaccandrakoṭikarakorakabhārabhāji babhrāma babhruṇi jaṭāpaṭale harasya |
tad vaḥ punātu himaśailaśilānikuñjajhāṅkāraḍambaravirāvi surāpagāmbhaḥ || 157 ||
atrārthasya prākaṭyaṃ prasādaḥ, vibhavotkarṣa udāratā, mṛdusphuṭonmiśra— varṇānāmavaiṣamyaṃ samatā, bandhagāḍhatā aurjityamityādibhyo guṇebhyaḥ prādhānyena śabdālaṅkārānuprāsaḥ pratīyate |
arthālaṅkārapradhāno yathā—
āśleṣiṇaḥ pṛthutaraklamapītaśītamāyāminīrghanamudo rajanīryuvānaḥ |
ūrvormuhurvalanabandhanasandhilolapādāntasaṃvalitatūlapaṭāḥ svapanti || 158 ||
atra bandhavikaṭatvamudāratā, ślāghyaviśeṣaṇayoga udāttatvam, vibhavotkarṣa audāryam, dīp‍tarasatvaṃ kāntirityādibhyo guṇebhyaḥ prādhānyena jātirarthālaṅkāraḥ pratīyate |
ubhayālaṅkārapradhāno yathā—
abhyuddha‍ṛtā vasumatī dalitaṃ ripūraḥ॰ || 159 || (pṛ. 501)
atroktiparipākaḥ praụdhiḥ, bandhavikaṭatvamudāratā, āśayotkarṣa udāttatvam, arthasya prākaṭyaṃ prasāda ityādibhyo guṇebhyaḥ śleṣopasarjanā viśeṣoktirubhayālaṅkāraḥ prādhānyena pratīyate |
(6. rasālaṅkārasaṅkaraḥ —6)
atha rasālaṅkārasaṅkara:—
rasavanti hi vastūni sālaṅkārāṇi kānicit |
ekenaiva prayatnena nirvartyante mahākaveḥ || 160 || (dhva. 2.17)
rasabhāvādiviṣayavivakṣāvirahe sati |
alaṅkāranibandho yaḥ sa 1kavibhyo na rocate || 161 || (dhva. 3.42 saṃ.)
1. 'sa' citraviṣayo mataḥ' dhva. 3.42 saṃkā. 2. prakṛṣyate = dhvanau mataḥ — dhva. 2.16
rasākṣip‍tatayā yasya bandhaḥ śakyakriyo bhavet |
apṛthagyat‍nanirvartyaḥ so 'laṅkāraḥ 2prakṛṣyate || 162 || (dhva. 2.16)
śrṛṅgārī cet kaviḥ kāvye jātaṃ rasamayaṃ jagat |
sa eva vītarāgaścennīrasaṃ sarvameva tat || 163 || (dhva. 3.43)
yayā kayācicchutyā yatsamānamanubhūyate |
tadrūpādipadāsaktissānuprāsā rasāvahā || 164 || (kāvyāda. 1.52)
navo 'rthaḥ sūktiragrāmyā śravyo bandhaḥ sphuṭā śrutiḥ |
alaukikārthānuktiśca rasamāhartumīśata1 || 165 || (ha.ca.)
tatra rasālaṅkārasaṅkaraḥ ṣọdhā sambhavati—
'śabdālaṅkārapradhānaḥ, arthālaṅkārapradhānaḥ, ubhayālaṅkārapradhānaḥ, bhāvapradhānaḥ, ābhāsapradhānaḥ rasapradhānaśceti' | teṣu —
śabdālaṅkārapradhāno yathā—(pṛ. 605)
kamalamaliramuñcadutpalakalikātaralolamutpalāśaṅkāṃ te |
kurute sma cakṣuralikulakalikātaralolamutpalāśaṅkāṃ te || 166 ||
atra ratirasaprabhavaṃ vāgārambhamabhibhūya yamakānuprāsau śabdālaṅkārau prādhānyena pratīyete |
arthālaṅkārapradhāno yathā— (seba. 15.66)
pulaaṃ jaṇeṃti dahakaṃdharassa rāhavasarā sarīraaḍaṃtā |
jaṇaasuāpaoharapphaṃsa—karajualāṇivvụ̄dhā || 167 ||
(pulakaṃ janayanti daśakandharasya rāghavaśarāḥ śarīre patantaḥ |
janakasutāpayodharasparśamahārghita—kara—yugala—nirvyụ̄dhā ||)
atra rasābhāsamabhibhūya heturarthālaṅkāraḥ prādhānyena pratīyate |
ubhayālaṅkārapradhāno yathā—
kiṃ guru jahaṇaṃ aha thaṇabharo tti bhāa-kara-alagga-tuliāe |
vihiṇo khuttaṃguli-magga-vibbhamaṃ vahaï se tivalī || 168 ||
(kiṃ guru jaghanamatha stanabhara iti bhāgakaratalāgratulitāyāḥ |
vidheḥ khātāṅgulimārgavibhramaṃ vahatyasyāstrivalī ||)
1. iha uttarārdham 'vikaṭākṣarabandhastu kṛtsnamekatra duṣkaram' iti |
atra ratiprabhavān vismayādīnabhibhūya paryāyasaṃśayahetūtprekṣopamā ubhayālaṅkārāḥ prādhānyena pratīyante |
bhāvapradhāno yathā—
tīe daṃsaṇasuhae paṇaa-kkhalaṇa-jaṇio muhammi maṇahare |
roso vi haraï hiaaṃ maapaṃko vva maalaṃchaṇammi ṇisaṇṇo || 169 ||
(tasyā darśanasubhage praṇayaskhalanajanito mukhe manohare |
roṣo 'pi harati hṛdayaṃ madapaṅka iva mṛgalāñchane niṣaṇṇaḥ ||)
atra hetūpamātiraskāreṇa rasavato harervacasi vāgārambharūpe rukmiṇīdatta— pārijātamañjarīvilokanaprabhavaṃ satyabhāmāyā roṣabhāvarāmaṇīyakaṃ prādhānyena pratīyate |
ābhāsapradhāno yathā—
kaha mā jhijjaü majjho imīa kaṃdoṭṭhadalasaricchehiṃ |
acchīhiṃ jo ṇa dīsaï ghaṇa-thaṇahara-ruddha-pasarehiṃ || 170 ||
(kathaṃ mā kṣīyatāṃ madhya etasyā kandoṣṭha/nīlotpala—dalasadṛśābhyām |
akṣibhyāṃ yo na dṛśyate ghanastanabhararuddhaprasarābhyām ||)
atra hetūpamotprekṣāsamādhitiraskāreṇa kasyacidanavāp‍tadayitāpratyabhiyogā— bhimānasukhasya subhagamāninaḥ pratināyakādeḥ pratyahaṃ sīdataḥ rasābhāsavāgārambhaḥ prādhānyena pratīyate |
rasapradhāno yathā—
mā garvamudvaha kapolatale cakāsti ॰|| 171 || (pṛ. 535 H.O.S.)
atrākṣepahetvahetuparyāyoktibhyaḥ prakṛṣṭaratirasaprasavaḥ priyapremābhimānavikatthanāyāḥ priyavayasyāyāḥ purastāt svakāntapremanivedanāparaḥ vepathuvyabhicārasūcako vāgārambhaḥ prādhānyena pratīyate |
evamiyamanekaprakārā saṃsṛṣṭirguṇarasālaṅkārasaṃkaraprabhavābhimantavyā | tatrāpi pradhānāṅgabhāvena samakakṣyatayā ca vyaktāvyaktobhayātmakarūpāyāḥ tilataṇḍulakṣīra— jalacchāyādarśakādayo bhedā yathāyogamavagantavyāḥ |
te kiṃ vaktavyāḥ?
na vaktavyāḥ |
kathamanuktā gamyante ?
ukteṣvevāntarbhāvāt | tadyathā—arthobhayālaṅkārasaṅkarābhidhāne 'khaṃ vaste' iti 'carcāṃ pārayati' iti vibhaktimudrā 'kalaviṅkakaṇṭhamalinaṃ kādambinīkambalam' iti padamudrā ca śabdālaṅkārāvapi saṃkīryamāṇau pratīyete |
kiṃ punaramī saṅkarā dvayorbahūnāmapi bhavantīti?
dvayoreveti brūmaḥ |
nanvidānīmevoktaṃ bahūnāmapi bhavantīti? dvayordvayoḥ sarvaprakārairapyudāhṛtatvād vākye ca guṇarasayogasya nityatvādullekhavanta eva saṅkarā gṛhyante, nānullekhavantaḥ |
tadyathā— (kusaṃ. 2.12)
ud‍ghātaḥ praṇavo yāsāṃ nyāyaistribhirudīraṇam |
karma yajñaḥ phalaṃ svargastāsāṃ tvaṃ prabhavo girām || 172 ||
atra ślāghyaviśeṣaṇayoga udāttatvamiti śabdaguṇe arthaprākaṭyaṃ prasādaḥ, viśeṣyānupādānādasampūrṇavākyatā neyatvamiti doṣaguṇaśca nollikhati, vibhāvyamānastu pratīyate | jñāpakahetvarthālaṅkāre 'tāsāṃ tva prabhava' iti kārakaheturarthālaṅkāraḥ kramaracaneti śabdālaṅkāra 1nollikhati vibhāvyamānastu pratīyate | preyasi rase vismayaprakarṣo harṣotkarṣaṃ (rṣaśca?) nollikhati vibhāvyamānastu pratīyate | evaṃ
kiṃ yena sṛjasi vyaktamuta yena bibharṣi tat |
atha yastasya saṃhartā bhāgaḥ katama eṣa te || 173 || (kusaṃ. 6.23)
atra vitarkālaṅkāre kārakahetuḥ kramaracanā ca nollikhati, prasādārthaguṇe suśabdatā bandhavaikaṭyaṃ ca nollikhati, matiprakarṣe prītyutkarṣo vitarkaśca nollikhati | vibhāvyamānāstu sarva eva pratīyante | tathā
śiñjānamañjumañjīrakāñcīsañcāracāravaḥ |
ramayanti manaḥ kāntā nitāntaṃ yogināmapi || 174 ||
atra saukumāryaśabdaguṇe samāsabhūyastvamojaḥ ślāghyaviśeṣaṇayoga udāttatvaṃ ca nollikhati | anuprāsaśabdālaṅkāre heturarthālaṃkāro jātiśca nollikhati | vismayabhāve ratirmatiśca nollikhati | vibhāvyamānāśca sarva eva pratīyante | api ca
payodharataṭotsaṅgalagnasandhyātapāṃśukā |
kasya kāmāturaṃ ceto vāruṇī na kariṣyati || 175 || (kāvyāda. 1.84)
atra hetusamādhyalaṅkārayoḥ śleṣarūpakālaṅkārau kāntyudāttatvaguṇayorojaḥ—
1. nollikhatītyevā 'trāsau vākyayogaḥ |
prasādaguṇau ālambanavibhāvoddīpanavibhāvayormativitarkau ca nollikhati | te tu vibhāvyamānāḥ pratīyante | kiṃca —
haste līlākamalamalakaṃ bālakundānuviddhaṃ1 nītā lodhraprasavarajasā pāṇḍutāmānanaśrīḥ |
cūḍāpāśe navakuravakaṃ cāru karṇe śirīṣaṃ sīmante ca tvadupagamajaṃ yatra nīpaṃ vadhūnām || 176 || (megha. 65)
atra jñāpakahetvalaṅkāre kārakaheturjātiścārthālaṅkārau, āvantyā rītiḥ kramaracanā ca śabdālaṅkārau, dīpakakramaśleṣahetūktiparyāyāśca ubhayālaṅkārau(rā) nollikhanti | ślāghyaviśeṣaṇayoga udāttatvamiti śabdaguṇe yāvadarthapadatā saṃmitatvam, aniṣṭhurākṣaraprāyatā saukumāryamiti śabdaguṇau, dīp‍tarasatvaṃ kāntirarthaprākaṭyaṃ prasāda ityarthaguṇo, kālavirodhi niṣkriyamaśarīramiti doṣaguṇau ca nollikhanti | svanivāsavarṇanotkarṣe patiprabhāvopavarṇanaṃ nivāsijanavaidagdhyābhidhānaṃ ca vibhāvau priyatamāsthāna (?) preyorase sarvopakaraṇaprāguṇyasmṛtiḥ vilāsādyabhinandanaṃ cānubhāvau priyasuhṛtprarocanotsāhe ghanāgamanīpavikāsasmṛtirutkaṇṭheti ca vyabhicāriṇau nollikhanti | vibhāvyamānāstu sarva eva pratīyante | anyacca —
śikhaṇḍe khaṇḍenduḥ śaśidinakarau karṇayugale gale tārā hāraḥ taralamuḍucakraṃ ca kucayoḥ |
taṭitkāñcī sandhyā sicayarucayaḥ kāli! tadayaṃ tavākalpaḥ kalpavyuparamavidheyo vijayate || 177 ||
atrārohāvarohakramo gatiḥ, ślāghyaviśeṣaṇayoga udāttatvamiti śabdaguṇayorbandha— vaikaṭyādayaḥ śabdaguṇāḥ, dīp‍tarasatvaṃ kāntirarthaprākaṭyaṃ prasāda ityarthaguṇayoḥ rụ̄dhāhaṅkārataurjityamityādayo 'rthaguṇāḥ, kālādivirodhyaprakṛtarasatvamiti doṣaguṇayoḥ niṣkriyatvādayo doṣaguṇā nollikhanti | vākyamudrānuprāsaśabdālaṅkārayoḥ kramaracanādayaḥ śabdālaṅkārāḥ, jātihetvarthālaṅkārayoḥ jñāpakahetvādayo 'rthālaṅkārā; samāsoktirūpa— kobhayālaṅkārayoḥ samuccayoktyādaya ubhayālaṅkārāḥ nollikhanti | preyaśśāntara— sayorbhayānakādayo rasāḥ raudraśrṛṅgārābhāsayorvīrābhāsādayaḥ ābhāsā matismṛtibhāva— yorharṣādayaśca bhāvā nollikhanti | vibhāvyamānāśca te sarva eva pratīyante |
so 'yaṃ vākyaviṣayo rasāviyoga uktaḥ ||
1. dra. asmākaṃ kālidāsagranthāvalīgataḥ pāṭhaḥ |
(2. prabandhaviṣayo rasāviyoga)*
prabandhaviṣaya ucyate— so 'pi doṣahānena guṇopādānena alaṅkārasaṅkareṇa ca prakāśamāno manīṣiṇāṃ manaḥprakarṣaheturbhavati | tatra
doṣahānamanaucityādiparihāreṇa yathā— māyākaikeyīdaśarathābhyāṃ rāmaḥ pravāsito na mātāpitṛbhyāmiti nirdoṣadaśarathe;
rāmameva yodhayan rāmeṇa vālī nihato na sugrīvamiti mahāvīracarite;
rudhirapriyarākṣasena duśśāsanasya rudhiraṃ pītaṃ 1na bhīmaseneneti veṇīsaṃhāre;
anaṅgāvatārasya pradyumnasyaiva janmāntarapatnī ratirmāyāvatī na gurvaṅganeti harivaṃśe;
durvāsaso avadhyānād duṣyantaḥ śakuntalāsvīkāraṃ visasmāra, nānavasthitā— nurāgatayeti śākuntale;
lavaṇaprayuktarākṣasākṣyāṃ rāma upahvare tattadabhidhāya sītā parityājitā na kaikeyīmantharābhyāmiti chalitarāme;
dagdhāyāmapi vāsavadattāyāṃ vairapraticikīrṣayā padmāvatī mayọdhā, siddhe ca samīhite tayā vinā kṣaṇamapi na jīvāmītyavijñātavāsavadattāsannidhervatsarāja— syāgnipraveśādhyavasāyaḥ priyāhṛdayato vyalīkaśalyamuccakhāneti tāpasavatsarāje;
nīcākṣaḥ svāmikāryaṃ sādhayāmīti prabhubhaktyā niraparādhāmapi preyasīṃ hitvā svāmikāryāpekṣayā ahametāvanti dināni jīvitaḥ, adya tu kṛtasvāmikārya— stāmevānugacchāmīti śivagaṇaḥ śūdrakavinirmitāṃ māyāmayīṃ citāṃ priyāsamakṣaṃ praviveśa, sāpi tatpremāpadānadarśanāpahnutapriyavyalīkā tadviyogakātarā tatraivātmānaṃ pracikṣepeti vikrāntaśūdrake|
evamanyadapi doṣahānamudāhāryam | guṇopādānaṃ tu vakṣyamāṇaprabandhabhedānāṃ samyaglakṣaṇayogena saṃvidhānakasusūtratā; teṣveva nagarārṇavavarṇanādīnāṃ sanniveśa— prāśastyamalaṅkārasaṅkara iti | taduktam— (rāmābhyudaye prastāvanāyām)
aucityaṃ vacasāṃ prakṛtyanugataṃ, sarvatra pātrocitā puṣṭiḥ svāvasare rasasya ca, kathāmārge na cātikramaḥ |
śuddhiḥ prastutasaṃvidhānakavidhau, praụdhiśca śabdārthayoḥ, vidvadbhiḥ paribhāvyatāmavahitairetāvadevāstu naḥ || 178 ||

tatreṣṭārthavyavacchinnā padapaṅ‌ktirvākyapaddhatiḥ prakaraṇāvalī vā prabandhaḥ | yataḥ padānāṃ subantānāṃ tiṅantānāṃ ca sarvārthasādhāraṇatvānna svarūpanibandhano viśeṣaḥ pratīyate | nāpi vākyānāṃ, sarvavyavahārasādhāraṇatvāt parasparāvacchedahetuḥ bhedaḥ saṃbhavati | na ca prakaraṇānāṃ śailartunagarārṇavavarṇanādirūpāṇāṃ sakalakāvyaśarīrāṅgatve tadgato vyatireka upapadyate | ato ya eva taiḥ upakriyamāṇo mahāvākyārthaḥ pratiniyatarūpaḥ sa paramanekavākyaprakaraṇādisamudāyarūpasya mahākāvyāderavacchedahetuḥ, tena vyavacchinnā viśeṣe 'vasthāpitā padapaṅktirvākyapaddhatiḥ prakaraṇāvalī vā prabandhaḥ | yathā jānakīharaṇaṃ, kumārasambhava iti |
nanu ca jānakyā haraṇamasmin, kumārasya sambhavo 'sminniti bahuvrīhau prabandhe 'nyapadārthe jānakīharaṇamiti na prāpnoti, kāvye tu kumārasambhava iti | na caikatra kāvyamevānyapadārthatvenāśrīyate, anyatra prabandha eveti niyamaheturasti | tarhi nāyaṃ bahuvrīhiḥ, ati tu tatpuruṣaḥ, jānakyā haraṇaṃ jānakīharaṇaṃ, kumārasya sambhavaḥ kumārasambhava iti | abhidheyena cābhidhāyakamapi vyapadiśanti kavayaḥ; yathā abhijñānaśākuntalaṃ nāṭakaṃ, harṣacaritamākhyāyiketi |
prabandhaśceha dvidhā— prekṣyaḥ, śravyaśca | tayoḥ —
abhineyaḥ prekṣyaḥ | sa ca nāṭakādibhedāccaturviṃśatiprakāro bhavati—
nāṭakaṃ, prakaraṇaṃ, vyāyogaḥ, īhāmṛgaḥ, samavakāraḥ, ḍimaḥ, utsṛṣṭikāṅkaḥ, bhāṇaḥ, prahasanaṃ, vīthī, nāṭikā, saṭṭakaḥ, śrīgaditaṃ, 1durmilikā, prasthānaṃ, kāvyaṃ, bhāṇakaṃ, bhāṇikā, goṣṭhī, hallīsakaṃ, nartanakaṃ, prekṣaṇakaṃ, rāsakaṃ, nāṭyarāsakamiti |
anabhineyaḥ śravyaḥ | so 'pyākhyāyikādibhedāccaturviṃśatiprakāro bhavati—
ākhyāyikā, upākhyānam, ākhyānaṃ, nidarśanaṃ, pravahlikā, mandhu(nthu)llikā, maṇikulyā, kathā, parikathā, khaṇḍakathā, upakathā, bṛhatkathā, campūḥ, parvabandhaḥ, kāṇḍabandhaḥ, āśvāsakabandhaḥ, sandhibandhaḥ, avaskandhabandhaḥ, kāvyaśāstraṃ, sargabandhaḥ, śāstrakāvyaṃ, kośaḥ, saṅghātaḥ, saṃhitā, 2sāhityaprakāśa iti | tatra
1. agre 'pi durmiliketyeva nāma | 2. idameva hi vastubhūtaṃ nāma granthasyāsya |
(prekṣyaprabandhaḥ (vākyārthābhinayaḥ) —24)
abhineyabhedeṣu—
(1. nāṭakam)
prakhyātavastuviṣayaṃ prakhyātodāttanāyakaṃ caiva |
rājarṣicaritavaṃśānucaritadivyāśrayopetam || 171 ||1 (nāśā.18.9)
sarvābhirbhāṣābhiḥ samanvitaṃ gadyapadyamiśrābhiḥ |
sarvaiścālaṅkārairlakṣaṇaṣaṭ‌triśatā2 yuktam || 180 ||
nānāvibhūtisaṃyutamṛddhivilāsādibhirguṇairyuktam |
aṅkapraveśakạ̄dhyaṃ rūpakamiha nāṭakaṃ nāma || 181 || (20.11)
nṛpatīnāṃ yaccaritaṃ nānārasabhāvasaṃśritaṃ bahudhā |
sukhaduḥkhotpattikṛtaṃ vācyaṃ tannāṭake bhavati || 182 || (20.12)
tatrāvasthopetaṃ kāryaṃ prasamīkṣya binduvistārāt |
kartavyo 'ṅkaḥ samyagguṇānvito nāṭyatattvajñaiḥ || 183 ||
yatrārthasya samāp‍tiryatra ca bījasya bhavati saṃhāraḥ |
kiñcidavalagnabinduḥ so 'ṅka iti sadāvagantavyaḥ || 184 ||
ye nāyakā nigaditāsteṣāṃ pratyakṣacaritasambhogaḥ |
nānāvasthāntaritaḥ kāryastvaṅko yathārtharasaḥ || 185 ||
nāyakadevīparijanapurohitāmātyasārthavāhānām |
naikarasāntaravihito hyaṅka iti budhaiḥ sa vijñeyaḥ || 186 ||
śokaprasādavidravaśāpotsargaprasādanakrodhāḥ |
udvāho3 'dbha‍utadarśanamaṅke pratyakṣajāni syuḥ || 187 ||
yuddhaṃ rājyabhraṃśo maraṇaṃ nagaroparodhanaṃ caiva |
pratyakṣāṇi tu nāṅke praveśakaiḥ saṃvidheyāni || 188 ||
1. nā.śā. kāśīsaṃ. | 2. bhojamatena lakṣaṇāni catuṣṣaṣṭirbhavanti | 3. ud‍vāho = utsāho
bhāvā rasāśca yasminnārohantyaṅkavad bhavet so 'ṅkaḥ |
nānāvidhānayukto lakṣmeva ca yaḥ prabandhasya || 189 ||
ekadivasaprayojyaḥ kāryastvaṅko 'rthabījamadhikṛtya |
āvaśyakakāryāṇāmavirodhena prabandheṣu || 190 ||
ekāṅkena kadācid bahūni kāryāṇi yojayed dhīmān |
āvaśyakāvirodhena tatra kāryāṇi kāryāṇi || 191 ||
jñātvā divasāvasthāṃ kṣaṇayāmamuhūrtalakṣaṇopetām |
vibhajet kāryaṃ matimān pṛthakpṛthak sarvamaṅkeṣu || 192 ||
raṅgaṃ tu ye praviṣṭāssarveṣāṃ bhavati tatra niṣkrāmaḥ |
bījārthayuktiyuktaṃ kṛtvā kāryaṃ yathārtharasam || 193 ||
divasāvasānakāryaṃ yadyaṅke nopapadyate sarvam |
aṅkacchedaṃ kṛtvā praveśakaistad vidhātavyam || 194 ||
sannihitanāyako 'ṅkaḥ kartavyo nāṭake prakaraṇe vā |
parijanakathānubandhaḥ praveśakastatra vijñeyaḥ || 195 ||
aṅkacchedaṃ kṛtvā māsakṛtaṃ varṣasañcitaṃ vāpi |
tat sarvaṃ kartavyaṃ varṣādūrdhvaṃ na tu kadācit || 196 ||
yadi kiñcit kāryavaśād gacchati puruṣaḥ prakṛṣṭamadhvānam |
tatrāpyaṅkacchedaḥ kartavyaḥ pūrvatantrajñaiḥ || 197 ||
aṅkāntarānusārī saṃkṣepārthamadhikṛtya bindūnām |
prakaraṇanāṭakaviṣaye praveśakassaṃvidhātavyaḥ || 198 ||
nottamamadhyamapuruṣairācarito nāpyudāttavacanakṛtaḥ |
prākṛtabhāṣācāraḥ prayogamāsādya kartavyaḥ || 199 ||
viṭamunidaivatapuruṣaiḥ kañcukibhiścārthayuktimāsādya |
saṃskṛtavāgbhirapītthaṃ praveśakaḥ saṃvidhātavyaḥ || 200 ||
kālotthānagatirasa—vyatyāsārambhakāmaviṣayāṇām |
arthābhidhānabhūtaḥ praveśakaḥ syādanekārthaḥ || 201 ||
bahvāśrayamapyarthaṃ praveśakaiḥ saṃkṣipet prabandheṣu |
aṅkeṣu saṃprayukto janayati khedaṃ prayogasya || 202 ||
yatrārthasya samāp‍tirna bhavatyaṅke prayogabāhulyāt |
vṛttāntaḥ svalpakathaiḥ praveśakaisso 'bhidhātavyaḥ || 203 ||
śuddhassaṅkīrṇo vā dvividho viṣkambhakaśca vijñeyaḥ |
madhyamapātraśśuddhaḥ saṅkīrṇo madhyanīcakṛtaḥ || 204 ||
aṅkamukhaṃ garbhāṅkaḥ kāryo 'smiṃś‍cūlikāpi vā kuśalaiḥ |
mā bhūditivṛttānāṃ vicchedo vistaro veti || 205 ||
aṅkamukhaṃ viśliṣṭaṃ yatropaśliṣyate striyā vākyaiḥ |
puruṣasya vā tadasminnaṅkamukhamiti vyapadiśanti || 206 ||
aṅkāntare parāṅko nipatati yasmin prayogamāsādya |
bījārthayuktiyukto garbhāṅko nāma sa jñeyaḥ || 207 ||
antaryavanikasaṃsthairmāgadhasūtādibhistu yaḥ kriyate |
arthasyopakṣepo 'nekavidhaś‍cūlikā sāpi || 208 ||
nāṭakalakṣaṇametanmayā samāsena kīrtitaṃ vidhivat |
prakaraṇamataḥ paramahaṃ lakṣaṇayuktyā pravakṣyāmi || 209 ||
(2. prakaraṇam)
yatra kavirātmabuddha‍yā vastu śarīraṃ ca nāyakaṃ caiva |
autpattikaṃ prakurute tajjñeyaṃ prakaraṇaṃ nāma || 210 ||
yadanārṣamaprayuktaṃ pareṇa yat syādabhūtaguṇabandham |
prakaraṇamiti tadvidyādaud‍‌bhijabījārthasaṃyuktam || 211 ||
yannāṭake mayoktaṃ vastuśarīraṃ rasāśrayopetam |
tatprakaraṇe 'pi kāryaṃ kevalamutpādyavastviha tat || 212 ||
vipravaṇiksacivānāṃ purohitāmātyasārthavāhānām |
caritaṃ yannaikavidhaṃ tajjñeyaṃ prakaraṇaṃ kṛtibhiḥ || 213 ||
nodāttanṛpopetaṃ na divyacaritaṃ na rājasambhogam |
bāhyajanasaṃprayuktaṃ tajjñeyaṃ prakaraṇaṃ loke || 214 ||
dāsaviṭaśreṣṭhiyutaṃ veśastryupacārakāraṇopetam |
mandakulastrīcaritaṃ kāryaṃ kāryaṃ prakaraṇe tu || 215 ||
sacivaśreṣṭhibrāhmaṇapurohitāmātyasārthavāhānām |
gṛhavārtā yatra bhavenna tatra veśyāṅganā kāryā || 216 ||
yadi veśayuvatiyuktaṃ na kulastrīsaṅgamarhati kadācit |
atha kulavadhūprayuktaṃ na veśayuvatirbhavettatra || 217 ||
yadi vā kāraṇayuktyā veśakulastrīsamāgamo 'pi syāt |
avikṛtabhāṣācāraṃ tatra tu pāṭhyaṃ prayoktavyam || 218 ||
madhyamapuruṣairnityaṃ yojyo viṣkambhako 'tra tantrajñaiḥ |
saṃskṛtavacanānugataḥ saṃkṣepārthaḥ praveśakavat || 219 ||
aṅkāntarālavihitapraveśako 'rthakriyāmabhisamīkṣya |
saṃkṣepāt sandhīnāmarthānāṃ caiva kartavyaḥ || 220 ||
aṅke praveśake vā prakaraṇamāśritya nāṭakaṃ vāpi |
na vadhaḥ kartavyo vai yastatra tu nāyakaḥ khyātaḥ || 221 ||
apasaraṇameva kāryaṃ grahaṇaṃ vā sandhireva vā yojyaḥ |
kāryaṃ śleṣairbahubhiryathārasaṃ nāṭyatattvajñaiḥ || 222 ||
prakaraṇanāṭakaviṣaye pañcādyā daśaparā bhavatyaṅkāḥ |
aṅkāntarasandhiṣu ca praveśakāsteṣu tāvantaḥ || 223 ||
na mahājanaparivāraṃ kartavyaṃ nāṭakaṃ prakaraṇaṃ vā |
ye tatra kāryapuruṣāścatvāraḥ pañca vā te syuḥ || 224 ||
vyāyogehāmṛgasamavakāraḍimasaṃjñitāni kāvyāni |
daśabhirdvādaśabhirvā ṣoḍaśabhirvāpi puruṣaiḥ syuḥ || 225 ||
(3. vyāyogaḥ)
vyāyogastatra budhaiḥ kāryaḥ prakhyātanāyakaśarīraḥ |
alpastrījanayuktaḥ syādekāhaprayojyaśca || 226 ||
bahavastatra tu puruṣā vyāyacchante kathāśarīravaśāt |
na ca tatpramāṇaniyamaḥ kiñcaikāṅkau vidhātavyaḥ || 227 ||
na sa divyanāyakakṛtaḥ kāryo rājarṣināyakanibandhaḥ |
yuddhaniyuddhādharṣaṇasaṅgharṣayutaśca kartavyaḥ || 228 ||
evaṃvidhastu kāryo vyāyogo dīp‍takāvyarasayoniḥ || 229 ||
(4. īhāmṛgaḥ)
vakṣyāmyataḥ paramahaṃ lakṣaṇamīhāmṛgasyāpi |
divyapuruṣāśrayakṛto divyastrīkāraṇopagatayuddhaḥ || 230 ||
suvihitavastunibandho vipratyayakārakaścaiva |
uddhatapuruṣaprāyastrīroṣagrathitakāvyabandhaśca || 231 ||
saṃkṣobhavidravakṛtaḥ saṃsphoṭakṛtaśca sa jñeyaḥ |
tatra ca vadhepsitānāṃ vadho 'pyudagro bhavenna puruṣāṇām || 232 ||
kiñcid‍vyājaṃ kṛtvā teṣāṃ yuddhaṃ śamayitavyam |
strībhedanāpaharaṇopamardanaprāp‍tavastuśṛṅgāraḥ || 233 ||
īhāmṛgo vidheyaścaturaṅkavibhūṣitastajjñaiḥ |
yad vyāyoge kāryaṃ ye puruṣā vṛttayo rasāścaiva || 234 ||
īhāmṛge 'pi te syuḥ kevalamamarastriyā yogaḥ |
īhāmṛgasya lakṣaṇamityuktamidaṃ mayā samāsena || 235 ||
(5. samavakāraḥ)
vakṣyāmyataḥparamahaṃ lakṣaṇayuktyā samavakāram |
devāsurabījakṛtaḥ prakhyātodāttanāyakaścaiva |
tryaṅkastathā trikapaṭastrividravaḥ syāttriśṛṅgāraḥ || 236 ||
dvādaśanāyakabahulo hyaṣṭādaśanāḍikāpramāṇaśca |
vakṣyāmyasyāṅkavidhiṃ yāvatyo nāḍikā yatra || 237 ||
aṅko 'tra saprahasanaḥ savidravaḥ sakapaṭaḥ savīthīkaḥ |
dvādaśanāḍīyuktaḥ prathamaḥ kāryaḥ kriyopetaḥ || 238 ||
kāryastathā dvitīyassamāśrito nāḍikāścatasrastu |
vastusamāpanavihito dvināḍikaḥ syāt tṛtīyo 'smin || 239 ||
nāḍīsaṃjñā jñeyā mānaṃ kālasya yanmuhūrtārdham |
tannāḍikāpramāṇaṃ yathoktamaṅkeṣu saṃyojyam || 240 ||
aṅke 'ṅke sambandhaḥ kartavyaḥ kāvyabandhamāsādya |
arthaṃ hi samavakāreṣvapratisambandhamicchanti || 241 ||
vastugatikramavihito daivavaśādvā paraprayukto vā |
sukhaduḥkhotpattikṛtastrividhaḥ kapaṭo 'tra vijñeyaḥ || 242 ||
yuddhajalasaṃbhramo vā vāyvag‍nigajendrasaṃbhramakṛto vā |
nagaroparodhajo vijñeyo vidravastrividhaḥ || 243 ||
vividhaścātra vidhijñaiḥ pṛthakpṛthakakkāvyabandhavihitārthaḥ |
trividhakṛtaḥ śṛṅgāro jñeyo dharmārthakāmeṣu || 244 ||
yasmin dharmaprāpakamātmahitaṃ bhavati sādhanaṃ bahudhā |
vrataniyamatapoyukto jñeyo 'sau dharmaśṛṅgāraḥ || 245 ||
arthasyāp‍tiryasmin bhavati ca bahudhā sa cārthaśṛṅgāraḥ |
strīsaṃprayogaviṣaye hyarthārthamapīṣyate 'bhiratiḥ || 246 ||
kanyāvilobhanakṛtaḥ prāp‍tau strīpuṃsayoḥ sa ratyaiva |
nibhṛtaṃ sāvegaṃ vā vijñeyaḥ kāmaśṛṅgāraḥ || 247 ||
uṣṇiggāyatryādyānyanyāni ca yāni bandhakuṭilāni |
vṛttāni samavakāre kavibhistāni prayojyāni || 248 ||
evaṃ kāryaḥ prājñairnānārasasaṃśrayaḥ samavakāraḥ |
(6. ḍimaḥ)
ḍimalakṣaṇaṃ tu bhūyo lakṣaṇayuktyā pravakṣyāmi || 249 ||
śṛṅgārahāsyavarjaṃ śaiṣaiḥ sarvai rasaissamāyuktaḥ |
dīp‍tarasakāvyayoniścaturaṅko vai ḍimaḥ kāryaḥ || 250 ||
prakhyātavastuviṣayaḥ prakhyātodāttanāyakarśceva |
raudrabhayānakabībhatsavīrakaruṇādbha‍utopetaḥ || 251 ||
māyendrajālabahulo bahupuṃso(pusto)tthānasaṃyuktaḥ |
devabhujagendrarākṣasayakṣapiśācāvakīrṇaśca || 252 ||
nirghātolkāpātairuparāgaiścandrasūryayoryuktaḥ |
yuddhaniyuddhanibaddhaḥ saṃspho(samphe)ṭakutaśca kartavyaḥ || 253 ||
sātvatyārabhaṭībhyāṃ vṛttibhyāmanvito ḍimaḥ kāryaḥ |
ṣoḍaśanāyakabahulastajjñairnānāśrayaviśeṣaḥ || 254 ||
ḍimalakṣaṇamapyabhihitamidamuddeśakrameṇa saṃkṣepāt |
utsṛṣṭikāṅkabhāṇaprahasanavīthīratho vakṣye || 255 ||
(7. utsṛṣṭikāṅkaḥ)
prakhyātavastuviṣayasteṣvaprakhyātavastuviṣayo vā |
divyapuruṣairviyuktaśśeṣaiśca samanvitaḥ puṃbhiḥ || 256 ||
karuṇarasaprāyakṛto niyuddhayuddhoddhataprahāraśca |
strīparidevitabahulo nirveditavākyabhāṣaśca || 257 ||
nātivyāyataceṣṭaḥ sātvatyārabhaṭikaiśikīhīnaḥ |
kāryaḥ kāvyavidhijñaissatatamihotsṛṣṭikāṅkastu || 258 ||
(8. bhāṇaḥ)
dhūrtaviṭasaṃprayojyo nānāvasthāntarātmakaścaiva |
vastusamāṅkaḥ kāryaḥ satataṃ kāvye budhairbhāṇaḥ || 259 ||
ātmānubhūtaśaṃśī parasaṃśrayavarṇanāviśeṣayutaḥ |
vividhāśrayaśca bhāṇo vijñeyaḥ saikahāryaśca || 260 ||
paravacanamātmasaṃsthaṃ paravacanaiḥ sottarairgrathitavākyam |
ākāśapuruṣakathitairaṅgavikārairihābhinayet || 261 ||
(9. prahasanam)
prahasanamiha vijñeyaṃ dvividhaṃ śuddhaṃ ca saṅkīrṇam |
vakṣyāmi tayoryuktyā pṛthakpṛthaglakṣaṇaviśeṣam || 262 ||
lokopacārayuktā yā vārtā yaśca dambhasaṃyogaḥ |
sa prahasane prayojyo dhūrtajanavivādasampannaḥ || 263 ||
bhagavattāpasaviprairanyairapi hāsavādasampannam |
nīcajanasaṃprayuktaṃ parihāsābhāṣaṇaprāyam || 264 ||
veśyānapuṃsakaviṭairvātikadāsījanena saṃkīrṇam |
anibhṛtaveṣaparicchadaceṣṭitakaraṇaiśca saṃpannam || 265 ||
avikṛtabhāṣācāraṃ viśeṣabhāṣopahāsaracitapadam |
niyatagativastuviṣayaṃ śuddhamiha prahasanaṃ bhavati || 266 ||
ud‍ghātyakādibhiridaṃ vīthyaṅgairmiśritaṃ bhavenmiśram | (10. vīthī)
vīthī syādekāṅkā dvipātrahāryaikahāryā vā || 267 ||
sarvarasalakṣaṇạ̄dhyā samanvitāṅgairiyaṃ trayodaśabhiḥ |
prathamo(adhamo)ttamamadhyamābhiryuktaḥ syāt prakṛtibhistisṛbhiḥ || 268 ||
iti daśarūpakametad bharatācāryānusārato gaditam | (11. nāṭikā)
prakaraṇanāṭakabhedo rūpakamiha nāṭikā bhavati || 269 ||
strīprāyā caturaṅkā lalitābhinayātmikā suvihitāṅgī |
bahugītanṛttavādyā ratisaṃbhogātmikā caiva |
rājopacārayuktā śṛṅgārābhinayabhāvasaṃyuktā || 270 ||
nāyakadevīparijanasamanvitā nāṭakaprakṛtiḥ |
(12. saṭṭakaḥ)
prakaraṇasamudbhavā punarutpādyaṃ vastu nāyakaṃ nṛpatim || 271 ||
antaḥpurasaṅgītakakanyāmadhikṛtya kartavyā |
viṣkambhakapraveśakarahito yastvekabhāṣayā bhavati || 272 ||
aprākṛta—saṃskṛtayā sa saṭṭako nāṭikāpratimaḥ |
kāvyaṃ gopucchāgraṃ kartavyaṃ nāṭikādiṣu prājñaiḥ || 273 ||
ye tūdāttā bhāvāste sarve pṛṣṭhataḥ kāryāḥ |
sarveṣāṃ kāvyānāṃ nānārasabhāvayuktiyuktānām || 274 ||
