namaskāro yathā harṣacarite—
namastuṅgaśiraś‍cumbicandracāmaracārave |
trailokyanagarārambhamūlastambhāya śambhave || 357 ||
stutiryathā raghuvaṃśe—(raghu.1.1)
vāgarthāviva sampṛktau vāgarthapratipattaye |
jagataḥ pitarau vande pārvatīparameśvarau || 358 ||
āśīryathā harivilāse—
omityetatparaṃ brahma śrutīnāṃ mukhamakṣaram |
prasīdat satāṃ svānteṣvekaṃ tripuruṣīmayam || 359 ||
vastunirdeśo yathā hayagrīvavadhe—
āsīd daityo hayagrīvaḥ suhṛd‍veśmasu yasya tāḥ |
vadanti sma balaṃ bāhvoḥ sitacchatrasmitāḥ śriyaḥ || 360 ||
vastūpakṣepo yathā mārīcavadhe—
maavaha-ṇimittaṇiggaa-maïṃdasuṇṇaṃ guhaṃ ṇieūṇa |
laddhāvasaro gahiūṇa mottiāiṃ gao vāho || 361 ||
(mṛgavadhanimittanirgatamṛgendraśūnyāṃ guhāṃ nirūpya |
labdhāvasaro gṛhītvā mauktikāni gato vyādhaḥ ||)
saṃbandhādimadādivākyatvamityanena svavaṃśādikīrtanaṃ, vaktavyārthapratijñānaṃ, tatprayojanopanyāsaḥ, kavipraśaṃsā, durjanasujanasvarūpamityādayaḥ saṃgṛhyante | tatra—
svavaṃśādikīrtanaṃ yathā kādambaryām—'babhūva vātsyāyanavaṃśasaṃbhava' ityupakramya,
dvijena tenākṣatakaṇṭhakauṇṭhyayā mahāmanomohamalīmasāndhayā |
alabdhavaidagdhyavilāsamugdhayā dhiyā nibaddheyamatidvayī kathā || 362 ||
vaktavyārthapratijñānaṃ yathā setubandhe—(1.12)
taṃ tiasabaṃdimokkhaṃ samatthatellokkahiaasalluddharaṇaṃ |
suṇaha aṇurāaïṇhaṃ sīādukkhakkhaaṃ dahamuhassa vahaṃ || 363 ||
(taṃ tridaśabandimokṣaṃ samastatrailokyahṛdayaśalyoddharaṇam |
śṛṇutānurāgacihnaṃ sītāduḥkhakṣayaṃ daśamukhasya vadham ||)
prayojanopanyāso yathā tatraiva—(seba. 1.10)
parivạdh‍ḍhaï viṇṇāṇaṃ saṃbhāvijjaï jaso viḍhappaṃti guṇā |
suvvaï suurisacariaṃ kiṃ taṃ jeṇa ṇa haraṃti kavvālāvā || 364 ||
(parivardhate vijñānaṃ saṃbhāvyate yaśo 'rjyante guṇāḥ |
śrūyate supuruṣacaritaṃ kiṃ tad yanna haranti kāvyālāpāḥ ||)
kavipraśaṃsā yathā rāvaṇavijaye—
saalaṃ cea ṇibaṃdhaṃ dohi paehi kalusaṃ pasaṇṇaṃ ca ṭhiaṃ |
jāṇaṃti kaīṇa kaī suddhasahāvehi loaṇehi va hiaaṃ || 365 ||
(sakalameva nibandhanaṃ dvābhyāṃ padābhyāṃ kaluṣaṃ prasannaṃ ca sthitam |
jānanti kavīnāṃ kavayaḥ śuddhasvamāvābhyāṃ locanābhyāmiva hṛdayam ||)
durjanasujanasvarūpaṃ yathā kādambaryām—
kaṭu k‍vaṇanto maladāyakāḥ khalāstudantyalaṃ bandhanaśṛṅkhalā iva |
manastu sādhudhvanibhiḥ padepade haranti santo maṇinūpurā iva || 366 ||
duṣkarasamasaṃskṛtādisargatvamityanena gomūtrikāmurajabandhaikākṣarapādayamakamāṣā— citrādaya upalakṣyante | teṣu —
gomūtrikā yathā kirātārjunīye—(kirātā. 15.12)
nāsuro 'yaṃ navā nāgo dharasaṃstho na rākṣasaḥ |
nāsukho 'yaṃ navābhogo dharaṇīstho hi rājasaḥ || 367 ||
murajabandho yathā śiśupālavadhe—(māgha.19.29)
sāsenā gamanārambhe rasenāsīdanāratā |
tāranādajanāmattadhīranāgamanāmayā || 368 ||
ekākṣarapādo yathā (tatraiva)—(māgha. 19.3)
jajaujojājijijjā jī taṃ tato 'titatātitut |
bhābho 'bhībhābhibhūbhābhūrārārirarirīraraḥ || 369 ||
yamakaṃ yathā tatraiva—(māgha. 19.9)
pṛthoradhyakṣipad rukmī yayā cāpamudāyudhaḥ |
tayaiva vācāpagamaṃ yayācāpamudā yudhaḥ || 370 ||
bhāṣācitraṃ mālatīmādhave—(māmā. 6.11)
kiṃ vā bhaṇāmi vicchedadāruṇāyāsakāriṇi |
kāmaṃ kuru varārohe dehi me parirambhaṇam || 371 ||
bhinnavṛttasargāntatvamityanena bhinnaparvāntatvaṃ, bhinnakāṇḍāntatvaṃ, bhinnasargāntatvaṃ, bhinnāśvāsakāntatvaṃ, bhinnasandhyantatvamityādīnyupasaṃgṛhyante | sargagrahaṇasya chatriṇo gacchantītivat sahacaritopalakṣaṇatvāt | etena vṛttagrahaṇena na kevalaṃ gaṇacchando mātrākṣaracchando 'pi parigṛhītaṃ bhavati |
nanu cāśvāsakabandheṣu tatsamāp‍tāvapi na cchangobheda upalabhyate | tathā hi rāvaṇavijaya—harivijaya—setubandheṣu āditassamāp‍tiparyantamekameva cchando bhavati | galitakāni tu tatra 1vyāsakaṣṭavat kairapi vidagdhamānibhirupakṣip‍tānīti tadvido bhāṣante |
maivam; mātrācchandasāṃ skandhakādīnāṃ chandovicitiṣvekaikasyāpyanantabhedatvāt | anye tu bhinnavṛttāḥ sargāntāḥ parvakāṇḍasargā eteṣviti vyācakṣate | tenāyamarthaḥ saṃpadyate
1. vyāsāṣṭakavaditi tu syāt |
parvaṇiparvaṇi kāṇḍekāṇḍe sargesarge cānyadanyacchando nibandhanīyamati | āśvāsakasandhibandhayostu sarvatra ekameva cchando bhavati |
tanna samyak; āśvāsakabandhe 'pi bhinnavṛttāntatvadarśanāt | tadyathā hariprabodhe āryāgīticchandonibandhaka āśvāsakānte puṣpitāgrā—
bhagavati śayite vibhāvarīṇāṃ dyutimapahṛtya yaśovibhāvarīṇām |
gatamasasitayā(?) vibhāvarīṇāṃ saghanamahassamatāvibhāvarīṇām || 372 ||
sandhibandheṣu ca nārācatoṭakādīni vicitrāṇi cchandāṃsi dṛśyante | ekeneva anuṣṭubjātyādinā chandasā bahavaḥ sargakāṇḍādayo raghuvaṃśa—rāmāyaṇādiṣūpalabhyante | tasmādupakrāntavṛttavyudāsena sargādīnāṃ vṛttāntarairupasaṃhāraḥ kartavya ityetadeva vyākhyānaṃ śreyaḥ | tadyathā kumārasambhave—(kusaṃ.2.64)
atha sa lalitayoṣid‍bhrūlatācāruśṛṅgaṃ rativalayapadāṅke cāpamāsajya kaṇṭhe |
sahacaramadhuhastanyastacūtāṅkurāstraḥ śatamakhamupatasthe prāñjaliḥ puṣpadhanvā || 373 ||
kavibhāvāṅkitasamāp‍tivākyatvamityanena 'svābhiprāyāṅkatā svanāmāṅkatā iṣṭanāmāṅkatā, maṅgalāṅkatā, āśaṃsāṅkatā' ca saṃgṛhyante | teṣu —
abhiprāyāṅkatā yathā dhairyamạ̄dhyarājasya, utsāhaḥ sarvasenasya, anurāgaḥ pravarasenasyeti |
svanāmāṅkatā yathā svaprabandheṣu govindacaturmukhādīnāṃ, yathā ca rājaśekharasya haravilāse |
iṣṭanāmāṅkatā yathā lakṣmyaṅkatā kirāte bhāraveḥ, śrayaṅkatā śiśupālavadhe māghasya, caturmukha—govinda—candraśekhareṣṭadevatānāmāṅkatā ca pūrvokteṣu pūrvoktānāmiti |
maṅgalāṅkatā yathā— abhyudayaḥ kṛṣṇacarite, jaya uṣāharaṇe, ānandaḥ pañcaśikhaśūdrakakathāyāmiti |
āśaṃsā(ṅkatā) dharmārthakāmamokṣaviṣayā | tāsu
dharmaviṣayā yathā uttararāmacarite—(u.rā.ca. 7.21)
pāpmabhyaśca punāti vardhayati ca śreyāṃsi yeyaṃ kathā
maṅgalyā ca manoharā ca jagatāṃ māteva gaṅgeva ca |
tāmetāṃ paribhāvayantvabhinayairvinyastarūpāṃ budhāḥ
śabdabrahmavidaḥ kaveḥ pariṇataprajñasya vāṇīmapi || 374 ||
arthaviṣayā yathā—(vikramo. 5.24)
parasparavirodhinyorekasaṃśrayadurlabham |
saṃgataṃ śrīsarasvatyorbhūtaye 'stu satāṃ bhuvi || 375 ||
kāmaviṣayā yathā—
mama hṛdayamaśaṅkitavyalīkaṃ samasukhaduḥkhamajātaviprayogam |
anubhavatu mudaḥ sadaiva yūnāṃ mithunamabhīṣṭatamāstava prasādāt || 376 ||
mokṣaviṣayā yathā—(śāku. 7.35)
pravartatāṃ prakṛtihitāya pārthivaḥ, sarasvatī śrutimahatāṃ mahīyatām |
mamāpi ca kṣapayatu nīlalohitaḥ punarbhavaṃ parigataśaktirātmabhūḥ || 377 ||
etenānyadapi vyākhyātam | tadyathā—
yāvallīlāvatīnāmanaṇumaṇiraṇatkiṅkiṇīk‍vāṇakūjat— kāñcīdāmopanaddhāḥ pṛthujaghanataṭīḥ pañcabāṇo 'dhiśete |
yāvacca bhrūvilāsassakalajanamanohāriṇaḥ sundarīṇāṃ tasyaivāstrībhavanti tribhuvanavijaye tāvadevāstu kīrttiḥ || 378 ||
nagarāśramaśailasainyāvāsārṇavavarṇanamityanena arthālaṅkāreṣu deśapraśaṃsāmupadiśati | tatra —
nagaravarṇanaṃ yathā setubandha—harivijaya—śiśupālavadha—kumārasambhavādau |
āśramavarṇanaṃ yathā raghuvaṃśa—kirātārjunīya—kādambarī—śākuntalādau |
śailavarṇanaṃ yathā kirātārjunīya—śiśupālavadha—setubandha—harivijayādau |
sainyāvāsavarṇanaṃ yathā śiśupālavadha—kirātārjunīya—rāvaṇavijaya—raghuvaṃśādau |
arṇavavarṇanaṃ yathā setubandha—harivijaya—raghuvaṃśādau |
ṛturātrindivārkāstamayacandrodayādivarṇanamityanena kālāvasthopavarṇanaṃ lakṣayati | tatra
ṛtuvarṇanaṃ śarad‍vasantagrīṣmavarṣādivarṇanāni setubandha—harivijaya—raghuvaṃśa—harivaṃśādau |
rātrivarṇanaṃ yathā kirātārjunīya—kumārasambhava—śiśupālavadha—hayagrīvavadhādau |
divasavarṇanaṃ x x x x x x
prabhātapūrvāh‍ṇāparāh‍ṇamadhyāhnavarṇanāni śiśupālavadha—rāmacarita—uttararāmacarita— kirātārjunīyādau |
arkāstamayavarṇanaṃ yathā kumārasambhava—harivijaya—setubandhādau |
candrodayavarṇanaṃ yathā kumārasambhava—kirātārjunīya—śiśupālavadha—setubandhādāviti |
nāyakanāyikākumārasahāyavāhanādivarṇanamityanena pātraviśeṣābhinandanaṃ sūcayati | tatra
nāyakavarṇanaṃ yathā harivijaya—rāvaṇavijaya—jānakīharaṇa—raghuvaṃśādau |
nāyikāvarṇanaṃ yathā kuvalayāśvacarita—kumārasambhava—jānakīharaṇa—subhadrāharaṇādau |
kumāravarṇanaṃ yathā raghuvaṃśa—uttaracarita—kādambarī—harṣacaritādau |
sahāyavarṇanaṃ yathā rāmāyaṇa—mahābhārata—bṛhatkathā—mālatīmādhavādau |
vāhanavarṇanaṃ yathā harṣacarita—kādambarī—harivijaya—rāvaṇavijayādau |
hastyaśvagarutmatpuṣpakādivarṇanādi |
mantradūtaprayāṇasaṅgrāmābhyudayavarṇanamityanena arthapradhānaceṣṭānāmupadeśāt 'caturvargaphalatve 'pi bhūyasārthopadeśakṛt' mahākāvyādikaṃ bhavatītyabhidhatte | puruṣakārāyattāṃ ca nāyakasya siddhiṃ sūcayati | tatra
mantraḥ pañcāṅgaḥ karmaṇāmārambhopāyaḥ puruṣadravyasampat deśakālavibhāgaḥ vinipātapratīkāraḥ kāryasiddhiśceti | sa yathā kirātārjunīya—śiśupālavadha— hayagrīvavadha—bhaṭṭikāvyādau |
dūtastridhā— nisṛṣṭārthaḥ, parimitārthaḥ śāsanaharaśca | tatra
nisṛṣṭārtho yathā udyogaparvaṇi vāsudevaḥ, harivijaye vā satyakaḥ |
parimitārtho yathā rāmāyaṇe 'ṅgadaḥ |
śāsanaharo yathā kādambaryāṃ keyūraka iti |
prayāṇaṃ tridhā— svaśaktyupacaye, paravyasane, abhimatārthasiddhaye ca | tatra
svaśaktyupacaye yathā raghuvaṃśe |
paravyasane yathā jarāsandhavyasaninaḥ śiśupālasyocchedāya vāsudevasya śiśupālavadhe |
abhimatārthasiddhaye yathā viṣṇoḥ pārijātaharaṇāya harivijaye, yathā vā divyāstralābhāyārjunasya kirātārjunīya iti |
saṅgrāmastridhā— samo, viṣamaḥ, samaviṣama iti | tatra
samo dvandvayuddhe caturaṅgayuddhe ca | dvandvayuddhaṃ yathā rāmarāvaṇayoḥ | caturaṅgaṃ yathā kurupāṇḍavānām |
viṣamo yathā rāmasya kharadūṣaṇatriśirobhiḥ saha |
caturdaśasahastrāṇi caturdaśa ca rakṣasām |
hatānyekena rāmeṇa mānuṣeṇa padātinā || 379 || (vārā. 3.26.35)
samaviṣamo yathā maheśvarārjunayoḥ kirātārjunīye, raghumaghonorvā raghuvaṃśa iti |
abhyudayastridhā— arivijayaḥ, strīlābhaḥ, putrotpattiriti | tatra—
arivijayo dvidhā— śatrūcchedena, tadupanatyā ca | sa pūrvo yathā rāvaṇavadhādau |
dvitīyo yathā harivijayādau |
strīlābho yathā indumatīsvayaṃvare |
putralābho yathā dilīpasya raghuvaṃśa iti |
vanavihārajalakrīḍāmadhupānamānāpagamaratotsavādivarṇanamityanena rasoddīpanavibhāvasya sambhogaśṛṅgārasya upadeśānmantradūtaprayāṇasaṅgrāmābhyudayādibhistāṃstānarthānadhigamya taistairvilāsaviśeṣaiḥ kāmasevayā tadupayogaḥ kartavya iti śikṣayati | tatra
vanavihāro dvidhā— mṛgayādibhiḥ puṣpāpacayādibhiśca |
tatrādyo yathā daśarathasya raghuvaṃśe, duṣyantasya śākuntale |
dvitīyo yathā yadūnāṃ śiśupālavadhe, apsarasāṃ vā kirātārjunīye iti |
jalakrīḍā dvidhā— ekasya vā bahvībhiḥ svayoṣābhirbahūnāṃ vā bahvībhiḥ yathāsvamaṅganābhiḥ |
tatrādyā yathā kārtavīryasya narmadāyāṃ, kuśasya vā sarayvām |
dvitīyā yathā apsarasāṃ vā siddhasindhau, yadūnāṃ vā raivatakahrada iti |
madhupānaṃ dvidhā; goṣṭhīgṛhe vāsabhavane ca |
tatrādyaṃ yathā harivijaye śiśupālavadhe ca |
dvitīyaṃ yathā kumārasambhave kirātārjunīye ca |
mānāpagamo dvidhā— prāyat‍niko naimittikaśca |
prāyat‍niko yathā harivijaye satyabhāmāyāḥ, rat‍nāvalyāṃ vāsavadattāyāḥ;
naimittiko yathā rāmātaṅkānniśācarīṇāṃ setubandhe, yathā vā malayamārutendūdayādibhyo mahāprabandheṣu |
ratotsavo 'pi dvidhā— sāmānyato viśeṣataśca |
sāmānyato yathā kirātārjunīye śiśupālavadhe ca |
viśeṣato yathā kumārasambhave jānakīharaṇe ceti |
bījabindupatākāprakarīkāryopakalpanamityanena pañcānāmarthapukṛtīnāṃ prayoge saṃpūrṇam |
prabandhaśarīramadhya evaikadvitrilope tvaparipūrṇamiti upavarṇayati | tatra
alyamātramupakṣip‍taṃ bahudhā yad visarpati |
phalāvasānaṃ yacca syāt tad bījamiha kīrtitam || (nāśā. 19.22)
tadyathā—
dhūrtairyacch‌vapacīkṛto vararuciḥ sarvajñakalpo 'pi sañ jīvanneva piśācatāṃ ca gamito bhatsyuryadabhyarcyadhīḥ |
chandogo 'yamiti prabhākaragururdeśācca nirvāsito mad‍vṛttāntavijṛmbhitena mahatā tat sarvamalpīkṛtam || 381 ||
prayojanānāṃ vicchede yadavicchedakāraṇam |
yāvatsamāp‍ti sambandhaḥ sa binduriti kīrtitaḥ || 382 ||
yathā—
dhvastāḥ kṣudrāḥ dhārtarāṣṭrāssamastāḥ pītaṃ raktaṃ svād duśśāsanasya |
pūrṇā kṛṣṇākeśabandhapratijñā tiṣṭhatyekaḥ kauravasyorubhaṅgaḥ || 383 ||
yasyā vṛttaṃ parārthaṃ syāt pradhānasyopakārakam |
ātmānubandhaphalavat sā patāketi kīrtitā || 384 ||
yathā— (urāca. 1.32)
diṣṭyā saiṣa mahābāhurañjanānandavardhanaḥ |
yasya vīryeṇa kṛtino vayaṃ ca bhuvanāni ca || 385 ||
phalaṃ prakalpate yasyāḥ parārthāyaiva kevalam |
anubandhavihīnāṃ tāṃ prakarīti vinirdiśet || 386 ||
yathā—
sandhyābhrakapiśastatra virādho nāma rākṣasaḥ |
atiṣṭhanmārgamāvṛtya rāmasyendoriva grahaḥ || 387 ||
yadādhikārikaṃ vastu samyak prājñaiḥ prayujyate |
yadarthaśca samārambhastat kāryamiti kīrtitam || 388 ||
yathā—
ājñā kṛtā gurūṇāṃ suhṛdbhiraparikṣatairahaṃ yuktaḥ |
dṛṣṭo bhagavān sākṣāddevī prāp‍tā priyaṃ kimataḥ || 389 ||
eṣāṃ tvekadvitrilope niyama ucyate—(nāśā. 19.18)
ekalope caturthasya dvilope tricaturthayoḥ |
dvitṛtīyacaturthānāṃ trilope lopa iṣyate || 390 ||
garbhāṅkacūlikāṅkamukhaviṣkambhakapraveśakavidhānamityanena saṃkṣepābhidhānenāpi kathāśarīrasyāvicchedād rasāvicchedaṃ rasāntaratiraskāraṃ ca sūcayati | tatra—
bījārthayuktimān aṅko yo 'ṅkeṣvaṅkaḥ prayujyate |
sa nāṭakeṣu garbhāṅko 'ṅkāvatāraśca kathyate || 391 ||
yathā bālarāmāyaṇe—(3.12)
śravaṇaiḥ śravyamanekairdṛśyaṃ dīrghaiśca locanairbahubhiḥ |
bhavadarthamiva nibaddhaṃ nāṭyaṃ sītāsvayaṃvaraṇam || 392 ||
antaryavanikāsaṃsthaiḥ sūtādibhiranekadhā |
arthopakṣepaṇaṃ yatra kriyate sā hi cūlikā || 393 ||
yathā veṇīsaṃhāre nepathye—(vesaṃ. 3.19)
ācāryasya tribhuvanagurornyastaśastrasya śokād droṇasyājau nayanasalilacchāditākṣānanasya |
maulau pāṇiṃ palitadhavale nyasya kṛtvā nṛśaṃsaṃ dhṛṣṭādyum‍naḥ svaśibiramayaṃ yāti sarve sahadhve || 394 ||
viśiṣṭaṃ mukhamaṅkasya striyā vā puruṣeṇa vā |
yadupakṣipyate pūrvaṃ tadaṅkamukhamucyate || 395 ||
yathā— mālatīmādhave— 'eṣāsmi saudāmanī bhagavataḥ śrīparvatādupetya' ityādi ||
nīcamadhyamapātrābhyāṃ madhyamābhyāṃ prayujyate |
tadaṅkamukhameveha viṣkambhaka iti smṛtam || 396 ||
yathā—
{kāmandakī— vatse! avalokite ! avalokitā— āṇavedu bhaavadī (ājñāpayatu bhagavatī |)}
kāmandakī— api nāma kalyāṇinoranayorbhūrivasudevarātāpatyayormālatīmādhava— yorabhimataḥ pāṇigrahaḥ syādityādi | (māmā. 1)
hīnābhyāmeva pātrābhyāmaṅkādau yaḥ prayujyate |
praveśakassa vijñeyaḥ śaurasenyādibhāṣayā || 397 ||
yathā— tataḥ praviśataśceṭyau |
ekā— sahi! saṃgīdasālāparisare avaloidādudiā bhaavadī maṃtaaṃtī āsī | (sakhi! saṃgītaśālāparisare avalokitādvitīyā bhagavatī mantrayantī āsīt |)
dvitīyā— sahi! teṇa kila māhavapiavayasseṇa maarandeṇa saalo maaraṃdaüjjāṇaüttaṃto bhaavadīe ṇivedido | (sakhi tena kila mādhavapriyavayasyena makarandena sakalo makarandodyānavṛttānto bhagavatyai niveditaḥ |) ityādi |
deśakālapātraceṣṭākathāntarānuṣañjanamityanena paripūrṇāṅge 'pi saṃvidhānake deśakālādyavirodhena tadvarṇanādikaṃ nirdiśati | tatra
deśāntarānuṣañjanaṃ yathā śiśupālavadhe— (māgha. 4.10)
mude murāreramaraiḥ sumerorānīya yasyopacitasya śṛṅgaiḥ |
bhavanti noddāmagirāṃ kavīnāmucchrāyasaundaryaguṇā mṛṣodyāḥ || 398 ||
kālāntarānuṣañjanaṃ yathā kirātārjunīye—(kirātā. 10.18)
sapadi harisakhairvadhūnideśād dhvanitamanoramavallakīmṛdaṅgaiḥ |
yugapadṛtugaṇasya sannidhānaṃ viyati vane ca yathāyathaṃ vitene || 399 ||
pātrāntarānuṣañjanaṃ yathā—(kirātā. 3.29)
kariṣyase yatra suduścarāṇi prasattaye gotrabhidastapāṃsi |
śiloccayaṃ cāruśiloccayaṃ tameṣa kṣaṇānneṣyati guhyakastvām || 400 ||
ceṣṭāntarānuṣañjanaṃ yathā— (kirātā. 16.2)
madasrutiśyāmitagaṇḍarekhāḥ krāmanti vikrāntanarādhirụ̄dhāḥ |
sahiṣṇavo neha yudhāmabhijñā nāgā nagocchrāyamivākṣipantaḥ || 401 ||
kathāntarānuṣañjanaṃ yathā kumārasambhave—(kusaṃ. 4.40)
kusumāyudhapat‍ni! durlabhastava bhartā na cirād‍ bhaviṣyati |
śṛṇu yena gataḥ sa karmaṇā śalabhatvaṃ haralocanārciṣi || 402 ||
dvisandhānamityanena vākyaprakaraṇaprabandhānāmanekārthānusandhānena kaveḥ śaktiviśeṣaṃ vyañjayati | tatra —
kiñcidekameva vākyaṃ prakaraṇaṃ prabandho vā dvayorarthayoḥ saṃgacchate |
kiṃcidabhinnārthamevocyamānamanekena śrotrā sambandhamanubhavati |
kiñcitpunarekamuddiśyābhidhīyamānamarthabhedādanyenāpi sambadhyate | tatra— ādyasyodāharaṇaṃ yathā mālatīmādhave —
'mahābhāga! suśliṣṭaguṇatayā ramaṇīya eṣa sanniveśaḥ | kutūlinī ca no bhartṛdārikā vartate tasyāmabhinavo vicitrakusumeṣuvyāpāraḥ | tadbhavatu kṛtārthatā vaidagdhyasya | phalatu nirmāṇasya ramaṇīyatā | samāsādayatu sarasa eva (ṣa) bhartṛdārikāyāḥ kaṇṭhāvalambanamahārghatāmiti |'
dvitīyasya yathā śiśupālavadhe— (māgha. 16.1)
damaghoṣasutena kaścana pratiśiṣṭaḥ pratibhānavānatha |
upagamya hariṃ sadasyadaḥ sphuṭabhinnārthamudāharad vacaḥ || 403 ||
tṛtīyasya yathā daṇḍino dhanañjayasya vā dvisandhānaprabandhau rāmāyaṇamahābhāratārthāvanubadh‍nāti |
caturthasya yathā kumārasambhave—(kusaṃ. 2.18)
svāgataṃ svānadhīkārān prabhāvairavalambya vaḥ |
yugapad yugabāhubhyaḥ prāp‍tebhyaḥ prājyavikramāḥ || 404 ||
ityādiprakaraṇaṃ catasṛṣvapi dikṣvavasthitairdivaukobhirbrahmaṇābhidhīyamānamabhisambadhyate |
pañcamasya yathā kīcakavadhe draupadī virāṭamabhibhāṣamāṇā tenaiva vākyena yudhiṣṭhirādīnabhibhāṣata iti |
mārgadvayānuvartanamityanena mahākavīnāṃ samayamupalakṣayati | tatra—
guṇataḥ prāgupanyasya nāyakaṃ tena vidviṣām |
nirākaraṇamityeṣa mārgaḥ prakṛtisundaraḥ || 405 || (kāvyāda. 1.21)
vaṃśavīryaśrutādīni varṇayitvā riporapi |
tajjayānnāyakotkarṣakathanaṃ ca dhinoti naḥ || 406 || (kāvyāda. 1.22)
kiṃ punarayaṃ nāyakena riporucchedaḥ kriyamāṇo doṣavato vā syād? guṇavato vā?
kiṃ cātaḥ?
yadi doṣavatastadā tata evocchedaḥ | na hi śīryamāṇanadītaṭopaviṣṭaprakṣepaṇe puruṣakāraḥ sāphalyamanubhavati | taduktaṃ 'kāṣṭhamiva ca ghuṇajagdhamavinītaputraṃ rājakulamaniyuktamātraṃ 'bhajyeta' |
nāpi guṇavataḥ, tasyānucchedyatvāt nāyakasya dviṣato vā na kaścidviśeṣa iti |
naivam; vidhiniṣedhavyutpattiphalatvāt prabandhānām | tathā hi— rāmāyaṇādiṣu guṇavato nāyakasya utkarṣapradarśane na doṣaḥ | ko hi guṇārjanaṃ prati yateta yadi guṇavato 'pyutchedaḥ syāt? api ca guṇavattve tulye ekasya jayo 'nyasya parājaya iti niyamanimittamabhidhānīyam; tannāntareṇa daivaṃ bhavitumarhati | daivasampāditāyāṃ ca siddhau puruṣakāraśūnyasya nāyakasya dviṣato vā na kaścidviśeṣa iti |
naivaṃ; vidhiniṣedhavyutpattiphalatvāt prabandhānām | tathā hi rāmāyaṇādiṣu guṇavato nāyakasya utkarṣapradarśanena doṣavataścocchedaprakāśena etad‍vyutpādyate rāmavad vartitavyaṃ na rāvaṇavat, yathā rāmasya piturājñāṃ paripālayato vanavāsino 'pi vijayaḥ saṃpannaḥ, rāvaṇasya ca paradārānabhilaṣataḥstrailokyavijayino 'pyucchedaḥ, tathānyasyāpi saṃpatsyata iti vidhiniṣedhavyutpattiḥ | tadanuvidhānena ca mahākāvyādiprabandhānāṃ viracaneti |
yatpunaridamuktaṃ doṣavataḥ samucchede svata eva viśīryamāṇatvāt ka iva nāyakasyotkarṣaḥ? ko vā guṇārjanaṃ prati yateta, yadi guṇavato 'pyucchedaḥ syāt?
tatra na puruṣārthaviṣayatvena doṣavattvam; nāpyucchedanimittatvena guṇavattvam; api tūcchedanimittatvena doṣavattvaṃ, nāyakotkarṣaprakāśakatvena ca pratipakṣasya ca guṇasamṛddhirvarṇyate | sthityatikramaśca tasyocchedanimittaṃ bhavati | tathā ca purāṇeṣu hiraṇyakaśipuprabhṛtīnāṃ devatārādhanaprāp‍tamahāvīryāṇāṃ trailokyakaṇṭakatvena samucchedo dṛśyate | vaṃśavīryaśrutādivarṇanajanitaśca tadutkarṣastajjayānnāyakasyaivotkarṣaheturbhavati ||
atha kimetāni nagarārṇavavarṇanādīni samuccayaprayojyāni, uta vikalpaprayojyāni? samuccayaprayojyānīti cet kirātārjunīyādau nagarārṇavārkodaya— kumāravivāhābhyudayādīnāṃ bhaṇanaṃ; atha vikalpena yatheṣṭakalpanāyām, alakṣaṇaprasaṅgaḥ |
tanna; aṅgakalpanasyobhayathāpīṣṭatvāt | yadā kathāśarīrasya paripūrṇāṅgasambhavaḥ tadā samuccayena, yadānyathā tadā vikalpeneti | tatrāpi keṣāṃcidevāṅgānāṃ vikalpaḥ, apareṣāṃ niyamena prayogaḥ | yāni puruṣārthasya kāmāderāsannopakārīṇi tāni niyamataḥ prayujyante | yathā— 'mantradūtaprayāṇājināyakābhyudayādayaḥ |' (bhāmahā. 1.20)
yathā ca śailartūdyānagamanajalakrīḍācandrodayamadhupānaratotsavādayaḥ | tāni ca yadi kathāśarīre na syuḥ, tadā kathāntarādyanuṣañjanenāpi kartavyānīti pracakṣate | tadetadubhayamapi tatra tatra niyamyamānaṃ śabdalakṣaṇamarthalakṣaṇaṃ ca veditavyam | tadyathā—
sargabandho mahākāvyamucyate tasya lakṣaṇam |
āśīrnamaskriyā vastunirdeśo vāpi tanmukham || (kāvyāda. 1.14–20)
itihāsakathodbha‍ūtamitarad vā sadāśrayam |
caturvargaphalopetaṃ caturodāttanāyakam || 408 ||
nagarārṇavaśailartucandrārkodayavarṇanaiḥ |
udyānasalilakrīḍāmadhupānaratotsavaiḥ || 409 ||
vipralambhairvivāhaiśca kumārodayavarṇanaiḥ |
mantradūtaprayāṇājināyakābhyudayairapi || 410 ||
alaṅkṛtamasaṃkṣip‍taṃ rasabhāvanirantaram |
sargairanativistīrṇaiḥ śravyavṛttaiḥ sumandhibhiḥ || 411 ||
sarvatra bhinnasargāntairupetaṃ lokarañjakam |
kāvyaṃ kalpāntarasthāyi jāyate sadalaṅkṛti || 412 ||
nyūnamapyatra yaiḥ kaiścidaṅgaiḥ kāvyaṃ na duṣyati |
yadyupātteṣu sampattirārādhayati tadvidaḥ || 413 || iti |
yathā ca— (nāśā. 19.139–141)
vṛttipratyaṅgasampannaṃ pañcārthaprakṛtikṣamam |
pañcāvasthābhiniṣpannaiḥ pañcabhissandhibhiryutam || 414 ||
sandhyantaraikaviṃśatyā catuṣṣaṣṭyaṅgasaṃyutam |
mahārasaṃ mahābhogamudāttavacanānvitam || 415 ||
mahāpuruṣasañcāraṃ sādhvācārajanapriyam |
suśliṣṭasandhisaṃyogaṃ suprayogaṃ sukhāśrayam || 416 ||
mṛduśabdābhidhānaṃ ca guṇālaṅkārasaṃyutam |
lakṣaṇaiśca catuṣṣaṣṭyā yuktaṃ kurvīta nāṭakam || 417 ||
nāṭake lakṣaṇaṃ yattu tat syāt prakaraṇe 'pi ca |
saṭṭake nāṭikāyāṃ ca kiñcidūnaṃ taducyate || 418 ||
mahākāvyeṣu ga ga ga ga ga ga ga tat |
kāvyaśāstrādiṣu tathā tathaivākhyāyikādiṣu || 419 ||
mahākāvyādayaḥ padyaṃ gadyamākhyāyikādayaḥ|
gadyapadyamayī campūḥ padyagadye tathā pṛthak || (kāvyāda.1.31)
pañcasandhi mahākāvyaṃ nāṭakaṃ nāṭikā tathā |
ākhyāyikā prakaraṇaṃ parvabandhādayaśca ye || 421 ||
ḍimassamavakāraśca catussandhī prakīrtitau |
vyāyogehāmṛgau prājñaiḥ saṃvidheyau trisandhikau || 422 ||
dvisandhi syāt prahasanaṃ vīthyaṅkau bhāṇa eva ca |
pravahlikādiṣu jñeyā yatheṣṭaṃ sandhikalpanā || 423 ||
na sandhikalpanā kośasaṅghātādiṣu vidyate |
kāvyavarjaṃ samasteṣu padārthābhinayeṣu ca || 424 ||
kaiśikīvṛttihīnāni ḍimādīnyaṣṭa lakṣayet |
kathādiṣu yathāyogaṃ vijñeyā vṛttikalpanā || 425 ||
saṃskṛtaṃ sargabandhādi prākṛtaṃ skandhakādi yat |
avaskandhānyapabhraṃśo nāṭakādi tu miśrakam || (kāvyāda. 1.37)
iti saṃkṣepataḥ proktaṃ mahākāvyādilakṣaṇam |
śeṣaṃ yad yatra nirdiṣṭaṃ tat tatraivopalakṣayet || 427 ||
tanmahākāvyamityāhurmahatāṃ ca mahac‍ca yat |
niruktamavagantavyamitthamevāpareṣvapi || 428 ||(bhāmahā. 1.19)
caturvargaphalatve 'pi bhūyasārthopadeśakṛt |
mahākāvyaṃ bhavet kāmapradhānāstu kathādayaḥ || 429 ||(bhāmahā. 1.21)
vākyaprabandhānugato 'yamukto mayā samāsena rasāviyogaḥ |
atheha ye 'rthā na vivecitāḥ pṛthag vibhajya te kecidudāhriyante || 430 ||
iti mahārājādhirājaśrībhojadevaviracite śṛṅgāraprakāśe rasāviyogaprakāśo nāma

atha
śṛṅgāraprakāśe dvādaśaḥ prakāśaḥ

tatra ca—(kāvyāda. 1.15)
itihāsakathod‍bhūtamitarad vā sadāśrayam |
caturvargaphalopetaṃ caturodāttanāyakam || 1 ||
pañcāvasthābhiniṣpannaiḥ pañcabhiḥ sandhibhiryutam |
vṛttivṛttyaṅgasaṃpannaṃ pañcārthaprakṛtikṣamam || 2 ||
mahārasaṃ mahābhogamudāttavacanānvitam |
mahāpuruṣasañcāraṃ sādhvācārajanapriyam || 3 ||
suś‍liṣṭasandhisaṃyogaṃ suprayogaṃ sukhāśrayam |
mṛduśabdābhidhānañca guṇālaṅkārabhūṣitam || 4 ||
sandhyantaraikaviṃśatyā catuṣṣaṣṭyaṅgasaṃyutam |
lakṣaṇaiś‍ca catuṣṣaṣṭyā yuktaṃ kurvīta nāṭakam || 5 ||
iti yaduktaṃ 1(nāśā. 19.27) tatra yathā kāvyādeḥ prabandhasya—
1. (1) śarīrāṇi pañca, (2) ārambhavidhayaḥ pañca, (3) arthaprakṛtayaḥ pañca, (4) avasthāḥ pañca, (5) saṃsthāḥ pañca, (6) samavasthāḥ pañca, (7) sandhayaḥ pañca, (8) vṛttayaḥ pañca, (9) caturviṃśatiḥ pravṛttayaḥ ityekā catuṣṣaṣṭiḥ |
2. (1) daśa lāsyāṅgani, (2) trayodaśa vīthyaṅgāni, (3) ṣoḍaśa vṛttyaṅgāni, (4)ekaviṃśatiḥ sandhyantarāṇi, (5)catvāri patākāsthānāni iti dvitīyā catuṣṣaṣṭiḥ,
3. sandhyaṅgāni catuṣṣaṣṭiḥ iti tṛtīyā,
4. kāvyalakṣaṇāni 1catuṣṣaṣṭiriti caturthī |
imāś‍catastro 'pi catuṣṣaṣṭayaḥ krameṇa kriyante | tatra—
1. atra draṣṭavyamasmatsaṃpādite nāṭyaśāstre 19.127, baḍa़audāsaṃskaraṇe 19.139 | ābhireva kārikā— bhirmahākāvyasargabandhādilakṣaṇamapi bharatoktaṃ phalati |
(1. prathamā catuṣṣaṣṭiḥ)
(1. prabandhaśarīrāṇi—5)
prathamacatuṣṣaṣṭau—
itihāsāśrayam, kathāśrayam, utpādyetivṛttam, anutpādyetivṛttam, pratisaṃskāryetivṛttamiti pañca prabandhaśarīrāṇi,
1.(1.1) itihāsāśrayamityanena vṛttadevādicaritasaṃśritā | śaṃsitāmāha, yathā kumārasambhava—hayagrīvavadhādayo mahādevādīnāmaitihāsikaṃ caritamāvedayanti |
2.(1.2) kathāśrayamityanena bṛhatkathādipratipannaprakhyātodāttanāyakacaritaviṣayatāmapi mahākāvyādeḥ prabandhasyābhidhatte, yathā bṛhatkathāyāṃ kathāmukha—pratipanna— vatseśvaracaritam udayanodaye |
3.(1.3) utpādyetivṛttamityanena kavimanīṣāprakalpitacaturvargāvabodhahetudivyāditvaṃ brūte, yathā candrāpīḍapuṇḍarīkādicaritavarṇanaṃ kādambaryām |
4.(1.4) anutpādyetivṛttamityanena yathāvagatavartamānātītamahārājādivṛttavarṇana— viṣayatāmasyācaṣṭe, yathā harṣavardhanarājyavardhanādīnāṃ ca varṇanaṃ harṣacarite |
5.(1.5) pratisaṃskāryetivṛttamityanenetihāseṣu yathāsthitavṛttopanibandhane nyāyapravṛtterapya— phalatvamaniṣṭāvāp‍tiphalatvaṃ ca dṛśyate, anyathā pravṛtterapi phalayogo '— vadhāryate, tatra tathā pratisaṃskāro vidheyaḥ, yathā nyāyapravṛttereva phalayogābhinirvṛtiḥ, viparītasya niṣphalatvāniṣṭāvāp‍tī bhavata iti vyutpādayati |
te ca dharmaśṛṅgārārthaśṛṅgārakāmaśṛṅgāramokṣaśṛṅgārādhikāriṇaḥ dhīrodāttadhīralalita— dhīroddhatadhīrapraśāntasāttvika—rājasa—tāmasottamamadhyamakaniṣṭhasādhāraṇānukūladakṣiṇa— śaṭhadhṛṣṭādibhedabhinnā nāyakānunāyakopanāyakapratināyakā agrataḥ prabandhena pratipādayiṣyanta iti neha pratanyate |
(2. ārambhavidhaya :—5)
pramāṇaṃ, prameyaṃ, vimarśaḥ, nirṇayaḥ, pravṛttiḥ ityetāḥ pañcārambhavidhayaḥ(dhāḥ) |
tāśca pratyekaṃ pañcaprakāratvāt pañcaviṃśatirbhavanti | tatra—
1. lakṣaṇāni bharataśāstre ṣaṭ‌‍‍triṃśadeva | teṣāmeva nāmaparamparādvayam, yayoraṣṭādaśa nūtanāni (18+18+18=54) ityevaṃ vardhiṣṇau saṃkhyāyāṃ gup‍tapādānāmānantyaṃ parāyaṇaṃ bhojasya punaś‍catuṣṣaṣṭitvam |
6.(2.1) yuktiruktirdṛṣṭaṃ nidarśanamarthāpattiriti pramāṇāni |
7.(2.2) dharmo 'rthaḥ kāmo loko lokayātreti prameyāṇi |
8.(2.3) karmaṇāmārambhopāyaḥ, puruṣadravyasaṃpad, deśakālavibhāgaḥ, vinipātapratīkāraḥ, kāryasiddhiśceti vimarśāḥ |
9.(2.4) anupalabdhasya jñānam, upalabdhasya niścayabalādhānam, advaidhasya saṃśayocchedana(artha)m, ekadeśadṛṣṭasya śeṣopalabdhiḥ, viparyayacikitsā ceti nirṇayāḥ |
10.(2.5) alabdhalābhārthā, labdhaparirakṣārthā, rakṣitābhivṛddha‍yarthā, vardhitopayogārthā, upayogaparyāp‍tyarthā ceti pravṛttayaḥ | pramāṇena prameyamupalabhya vimṛśyāvadhārya upekṣā(prekṣā)pūrvakāriṇo abhīṣṭakarmāṇi prārabhante |
tā imāḥ pañcaviṃśatirārambhavidhayaḥ kathyante |
(3. arthaprakṛtayaḥ — 5)
athaitāsu kathāśarīropādānakāraṇabhūtāḥ pañcārthaprakṛtayo bhavanti | catasṛṣu hi vidhāsu tattvaṃ parisamāpyate— 'kartā karma karaṇaṃ kriye'ti | tāśca prakṛtipañcakopalakṣaṇena pratipādyante | tadyathā—
bījaṃ binduḥ patākā ca prakarī kāryameva ca |
arthaprakṛtayaḥ pañca kathādehasya hetavaḥ || 6 || (nāśā. 19.20)
11.(3.1) (bījam)
kathāśarīravyāpini nāyake kartari karmaṇi vāvatiṣṭhamāna ārambho bījamityucyate, yathā rāmacaritaṃ śiśupālavadha iti | etena nāyikā api vyākhyātāḥ, yathā lakṣmīsvayaṃvaraḥ, subhadrāharaṇamiti | uktaṃ ca—(nāśā. 19.21)
alpamātramupakṣip‍taṃ bahudhā yad visarpati |
phalāvasānaṃ yac‍ca syāt tad bījamiti saṃjñitam || 7 ||
bījamiva ca bījam yathā bījamup‍tamaṅkuramūlaprakāṇḍapatraskandhaśākhā— prarohapallavapuṣpādinā prakāreṇa bahudhā visarpad ante phalāya kalpate, tathā yo mahāvākyārtho nāyakopanāyakānunāyakapratināyakasuhṛtsahāyādivyāpārabhedād bahudhā visarpannante phalāya jāyate sa bījamityucyate | kathāśarīravyāpiṣu
gurujñātipurohitāmātyabhṛtyadāsapīṭhamardaviṭavidūṣakaśakārasiddhatāpasādināyaka— pratināyakasahāyeṣu kartṛbhūteṣu paryastamāna ārambho bījamityucyate |
12.(3.2) (bindu)
sa hi viṣkambhapraveśakādibhirasambaddhaḥ sambaddho vā kathāśarīrā 'viccheda— hetutayāvatiṣṭhamāno bindurityākhyāyate | uktaṃ ca—
prayojanānāṃ vicchede yadavicchedakāraṇam |
yāvatsamāp‍ti yadvandhaḥ sa binduriti kīrtitaḥ || 8 || (nāśā. 19.22)
binduriva ca binduḥ | yathā payobinduś‍cyotam payo 'bhiṣyandalakṣaṇāyāḥ kriyāyā avicchedahetuḥ, yathā vā dhṛtabindurag‍nijvalanalakṣaṇāyāḥ, evaṃ vicchinnāvicchinneṣu kathāśarīreṣu yo 'nusandhātā sa bindurityucyate |
13.(3.3) (patākā)
kathāśarīravyāpini punaḥ sahāyaviśeṣe sādhakatamatvena karaṇabhūte vartamāna ārambhaḥ patāketyucyate | kathāśarīravyāpino hi nāyakasya prādhānyena yadupakārakaṃ ca phalena ca phalavat sā patākā | uktaṃ ca—
yasyā vṛttaṃ parārthaṃ syāt pradhānasyopakārakam |
tatsambandhāc‍ca phalavat sā patāketi kīrtitā || 9 || (nāśā. 19.23)
yathā hi patākā kasyacic‍cihnarūpeṇa prakarṣaśobhāyai bhavati, evaṃ teṣu yadupanāyakādeścaritaṃ tatpradhānasyātmanaśca śobhāprakarṣāya jāyamānaṃ patāketyucyate |
14.(3.4) (prakarī)
kathāśarīravyāpini punaḥ sahāyaviśeṣa eva sādhakatvāt karaṇābhāsabhūte vartamāna ārambhaḥ prakarītyucyate | patākaiva hyaphalavatyanubandhavihīnā ca prakarī | yathocyate—
phalaṃ prakalpate yasyāḥ parārthāyaidha kevalam |
anubandhavihīnāṃ tāṃ prakarīti vinirdiśet || 10 || (nāśā. 19.24)
prakarīva prakarī; laghurhi prakaraḥ prakarītyucyate | sa tu puṣpādīnāmeva syāt | yathā ca puṣpaprakaraḥ parārtho 'pavarakādeḥ śayanasthānasya anyasya vā śobhāyai bhavati evaṃ mahāprabandhasya ṛtuvarṇanādiḥ, anyo vā ko 'pi tadvidho vyāpāraḥ sā prakarīti kathyate |
15.(3.5) (kāryam)
kathāśarīravyāpinyāṃ nāyakasahāyādikriyāyāmupalabhyamānaṃ pradhānasambandhī prārambhaphalaviśeṣaḥ kāryamityucyate | dharmārthakāmānāmanyatamaṃ hi puruṣārtha— kāryamityāmananti | tadāha—
yadādhikārikaṃ vastu samyak prājñaiḥ prayujyate |
yadarthaśca samārambhastatkāryāmiti kīrtitam || 11 || (nāśā. 19.25)
athaiteṣāmudāharaṇāni1— (māvīca. 1.7)
prācetaso munivṛṣā pravaraḥ kavīnāṃ yatpāvanaṃ raghupateḥ praṇināya vṛttam |
bhaktasya tatra samaranta mamāpi vācaḥ tāḥ suprasannamanasaḥ kṛtino bhajantām || 12 || iti bījasya |
hā vatsāḥ kharadūṣaṇaprabhṛtayo vadhyāḥ stha pāpasya me hā hā vatsa ! vibhīṣaṇa ! tvamapi me kāryeṇa heyaḥ sthitaḥ |
hā mad vatsala ! vatsa ! rāvaṇa ! mahat paśyāmi te saṅkaṭaṃ vatse ! kaikasi ! hā hatāsi na ciraṃ trīn putrakān drakṣyasi || 13a ||

ārambhaprasavodbhedakiñciccheṣasamāp‍tayaḥ |

īṣatprāp‍tiryadā kācit phalasya parikalpyate |

(5. saṃsthāḥ —5)

21–25.(5.1–5.5)
prārambhaśca prayat‍naśca tathā vai prāp‍tisambhavaḥ |

atra pratyekaṃ propasargayogāt pauruṣaprakarṣo 'vabhāsate | puruṣavyāpāreṇa balātkāryasiddhiḥ saṃsthāpyate iti imāḥ saṃsthā ucyante | arthastu yaḥ pūrveṣāṃ sa eṣāmapīti |
(6. samavasthāḥ —5)
(ubhayaprādhānye samavasthāḥ | tāsāṃ tu) prārthanādayaḥ pañcaiva parvāṇi | 26–30.(6.1–6.5) prārthanā lābhasaṃyogau nāśassaṃprāp‍tireva ca ||
atra lābhanāśayordaivasya prādhānyaṃ, prārthanāsaṃyogayoḥ pauruṣasya, saṃprāp‍tau
daivapauruṣayoriti na sarvatra prakarṣavācī propasargayogo bhavati | tatra ārambhaprasavādayo avasthā uṣāharaṇādiṣu, prārambhaprayat‍nādayaḥ saṃsthāścaturdārikālābhādiṣu prabandheṣu upavīthayo (upādhayo) gṛhyante |
(7. sandhayaḥ—5)
athaitadupādheḥ kathāśarīrabhāgānāṃ mukhādayaḥ pañca vyapadeśā bhavanti—mukhaṃ, pratimukhaṃ, garbho, vimarśo, nirvahaṇamiti | te ca bījabindvādīnāmarthaprakṛtīnāṃ sandhānāt sandhaya ucyante |
tadāha— (nāśā. 19.35)
mukhaṃ pratimukhaṃ garbho vimarśaśca tathaiva hi |
tathā nirvahaṇaṃ ceti sandhayaḥ pañca nāṭake || 21 ||
31.(7.1) tatrādhikāriṇo nāyakādeḥ yatra nirūpaṇaṃ tatra rasasambhavāḥ |
yatra bījasamutpattirnānārtharasasambhavā |
kathāśarīrānugataṃ tanmukhaṃ parikīrtitam || 22 || (nāśā. 19.36)
32.(7.2) yatra phalārthāyāḥ pravṛtterupakramaskandhe tu yannirūpaṇaṃ tatpratimukham | yathocyate—
bījasyoddhāṭanaṃ yatra dṛṣṭanaṣṭamiva k‍vacit |
mukhe nyastasya dṛśyeta tadvai pratimukhaṃ smṛtam || 23 || (nāśā. 19.37) 33.(7.3) yatra kriyāphalasyodbhedalābhanāśānveṣaṇādayo jāyante sa garbhaḥ | yathocyate—
udbhedaḥ kāryabījasya prāp‍tiraprāp‍tireva vā |
punaścānveṣaṇaṃ yatra sa garbha iti saṃjñitaḥ || 24 || (nāśā. 19.38)
34.(7.4) kriyāphalāvāp‍taye vicāranirṇayo vimarśaḥ | yathocyate—
garbhanirbhinnabījārthaḥ krodhavyasanajo 'pi vā |
vipralambhakṛto vāpi vimarśa iti saṃjñitaḥ ||25|| (nāśā. 19.39) iti |
35.(7.5) kriyāphalena samyagyogo nirvahaṇam | yathocyate—
yatrānayanamarthānāṃ mukhādyānāṃ mahaujasām |
phalopabṛṃhitānāṃ syājjñeyaṃ nirvahaṇaṃ tu tat || 26 || (nāśā. 19.40)
ete ca mahāvākyeṣu rat‍nāvalyādiṣūpakṣepaparikarādyaṅgacatuṣṣaṣṭipravibhāgaprastāvādanyatra vistarādudāhariṣyanta iti neha pratanyate | tathā copakṣepādayaḥ prabandheṣvādhikārikāḥ ānuṣaṅgikāḥ prāsaṅgikā vā prayoktavyāḥ, yathā sandarbhasya śobhāyai bhavanti | tenānusandhyādīnāmapi samāveśo vyākhyātaḥ |
tatra kimādhikārikaṃ kimānuṣaṅgikaṃ kiṃ prāsaṅgikamiti cet—
yat kāryaṃ hi phalaprāp‍tau samarthaṃ parikalpyate |
tadādhikārikaṃ jñeyamanyat syādānuṣaṅgikam || 27 || (nāśā. 19.3)
kāraṇāt phalayogasya vṛttaṃ syādādhikārikam |
tasyodāharaṇārthaṃ tu prāsaṅgikamihocyate || 28 || (nāśā. 19.4)
evamete pañca sandhayaḥ paripūrṇaprabandhe bhavanti | taduktam—
ete tu sandhayaḥ kāryā nāṭakeṣu prayok‍tṛbhiḥ |
tathā prakaraṇeṣvevaṃ kathāsvākhyāyikāsu ca || 29 || (nāśā. 19.44)
mahākāvyeṣu campūṣu tathaivākhyānakeṣu ca |

ekalope caturthasya dvilope tricaturthayoḥ |

mukhādisandhiṣu ca vyāpriyamāṇānāṃ nāyikā'— nāyakopanāyakādīnāṃ manovākkāyakarmanibandhanāḥ pañca vṛttayo bhavanti— 'bhāratī, ārabhaṭī, kaiśikī, sāttvatī, vimiśrā' ceti | tāsu— (nāśā.20.23) 36.(8.1)
yā vākpradhānā nṛvaraprayojyā strīvarjitā saṃskṛtavākyayuktā |

yatrārabhaṭyādiguṇāssamastāḥ miśratvamāśritya mithaḥ prathante |

(9. pravṛttayaḥ —24)
veṣavinyāsakramaḥ pravṛttiḥ | sāpi caturdhā— 'paurastyā, māgadhī, dākṣiṇātyā, āvantyā' ca | tāsāṃ ca lakṣaṇānyagrato vakṣyāmaḥ | (dra. pṛ. 977)
anye punaranyathā pravṛttiṃ vyācakṣate— daśavidhā puṇyapravṛttiḥ, daśavidhā pāpapravṛttiriti | sā cāgrato vyākariṣyate |
kecittu tāmapyanyathā āhuḥ— pañca buddhīndriyāṇi, pañca karmondriyāṇi tad‍dvārikā ca dharmā ca vādasthāne ca pṛthakpṛthak daśaprakārā pravṛttiḥ bhavati |
athānyanmatam— 'pravṛttirvāgbuddhiśarīrārambhā' | tatra vāgārambhā dvādaśa ālāpapralāpādayaḥ, buddha‍yārambhā dvādaśa bhāvahāvādayaḥ, śarīrārambhā dvādaśa vilāsādayaḥ | ta ete ṣaṭ‌triṃśadapyagrata udāhariṣyante | (dra. pṛ. 969)
anyattu darśanam— veṣavinyāsakramaḥ pravṛttirityuktam | tatra ca paurastyaụdhramāgadhī— tyādinā deśopalakṣaṇena deśakālapātravayo 'vasthāśaktisādhanābhiprāyapratyaya(/vyatyāsa)— vipariṇāmanimittābhigamasaṅgrāmavihāropahāracchalacchadmāśramajātivṛttivyaktivibhava— prakīrṇasaṃkīrṇaviprakīrṇādayo veṣaviśeṣapravṛttihetavaḥ saṃgṛhyante | tatra—

(1. lāsyāṅgāni — 10)

āsaneṣūpaviṣṭairyadbhāṇḍavādyopabṛṃhitam |
gāyanairgīyate śuṣkaṃ tad geyapadamucyate || 60 || (nāśā. 19.114)

abhivāñchitaṃ prasidhyatu bhagavati ! yuṣmatprasādena || 61 ||
2.(1.2)
prākṛtaṃ yanniyukte/viyuktā tu paṭhedāsanasaṃsthitā |
madanānalatap‍tāṅgī sthitapāṭhyaṃ taducyate || 62 || (nāśā. 19.114)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ dvitīye 'ṅke—
'sāgarikā (niḥśvasya)—'hiaa, pasīda, kiṃ imiṇā āāsamettaphalaeṇa dullahajaṇappatthaṇāṇubaṃdheṇa | aṇṇac‍ca—jeṇa evva diṭhṭhametteṇa aaṃ īdiso saṃdāvo taṃ evva puṇo pekkhiduṃ ahilasasi tti aho de mūḍhadā | kiṃ ca— aï ṇisaṃsa ! jammapahudi saha vaḍ‌̣dhiaṃ maṃ parivaṃia kkhaṇamattadaṃsaṇaṃ jaṇaṃ aṇugacchaṃto kahaṃ ṇa lajjesi ? ahavā aṇaṃgasarasaṇibaṃdhaṇabhīdeṇa tue edaṃ vvavasidaṃ | bhaavaṃ kusumāuha ! ṇijjiasaalasurāsuro bhavia itthiājaṇaṃ paharaṃto ṇa lajjesi | savvahā ma imiṇā ṇimitteṇa uvaṭṭhidaṃ | tā jāva iha ṇa ko vi āacchadi dāva ālekkhagadaṃ vi taṃ jaṇaṃ pekkhia jahāsamīhidaṃ karaïssaṃ' (rat‍nā. 2)1 iti | 3.(1.3)
āsīnamāsyate yatra sarvātodyavivarjitam |
aprasāritamātraṃ ca cintāśokasamanvitam || 63 || (nāśā. 19.116)
1. hṛdaya, prasīda | kimamunāyāsamātraphalakena durlabhajanaprārthanānubandhena ? anyac‍ca—yenaiva dṛṣṭamātreṇa ayam īdṛśaḥ santāpaḥ tameva punaḥ prekṣituṃ abhilaṣasītyaho te mūḍhatā | kiṃ ca ayi nṛśaṃsa ! janmaprabhṛti saha vardhitaṃ māṃ parivarjya kṣaṇamātradarśanaṃ janamanugacchat kathaṃ na lajjse ? athavā anaṅgaśara— nibandhanabhītena tvayaitad vyavasitam | bhagavan kusumāyudha ! nirjitasakalasurāsuro bhūtvā strījanaṃ praharan na lajjase | sarvathā mama anena nimittena upasthitam | tadyāvadiha na ke 'pi āgacchati tāvadālekhyagataṃ taṃ janaṃ prekṣya yathāsamīhitaṃ kariṣyāmi |
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ tṛtīye 'ṅke rājā āsanastha eva praviṣṭaḥ paṭhati—(rat‍nā. 3.1)
saṃtāpo hṛdaya ! smarānalakṛtaḥ saṃpratyayaṃ sahyatāṃ nāstyevoparamo 'sya tāṃ prati punaḥ kiṃ tvaṃ mudhā khidyase |
yanmụ̄dhena mayā tadā kathamapi prāp‍to gṛhītvā ciraṃ vinyastastvayi sāndracandanarasasparśo na tasyāḥ karaḥ || 64 ||
na ca tathāhamevaṃvidhamātmānaṃ cintayāmi yathāntarnigūḍhakopasambhārāyā devyā gocaragatāṃ tāmeva tapasvinīṃ sāgarikām | tathā hi—(rat‍nā. 3.4)
hriyā sarvasyādho nayati viditāsmīti vadanaṃ dvayordṛṣṭvā ' 'lāpaṃ kalayati kathāmātmaviṣayām |
sakhīṣu smerāsu prakaṭayati vailakṣyamiti me priyā prāyeṇāste hṛdayanihitātaṅkavidhurā || 65 || iti | 4.(1.4)
vṛttāni vividhāni syurgeyaṃ cātodyasaṃśritam |
ceṣṭā ca vividhā puṃsā yatra sā puṣpagaṇḍikā || 66 ||(nāśā. 19.117)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ dvitīye 'ṅke vidūṣakeṇa nalinīpatraśayane darśite rājā— vayasya, nipuṇamupalakṣitam |
parimlānaṃ pīnastanajaghanasaṅgādubhayata— stanormadhyasyāntaḥ parimilanamaprāpya haritam |
idaṃ vyastanyāsaṃ ślathabhujalatākṣepavalanaiḥ kṛśāṅgyāḥ santāpaṃ vadati nalinīpatraśayanam || 67 || (rat‍nā. 2.11)
api ca—
sthitamurasi viśālaṃ padminīpatrametat kathayati na tathāntarmanmathotthāmavasthām |
atiśayaparitāpaglāpitāṅgyā yathāsyāḥ stanayugapariṇāhaṃ maṇḍalābhyāṃ bravīti || 68 || (rat‍nā. 2.12) 5.(1.5)
pracchedakassa vijñeyo yatra candrātapāhatāḥ |
striyaḥ priyeṣu sajjante api vipriyakāriṣu || 69 || (nāśā. 19.118)
yathā rāsakāṅke — 'sādhu re caṃdāyaṇa paḍu aṇasu eva x x x ṇac‍cāṇa akkhaṃka (ta) hiaaṃ x x x tanodīrayāva c‍cia īdise cuddhacandāloe vado
u(sa)mae(samae) ṇiddiṭṭhasaṃkeaṃ piavaassaṃ kadaṇu a x x x capalādiyaṃ vesaanteṇa ṇivvūḍhaṃ te jahā samatthidaṃ ti | (sādhu re candrāyaṇa x x x ākrāntahṛdayaṃ x x x iva īdṛśe śuddhacandrāloke pradoṣasamaye nirdiṣṭasaṅketaṃ priyavayasyaṃ x x x nirvyūḍhaṃ te yathā samarthitam) iti vidūṣakādeva prakṛtibhedamavagamya tathākṛtāparādhamapi candrātapāhatā priyamabhisasāra rādhā, 'yatra vā pālitakā gatā' iti | 6.(1.6)
aniṣṭhuraślakṣṇapadaṃ samavṛttairalaṅkṛtam |
nāṭyaṃ puruṣabhāvạ̄dhyaṃ trimūḍhakamudāhṛtam || 70 || (nāśā. 19.119)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ dvitīye 'ṅke rājā sāgarikāmevāvalokyāha—(rat‍nā. 2.14)
dṛśaḥ pṛthutarīkṛtā jitanijābjapatratviṣaḥ caturbhirapi sādhu sādhviti mukhaiḥ samaṃ vyāhṛtam |
śirāṃsi calitāni vismayavaśād dhruvaṃ vedhaso vidhāya lalanāṃ jagattrayalalāmabhūtāmimām || 71 ||
dṛṣṭiṃ ruṣā kṣipasi yadyapi bhāminīmāṃ s‍nigdheyeṣyati tathāpi na rūkṣabhāvam |
tyaktvā tvarāṃ vraja padaiḥ skhalitairayaṃ te khedaṃ gamiṣyati gururniyataṃ nitambaḥ || 72 || (rat‍nā. 2.15)
śrīreṣā pāṇirapyasyāḥ pārijātasya pallavaḥ |
kuto 'nyathā sravatyeṣa svedacchadmāmṛtadravaḥ || 73 || (rat‍nā. 2.16) 7.(1.7)
rūpādivādyasaṃyuktaṃ pāṭhyena ca vivarjitam |
nāṭyaṃ hi tattu vijñeyaṃ saindhavaṃ nāṭyakovidaiḥ || 74 ||(nāśā. ba.sa. 19.123)
rat‍nāvalyāṃ dvitīye 'ṅke vidūṣakaḥ—'bho avassa jidaṃ amhehiṃ' (bho vayasya, jitaṃ asmābhiḥ|) ityuktvā bāhū prasārya nṛtyati | kakṣāyāḥ citraphalakaṃ patati, vidūṣakaḥ viṣādaṃ nāṭayati | rājā apavārya vidūṣakam aṅgulyā tarjayatīti | ||75|| (rat‍nā. 2.17/18) 8.(1.8)
mukhapratimukhopetaṃ caturaśrapadakramam |
spaṣṭabhāvarasopetaṃ citrārthaṃ ced dvimūḍhakam || 76 || (nāśā. 19.121)
rat‍nāvalyāṃ dvitīye 'ṅke rājā citragatāṃ sāgarikāṃ dṛṣṭvā āha—

mānasamupaiti keyaṃ citragatā rājahaṃsīva || 77 || (rat‍nā. 2.7)
ityādyabhihitaṃ yāvat susaṅgatā āgacchati, etanmukhopakṣip‍tabījod‍bhedānmukhamiva mukham | tathā susaṅgatāyāmāgatāyāṃ rājani sāśaṅke vicchinnamiva tad bījamiti dṛśyate |
'bījasyod‍ghāṭanaṃ yatra dṛṣṭanaṣṭamiva k‍vacit || 78 ||' (nāśā. 19.37) iti |
ata evābhihitaṃ rājñā 'susaṅgate krīḍāmātrakamevaitad' (rat‍nā. 2.13) ityādi | ata eva dve mukhapratimukhe mụ̄dhe ghaṭite yatra tad dvimūḍhakamiti | 9.(1.9)
uttamottamakaṃ vidyādanekarasasaṃśrayam |
vicitraślokabandhaiśca helāhāvavibhūṣitam || 79 || (nāśā. 19.122)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ tṛtīye 'ṅke,
rājā sāgarikābuddhyā vāsavadattāmāha— 'priye sāgarike'/?/ !
śītāṃśurmukhamutpale tava dṛśau padmānukārau karau rambhāgarbhanibhaṃ tavoruyugalaṃ bāhū mṛṇālopamau |
ityāhlādakarākhilāṅgi ! rabhasānniśśaṅkamāliṅgya mā— maṅgāni tvamanaṅgatāpavidhurāṇyehyehi nirvāpaya || 80 ||
(rat‍nā. 3.11) ityādi | 10(1.10)
kopa-prasāda-janitamadhikṣepasamāśrayam |
uktapratyuktamevaṃ syāllāsyāṅgaṃ daśamaṃ tviha || 81 || (nāśā. 19.123)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ tṛtīye 'ṅke rājñā pratyabhijñātāyāṃ vāsavadattāyāṃ 'priye vāsavadatte' ityādyabhihite vāsavadattā sakopamāha,
'ajjaütta, mā evvaṃ bhaṇa | adikkaṃdāiṃ dāṇiṃ edāiṃ akkharāiṃ' | (āryaputra, mā evaṃ bhaṇa | atikrāntānīdānīmetānyakṣarāṇi |) evamukte tadā vijñāpanānantaraṃ pādayoḥ patantaṃ rājānaṃ dṛṣṭvā vāsavadattā punaranubhāvānnāyakaprasādamurarīkṛtya praviṣṭāha— 'kaṃcaṇamāle, taṃ tahā calaṇaṇipaḍidaṃ ajjaüttaṃ avadhīria āacchaṃtīe mae adiniṭhṭhuraṃ evva kidaṃ | dāṇiṃ saaṃ tā gadua alakkhidā evva kaṃṭhe geṇhia pasādaïssaṃ |' (rat‍nā. 3.17)
(kāñcanamāle, taṃ tathā caraṇanipatitamāryaputramavadhīryāgacchantyā mayātiniṣṭhuram eva kṛtam | idānīṃ svayaṃ taṃ gatvā alakṣitaiva kaṇṭhe gṛhītvā prasādayiṣye |) ityādi |
(2. vīthyaṅgani—13)
atha vīthyaṅgāni — ud‍ghātyakam, avaluṇṭhitam(avalagitam), anvasyanditam, asatpralāpaḥ, nālikā, vākkeliḥ, adhibalaṃ, chalaṃ, vyāhāraḥ, trigataṃ, gaṇḍaḥ, mṛdavaṃ, prapañca iti | 11.(2.1)
padāni tvagatārthāni tadarthagataye narāḥ |
paryāyairavabodhyante tadud‍ghātyakamucyate || 82 || (nāśā. 18.108)
yathā mālatikāyāṃ vīthyām—mālatikā—
ko visamo saṃsāre ko vā dukkhena pīrae tariuṃ || 83 ||
(ko viṣamaḥ saṃsāre ko vā duḥkhena pāryate tarttum |) rājā—
kusumaśarastaralākṣīviyogaduḥkhāmbudhiścaiva || 84 ||
yathā vā veṇīsaṃhāre—
satpakṣā madhuragiraḥ prasādhitāśā madoddhatārambhāḥ |
nipatanti dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ kālavaśānmedinīpṛṣṭhe || 85 || (vesaṃ. 1.5)
iti sūtradhāreṇa paṭhite praviśya saṃbhrāntaḥ
pāripārśvakaḥ— 'bhāva, śāntaṃ pāpaṃ, pratihatamamaṅgalam |'
sūtradhāraḥ— nanu śaratsamayavarṇanāśaṃsayā haṃsān dhārtarāṣṭrāniti vyapadiśāmi |
pāripārśvakaḥ— bhāva, na khalu na jāne | kintvamaṅgalatvādasya vo vacasaḥ kampitamiva me hṛdayam iti | 12.(2.2)
yatrānyasmin samāveśya kāryamanyat prasādhyate |
tac‍cāvalagitaṃ nāma vijñeyaṃ nāṭyayoktṛbhiḥ || 86 || (nāśā. 18.109)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ dvitīye 'ṅke
susaṅgatā—sahi, jassa kide tumaṃ āadā so aaṃ ciṭṭhadi | (sakhi, yasya kṛte tvamāgatā so 'yaṃ tiṣṭhati |)
sāgarikā— (sāsūyaṃ) sahi, kassa kide ahaṃ āadā ? (sakhi, kasya kṛte 'hamāgatā ?) susaṅgatā—(vihasya), citraphalakasya kṛte āgatāhamiti pratipādayantyā chāyāntareṇa rājārtho 'pi pratipādita ityavalagitam |
13.(2.3)
ākāṅ‍‌kṣite tu kismiṃścicchubhāśubhasamutthite |
kauśalāducyate 'nyo 'rthastadavasyanditaṃ bhaveta || 87 || (nāśā. 18.110)
yathā veṇīsaṃhāre prathame 'ṅke sūtradhāraḥ— (vesaṃ. 1.6)
nirvāṇavairadahanāḥ praśamādarīṇāṃ nandantu pāṇḍutanayāḥ saha mādhavena |
raktaprasādhitabhuvaḥ kṣatavigrahāśca svasthā bhavantu kururājasutāḥ sabhṛtyāḥ ||
iti sūtradhāravacanamamṛṣyamāṇaḥ krudhyan
bhīmasenaḥ prāha — āḥ durātman vṛthāmaṅgalapāṭhaka śailūṣāpasada !
lākṣāgṛhānalaviṣānnasabhāpraveśaiḥ prāṇeṣu vittanicayeṣu ca naḥ prahṛtya |
ākṛṣṭapāṇḍavavadhūparidhānakeśāḥ svasthā bhavantu mayi jīvati dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ ? || 89 || (vesaṃ. 1.7)
iti bhīmasenenokte
sahadeva āha— 'ārya ! anumatamevāsya no bharataputravacanam | tathāhi— 'nirvāṇa vairadahanā ityanyathāsya vyākhyānam' ityuktvā, 'raktaprasādhitabhuvaḥ kṣatavigrahāḥ svargasthā bhavantu' iti anyathā vyācaṣṭe | 14.(2.4) mūrkhajanasannikarṣe hitamapi yatra prabhāṣate vidvān | na ca gṛhyate 'sya vacanaṃ vijñeyo 'satpralāpo 'sau || 90 ||(nāśā. 18.111) yathā— rāmābhyudaye dvitīye 'ṅke
rāvaṇaḥ — 'prāyaḥ śrutameva bhavadbhiḥ | yathā kalatramātrasādhano 'sau tāpasaḥ, tadapahāra eva tāvan nirūpyatām | na ca kalatrāpaharaṇādṛte puruṣasyāparaṃ paribhavasthānamasti | tatra ca mārīcena sāhāyyakaṃ kriyamāṇamicchāmi |
mārīcaḥ— svāmin, jīvato rāmasya paribhava ityaśakyametat | na khalu tāpasa iti mā tamavajñātumarhati devaḥ | anyadeva kimapi vastvantaraṃ tat |
rāvaṇaḥ— (sakrodham) āḥ, kinnāma vastvantaraṃ tat ? mūḍha !
yuktyaiva kṣatrabandhoḥ paribhavamamasamaṃ jīvataḥ kartumicchan māyāsāhāyyake tvaṃ nipuṇatara iti prārthaye, nāsamarthaḥ |
yac‍cānyat tatra vajraprahatimasṛṇitasphārakeyūrabhājaḥ sajjāstrailokyalakṣmīhaṭhaharaṇasahā bāhavo rāvaṇasya || 91 ||
15.(2.5)
yatrātmanaḥ parasya ca vacanaṃ syāduttarottaraprabhavam |
anyonyārthaviśeṣakamadhibalamiti tad budhairjñeyam || 92 ||(nāśā. 18.109)
yathā — kṛtyārāvaṇe—'hā bhrātarlakṣmaṇa paritrāyasva māṃ paritrāyasvaṃ' iti śrutvā sītāveṣadhāriṇī śūrpaṇakhā mohamupāgatā, tasyāṃ ca mụ̄dhāyāṃ
lakṣmaṇaḥ — ārye, samāśvasihi, samāśvasihi |
śūrpaṇakhā — {akṣiṇī ni(un‍ ‍)mīlya, sakrodhaṃ sakaruṇaṃ ca} ā aṇayya! ajjavi tumaṃ ciṭhṭhasi yyeva | aho dāṇiṃ se tumaṃ nisaṃso nissineho | ciṭhṭhadu dāva bhāduasineho, kahaṃ ikkhāukulasaṃbhaveṇa mahākhattieṇa bhavia evvaṃ tue vavasidaṃ ? ṇaṃ bhaṇāmi evaṃ akkadaṃto sattū vi ṇa uvekkhīadi, kiṃ puṇa ayyaütto ?
{ā anārya ! adyāpi tvaṃ tiṣṭhasyeva | aho idānīmasi tvaṃ nṛśaṃso niḥs‍nehaḥ ! tiṣṭhatu tāvat bhrātṛs‍nehaḥ, katham ikṣvākukulasambhavena mahākṣattriyeṇa bhūtvā evaṃ (tvayā) vyavasitam ? nanu bhaṇāmi evamākrandan śatrurapi nopekṣyate, kiṃ punarāryaputraḥ ?}
lakṣmaṇaḥ — ārye nanu tvadartha eva āryeṇa sthāpito 'smi ?
śūrpaṇakhā — evaṃ mama attho kado hodi ? evaṃ ca parirakkhidā homi ? tti | (evaṃ mamārthaḥ kṛto bhavati | evaṃ cāhaṃ parirakṣitā bhavāmi iti) || 93 || 16.(2.6)
anyārthameva vākyaṃ chalamabhisandhānahāsyaroṣakaram || 94 || (nāśā.18.115)
yathā— rat‍nāvalyāṃ citraphalake rājānaṃ sāgarikāṃ cāvalokya 'kassa edaṃ viṇṇāṇaṃ ?' (kasyedaṃ vijñānam ?) iti vāsavadattāpraś‍ne,
rājā — devi ! alamanyathā sambhāvitena | iyaṃ hi mayā svacetasaiva vikalpyālikhitā, na tu dṛṣṭapūrvā |
vidūṣakaḥ sac‍ca savāmi bamhasutteṇa jaï amhehiṃ īdisī diṭhṭhapuvvā | (satyaṃ śape brahmasūtreṇa yadi asmābhirīdṛśī dṛṣṭapūrvā) iti || 17.(2.7)
pratyakṣavṛttirukto vyāhāro hāsyaleśārthaḥ || 95 || (nāśā. 18.116)

adhyāsituṃ tava ciraṃ jaghanasthalasya paryāp‍tameva karabhoru! mamoruyugmam || 101 ||

22.(2.12)
yad‍guṇadoṣīkaraṇaṃ doṣaguṇīkaraṇameva vā vāde |

iti kāmandakīvacanādanantaraṃ—
lavaṅgikā—bhaavadi! kisaṇa—caüddasīraaṇīmasāṇasaṃcāraṇipaḍida ṇivvattia visamavavasāaṇiṭṭhāvidacaṃḍapāsaṃḍavaaṃḍadoddaṃḍasāhaso sāhasio kkhu eso | ado piasahī ukkaṃpidā |
(bhagavati! kṛṣṇacaturdaśīrajanīśmaśānasañcāranipatita viṣamavyavasāya— niṣṭhāpitacaṇḍapāṣaṇḍapracaṇḍadordaṇḍasāhasaḥ sāhasikaḥ khalveṣaḥ | ataḥ priyasakhī utkampitā |)

yadasad‍bhūtaṃ vacanaṃ saṃstavayuktaṃ dvayoḥ parasparaṃ yattu |
ekasya vā 'rthahetoḥ sa hāsyajananaḥ prapañcastu || 113 ||(nāśā. 18.112)
yathā prayogadvaye (prayogābhyudaye)—
taraṅgadattakaceṭī— ammo! ayaṃ kkhu eso saṃcārimaṃ avahāsapaṭṭaṇaṃ aybhaṃḍīravo ido yyeva āgacchadi | (aho! ayaṃ khalveṣa sañcariṣṇūpahāsapattanamāryabhaṇḍīrava ita evāgacchati |)
vidūṣakaḥ— (upasūtya) bhodī! sāgadaṃ de | (bhavati! svāgataṃ te |)
ceṭī—(svagatam) parihāsaïssaṃ dāva ṇaṃ | (parihāsayiṣyāmi tāvadenam |) (prakāśam) ko dāṇi eso amhāṇaṃ pesaṇaārao ceḍaü tti? | (ka idānīmeṣo 'smākaṃ preṣaṇakāraśceṭaka iti?)
vidūṣakaḥ—ahaṃ ghaṭadāsīṇaṃ sāmiṇo | (ahaṃ ghaṭadāsīnāṃ svāmī |)
ceṭī — kiṃ ceḍaü tti bhaṇide kuvido tumaṃ? (kiṃ ceṭaka iti bhaṇite kupitastvam?)
vidūṣakaḥ —ko dāṇi viseso ghaṭadāsīṇaṃ kuṃbhadāsīṇaṃ ca? (ka idānīṃ viśeṣo ghaṭadāsīnāṃ kumbhadāsīnāṃ ca?)
ceṭī— mā kuppa, bhaṭṭaütto tti bhaṇissaṃ | (mā kupya, bhaṭṭaputra iti bhaṇiṣyāmi |)
vidūṣakaḥ — bhodī! tuvaṃ pi mā kuppa, ajjā itti bhaṇissaṃ | (bhavati, tvamapi mā kupya, āryā iti bhaṇipyāmi |)
ceṭī—aho! bhaṭṭaputtassa gadī! (aho! bhaṭṭaputrasya gatiḥ!)
vidūṣakaḥ—aho !adirūā ajjayā || (aho ! atirūpā āryā ||)
ekasya vā 'rthahetoḥ—yathā mṛcchakaṭikāyām—
nāyakaḥ—(maitreyaṃ dṛṣṭvā) diṣṭyā bhavān dṛśyate?
vidūṣakaḥ— saṭṭu x x x x x kaṃ corakaṃ to rā doṇī samiduṇṇa tāri sādo gaṇiā—kaṃ tā rā do | kkhu uccadi—akaṃdasamutthitā paümiṇī, avañcao vāṇio, acoro suvaṇṇaāro, akalaho gāmasamāgamo, aluddhā gaṇiā tti dukkaraṃ ede saṃbhāvīanti | tā piavaassaṃ gadua imādo gaṇiāpasaṅgādo ṇivattāvemi | (parikramaya dṛṣṭ‍vā) kathaṃ piavaasso rukkhavāḍiāe uvaviṭṭo ciṭṭhadi | tā jāva uvasappāmi | (upasṛtya) sotthi bhavade | vaḍ‌ṭhaḍhadu bhavaṃ |

cārudattaḥ — kiṃ tayā na gṛhītā sā rat‍nāvalī?

1. atra rāghavapāṭhaḥ vidūṣakaḥ— kudo etti uttī ā bhi paḍigiṇhisi | edaṃ evva pasādhia virala viṇṇi aṃgulī kariia aṃjaliuḍaṃ tahu kkhidāe vilapajjaravihīe maṃ sa pesī vitiṇo tāvatī esā muktāvalī akkhitto | 2. 'pratyaṅgāni' jośeraḥ
24.(3.1) ud‌ghātyako yathā—
ko jayati? jayati śarvaḥ; kena jitaṃ? jitamanaṅgadahanena |
tripurāriṇā bhagavatā bālaśaśāṅkāṅkitajaṭena || 115 ||
kathod‍ghāto yathā—
sākaṃ paṅkajajanmanā surapaterabhyarthanāyā vaśā— dikṣvākoḥ śaradindubimbavimale vaṃśe 'vatīrya svayam |
niśśoṣābhayadastrayīpathajuṣāṃ vidveṣiṇāṃ rakṣasāṃ yaḥ paulastyamahan sa pātu bhavato rāmābhidhāno hariḥ || 116 ||
25.(3.2) prayogātiśayo yathā—
yūthāyitamavatu hareḥ kṣmāmuddharato varāhavapuṣo vaḥ |
śeṣaphaṇarat‍nadarṇaṇasahastrasaṅkrāntabimbasya || 117 ||
26.(3.3) pravṛttako yathā—(chalitarāmake.)
āsāditaprakaṭanirmalacandrahāsaḥ prāp‍taḥ śaratsamaya eṣa viśuddhakāntaḥ |
utkhāya gāḍhatamasaṃ ghanakālamugraṃ rāmo daśāsyamiva sambhṛtabandhujīvaḥ || 118 ||
27.(3.4) avalagitaṃ yathā—

nipatanti dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ kālavaśānmedinīpṛṣṭhe || 119 ||
(ārabhaṭyaṅgāni—4)
saṃkṣip‍tikā, avapātaḥ, vastūtthāpanaṃ, saṃsphoṭa iti catvāryārabhaṭyaṅgani | teṣu 28.(3.5) māyendrajālaśilpanaipathyādibhiḥ vastusaṃkṣepaḥ saṃkṣip‍tikā |

rakṣasā mṛgarūpeṇa vañcayitvā sa rāghavau |

kṛṣṭā yena vilolakeśanivahā pāñcālarājātmajā yenāsyāḥ paridhānamapyapahṛtaṃ rājñāṃ kurūṇāṃ puraḥ |

(kaiśikyaṅgāni—4)
narma, narmasphijaḥ, narmasphoṭaḥ, narmagarbha iti catvāri kaiśikyaṅgāni | teṣu —
32.(3.9) āsthāpitaśrṛṅgāraṃ vaco viceṣṭitaṃ vā saparihāsaṃ narma | yathā—(māmā. 6.9)
vayaṃ tathā nāma yadāttha kiṃ vadā— myayaṃ tvakasmād vikalaḥ kathāntare |
kadambagolākṛtimantritaṃ/māśritaḥ kathaṃ viśuddhamugdhaḥ kulakanyakājanaḥ || 124 ||

prāp‍tā 'sau vṛṣaparvaṇaḥ priyasutā saṅketaṣaṇḍaṃ sakhe! vṛṣṭiḥ seyamanambudāmṛtamayī gātrāṇi me siñcati |

apaśyadbhiriveśānaṃ raṇānnivavṛte gaṇaiḥ |

41.(4.2) bhedo yathā mudrārākṣase—

42.(4.3) daṇḍo yathā tatraiva rākṣasasaṅgrahārthaṃ vadhabandhādikaṃ tanmitre śreṣṭhini candanadāse prayuktam |

śakāro gaṇikāṃ vyāpādayituṃ viṭāya dānamupanyastavān | (śakāraḥ) bhāva !
jadicchase laṃbadasākalāpaṃ pāvāiaṃ suttasatena juttaṃ |
maṃsaṃ ca khāduṃ taha tuṭṭhi kāhiṃ cuhū cuhū cukku cuhū cuhūtti || 133 ||
{yadīcchasi lambadaśākalāpaṃ prāvārakaṃ sūtraśatena yuktam |
māṃsaṃ ca khādituṃ tathā tuṣṭiṃ kartuṃ (cuhū cuhū cukku cuhū cuhū)iti ||}
viṭaḥ— tataḥ kim?
śakāraḥ— mama piaṃ kahehi | (mama priyaṃ kuru |)
viṭaḥ— bāḍhaṃ karomi, varjayitvā tvakāryam |
śakāraḥ— akajjassa gaṃdho vi ṇa tthi | (akāryasya gandho 'pi nāsti |)
viṭaḥ— ucyatāṃ tarhi |
śakāraḥ— mālehi vasaṃtaśeṇiaṃ ti | (māraya vasantasenām iti |) tathā mama svāminānenāryeṇa (anāryeṇa) vasantasenā vyāpāditā; na cārudattena iti bruvate sa ceṭāya kaṭakaṃ prayacchannāha ca—putaka (edaṃ geh‍iṇaa aṇṇa) dhā bhaṇa | (putraka ! etad gṛhītvā 'nyathā bhaṇa |) || 134 ||
44.(4.5) vadho yathā— rāmāyaṇīyeṣu nāṭakeṣu tāṭakāvirādhavālijaṭāyuḥprabhṛtīnāṃ, bhāratīyeṣu bakahiḍimbakīcakābhimanyuprabhṛtīnāmiti |
45.(4.6) pratyutpannamatitvaṃ yathā tāpasavatsarāje vasantakena rājā bhautikanaiṣṭhika— vṛttayorviśeṣaṃ pṛṣṭaḥ kathayitvā ' 'ha — kiṃ ca bhavān naiṣṭhikaṃ prapannaḥ?
vidūṣakaḥ — bho ṇāhaṃ bhodiaṃ jāṇāmi | ṇa hi (ṇa)ṭṭhiaṃ | jadā tumaṃ eda vva padaṃ pariccaasi tadā x x x x jā esā dāsīe libhā assa thavia x x x x edāvia akha x x x x vimedhā doṇeddaradi | edaṃ parivyāaabhaṃḍiaṃ sadasakkāraṃ ṇaïa tā ajjeva devīe vāsavadattāe sahatthovaṇīdamodae aṇhaṃto paḍhamakālādo vi avbhuaṃ vilasissaṃ | (bho nāhaṃ bhautikaṃ jānāmi, na hi naiṣṭhikam | yadā tvam etadeva padaṃ parityajasi tadā x x x x yā eṣā dāsyāḥ x x x x tarati | evaṃ parivrājakabhaṇḍilaṃ śatasatkāraṃ nītvā tad adyaiva devyā vāsavadattayā svahastopanītamodakānyaśrnan prathamakālādapi adbhutaṃ vilasiṣyāmi |)
rājā— sasamabhramautsukyaṃ kathamiva? tataḥ x x x x
vidūṣakaḥ— {prakāśitadāhāyā vāsavadattāyā rabhasāt jīvanocchedaṃ (?) kṛtvā, hastamavadhūya, ātmagatam} kiṃ dāṇiṃ ettha karissaṃ? (kimidānīmatra kariṣyāmi?) (pratyutpannamatitvāt cintayan āha) ahavā evvaṃ dāva | (athavā evaṃ tāvat) | (prakāśam) bho vaassa ! kiṃ ṇa suramadi bhavaṃ jaṃ bhaṇidaṃ teṇa bhaavadā sihādeseṇa devīsarisākidīe kaṇṇaāe pāṇiggahaṇaṃ ṇiccatia devīsamāgamo de bhavissidi tti | (bho vayasya ! kiṃ na smarati bhavān—yad bhaṇitaṃ tena bhagavatā siddhādeśena devīsadṛśākṛtyāḥ kanyakāyāḥ pāṇigrahaṇaṃ nirvartya devīsamāgamaste bhaviṣyatīti |) || 135 ||
46.(4.7) gotraskhalitaṃ yathā— vikramorvaśyām— apsarasā anyasyai kathitam ūrvaśyā śakrasadasi prekṣaṇīye 'puruṣottama' iti vaktavye tadgatamanasā 'purūravāḥ' ityabhihitam iti praveśake sūcitam |
47.(4.8)sāhasaṃ yathā— (devī)candragup‍te— strīveṣanihnutaścandragup‍taḥ śatroḥ skandhāvāram alipuraṃ gatavati (śakapati)vadhāyāgamad iti prayoge darśitam, śakapatimaghātayad iti ca vṛttaṃ sūcitam |
48.(4.9) bhayaṃ yathā— veṇīsaṃhāre nepathye sūcitam—'bho bho bhayaskhalitakārmuka— kṛpāṇatomaraśakti(ktayaḥ) kauravabalapakṣapātatṛṇīkṛtaprāṇadraviṇasañcayā narapatayaḥ | saṃstabhyatām | nirhataduśśāsanapītaśeṣaśoṇitasnapita— bībhatsavṛkodaradarśanapariskhalatpraharaṇāni raṇād vidravanti balāni |' punaśca mūrcchitaduryodhanamapavāhayatā sūtenoktam— kathāmāsanna evāyaṃ durātmā kauravadrumotpātamāruto mārutiḥ! anupalabdhasaṃjñaśca tāvadatra mahārājaḥ! bhavatu, sudūramapaharāmi syandanam | ityevaṃ prayoga eva darśitam |
49.(4.10) hnīryathā— tāpasavatsarāje padmāvatī pratyākhyānaduḥkhāduddha‍ṛtyātmānaṃ vyāpādayantī vatsarājena nivāritā hriyā yuktā | tatra hi— (tāva. 4.20/21)
vidūṣakaḥ— bhodi ! aaṃ dāva dhoaguggullanibaddhāo uṇhodaeṇṇa jaḍāo viccholia tāriso evva | ahaṃ puṇa aṇavarādhamuṃḍido kudo tārise caṃḍu X X X X lahisaṃ | {bhavati ! ayaṃ tāvad X X X X guga (?) X X X X uṣṇodakena X X X X}
padmāvatī— (lajjāvanatamukhī smitaṃ karoti |) punaśca kañcukivijñāpanayā anujñātā rājñā salajjā adhomukhī kañcukinā saha niṣkrāntā |
tathā puṃso 'pi hrīryathā pārthavijaye— gandharvaiḥ parājitya badhyasya arjunena vikramya mocitasya duryodhanasya |
tatra hi duryodhanamarjuna āha— 'na cāhamasmin kāle pāṇḍavenāhūta iti manasi sambhāvanīyam | yasmād abhinnameva āryayudhiṣṭhiramahārājamavagacchāmaḥ, viśeṣato 'smin kāle | paś‍yatu mahārājaḥ—
svairvaire kurupāṇḍavāntarakṛto yasmin viśeṣo 'sti na— stasmiṃstat kimasādhu sādhu kathamityāryā vijānanti tat |
yatraikābhijanānvaye tvabhibhavaḥ kṣatrasya tasmin puna— rbhrātṝṇāṃ purato 'bhiyogasamaye pañcottaraṃ naḥ śatam || 136 ||'
duryodhanaḥ— (savairalakṣyamātmagatam) hṛdaya, śikṣayottaram | kathamivainamālapāmi?
bhrātāhamityasadṛśaṃ mama duṣkṛtaistai— rdveṣṭā bhavāniti tadatra daśāviruddham |
yadyad bravīmi vacanaṃ laghu tattu tatra kāmaṃ bhaveccharaṇamapratipattireva || 137 ||
tadatra vailakṣyam lajjānimittameva |
50. (4.11) māyā yathā devīcandragup‍te— candragup‍tasya kṛtakonmāda iti mānuṣī māyā| kṛtyārāvaṇādiṣu— kanakamṛgādiracanātmikā tvamānuṣī |
51. (4.12) krodho yathā— śrīviśākhadevakṛte abhisārikāvañcite vatsaṃrājaḥ sambhāvitaputravadhāyai padmāvatyai kruddhaḥ, tathā cābhyadhāt—
praduṣṭogragrāhāṃ saritamavagāḍhaḥ śramavaśā— dupālīnaḥ śākhāṃ phalakusumalobhād viṣataroḥ |
phaṇālị̄dhenārthī cyutaparicayāṃ krauryaniratāṃ viṣajvālāgarbhāṃ ciramuragakanyāmanusṛtaḥ || 138 ||
yo 'sau puruṣārthasiddhihetuḥ krodhaḥ sthāyibhāvaḥ, so 'yaṃ na bhavatītyudāhṛtam | puruṣārthasiddhihetustu sthāyibhāvaḥ, na sandhyantaram |
52. (4.13) ojo yathā devīcandragup‍te vidūṣakaḥ śakapateḥ śibiramabhiprasthitaṃ nāyakamāha— bho kaha dāṇiṃ tumaṃ subahuāṇaṃ amaccāṇaṃ majjhe saṃcarissasi? (bhoḥ, kathamidānīṃ tvaṃ subahūnām amātyānāṃ madhye ekākī saṃcariṣyasi ?)
nāyakaḥ— alaṃ mūrkhaṃ, sattvamṛtsṛjya saṅkhyāyāṃ bahumāno bhavataḥ | paś‍ya—
sadvaṃśān pṛthuvarṣmavikramabalān dṛṣṭvādbha‍utān dantino hāsasmeraguhāmukhādabhimukhaṃ niṣkrāmataḥ parvatāt |
ekasyāpi vidhūtakesarasaṭābhārasya bhītā mṛgā gandhādeva harerdravanti bahavo, vīrasya kiṃ saṃkhyayā || 139 ||
etadojasābhihitam |
53. (4.14) saṃvaraṇa yathā tāpasavatsarāje— padmāvatyā svikāyāṃ vatsarājapratikṛtau darśitāyāṃ
vāsavadattāṃ svagatamāha— kahaṃ ayyaütto ! aï hadahiaa āliaṃ mahāṇubhāvaṃ attaa ce(pe)kkhassaṃ taṃ khivvaṃtaṃ mandabhāiṇiṃ āāsesi | (kathamāryaputraḥ! ayi hatahṛdaya! ālikhitaṃ mahānubhāvam X X X X (?) mandabhāginīmāyāsayasi ?) iti sasaṃvaraṇamāste |
padmāvatī— piasahi, kiṃ bhaṇāmi ṇaṃ lajjāvedi piasahī esa (mi?) jaḍāpariggaho | (priyasakhi! kiṃ bhaṇāmi, lajjayati priyasakhi, eṣa jaṭāparigrahaḥ |)
vāsavadattā—kahaṃ te esā ākidī aṇaṇurūpe abhiramadi | (kathaṃ tava eṣā ākṛtiḥ ananurūpe abhiramate ?)
sāṃkṛtyāyanī—(sakhedamātmagatam) aho dhairyaṃ vatsāyāḥ, yeneyam—(tāpa. 3.7)
dayitaṃ vilokayantī tadgatamanaso 'pi hastagatamasyāḥ |
antarniyamitaduḥkhā na manāgapi vikṛtimāyāti || 140 ||
54.(4.15) bhrāntiryathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ— rātrāvudyānasaṅketasthānasthitena rājñā naipathyasādṛś‍yanimittayā bhrāntyā sāgariketi tannāmnā vāsavadattā samābhāṣitā, vāsavadattānāmnā sāgarikā |
55. (4.16) hetvavadhāraṇaṃ yathā mudrārākṣase nepathye— vaitālikābhyāṃ devatārūpakeṇa pravṛttaśaradu/?/ṇa— prakhyāpakāśīrvacane paṭhite 'nantaraṃ ś‍lokadvayaṃ paṭhitam—
sattvotkarṣasya dhātrā nidhaya iva kṛtāḥ ke 'pi kasyāpi heto— rjetāraḥ svena dhāmnā madasalilamucāṃ nāgayūtheśvarāṇām |
daṃṣṭrābhaṅgaṃ mṛgāṇāmadhipataya iva tyaktamānāvalepāḥ nājñābhaṅgaṃ sahante nṛvara! nṛpatayastvādṛśāssārvabhaumāḥ || 141 ||
api ca—
bhūṣaṇādyupabhogena prabhurbhavati na prabhuḥ |
parairaparibhūtājñastvamiva prabhurucyate || 142 ||
etadākarṇya cāṇakyaścandragup‍tenādiṣṭasya kaumudīmahotsavasya svayaṃ kṛtaṃ pratiṣedhamanusandhāya candragup‍tasamuttejanaparametadityavadhārayan tathā hi svagatamāha— prathamaṃ tāvad viśiṣṭadevatā (stutirūpeṇa pravṛtaśaradu/?/ṇaprakhyāpanamāśīrvacana)m,
aparaṃ kimityavadhārayāmi ? (vicintya) āḥ, bhavatu jñātam | rākṣasasyāyaṃ prayogaḥ | (ākāśe lakṣyaṃ vaddhvā) rākṣasa rākṣasa ! dṛś‍yase bhoḥ! (dṛś‍yase) jāgarti khalu kauṭilyaḥ (iti) rākṣasaprayukte hetoravadhāraṇam ||
56.(4.17) dūto yathā pārthavijaye—bhagavān vāsudevo duryodhanasya dūto gataḥ |
57.(4.18) lekho yathā tāpasavatsarāje— pradyotena vāsavadattāyāḥ prahite lekhe, vatse tvāṃ svajanāśiṣāmaviṣayaṃ patyuḥ |
58.(4.19) svap‍no yathā svap‍na vāsavadatte padmāvatīmasvasthāṃ dṛṣṭvā rājā samudragṛhakaṃ gataḥ | padmāvatīrahitaṃ ca tadavalokya tasyā eva śayanīye suṣvāpa | vāsavadattāṃ ca svap‍navadasvap‍ne dadarśa | svap‍nāyamānaśca vāsavadattā— mābabhāṣe | svap‍naśabdena ceha svāpo vā svap‍nadarśanaṃ vā svap‍nāyitaṃ vā vivakṣitam; sarvatredamevodāharaṇam, sarveṣāṃ sambhavāt |
59.(4.20) citraṃ yathā ratnāvalyāṃ citragatāṃ sāgarikāṃ dṛṣṭvā vatsarājasya kāmaḥ |
60(4.21) madaḥ mānino bhavasya (?) cetihāseṣu darśitam; rāvaṇasyāpi nāṭakeṣu kavibhirnibandhaḥ(ddhaḥ)| yathā kṛtyārāvaṇe vimānastho rāvaṇo madādāha—
bhītāḥ stha bhoḥ kimamarāssamarābhimāna— mutsṛjya tiṣṭhati ripau na hi me 'sti vairam |
svastho 'ruṇa—vraja—vikṛṣṭakhalīnapāśaḥ preṣyeṣu kiṃ daśaśirāḥ prahiṇoti śastram? || 143 ||
atha pānanimitto yathā mālavikāg‍nimitre | tatra hi irāvatī yuktamadā (praviś‍ya) ceṭī ca—
irāvatī — haṃje niuṇie, suṇomi bahuso mado kila visesamaṃḍaṇaṃ itthiāaṇassa tti | avi sacco loappavādo ? (hañje nipuṇike, śrṛṇomi bahuśaḥ madaḥ kila viśeṣamaṇḍanaṃ strījanasyeti | api satyo lokapravādaḥ ?)
ceṭī— paḍamaṃ loappavādo evva, ajja uṇa sacco saṃutto | (prathamaṃ lokapravāda eva; adya punaḥ satyaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ |)|| 144 ||
(5. patākāsthānam—4)
atha patākāsthānāni catvāri | tatra ca—(nāśā. 19. 30)
yatrārthe cintite 'nyasmiṃstalliṅgo 'nyaḥ prayujyate |
āgantukena bhāvena patākāsthānakaṃ tu tat || 145 ||
taccaturdhā— (nāśā 19.31)
61.(5.1)
sahasaivārthasampattirguṇavatyupakārataḥ |
patākāsthānakamidaṃ prathamaṃ parikīrtitam || 146 ||
kevatinā (śakapatinā) paraṃ kṛcchramāpatitaṃ rāmagup‍taskandhāvāramanujighṛkṣu— rupāyāntarāgocare pratīkāre niśi vetālasādhanamadhyavasyati kumāracandragup‍te ātreyeṇa vidūṣakeṇoktam—
vidūṣakaḥ— bho ṇa sakkaṃ dāṇiṃ bhavadā imāe velāṃmabhaṇḍāgāriāṇaṃ) saāsādo padādo padaṃ vi gaṃtuṃ ? (bhoḥ! na śakyamidānīṃ bhavatā asyāṃ velāyāṃ bhāṇḍāgārikāṇāṃ sakāśāt padatpadamapi gantum ?)
nāyakaḥ—(svagatam) atropāyaścintanīyaḥ | (praviś‍ya paṭalakahastā ceṭikā)
ceṭī—jaadu jaadu kumāro | kumāra! kahiṃ ajjuā . . . ajja khu ajjuā keṇa vi kāraṇeṇa aaṃ vimaṇā kumāraṃ pekkhāmi tti bhaṇaṃtī rāuḷādo ṇikkaṃtā | imaṃ ca se devīe dhupadevīe sasarīraparibhuttaṃ vasāhaṇaaṃ pasādīkidaṃ gah‍ṇia kumārassa samīpe ajjua . . . maṇṇā āgadatthia vatteakhoai imaṃ jāva ajjuaṃ aṇṇosāmi | (niṣkrāntā |)
(jayatu jayatu kumāraḥ | kumāra! kutrājjukā ? X X X X adya khalu ajjukā kenāpi kāraṇena ahaṃ vimanāḥ kumāraṃ prekṣe iti bhaṇantī rājakulānniṣkrāntā | idaṃ ca tasyā devyāḥ dhruvadevyāḥ svaśarīraparibhuktaṃ prasādhanakaṃ prasādīkṛtaṃ gṛhītvā kumārasya samīpe 'jjukā gatā | yāvadajjukāmanveṣayāmi |)
vidūṣakaḥ—ā dāsīedhīe ! kiṃ tava ahaṃ bhaṃḍāgārio ? gaccha vecchi ā dāsyāḥ putri! kiṃ tavāhaṃ bhāṇḍāgārikaḥ? gaccha iti yavanikāntaritaḥ strīveṣaṃ kṛtvā niṣkrāntaḥ || 147 ||
tadevamanyathā nirgamanopāye cintyamāne strīveṣaḥ sādhanamupagatāmiti sāmānyalakṣaṇānugamāttadbhedaśceṭīvacanaprayuktamekaṃ patākāsthānakamiti |
62. (5. 2)
vacaḥ sātiśayaṃ śliṣṭaṃ kāvyabandhasamāśrayam |
patākāsthānakamidaṃ dvitīyaṃ parikīrtitam || 148 || (nāśā. 19.31)
yathā rāmābhyudaye— tṛtīye 'ṅke sugrīvaḥ saṃdiśati—
bahunātra kimuktena pāre 'pi jaladheḥ sthitām |
acirādeva devi tvāmāryaḥ praśvāsayiṣyati || 149 ||
atra jaladheḥ pārasya durgatvāt duṣkaraṃ praśvāsaṃ manyamāno rāmaparākramasya tatrāpratighātādatiśayamupavarṇayaṃścintyamāneṣu deśāntareṣu sukaratāṃ praśvāsane bhāvinīṃ khyāpayati, na tu jaladheḥ pāre sthitāṃ jñātvaiva |
63.(5.3)
arthopakṣepaṇaṃ yatra hīnaṃ/līnaṃ savinayaṃ bhavet |
śliṣṭapratyuttaropetaṃ tṛtīyamidamiṣyate || 150 ||(nāśā. 19.32)
yathā mudrārākṣase— cāṇakyena svacaritāt prayogādrākṣasagrahaṇe sandehādāśaṃsite siddhārthavacanasaṅghaṭanayā niścaya upakṣip‍taḥ | tatra
cāṇakyaḥ— api nāma durātmā rākṣaso gṛhyeta ?
siddhārthakaḥ— ayaṃ gaṇhio | (ayaṃ gṛhītaḥ |)
cāṇakyaḥ— (saharṣamātmagatam) hanta, gṛhīto durātmā rākṣasaḥ! (prakāśam) bhadra atha ko 'yaṃ gṛhītaḥ?
siddhārthakaḥ— gahīdo ayyasaṃdeso tti | (gṛhīta āryasandeśa iti |)|| 151 ||
64.(5.4)
dva‍yartho vacanavinyāsaḥ suśliṣṭaḥ kāryayojitaḥ |
upanyāsasuyuktatvaṃ taccaturthamudāhṛtam || 152 || (nāśā. 19.33)
yathā ratnāvalyāṃ rājā navamālikopanyāsādāha— (ratnā. 2.4)
uddāmotkalikāṃ vipāṇḍurarucaṃ prārabdhajṛmbhāṃ kṣaṇā— dāyāsaṃ śvasanod‌gamairaviratairātanvatīmātmanaḥ |
adyodyānalatāmimāṃ samadanāṃ nārīmivānyāṃ dhruvaṃ paś‍yan kopavipāṭaladyuti mukhaṃ devyāḥ kariṣyāmyaham || 153 ||
atra vatsarājasya vāsavadattayā saha navamālikāmādhavīlatayoḥ prathamakusumodgamanimitte samāhvaye viṣayasukhamabhilaṣataḥ sāgarikāsaṃdarśanaṃ sukhanimittaṃ dvitīyārthābhidhānādāgāmi prayuktam; ayaṃ ca vacanavinyāsaḥ suśliṣṭo nitarāmupakṣepaṇārthenāliṅgitaḥ prasaṅgāduktaḥ | seyaṃ dvitīyā catuṣṣaṣṭiḥ ||
(3. tṛtīyā catuṣṣaṣṭiḥ)
(sandhyaṅgacatuṣṣaṣṭiḥ)
atha tṛtīyā sandhyaṅgacatuṣṣaṣṭirityācakṣate |
sandhīnāṃ yāni vṛttāni pradeśeṣvanu pūrvaśaḥ |
susampadguṇayuktāni tānyaṅgānyupadhārayet || 154 ||
iṣṭasyārthasya racanā vṛttāntasyānupakṣayaḥ | rāgaprāp‍tiḥ prayogasya guhyānāṃ ca nigūhanam || 155 ||
āścaryavadabhikhyānaṃ prakāś‍yānāṃ prakāśanam |
aṅgānāṃ ṣaḍivadhaṃ hyetad dṛṣṭaṃ śāstre prayojanam || 156 ||
aṅgahīno naro yaśca naivārambhakṣamo bhavet |
aṅgahīnaṃ tathā kāvyaṃ na prayogakṣamaṃ bhavet || 157 || (nāśā.19.47)
kāvyaṃ yadapi hīnārthaṃ samyagaṅgaiḥ samanvitam |
dīp‍tatvāttu prayogasya śobhāmeti na saṃśayaḥ || 158 || (nāśā. 19.48)
udāttamapi yat kāryaṃ/kāvyaṃ syādaṅgaiḥ parivarjitam |
hīnatvāddhi prayogasya na satāṃ rañjayenmanaḥ || 159 ||(nāśā.19.49)
tasmāt sandhiprayogeṣu yathākāvyaṃ yathārasam |
kāryāṇyaṅgāni teṣāṃ tu pravibhāgaḥ pradṛś‍yate || 160 || (nāśā. 19.50)
upakṣepaḥ, parīkarma/parikaraḥ, parinyāso, vilobhanam, yuktiḥ, prāp‍tiḥ, samādhānaṃ, vidhānaṃ, paribhāvanā, udbhedaḥ, karaṇaṃ, bhedaḥ iti mukhasandhau dvādaśāṅgāni |
vilāsaḥ, parisarpaḥ, vidhūtaṃ, tāpanaṃ, narma, narmadyutiḥ, pragamanaṃ, virodhaḥ(nirodhaḥ), paryupāsanaṃ, puṣpaṃ, vajraṃ, varṇasaṃhāra iti pratimukhasandhāvapi dvādaśāṅgāni |
abhūtāharaṇaṃ, mārgaḥ, rūpam, udāharaṇaṃ, kramaḥ, saṅgrahaḥ anumānaṃ, prārthanā, ākṣip‍tiḥ(saṃkṣip‍tiḥ), toṭakam, adhibalam, udvegaḥ, vidravaḥ iti garbhasandhau trayodaśāṅgāni |
apavādaḥ, saṃsphoṭaḥ, dravaḥ, śaktiḥ, vyavasāyaḥ, prasaṅgaḥ, kāntiḥ, khedaḥ, pratiṣedhaḥ, virodhanam, ādānaṃ, sādhanaṃ/chādanaṃ, prarocaneti vimarśasandhāvapi trayodaśa |
sandhiḥ, nirodhaḥ, grathanaṃ, nirṇayaḥ, śeṣaṇaṃ/paribhāṣaṇam, kāntiḥ(dyutiḥ), prasādaḥ, ānandaḥ, samayaḥ, upagūhanaṃ, bhūṣaṇaṃ, punarvākyaṃ, kāvyasaṃhāraḥ, praśastiḥ iti nirvahaṇasandhau caturdaśāṅgāni |
saiṣā sandhyaṅgacatuṣṭirnāṭakādiṣu mahākāvyādiṣu ca pūrṇasandhyādiṣu nibandhanīyā | pratisandhi ca yānyaṅgāni paṭhitāni tāvatāmeva krameṇa nibandhaḥ kārya ityeṣa pracuraḥ prayogaḥ | saṃvidhānavaśācca nyūnādhikabhāvena vyutkrameṇa ca prayoga ityetadapyavagantavyamiti || 161 || teṣu —
(1. mukhasandhau dvādaśāṅgāni)
mukhāṅgāni (12) tāvat—
1. (1.1 upakṣepaḥ)
kāvyārthasya samutpattirupakṣepa iti smṛtaḥ || 162 || (nāśā. 19.65)
yathā ratnāvalyāṃ yaugandharāyaṇaḥ sūtradhārānantaram— evametat | kassandehaḥ? 'dvīpādanyasmādapi' ityādi paṭhati |
yathā ca veṇīsaṃhāre sūtradhāraḥ—
nirvāṇavairadahanāḥ praśamādarīṇāṃ nandantu pāṇḍutanayāḥ saha mādhavena |
raktaprasādhitabhuvaḥ kṣatavigrahāśca svasthā bhavantu kururājasutāḥ sabhṛtyāḥ || 163 ||
2. (1.2 parikaraḥ)
samutpannārthabāhulyājjñeyaḥ parikarastu saḥ || 164 || (nāśā. 19.65)
yathā ratnāvalyām— anyathā k‍va siddhādeśapratyayaprārthitāyāḥ siṃhaleśvaraduhituḥ samudre pravahaṇabhaṅganimagnāyāḥ phalakāsādanam ratnamālācihnāyāḥ parijñāyehānayanam, iti yāvat ||
yathā ca veṇīsaṃhāre bhīmaḥ— sahadeva, ucyatāṃ mad‌vacanādāryaḥ— (vesaṃ. 1.11)
yuṣmacchāsanalaṅghanāmbhāsi mayā magnena nāma sthitaṃ prāp‍tā nāma vigarhaṇā sthitimatāṃ madhye 'nujānāmapi |
krodhollāsitaśoṇitāruṇagadasyocchindataḥ kauravā— nadyaikaṃ divasaṃ mamāsi na gururnāhaṃ vidheyastava || 165 ||
3. (1.3 parinyāsaḥ)
tanniṣpapattiḥ parinyāso vijñeyaḥ kavibhiḥ sadā || 166 || (nāśā. 19.66)
yathā ratnāvalyāṃ yaugandharāyaṇaḥ — tadevaṃ niṣpannaprāyamapi prabhuprayojanaṃ na me dhṛtimāvahatīti kaṣṭo 'yaṃ khalu bhṛtyabhāvaḥ bhartuḥ iti yāvat | yathā ca veṇīsaṃhāre—(vesaṃ. 1.20)
cañcadbha‍ujabhramitacaṇḍagadābhighātasaṃcūrṇitoruyugalasya suyodhanasya |
styānāvanaddhaghanaśoṇitaśoṇapāṇiruttaṃsayiṣyati kacāṃstava devi bhīmaḥ ||
4. (1.4 vilobhanam)
guṇanirvarṇanaṃ caiva vilobhanamiti smṛtam || 168 || (nāśā. 19.66)
yathā ratnāvalyāṃ yaugandharāyaṇaḥ ratnāvalīto vilobhanārthamāha—
'viśrāntavigrahakathaḥ' ityupakramya,
'vatseśvaraḥ kusumacāpa ivābhyupaiti' || 169 || (rat‍nā. 1.8) iti |
yathā ca veṇīsaṃhāre— (vesaṃ. 1.21)
manthāyastārṇavāmbhaḥplutakuhara—valanmanadaradhvānadhīraḥ koṇāghāteṣu garjatpralayaghanaghaṭānyonyasaṅghaṭṭacaṇḍaḥ |
kṛṣṇākrodhāgradūtaḥ kuruśatanidhanotpātanirghātavātaḥ kenāsmatsiṃhanādapratirasitasakho dundubhistāḍito 'yam || 170 || iti ||
5. (1.5 yuktiḥ)
sampradhāraṇamarthānāṃ yuktirityabhidhīyate || 171 || (nāśā. 11.67)
yathā ratnāvalyāṃ rājā—(ratnā.1.9)
rājyaṃ nirjitaśatru yogyasacive nyastaḥ samasto bharaḥ samyakpālanalālitāḥ praśamitāśeṣopasargāḥ prajāḥ |
pradyotasya sutā basantasamayastvaṃ ceti nām‍nā dhṛtiṃ kāmaḥ kāmamupaitvayaṃ mama punarmanye mahānutsavaḥ || 172 ||
yathā veṇīsaṃhāre —
sahadevaḥ —ārya kiṃ mahārājasya saṃ)deśo 'yamāryeṇāpi avyutpanna iva gṛhītaḥ |
bhīmaḥ— kā punarasya vyutpatti?
sahadevaḥ— evamāryeṇa sandiṣṭaṃ suyodhanasya—(vesaṃ. 1.15)
kuśasthalaṃ vṛkasthalaṃ mākandīṃ vāraṇāvatam |
prayaccha caturo grāmān kaṃcideva tu pañcamam || 173 || iti |
tadanayā pratināmagrāmaprārthanayā pañcamasya cākīrtanād‌viṣabhojanajatugṛhadāha— dyūtasamādyapakārod‌ghāṭanamevedaṃ manyāmahe iti ||
6. (1.6 prāp‍tiḥ) (nāśā. 19.67)
sukhārtasyopagamanaṃ prāp‍tirityabhidhīyate || 174 ||
yathā ratnāvalyāṃ vasantakena madanamahotsave varṇi X X X
dadhadvasantakenānekavidhaṃ madanikāṃ nṛtyantīṃ paś‍yan sukhātiśayamanubhūtavān |
yathā ca veṇīsaṃhāre —
ceṭī— (sāmandaṃ) bhaṭṭiṇi! parikuvido via kumālo lakkhīadi | (bhaṭṭiṇi! parikupita iva kumāro lakṣyate |)
draupadī— hañje! jadi evvaṃ tā avahīraṇā vi esā samāsāsedi | tā iha evva upavisia (suṇāmo) dāva ṇāhassa vavasidaṃ | {hañje! yadyevaṃ tadavadhīraṇā 'pyeṣā samāśvāsayati | tat ihaiva upaviś‍ya śrṛṇugastāvannāthasya vyavasitam |}
bhīmaḥ—
mathnāmi kauravaśataṃ samare na kopād duśśāsanasya rudhiraṃ na pibāmyurastaḥ |
sañcūrṇayāmi gadayā na suyodhanorū sandhiṃ karotu bhavatāṃ nṛpatiḥ paṇena || 175 || (vesaṃ. 1.14)
draupadī—assudapuvvaṃ kkhu de edisaṃ vaaṇaṃ | ṇāha ! puṇo vi bhaṇa | (aśrutapūrvaṃ khalu te īdṛśaṃ vatanam | nātha ! punarapi bhaṇa) iti ||
7. (1.7 samādhānam)
bījārthasyopagamanaṃ samādhānamiti smṛtam || 176 || (nāśā. 19.68)
yathā— rat‍nāvalyāṃ—
ceṭyau— ṇahi ṇahi viṇṇavedi | (nahi nahi, vijñāpayati |)
rājā— (vihasya, sādaram) madanike ! nanvājñāpayatītyetadeva ramaṇīyam, viśeṣato 'dya madanotsave | tat kimājñāpayati devī ? |
ceṭyau—jahā ajja mae maaraṃdujjāṇe rattāsoaṇaavaṭṭhiassa bhaavado kusumāuhassa pūā ṇivvattaïdavvā x x x saṃ(?) ayyaütteṇa hodavvaṃ tti | (yathā adya mayā makarandodyāne raktāśokapādapasthitasya bhagavataḥ kusumāyudhasya pūjā nirvartayitavyā āryaputreṇa sannihitena bhavitavyam iti |)
vidūṣakaḥ— bho ! uṭṭhehi lahu gacchahmābaṃhaṇassa me sotthivāaṇaṃ bhavissidi tti | (bho ! uttiṣṭha, laghu tatra gacchāvaḥ | brāhmaṇasya me svastivāyanaṃ bhaviṣyati iti) || rat‍nā. 1.16
yathā ca veṇīsaṃhāre—
draupadī— ṇāha ! mā kkhu jaṇṇaseṇīparibhavuddīvidakovāṇalā sarīraṇaravekkhaṃ parikkāmissatho | jado appamattasaṃcaraṇīāṇi riubalāṇi suṇīaṃti | (nātha! khalu yājñasenīparibhavoddīpitakopānalā śarīranirapekṣaṃ parikrāmiṣyatha | yato 'pramattasañcaraṇīyāni ripubalāni śrūyante |) bhīmaḥ—
ayi sukṣatriye ! || 177 || (vesaṃ. 1.26)
anyonyāsphālabhinnadviparudhiravasāsāndramastiṣkapaṅke mag‍nānāṃ syandanānāmupari kṛtapadanyāsavikrāntapattau |
sphītāsṛkpānagoṣṭhīrasadaśivaśivātūryanṛtyatkabandhe saṅgrāmaikārṇavāntaḥpayasi vicarituṃ paṇḍitāḥ pāṇḍuputrāḥ || 178 ||iti |
8. (1.8 vidhānam)
sukhaduḥkhānvito yo 'rthastad vidhānamiti smṛtam || 179 || (nāśā. 19.68)
yathā rat‍nāvalyām—
kāñcanamālā— devi ! aaṃ so rattāsoapāavo jahiṃ devī aṇaṃgassa pūāṃ ṇivvattaïsmidi | (devi ! ayaṃ sa raktāśokapādapaḥ yatra devī anaṅgasya pūjāṃ nirvartayiṣyati |)
vāsavadattā— teṇa hi avaṇehi me pūāṇimittaüpaaraṇāī | (tena hi upanaya me pūjānimittopakaraṇāni |)
sāgarikā— devi ! ūṇaïṃ (devi ! upanītam |)
vāsavadattā— (nirūpyātmagatam) aho pamādo pariaṇassa | jassa jevva daṃsaṇapadhādo paatteṇa rakkhīadi, tassa jevva ajja diṭhṭhigoaragadā | (prakāśap) halā sāarie ! kīsa tumaṃ maaṇavarāhiṇṇa pariaṇe maaṇamahūssave sāriaṃ mottūṇa idha āgadā ? tā tahiṃ evva gaccha | eaṃ savvaṃ kaṃcaṇamālāe samappehi | {aho pramādaḥ parijanasya ! yasya eva darśanapathāt prayat‍nena rakṣyate tasyaivādya dṛṣṭigocaragatā | halā sāgarike ! kasmāt tvaṃ madanaparādhīne parijane madanamahotsave ? śārikāṃ muktvā ihāgatā ? tat tatraiva gaccha | etat sarvaṃ kāñcanamālāyai samarpaya |}
sāgarikā— jaṃ devī āṇavedi (yad devī ājñāpayati) (iti katicit padāni gatvā) sāriā dāva mae susaṃgadāe samappidā | edaṃ vi atthi pekkhiduṃ me kaudūhalaṃ | taṃ jahā nātādassa aṃteure bhaaü aṇaṃgo ac‍cīadi ihāpi(vi) taha evva, ādu aṇṇaha tā alakkhidā bhavia pekkhissaṃ | {śārikā tāvat mayā susaṅgatāyai samarpitā | (etadapyasti) prekṣituṃ me kautūhalam — tad yathā tātasyāntaḥ pure bhagavānanaṅgo 'rcyate, ihāpi tathaiva | athavā anyathā iti | tadalakṣitā bhūtvā prekṣiṣye |} || 180 ||
yathā ca veṇīsaṃhāre
draupadī— ṇāha ! puṇo tue ahaṃ āacchia samāsāsaïdavvā |
(nātha ! punastvayā 'hamāgatya samāśvāsayitavyā |)
bhīmaḥ ! nanu pañcālarājatanaye ! kimadyāpyalīkāśvāsanādibhiḥ |
bhūyaḥ paribhavakṣāntilajjābandhuritānanam |
aniśśeṣitakauravyaṃ na paśyasi vṛkodaram || 181 || (vesaṃ.1.25) iti |
9. (1.9 paribhāvanā)
kutūhalottarāvedhaḥ(gā) proktā tu paribhāvanā || 182 || (nāśā. 19.69)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ
sāgarikā—kahaṃ pac‍cakkho evva bhaavaṃta sumāugo pac‍cīadi ? (kathaṃ pratyakṣa eva bhagavān sumāśugaḥ pratīcchati ?)
yathā (ca) veṇīsaṃhāre—
draupadī— kiṃ dāṇiṃ eso palaajala (kimidānīmeṣaḥ pralayajala॰ |)
10. (1.10 ud‍bhedaḥ)
(bījārthasya) praroho ya udbhedaḥ sa tu kīrtitaḥ || 183 || (nāśā. 19.69)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ nepathye vaitālikaḥ—(rat‍nā. 1.23)
astāpāstasamastabhāsi nabhasaḥ pāraṃ prayāte ravā— vāsthānīṃ samaye samaṃ nṛpajanassāyantane sampatan |
sampratyeva saroruhadyutimuṣaḥ pādāṃstavāsevituṃ prītyutkarṣakṛto dṛśāmudayanasyendorivodvīkṣate || 184 ||
sāgarikā— (saharṣaṃ parivṛtya saspṛhaṃ paśyantī) kahaṃ aaṃ so rāā (udaaṇo jassa ahaṃ tādeṇa diṇṇā | (kathamayaṃ se rājā udayano yasyāhaṃ tātena dattā ?)
yathā ca veṇīsaṃhāre bhīmaḥ — raṇayajñaḥ | tathāhi— (vesaṃ. 1.24)
catvāro vayamṛtvijaḥ sa bhagavān karmopadeṣṭā hariḥ saṃgrāmādhvaradīkṣito narapatiḥ pat‍nī gṛhītavratā |
kauravyāḥ paśavaḥ priyāparibhavakleśopaśāntiḥ phalaṃ rājanyopanimantraṇāya rasati sphītaṃ yaśo/ito dundubhiḥ || 185 ||
11. (1.11 karaṇam)
prakṛtārthasamārambhaṃ karaṇaṃ paricakṣate || 186 || (nāśā. 19.70)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ
sāgarikā—kahaṃ aaṃ so rājā udaaṇo jassa aaṃ tādeṇa diṇṇā | tā parappesaṇadūsidaṃ vi me sarīraṃ edassa daṃsaṇeṇa ajja bahumadaṃ saṃvuttam |) (kathamayaṃ sa rājā udayano yasyāhaṃ tātena dattā ? tat parapreṣaṇadūṣitamapi me śarīrametasya darśanenādya bahumataṃ saṃvṛttam |)
yathā ca veṇīsaṃhāre—
sahadevaḥ—ārya, gacchāmo vayamidānīṃ gurujanenānujñātā vikramānurūpamā— caritum |
bhīmaḥ—vatsa, ete vayamudyatā eva (āryasya) ājñāmanuṣṭhātum | (uttiṣṭhati |) |
(utthāya) devi, gacchāmo vayamidānīṃ kurukulakṣayāya iti |
12. (1.12 bhedaḥ)
saṅghātarūpabhedo yaḥ sa bheda iti kīrtitaḥ || 187 || (nāśā. 19.70)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ —
sāgarikā— diṭhṭhaṃ jaṃ diṭhṭhavvaṃ (dṛṣṭhaṃ yad draṣṭavyam) ityādi bhaṇitvā nirgatā | yathā ca veṇīsaṃhāre vāsudevopakrāntaḥ sandhiḥ x x x x (vesaṃ. 1.23)
yat satyavratabhaṅgabhīrumanasā yat‍nena mandīkṛtaṃ yad vismartumapīhitaṃ śamavatā śāntiṃ kulasyecchatā |
tad dyūtāraṇisambhṛtaṃ nṛpavadhūkeśāmbarākarṣaṇaiḥ krodhajyotiridaṃ mahat kuruvane yaudhiṣṭhiraṃ jṛmbhate || 188 ||
bhīmaḥ— jṛmbhatāmapratihatakopamāryasya jyotiriti | (vesaṃ. 1.22—24)
(2. pratimukhasandhau dvādaśāṅgani)
atha pratimukhāṅgāni dvādaśa |
13. (2.1 vilāsaḥ)
samīhā ratibhogārthā vilāsaḥ parikīrtitaḥ || (nāśā. 19.71)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ citritenāpi nāyakena saha sambhogasukhamavagacchantyā sāgarikayā |
yathā ca veṇīsaṃhāre rājā— vinayandhara, prātareva vāsabhavanānmāmanāmantryaiva bhānumatī niṣkrānteti vyākṣip‍taṃ me manaḥ |
14. (2.2 parisarpa)
dṛṣṭanaṣṭānusaraṇaṃ parisarpaḥ || 189 || (nāśā. 19.71)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ madanaparavaśāṃ sāgarikāṃ rājānamālikhantīṃ dṛṣṭvā susaṅgatayā— bhyadhāyi — kiṃ puṇa esā guruāṇurāokkhittahiaā ālihaṃtī maṃ pi ṇa pekkhadi | hodu | to jāva imāe diṭhṭhivahaṃ se pariharia ṇirūvaïssaṃ kiṃ esā ālihadi tti | {kiṃ punareṣā gurvanurāgotkṣip‍tahṛdayā ālikhantī mām api na prekṣate ? bhavatu | tadyāvadasyā dṛṣṭipathaṃ parihṛtya nirūpayiṣyāmi kimeṣā ' 'likhati iti |}
yathā ca veṇīsaṃhāre kañcukī— sādhu pativrate sādhu ! strīsvabhāve 'pi vartamānā varaṃ bhavatī, na punarmahārājaḥ, yo 'yamudyateṣu balavatsu, athavā kiṃ balavatsu vāsudevasahāyakeṣu ripuṣu adyāpyantaḥpurakrīḍāsukhamabhilaṣati | idaṃ cāparamayathāyathaṃ svāminaśceṣṭitam | (vesaṃ. 2.2)
āśastragrahaṇādakuṇṭhaparaśostasyāpi jetā mune— stāpāyāsya na pāṇḍusūnubhirayaṃ bhīṣmaḥ śaraiḥ śāyitaḥ |
praụdhānekadhanurdharārivijayaśrāntasya caikākino bālasyāyamarātilūnadhanuṣaḥ prīto 'bhimanyorvadhāt || iti |
15. (2.3 vidhūtam)
kṛtasya vinaya(syānunaya)syādau vidhūtaṃ hyaparigrahaḥ || 191 || (nāśā. 19.72)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ —
susaṅgatā— (sāgarikāhṛdaye hastaṃ dattvā), sahi samassasa samassasa | jāva imāe digghiāe ṇaliṇīpattāiṃ muṇāloaïṃ a geṇhia āacchāmi | {sakhi, samāśvasihi samāśvasihi ! yāvadasyā dīrghikāyā nalinīpatrāṇi mṛṇālikāṃ ca gṛhītvā āgacchāmi | (utthāya parikramyopasṛtya nalinīpatrāṇi mṛṇālikāśca nāṭyena hṛdaye 'syā dadāti |)}
sāgarikā— (patrāṇi vikṣipantī) sahi, avaṇehi ṇaliṇīpattāiṃ muṇāliā a | alaṃ edehiṃ | kīsa aāraṇe attāṇaṃ āāsesi tti | (sakhi, apanaya nalinīpatrāṇi mṛṇālikāśca | alametena | kimakāraṇa ātmānamāyāsayasi iti |) || 192 ||
yathā ca veṇīsaṃhāre (dvitīye ')ṅke — (vesaṃ. 2.16)
rājā—
vikira dhavaladīrghāpāṅgasaṃsarpi cakṣuḥ parijanapadavartinyatra kiṃ sambhrameṇa |
smitamadhuramudāraṃ devi ! māmālapoc‍cai prabhavati mama pāṇyorañjaliḥ tvaṃ spṛśā 'smin || 193 ||
bhānumatī— ayyaütta ! kassiṃci ṇiame ahippāo | to aṇumaṇṇadu maṃ ayyaütto tti | (āryaputra ! kasmiṃścinniyame 'bhiprāyaḥ | tadanumanyatāṃ māmāryaputraḥ iti |)
16. (2.4 tāpanam) apāyadarśanaṃ yattuṃ tāpanaṃ nāma tadbhavet || 194 ||(nāśā.19.72)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ sāgarikā—
dullahajaṇe 'ṇurāo lajjā guruī paravvaso appā |
piasahi visamaṃ ppemma maraṇaṃ saraṇaṃ ṇu varamekam || 195 ||
(durlabhajane 'nurāgo lajjā gurvī paravaśa ātmā |
priyasakhi ! viṣamaṃ prema maraṇaṃ śaraṇaṃ nu varamekam ||)(rat‍nā. 2.1)
yathā ca veṇīsaṃhāre—
suvadanā— sahi bhāṇumadi ! kīsa dāṇīṃ tumaṃ siviṇaadaṃsaṇamettakassa kide ahimāṇiṇo mahārāadujjohaṇassa mahisī bhavia evvaṃ vialiatthirabhāvā aṇimittaṃ saṃtappasi | (sakhi bhānumati ! kasmādidānīṃ tvaṃ svap‍nadarśanamātrakasya kṛte abhimānino mahārājaduryodhanasya mahiṣī bhūtvā evaṃ vigalitasthirabhāvā animittaṃ santapyase ?)
bhānumatī—evvaṃ ṇedam | kiṃ uṇa taṃ(?) me siviṇaaṇimittaṃ āui (āula)daṃsaṇaṃ paḍibhādi | (evaṃ nu etat | kiṃ punastat meṃ svap‍nanimittamākuladarśanaṃ pratibhāti ?) || 196 ||
17. (2.5 narma)
krīḍāvilobhanārthaṃ ca hāsyaṃ narmeti kīrtitam || 197 || (nāśā. 19.73)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ
vidūṣakaḥ—(karṇaṃ dattvā, sasambhramaṃ rājānaṃ haste gṛhītvā) bho vayassa ! ehi palāahma | essiṃ baülapāape kiṃ vi bhūdaṃ paḍivasadi | jaï maṃ ṇa pattiāāsi, tā aggado bhavia saaṃ e(vva) āaṇṇehi | {bho vayasya ! (ehi pa)lāyāvaḥ | asmin vakulapādape kimapi bhūtaṃ prativasati | yadi māṃ na pratyāyayasi, tadagrato bhūtvā svayamevākarṇaya |}
rājā—(ākarṇya) vayasya ! śārikeyam iti ||
yathā ca veṇīsaṃhāre
rājā kṛtāvakuṇṭhanaśceṭyā hastād gṛhītvā bhānumatyā arghyapātramupanayati |
bhānumatī—{sparśamabhinīya sotkampamarghyapātraṃ dhārayati | sasādhvasāyā hastāt puṣpāṇi patanti | (rājānamavalokya) aho pamādo pariaṇassa | (aho pramādaḥ parijanasya !)} ityata ārabhya—
rājā—(saparihāsaṃ) nipuṇaḥ parijanaste evaṃvidhe sevāvakāśe iti || 198 ||
18. (2.6. narmadyutiḥ)
doṣapracchādanārthaṃ tu hāsyaṃ narmadyutiḥ smṛtā || 199 || (nāśā. 19.73)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ
vidūṣakaḥ— (ūrdhvaṃ vilokya) kahaṃ sac‍caṃ evva sāriā | (daṇḍakāṣṭhamudyamya) dāsīedhīe, kiṃ tue jāṇidaṃ jahā sa sac‍caṃ evva vasantao bhāadi | tā ciṭhṭha muhuttaaṃ, jāva imiṇā rattakāmiṇīhiaabhaṃgureṇa daṃḍakaṭhṭhaeṇa paḍipakke via kaïtthaphalaṃ imādo vaüḷapāavādo pāḍaïssaṃ iti | (kathaṃ satyameva śārikā ! dāsyāḥputri, kiṃ tvayā jñātaṃ yathā sa satyameva vasantako bibheti ? tattiṣṭha muhūrtaṃ yāvadetena raktakāminīhṛdayabhaṅgureṇa daṇḍakāṣṭhena paripak‍vamiva kapitthaphalamasmād vakulapādapāt pātayiṣyāmi iti |)
yathā ca veṇīsaṃhāre
rājā— (saparihāsaṃ) devi ! śrutavistāra evāsmi bhavatyāḥ svap‍navṛttāntasya; tadalamatyantasukumāramātmānaṃ khedayitum iti ||200 ||
19. (2.7. praśamanam)
uttarottaravākyaṃ tu bhavet praśamanaṃ tathā || 201 || (nāśā. 19.74)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ
vidūṣakaḥ— bho esā khu sāriā caüvedī via brahmaṇo riāo paṭhiduṃ āraddhā | (bho eṣā khalu śārikā caturvedī iva brāhmaṇaḥ ṛcaḥ paṭhitumārabdhā |)
rājā— mitrā 'nyacetasā mayā nāvadhāritaṃ, kimanayoktam ?
vidūṣakaḥ— bho eāe maṃtidaṃ— (bho etayā mantritam)— duḷahajaṇe 'ṇurāo (durlabhajane 'nurāgo) ityādi paṭhati |
rājā— (sahāsaṃ) mahābrāhmaṇa, bhavantaṃ muktvā ko 'nya evamṛcāmabhijñaḥ ?
viduṣakaḥ— kiṃ khu dāṇi edaṃ | (kiṃ khalvidānīmetat ?)
rājā— vayasya, nanu gāthā | idaṃ kayāpi ślāghyamanāsādayantyā jīvitanirapekṣayoktam |
vidūṣakaḥ— kiṃ edehiṃ vak‍kabhaṇidehiṃ ? ujjuaṃ evvaṃ kiṃ ṇa bhaṇasi jaha maṃ ṇāsāaaṃtīe tti | aṇṇahā ko aṇṇo kusumacāvavvavadeseṇa ṇiṇhavīadi | {kimetairvakrabhaṇitaiḥ ? ṛjukamevaṃ kiṃ na bhaṇasi yathā mām anāsādayantyā iti | anyathā ko 'nyaḥ kusumacāpavyapadeśena nihnūyate ?} (ityuc‍cairhasati ||)
yathā ca veṇīsaṃhāre (praviśya)
kañcukī— bhag‍nam |
duryodhanaḥ— kena ?
kañcukī— bhīmena |
duryodhanaḥ— kasya ?
kañcukī— bhavataḥ |
duryodhanaḥ— kimuddhataṃ pralapasi ?
kañcukī—(sabhayaṃ) deva,
bhag‍naṃ bhīmena bhavato marutā rathaketanam || 202 || (vesaṃ. 2.23) iti ||
20. (2.8 nirodha:)
sukhānāṃ sanniveśo yaḥ sa nirodhaḥ prakīrtitaḥ || 203 || (nāśā.19.74)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ
rājā— dhiṅmūrkha! kimuccairhasatā tvayeyaṃ trāsitā? yenoḍḍīyānyataḥ k‍vāpi gatā iti |
yathā(ca) veṇīsaṃhāre (bhānumatyā saha sukhāsīne rājani praviśya jayadrathamātā duḥśalā ca |)
mātā— parittāadu parittāadu kuruṇāho | (paritrāyatāṃ paritrāyatāṃ kurunāthaḥ |)
duryodhanaḥ — samāśvasihi | kuśalaṃ samarāṅgaṇeṣvapratihatarathasya mahārājajayadrathasya |
mātā— kudo kudo kusalam? (kutaḥ kutaḥ kuśalam?) ityādi || 204 ||
21. (2.9 paryupāsanam)
kruddhasyānunayo yastu1 bhavet tat paryupāsanam || 205 || (nāśā. 19.75)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ
vidūṣakaḥ—bho esā khu kaalīgharaperaṃteṇa gadā | tā ehi turiaṃ aṇusarahma | (bho eṣā khalu kadalīgṛhaparyantena gatā! tadehi, tvaritamanusarāvaḥ |)
yathā ca veṇīsaṃhāre
rājā—(kañcukinamuddiśya) vinayandhara! kimāha bhavān? ekākī bahubhirbālo lūnaśarāsanaśca hata iti | paśya—(vesaṃ. 2.3)
hate jarati goṅgeye puraskṛtya śikhaṇḍinam |
yā ślāghā pāṇḍuputrāṇāṃ saivāsmākaṃ bhaviṣyati || 206 ||
22. (2.10 puṣpam)
viśeṣavacanaṃ yattu tat puṣpamiti saṃjñitam || 207 || (nāśā. 19.75)
