yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ
vidūṣakaḥ— bho edaṃ khu taṃ jaṃ mae bhaṇidaṃ tumaṃ evva etthaṃ ālihido | aṇṇahā ko aṇṇo kusumacāpavvavadeseṇa ṇiṇhavīadi iti | (bho, etatkhalu़
1. syānanuyogastu iti rā.
tat yanmayā bhaṇitaṃ tvamevetamilikhitaḥ | anyathā ko 'nyaḥ kusumacāpavyapadeśena nihrūyata iti |)
yathā ca veṇīsaṃhāre
rājā—alaṃ vikalpena | svap‍nadarśanamanayā varṇitam | mayā punarmanda— dhiyā( 'n‍ )yathaiva saṃbhāvitam iti || 208 ||
23. (2.11 vajram)
pratyakṣarūkṣaṃ yad vākyaṃ tad vajramiti kīrtitam || 201 ||(nāśā. 19.76)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ
rājā—susaṅgate, kathamahamihastho bhavatyā vijñānaḥ?
susaṅgatā—bhaṭṭā! ṇa kevalaṃ tumaṃ, samaṃ cittaphalaeṇa savvo mae vuttanto viṇṇādo | tā gadua devīe ṇivedaïssaṃ iti | (bhartaḥ! na kevalaṃ tvaṃ, samaṃ citraphalakena sarvo mayā vṛttānto vijñātaḥ | tad gatvā devyai nivedayiṣye |) iti ||
yathā ca veṇīsaṃhāre
rājā kañcukinamāha—ā vṛddhāpasada, marutā rathasya keturbhag‍naḥ| tatkimākulaṃ pralapasi iti || 210 ||
24. (2.12 varṇasaṃhāraḥ)
varṇitārthatiraskāro varṇasaṃhāra ucyate || 211 || (nāśā. 19.77)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ
vidūṣaka:— (apavārya), bho savvaṃ saṃbhāviadi | muharā khu esā gabbhadāsī | tā pariosehi ṇaṃ | (bhoḥ, sarvaṃ sambhāvyate | mukharā khalveṣā garbhadāsī | tat paritoṣayainām |)
rājā— yuktamabhihitam | susaṅgate! krīḍāmātramevaitat | tathā nākāraṇaṃ tvayā devī khedayitavyā | tad gṛhāṇa karṇābharaṇam |
susaṅgatā—idaṃ bhaṭṭiṇo pasādeṇa mae kīlidaṃ evva | tā kiṃ kaṇṇābharaṇeṇa | ado vi me guruo pasādo jaṃ kissa tae ahaṃ cittaphaḷae āḷihidā tti parikuvidā me piasahī sāariā | sā pasādiadu iti |
1. 'cāturvarṇyopagamanaṃm' iti nāśā. 19.77
(idaṃ bhartuḥ prasādena mayā krīḍitameva | tat kiṃ karṇābharaṇena ? ayamapi me guruḥ prasādaḥ yat kimiti tvayā ahaṃ citraphalake ālikhiteti parikupitā me priyasakhī sāgarikā | sā prasādyatām iti |)
yathā ca veṇīsaṃhāre kañcukinā rathaketanapatanam āvedite |
(bhānumatī)—aṃtariadu dāva edaṃ samatthapaṇāṇaṃ (baṃmaṇāṇaṃ) veapathabhaṇi maṃgaḷagghoseṇa iti | (antarīyatāṃ tāvadetat samarthabrāhmaṇānāṃ vedadhvanimaṅgaloddhoṣeṇa iti |) || 212 ||
(3. garbhasandhau trayodaśāṅgāni)
atha garbhāṅgāni trayodaśa | teṣu—
25. (3.1 abhūtāharaṇam)—
abhūtāharaṇaṃ tat syād vākyaṃ yat kapaṭāśrayam || 213 ||(nāśā. 19.77)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ
vidūṣakaḥ — susaṅgade ! ṇa hu sāariaṃ vajjia aṇṇaṃ piavaassassa asatthadāe kāraṇaṃ | tā ciṃtehi ettha ko uvāo tti | ajjae cittaphaḷaavuttaṃtasaṃkidāe sāariaṃ mapa(ma) rakkhidu samappaaṃtīe jahāvaṇa . . . (jaṃ ṇevatthaṃ me) pasādīkidaṃ tā teṇa evva viraïdabhaṭṭiṇīvesaṃ sāariaṃ geh‍iṇaa ahaṃ vi kaṃcaṇamālāvesa (dhā)riṇī bhavia padose āgamissaṃ | tumaṃ pi idha evva paḍivālaïssasi | tado māhavīladāmaṃḍave bhaṭṭiṇo tae saha samāamo havissadi | (susaṅgate ! na khalu sāgarikāṃ varjayitvā anyat priyavayasyasyāsvasthatāyāḥ kāraṇam | tat cintayātra ka upāya iti | āryayā citraphalakavṛttāntaśaṅkitayā sāgarikāṃ mama rakṣituṃ samarpayantyā yannepathyaṃ me prasādīkṛtaṃ tatastenaiva viracitabhaṭṭinīveṣāṃ sāgarikāṃ gṛhītvā ahamapi kāñcanamālāveṣadhāriṇī bhūtvā pradoṣe āgamiṣyāmi | tvamapi ihaiva pratipālayiṣyasi | tato mādhavīlatāmaṇḍape bhartuḥ tayā saha samāgamo bhaviṣyati |}
yathā ca veṇīsaṃhāre draupadīmuddiśya sūto 'śvatthāmānamāha—(vesaṃ. 3.10)
aśvatthāmā hata iti pṛthāsūnunā spaṣṭamuktvā svairaṃ śeṣe gaja iti kila vyāhṛtaṃ satyavācā |
tacchutvā 'sau dayitatanayaḥ pratyayāt tasya rājñaḥ śastrāṇyājau nayanasalilaṃ cāpi tulyaṃ mumoca || 214 ||
26. (3.2 mārgaḥ)
tattvārthavacanaṃ caiva mārga ityabhidhīyate || 215 || (nāśā. 19.78)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ tṛtīye 'ṅke kāñcanamālayā sarvo 'sau susaṅgatāvasantakayoḥ kapaṭaprapañco rājñaścāsvasthāsthatāpracchādanaṃ tattvata upalabhya madanikāyai punaśca vāsavadattāyai niveditam iti |
yathā ya veṇīsaṃhāre
rājā— kathaṃ punarācāryaḥ śastragrahaṇasamaye sastramujjhitavān ?
karṇaḥ— ayamabhiprāyaḥ tat (tasya ?) syāt— aśvatthāmā mayā pṛthivīrājye abhiṣektavya iti | tasyaivābhāvād vṛddhasya me brāhmaṇasya vṛthā śastragrahaṇamiti tathā kṛtavān |
rājā— sādhu, nipuṇamupalakṣitam | ata eva samartho 'pi kurukulakṣaya— mupekṣitavān iti |
27. (3.3 rūpam)
citrārthasamavāye tu vitarko rūpamucyate || 216 || (nāśā. 19.78)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ tṛtīye 'ṅke
rājā—aho mahadāścaryam !
manaścalaṃ prakṛtyaiva durlakṣyaṃ ca tathāpi me |
kāmenaitat kathaṃ viddhaṃ samaṃ sarvaiśśilīmukhaiḥ || 217 ||(rat‍nā 3.2) iti ||
yathā ca veṇīsaṃhāre
rājā— (vesaṃ. 3.26)
tejasvī ripuhatabandhuduḥkhapāraṃ bāhubhyāṃ vrajati dhṛtāyudhaplavābhyām |
ācāryaḥ sutanidhanaṃ niśamya saṃkhye kiṃ śastragrahasamaye viśastra āsīt || 218 ||
28. (3.4 udāharaṇam)
yac‍cātiśayavad vākyaṃ tadudāharaṇaṃ smṛtam || 219 || (nāśā. 19.79)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ
vidūṣakaḥ— hī hī ! kosaṃbīrajjalāheṇa vi ṇa tādiso piavaassassa maṇaparioso āsī jādiso ajja mama saāsādo piavaaṇaṃ suṇia bhavissadi tti tak‍kemi | (hī hī ! kauśāmbīrājyalābhenāpi na tādṛśaḥ priyavayasyasya manaḥparitoṣaḥ āsīd yādṛśo 'dya mama sakāśāt priyavacanaṃ śrutvā bhaviṣyatīti tarkayāmi |)
yathā ca veṇīsaṃhāre
aśvatthāmā—aṅgarāja ! kimāha bhavān—kimatra kriyata iti ? śrūyatāṃ yad yat kriyate—(vesaṃ. 3.31)
yo yaḥ śastraṃ bibharti svabhujagurumadaḥ pāṇḍavīnāṃ camūnāṃ yo yaḥ pāñcālagotre śiśuradhikavayā garbhaśayyāṃ gato vā |
yo yastatkarmasākṣī carati mayi raṇe yaśca yaśca pratīpaḥ krodhāndhastasya tasya svayamapi jagatāmantakasyāntako 'ham || 220 ||
29. (3.5. kramaḥ)
bhāvatattvopalabdhistu krama ityabhidhīyate || 221 || (nāśā. 19.79)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ tṛtīye 'ṅke —
vidūṣakaḥ—(upasṛtya) bho vaassa ! diṭhṭhiā vaḍḍhasi samīhitabbhadiāai kajjasiddhīe | (bho vayasya, diṣṭyā vardhase samīhitābhyadhikayā kāryasiddha‍yā |)
rājā— vayasya, api kuśalaṃ priyāyāḥ ?
vidūṣakaḥ— aïreṇa pekkhia saaṃ evva jāṇissidi bhavaṃ | (acireṇa prekṣya svayameva jñāsyati bhavān |)
rājā—(saparitoṣaṃ) kathaṃ darśanamapi bhaviṣyati, iti |
yathā ca veṇīsaṃhāre tṛtīye 'ṅke, . . .
rājan duryodhana ! mahā(n) x x x x x bhavatā ca kṛtaparikaro 'yaṃ
lokatrayamucchettuṃ samarthaḥ, kiṃ punaretad yudhiṣṭhirabalam ? tadabhiṣicyatāṃ saināpatye |
rājā— suṣṭhuṃ yujyamānamabhihitam; kiṃ tu prākpratipanno 'yamartho mayā 'ṅgarājasya, iti || 222 ||
30. (3.6 saṃgrahaḥ)
sāmadānārthasampannaḥ saṃgrahaḥ parikīrtitaḥ || 223 || (nāśā. 19.80)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ tṛtīye 'ṅke
rājā— (saharṣaṃ) (sādhu) vayasya, sādhu | idaṃ ca te pāritoṣikam | (hastādapasārya kaṭakaṃ prayacchati) |
yathā ca veṇīsaṃhāre
aśvatthāmā— rājan kauraveśvera ! kimadyāpi yuktāyuktavicāraṇayā ?|| 224 ||
prayat‍naparibodhitaḥ stutibhiradya śeṣe niśā— makeśavamapāṇḍavaṃ bhuvanamadya nissomakam |
iyaṃ parisamāpyate raṇakathā 'dya dośśālinā— mapaitu nṛpakānanācigururadya bhāro bhuvaḥ || 225 || (vesaṃ. 3.33)
31. (3.7 anumānam)
rūpānurūpagamanamanumānamiti smṛtam || 226 || (nāśā. 19.80)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ —
vidūṣakaḥ—(nirūpya) bho edaṃ khu (saṃsa)ttaṃ (bahala)pattapādavadāe piṃḍīkadaṃdhaāraṃ via ujjāṇaṃ | tā kadhaṃ ettha maggo lakkhīadi ? (bho, etat khalu saṃsaktabahalapatrapādapatayā piṇḍīkṛtāndhakāramiva udyānam | tatkathamatra mārgo lakṣyate ?)
rājā— vayasya ! sujñātamevaitat | tathā hi—(rat‍nā. 3.8)
pālīyaṃ campakānāṃ niyatamayamasau sundaraḥ sindhuvāraḥ sāndrā vīthī tatheyaṃ bakulaviṭapināṃ pāṭalā paṅktireṣā |
āghrāyāghrāya gandhaṃ vividhamadhigataiḥ pādapairevamasmin vyaktiṃ panthāḥ prayāti dviguṇataratamonihnuto 'pyeṣa cihnaiḥ || 227 ||iti |
yathā ca veṇīsaṃhāre
aśvatthāmā— (agrato vilokya), hā hā dhikkaṣṭam ! bho bhoḥ ! pratijñābhaṅgabhīruḥ kirīṭī duryodhanarādheyau śaravarṣairabhidravati | sarvathā pītaṃ śoṇitaṃ duḥśāsanasya bhīmena, iti |
32. (3.8 prārthanā)
abhyarthanāparaṃ vākyaṃ prārthanetyabhidhīyate 1 || 228 || (nāśā. 19.81)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ tṛtīye 'ṅke
vidūṣakaḥ—bhodi sāarie ! vīsaddhā bhavia ālava piavaassaṃ | ajja vi dāva se ṇic‍caruṭṭāe devīe vāsavadattāe duṭ‍ṭhavaaṇehiṃ kaḍuidāiṃ sottāiṃ saṃpadaṃ suhāvedu tuha mahuravaaṇovaṇṇāso | (bhavati sāgarike ! visrabdhā bhūtvā ālapa priyavayasyam | adyāpi tāvadasyā nityaruṣṭayā devyā vāsavadattāyāḥ duṣṭavacanaiḥ kaṭukite śrotre sāmprataṃ sukhayatu tava madhuravacanopanyāsaḥ |)
yathā ca veṇīsaṃhāre
aśvatthāmā— rājan duryodhana ! abhīṣmadroṇaṃ ca saṃprati kauravabalamāloḍayantau bhīmārjunau rādheyena naivaṃvidhenānyena vā śakyete nivārayitum | ataḥ svayaṃ bhrātuḥ pratīkāraparo bhava, iti || 229 ||
33. (3.9 saṃkṣip‍tiḥ)
garbhasyodbhedanaṃ yattu 2saṃkṣip‍tiriti gīyate || 230 || (nāśā. 19.81)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ
rājā—(mukhamud‍ghāṭya, unnamayya) vilokya ca, saviṣādaṃ kathaṃ devī vāsavadattā ! (vidūṣakamuddiśya) mūrkha, kimetat ?
vidūṣakaḥ—(sabhayaṃ) bho ahmāṇaṃ jīvidasaṃsao | (bhoḥ, asmākaṃ jīvitasaṃśayaḥ !)
yathā ca veṇīsaṃhāre caturthe 'ṅke
sundarakaḥ—aha vā kiṃ ettha devaṃ uvālahāmi | tassa kkhu edaṃ
1. ratiharṣotsavādīnāṃ prārthanā prārthanā bhavet | nāśā. 19.81 2. 'sā ' 'kṣi'—iti nāśā. 19.81
ṇibbhacchiaviuravaaṇavīassa paribhūdapidāmahahidovadesaṃkurassa saüṇippocchāhaṇāvarūḍhamūlassa jadugehajūdavisasāhiṇo paṃcālī— kesaggahaṇakusumassa phalam, iti | (atha vā kimatra daivamupālabhe ? tasya khalvetad nirbhartsitaviduravacanabījasya paribhūtapitāmaha— hitopadeśāṅkurasya śakuniprotsāhanāvarūḍhamūlasya jatugṛha— dyūtaviṣaśākhinaḥ pāñcālīkeśagrahaṇakusumasya phalam, iti |}|| 231 ||
34. (3.10 toṭakam)
saṃrambhavacanaṃ caiva toṭakaṃ samudāhṛtam || 232 || (nāśā. 19.81)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ
rājā—(añjaliṃ baddha‍‍vā), priye vāsavadatte, prasīda |
vāsavadattā—(aśrūṇi dhārayantī), ayyavutta ! mā evaṃ bhaṇa | saṃkaṃtāi khu edāiṃ aṇṇassi akkharāiṃ |
(āryaputra ! mā evaṃ bhaṇa | saṃkrāntāni khalvidānīmanyasyāmakṣarāṇi |)
yathā ca veṇīsaṃhāre
rājā—sundaraka, kac‍cit kuśalamaṅgarājasya ?
puruṣaḥ—kusalaṃ sarīramettaeṇa | (kuśalaṃ śarīramātrakeṇa |)
rājā—kiñcāsya kirīṭinā nihatā dhaureyāḥ kṣatassārathirbhag‍no vā rathaḥ ?
puruṣaḥ— deva ṇa bhaggo raho | bhaggo de maṇoraho | (deva ! na bhag‍no rathaḥ | bhag‍naste manorathaḥ)
rājā—sasaṃrambhaṃ kimavispaṣṭavacanairākulamapi paryākulayasi me hṛdayam ? iti |
35. (3.11 adhibalam)
kapaṭasyānyathābhāvaṃ bruvate 'dhibalaṃ budhāḥ || 233 || (nāśā. 19.82)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ tṛtīye 'ṅke (rat‍nā. 3.14)
rājā—evamapi pratyakṣadṛṣṭavyalīkaḥ kiṃ vijñāpayāmi ?
ātāmratāmapanayāmi vilakṣa eṣa lākṣākṛtāṃ caraṇayostava devi mūrdh‍nā |
kopoparāgajanitāṃ tu mukhendubimbe hartuṃ kṣamo yadiparaṃ karuṇā mayi syāt || 234 ||
yathā ca veṇīsaṃhāre
sundarakaḥ—tado a deva sattikhaṃḍaṇāmarisideṇa gaṃḍīviṇā bhaṇi(a)—re re dujjohaṇappamuhā kurukula—aviṇaa—ṇāvākaṇṇadhāra kaṇṇa ! tumhehiṃ bahuhiṃ mahārahehiṃ paḍivāria eāī mama puttao ahimaṇṇu vvāvādido | ahaṃ uṇa tumhāṇaṃ pekkhantāṇaṃ evva visaseṇaṃ ajja sumaridavvasesaṃ karomi | (tataśca deva ! śaktikhaṇḍanāmarṣitena gāṇḍīvinā bhaṇitam—re re duryodhanapramukhāḥ, kurukulāvinaya— nāvākarṇadhāra karṇa ! yuṣmābhiḥ bahubhirmahārathaiḥ parivāryaikākī mama putrako 'bhimanyurvyāpāditaḥ | ahaṃ punaryuṣmākaṃ prekṣamāṇānāmeva vṛṣasenamadya smartavyaśeṣaṃ karomi |) || 235 ||
36. (3.12 ud‍vegaḥ)
bhayaṃ nṛpādijanitamudvegassaṃprakīrtitaḥ || 236 || (nāśā. 19.83)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ tṛtīye 'ṅke,
sāgarikā—varaṃ dāṇiṃ ahaṃ saaṃ evva attāṇaṃ ubbaṃdhia uvaradā, ṇa uṇa jāṇidasaṃkedavuttaṃtae devīe paribhūda hmi | tā jāva iha asoapādavaṃ gadua jadhāsamīhidaṃ karissaṃ |
{varamidānīmahaṃ svayamevātmānamud‍badhyoparatā, punarjñātasaṃketavṛttāntayā devyā paribhūtāsmi | tadyāvadiha aśokapādapaṃ gatvā yathāsamīhitaṃ kariṣye |}
yathā ca veṇīsaṃhāre caturthe 'ṅke,
'bho bhoḥ bhayaskhalitakārmukakṛpāṇatomaraśaktayaḥ kauravacamūbhaṭāḥ pāṇḍavapakṣapātinaśca yodhāḥ ! na bhetavyaṃ na bhetavyam' ityādi bhīmasenavacanaṃ śrutvā, (sabhayam) kathamāsanno durātmā kauravarāja— putramahāvanotpātamārutaḥ ! anupalabdhasaṃjñaśca mahārājaḥ ! bhavatu | sudūramapaharāmi syandanam | kadācidayamanāryo duśśāsana ivāsminnadyāpyanāryamācariṣyati, iti || 237 ||
37. (3.13 vidravaḥ)
śaṅkā bhayatrāsakṛto vidravaḥ samudāhṛtaḥ || 238 || (nāśā. 19.85)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ
vidūṣakaḥ— uc‍cai bho vaassa, parittāhi parittāhi | esā kkhu devī vāsavadattā appāṇaṃ ubbaṃdhia vāvādiadi | (bho vayasya, paritrāyasva, paritrāyasva ! eṣā khalu devī vāsavadattā ātmānamudvadhya vyāpādayati |)
rājā— (sasambhramamupasṛtya) vayasya, k‍vāsau k‍vāsau ?
vidūṣakaḥ— ho esā | (aho eṣā !)
rājā—ayi kimidamakāryaṃ kriyate ? || 239 ||
mama kaṇṭhagatāḥ prāṇāḥ pāśe kaṇṭhagate tava |
anarthārthaḥ prayāso 'yaṃ tyajyatāṃ sāhasaṃ priye || 240 ||(rat‍nā. 4.1) iti |
yathā (ca) veṇīsaṃhāre pañcame 'ṅke,
sūtaḥ—deva !
prāp‍tāvekarathārụ̄dhau pṛcchantau tvāmitastataḥ |
sarve— kaśca kaśca ?
sūtaḥ— sa karṇāriḥ sa ca krūro vṛkakarmā vṛkodaraḥ || 241 ||(vesaṃ. 5.25)
gāndhārī— (sabhayam) jāda ! kiṃ ettha paḍivajjidavvaṃ ? (jāta ! kimatra pratipattavyam ?)
rājā—nanu sannihitaiveyaṃ gadā, iti |
(4. vimarśasandhau trayodaśāṅgāni)
atha vimarśāṅgāni trayodaśa | (teṣu)—
38. (4.1 apavādaḥ)
doṣaprakhyāpanaṃ yat syāt so 'pavādaḥ prakīrttitaḥ || 242 || (nāśā. 19.84)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ tṛtīye 'ṅke rājñi priyaṃ vadatyapi
sāgarikā—ayyaütta ! kiṃ ediṇā alīadākkhiṇṇeṇa jīvidādo vi vallahatarāe devīe attāṇaaṃ avarāhiṇaṃ karesi ? (āryaputra ! kiṃ etena alīkadākṣiṇyena jīvitādapi vallabhatarāyāḥ devyāḥ ātmānamaparādhinaṃ karoṣi ? |)
rājā—ayi ! mithyāvādinī khalvasi | kutaḥ—(rat‍nā. 3.17)
śvāsotkampini kampitaṃ kucayuge maune priyaṃ bhāṣitaṃ vaktre 'syāḥ kuṭilīkṛtabhruṇi ruṣā yātaṃ mayā pādayoḥ |
itthaṃ naḥ sahajābhijātyajanitā sevaiva devyāḥ, paraṃ premābandhavivardhitādhikarasā prītistu yā sā tvayi || 243 ||
yathā ca veṇīsaṃhāre yudhiṣṭhiraḥ—(vesaṃ. 6.1)
tīrṇe bhīṣmamahodadhau kathamapi droṇānale nirvṛte karṇāśīviṣabhogini praśamite śalye ca yāte divam |
bhīmena priyasāhasena rabhasādalpāvaśeṣe jaye sarve jīvitasaṃśayaṃ vayamamī vācā samāropitāḥ || 244 ||
39. (4.2 saṃsphoṭaḥ)
roṣagrathitavākyaṃ tu saṃsphoṭa iti kīrtitam || 245 || (nāśā. 19.84)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ tṛtīye 'ṅke tadeva sāgarikā—vatsarājayorvākyamalakṣitā niśamyopasṛtya ca devī saroṣamāha—
jajjaütta ! juttaṃ edaṃ, sarisaṃ edaṃ | (āryaputra ! yuktametat ! sadṛśametat !)
rājā—(sāgarikāṃ muktvā sasambhramam) devi ! na khalvakāraṇe māmupā— labdhumarhasi | satyaṃ tvāmeva matvā veṣasādṛśyād vipralabdhā vayamihāgatāḥ | tathāpi kṣamyatām | (iti pādayoḥ patati |)
vāsavadattā—ayyaütta ! uṭṭehi | kiṃ ajje vi ahijāī sevādukkhaṃ aṇubhavīadi ? | (āryaputra ! uttiṣṭha | kimadyāpi abhijātayā sevāduḥkhamanubhāvyate ?)
rājā—kathamidamapi śrutaṃ devyā ? iti |
yathā ca veṇīsaṃhāre
yudhiṣṭhiraḥ—pāñcālaka ! kac‍cidāsāditā tasya durātmanaḥ kauravāpasadasya padavī ?
pāñcālakaḥ—na kevalaṃ padavī, sa eva durātmā devīkeśāmbarākarṣaṇamahāpātaka— pradhānaheturupalabdhaḥ, iti || 246 ||
40. (4.3 dravaḥ)
guruvyatikramo yastu sa dravaḥ parikīrtitaḥ || 247 || (nāśā. 19.85)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ tṛtīye 'ṅke—
vidūṣakaḥ—hodi ! tumaṃ evva ubbaṃdhia attāṇaaṃ vivajjihisi tti karia vesasārissamohideṇa mae vayasso iha āṇīdo | (bhavati ! tvameva udvadhyātmānaṃ vipatsyase iti kṛtvā veṣasādṛśyamohitena mayā vayasya ihānītaḥ) | latāpāśaṃ darśayati | kiṃ ṇa pekkhadi hodi imaṃ | (kiṃ na prekṣate bhavatī idam ?)
vāsavadattā—kaṃcaṇamāle edeṇa evva ladāvāseṇa baṃdhia āṇehi baṃhabaṃdhuaṃ | (aṅgulyā tarjayantī) edaṃ vi duvviṇīaṃ aggado karehi | kāñcanamāle ! etenaiva latāpāśena baddha‍vā ānaya brahmabandhum | etāmapi kanyakāṃ durvinītām agrataḥ kuru |
kāñcanamālā—jaṃ bhaṭṭiṇī āṇavedi | yad bhaṭṭinī ājñāpayati | iti vidūṣakaṃ badh‍nāti |
yathā vā veṇīsaṃhāre
yudhiṣṭhiraḥ—(draupadīmavalokya, mukhādasyāḥ bāṣpamapanīya) ayi sukṣatriye ! || 248 ||
gurūṇāṃ bandhūnāṃ kṣitipatisahastrasya purataḥ purā 'bhūdasmākaṃ nṛpasadasi yo 'yaṃ paribhavaḥ |
priye ! prāyastasya dvitayamapi pāraṃ gamayitā kṣayaḥ prāṇānāṃ vā kurupatipaśorvā 'dya samare || 249 || (vesaṃ.6.45)
49. (4.4 śaktiḥ)
virodhapraśamo yastu sā śaktiḥ parikīrtitā || 250 || (nāśā. 19.85)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ caturthe 'ṅke—
vidūṣakaḥ—praviś‍yāha—hī hī bho ajje kkhu piavaassappasādiāe devie baṃdhaṇādo moia sahatthadiṇṇehiṃ modaehiṃ cirassa kālassa me udaraṃ pūridaṃ | aṇṇacca edaṃ paṭṭaṃsuajualaṃ kaṇṇāharaṇaṃ ca diṇṇaṃ | tā jāva piavayassaṃ pekkha, iti | (hī hī bhoḥ! adya khalu priyavayasyaprasāditayā devyā bandhanāt mocayitvā svahastadattaiḥ modakaiḥ cirasya kālasya me udaraṃ pūritam | anyacca, etat paṭṭāṃśukayugalaṃ karṇābharaṇaṃ ca dattam | tad yāvat priyavayasyaṃ prekṣe, iti}
yathā na veṇīsaṃhāre
pāñcālako yudhiṣṭhiramāha— ahaṃ ca devena cakrapāṇinā devasakāśamanupreṣitaḥ | āha ca devo devakīnandanaḥ— aparyuṣitapratijñe mārutau pranaṣṭe kauraveśvara mahān āsīnno viṣādaḥ | samprati punarbhīmasenenāsādite suyodhane niṣkaṇṭakībhūtaṃ bhuvanatalaṃ parikalpayatu devaḥ, iti || 251 ||
42. (4.5. vyavasāyaḥ)
vyavasāyaśca vijñeyaḥ pratijñāhetusambhavaḥ || 252 || (nāśā. 19.86)
yathā rat‍nāvalyām —
aindrajālikaḥ—deva!
kiṃ dharaṇie miaṃko āāse mahiaro jale jalaṇo |
majjhaṇhami paoso dāvijjaï dehi āṇattiṃ || 253 ||
(kiṃ dharaṇyāṃ mṛmāṅka ākāśe mahīdharo jale jvalanaḥ |
madhyāhne pradoṣo darś‍yatāṃ dehyājñap‍tim ||) (rat‍nā. 4. 8)
avi a(api ca)— (rat‍nā. 4.10,9)
hariharabahmappamuhe deve dāvemi devarāaṃ a |
gaaṇe vi siddha—vijjāhara—vahu—satthaṃ ca ṇaccaṃtaṃ || 254 ||
(hariharabrahmapramukhān devān darśayāmi devarāja ca |
gagane siddhavidyādharavadhūsārdhaṃ ca nṛtyantam ||)
1. 'bahuṇā mahamahanimaṇeṇāvi aṃ piyaṃ daṭṭhuṃ'—iti HOS. dra. pariśiṣṭe 'pi
kiṃ jappieṇa bahuṇā jaṃ jaṃ hiae samīhidaṃ1 piyaṃ daṭaṭhuṃ |
taṃ taṃ daṃsemi ahaṃ guruṇo maṃtappahāveṇa || 255 || iti |
(kiṃ jalpitena bahunā yad yad hṛdaye samīhitaṃ draṣṭum |
tattad darśayāmyahaṃ gurormantraprabhāveṇa ||}
īdisoavasṭambho jeṇa savvaṃ saṃbhāvīadi | {īdṛśo 'vaṣṭambho yena sarvaṃ saṃbhāvyate |} iti |
yathā ca veṇīsaṃhāre
yudhiṣṭhiraḥ—(aśrūṇi vimuñcan)
sarvathā kathaya brahman saṃkṣepād vistareṇa vā |
vatsasya kimapi śrotumetaddattaṃ mano1 mayā || 256 || (vesaṃ.6.15)
rākṣasaḥ—śrūyatām—
tasmin kauravapārthayorgurugadāghoradhvanau saṃyuge || 257 ||
draupadī—(labdhasaṃjñā) tado kiṃ? (tataḥ kim?)
rākṣasaḥ—(ātmagatam) kathaṃ punarapyanayā labdhā saṃjñā? ayamapaharāmyasyāḥ prāṇān |
sīrī tatkṣaṇamāgataściramabhūt tasyāgrataḥ saṅgaraḥ || 258 ||
kañcukī—nūnaṃ tatkuto 'tra kaścidaparāddho bhaviṣyati?
rākṣasaḥ— (vesaṃ.6.16)
ālambya priyaśiṣyatāṃ tu halinā saṃjñā rahasyāhitā
yāmāsādya kurūttamaḥ pratikṛtiṃ duśśāsanārau gataḥ || 259 ||
43. (4.6 prasaṅgaḥ)
aprastutārthavacanaṃ2 prasaṅgaḥ parikīrtitaḥ || 260 || (nāśā. 19.86)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ
vāsavadattā—halā kaṃcaṇamāle! ujjaïṇīe āado tti atthi me edassiṃ iṃdajālie vakkhavādo | (halā kāñcanamāle, ujjayinyā āgata ityasti me etasmin aindrajālike pakṣapātaḥ |)
1. metaddattaṃ manomeṣa dattaḥ kṣaṇo—jo., mūlaṃ HOS. 2. prasaṅgaś‍caiva vijñeyo gurūṇāṃ parikīrttanam | nāśā. 19.86
kāñcanamālā—bhaṭṭiṇi, ṇāikulavahumāṇo khu eso |
(bhaṭṭini, jñātikulabahumānaḥ khalu eṣaḥ |)
yathā ca veṇīsaṃhāre—
yudhiṣṭhiraḥ—hā tāta bhīma hā kāntārabāndhava, hā jatugṛhasamudrataraṇayānapātra, hā kirmīrajaṭāsurajarāsandhapratimalla, hā kīcakasuyodhanānuja— śatakanalinīvanaprāleyavarṣa!|| 261 ||
nirlajjasya durodaravyasanino vatsa! tvayā sā tadā bhak‍tyā me samadadvipāyutabalenāṅgīkṛtā dāsatā |
kiṃ nāmāpakṛtaṃ mayā 'dhikamatastvayyadya yad gamyate muktvā 'nāthamabāndhavaṃ sapadi māṃ prītiḥ k‍va te sā 'dhunā || (vesaṃ. 6.17)
draupadī—mahārāa, kiṃ ṇedaṃ? (mahārāja, kiṃ nvidam ?)
yudhiṣṭhiraḥ—(vesaṃ. 6.18)
sa kīcakaniṣūdano bakahiḍimbakirmīrahā madāndhamagadhādhipadviradasandhibhaṅgāśaniḥ |
gadāparighaśobhinā bhujayugena tenānvitaḥ priyastava mamānujo 'rjunagururgato 'staṃ kila || 263 || iti |
44. (4.7 dyutiḥ)
vākyamādharṣasaṃyuktaṃ dyutistajjñairudāhṛtā || 264 || (nāśā. 19.87)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ caturthe 'ṅke,
vidūṣakaḥ—(apavārya) āḥ dāsīeutta, iṃdaālia, kiṃ devehiṃ, kiṃ vā accharāihiṃ? jaï imiṇā parituṭhṭheṇa de paoaṇaṃ tā sāariaṃ se daṃsehi | (āḥ dāsyāḥputra, aindrajālika, kiṃ devaiḥ, kiṃ vā 'psarobhiḥ? yadi anena parituṣṭena te prayojanaṃ sāgarikāṃ tasya darśaya |)
yathā ca veṇīsaṃhāre ṣaṣṭhe 'ṅke,
yudhiṣṭhiraḥ—bhagavan kāmapāla, kṛṣṇāgraja, subhadrābhrātaḥ || 265 ||
jñātiprītirmanasi na kṛtā kṣatriyāṇāṃ na dharmo rūḍhaṃ sakhyaṃ tadapi gaṇitaṃ nānujasyārjunena |
tulyaḥ kāmaṃ bhavatu bhavataśśiṣyayoss‍nehabandhaḥ ko 'yaṃ panthā yadasi vimukho mandabhāgye mayīttham || 266 ||(vesaṃ.) iti |
45. (4.8 khedaḥ)
manaśceṣṭāviniṣpannaḥ śramaḥ kheda udāhṛtaḥ || 267 || (nāśā. 19.87)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ
rājā—ārya vasubhūte! api kuśalaṃ tatrabhavataḥ siṃhaleśvarasya ?
vasubhūtiḥ—(ūrdhvamavalokya, niḥśvasya ca) deva! na jāne kiṃ vijñāpayāmi |
vāsavadattā—(saviṣādamātmagatam) haddhi, kiṃ dāṇīṃ vasubhūdī kathaïssadi, kiṃ bhavissidi tti saṃsae vaṭṭāmi |
(hā dhik, kimidānīṃ vasubhūtiḥ kathayiṣyati ? kiṃ bhaviṣyati iti saṃśaye varte |)
rājā—kathaya, kimiti paryākulo 'si ?
bābhravyaḥ— (apavārya) amātya, suciramapi sthitvā kathanīyamevaitat | kathyatām |
vasubhūtiḥ—deva, śakyate kathayitum | tathāpyeṣa mandabhāgyaḥ kathayāmi | yā sā tatrabhavatā siṃhaleśvareṇa svaduhitā rat‍nāvalī nāma āyuṣmatīṃ devīṃ dagdhāṃ vāsavadattāmupaśrutya devāya pūrvaṃ prārthitā satī dattā—
vidūṣakaḥ— tado tāe kiṃ saṃuttaṃ ? (tatastasyāḥ kiṃ saṃvṛttam ?)
vasubhūtiḥ— sā yuṣmadantikamasmābhirānīyamānā pravahaṇabhaṅgāt sāgare nimag‍nā |
vāsavadattā— (sāsram) hā bahiṇie, kahiṃ si | dehi me paḍivaaṇaṃ | (hā bhaginike, k‍vāsi? dehi me prativacanam |) iti |
yathā ca veṇīsaṃhāre—(vesaṃ. 6.21)
yudhiṣṭhiraḥ—yuktamāha pāñcālī | kañcukin, kriyatāmiyaṃ tapasvinī citāsaṃvibhāgena sahyavedanā | mamāpi dhanurupanaya | alamathavā dhanuṣā || 268 ||
tasyaiva deharudhirokṣaṇapāṭalāṅgīm ādāya saṃyati gadāmapavidhya cāpam |
bhrātṛpriyeṇa kṛtamadya yadarjunena śreyo mamāpi hi tadeva jayena kiṃ me || 269 ||
46. (4.9 pratiṣedhaḥ)
īpsitārthapratīghātaḥ pratiṣedha iti smṛtaḥ || 270 || (nāśā. 19.88)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ caturthe 'ṅke
rājā— devi, samāśvasihi samāśvasihi | duravaboghā gatirdaivasya | nanvetāveva vahanabhaṅge 'pyabhag‍nau bābhravyavasubhūtī nidarśanam |
vāsavadattā—ayyaütta, jujjaï edaṃ | kudo uṇa mama ettiā bhāadheyā | (āryaputra, yujyata etat | kutaḥ punaḥ mamaitāvadbhāgadheyam ?)
rājā— (vasubhūtimapavārya) bābhravya, kimetat? sarvaṃ nāvagacchāmi |
bābhravyaḥ— deva, śrūyatām || 271 ||
(nepathye)
harmyāṇāṃ hemaśṛṅgaśriyamiva nicayairarciṣāmādadhānaḥ sāndrodyānadrumāgraglapanapiśunitātyantatīvrābhitāpaḥ |
kurvan krīḍāmahīdhraṃ sajalajaladharaś‍yāmalaṃ dhūmapātai— reṣa ploṣārtayoṣijjana iha sahasaivotthito 'ntaḥpure 'g‍niḥ || 272 || (rat‍nā.)
(sarve sasambhramamuttiṣṭhanti |)
yathā ca veṇīsaṃhāre yudhiṣṭhire duryodhanamabhiyojayituṃ jigamiṣati—
rākṣasaḥ(upagamyaya)— rājan, ripujayavimukhaṃ yadā te cetaḥ tadā yatra tatra prāṇatyāgaḥ kriyatām | vṛthā tu tatra gamanam, iti |
47. (4.10 virodhanam)
kāryātyayopagamanaṃ virodhanamiti smatam || 273 || (nāśā. 19.88)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ
vāsavadattā— na khu ahaṃ ? attaṇo kāraṇeṇa evvaṃ bhaṇāmi | esā khu mae ṇigghiṇāe iha saṃjadā sāariā vivajjadi | tā parittāadu parittāadu ajjaütto | (na khalvahamātmanaḥ kāraṇenaivaṃ bhaṇāmi | eṣā khalu mayā nirghṛṇayeha saṃyatā sāgarikā vipadyate | tatparitrāyatāṃ paritrāyatāmāryaputraḥ!) iti |
yathā ca veṇīsaṃhāre, (praviś‍ya sambhrāntaḥ),
kañcukī— mahārāja! paritrāyatām! eṣa durātmā kauravāpasadaḥ kṣatajajalā— bhiṣekapāṭalitāmbaraḥ samucchritaraktabhīṣaṇagadāśanirudyatakāladaṇḍa iva antako 'trabhavatīṃ pāñcālatanayāmitastataḥ parimārgamāṇaḥ ita evābhivartate, iti || 274 ||
48. (4.11 ādānam)
bījakāryopagamanamādānamiti saṃjñitam || 275 || (nāśā. 19.89)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ 'sāgarikā vipadyate, tāṃ paritrāyatāṃ rājaputraḥ' iti vāsavadattayokte,
rājā— eṣa gacchāmi |
vasubhūtiḥ—kimayamakāraṇe pataṅgavṛttiḥ kriyate ?
kañcukī— yuktamāha vasubhūtiḥ |
vidūṣakaḥ—(rājānamuttarīye gṛhītvā) bho mā khu mā khu sāhasaṃ karaïssasi | (bhoḥ, mā khalu mā khalu sāhasaṃ kuru!)
rājā— (uttarīyamutsṛjya)—'mūrkha, sāgarikā dahyate | ahaṃ prāṇān bibharmi' ityārabhya sarveṣvag‍nipraveśaṃ nāṭayatsu, rājā—'nanviyamāsannā vartate sāgarikā | tat tvaritamenāṃ sambhāvayāmi' iti yāvat |
yathā ca veṇīsaṃhāre
kañcukī buddhimatikāmāha—kaṣṭam! idānīmayaṃ durātmā yatheṣṭaṃ pravartate | sarvathā 'yaṃ samprati deśakālocitaḥ pratīkāraḥ | citāsamīpaṃ nayāmyatrabhavatīṃ pāñcālarājatanayām | tvamapi bhadre! devyāḥ bhrātaraṃ dhṛṣṭadyum‍naṃ nakulasahadevau sambhāvaya, iti | etadavasthe (mahā)rāje 'stamitayoḥ bhīmārjunayoriyamatra paritrāṇāśā, iti || 276 ||
49. (4.12 chādanam)
apamānakṛtaṃ vākyaṃ kāryārthaṃ chādanaṃ bhavet || 277 || (nāśā. 19.89)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ
sāgarikā— (diśo vilokya, saharṣam) samaṃtado pajjalido bhaavaṃ hudāsaṇo | diṭṭhiā ajja me karaïssidi duḥkhāvasāṇaṃ | (samantataḥ prajvalito bhagavān hutāśanaḥ | diṣṭyā adya me kariṣyati duḥkhāvasānam) iti |
yathā ca veṇīsaṃhāre (nepathye)—'bho bhoḥ samantapañcakasañcariṇaḥ!' ityādyupakramya
ūrū kareṇa parighaṭṭa‍yataḥ salīlaṃ duryodhanasya purato 'pahṛtāmbarā yā |
duśśāsanāgrakarakarṣaṇabhinnamauliḥ sā draupadī kathayata k‍va punaḥ pradeśe || iti |
(vesaṃ. 6.35)
50. (4.13 prarocanā)
prarocanā sā vijñeyā saṃhārārthapradarśinī || 279 || (nāśā. 19.90)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ
rājā—aho āścaryam!
k‍vāsau jvaladdhutavahastadavasthameta— dantaḥpuraṃ kathamavantinṛpātmajeyam |
bābhravya eṣa vasubhūtirayaṃ vayasyaḥ svap‍ne matirbhramati kiṃ tvidamindrajālam || 280 || (rat‍nā. 4.19)
vidūṣakaḥ— bho mā saṃdehaṃ karehi | bhaṇidaṃ khu teṇa dāsīeutteṇa iṃdaālieṇa ekko uṇa khelao avassaṃ deveṇa pekkhidavvo tti | (bhoḥ, mā sandehaṃ kuru | bhaṇitaṃ khalu tena dāsyāḥputreṇa aindrajālikena—ekaḥ punaḥ khelako 'vaś‍yaṃ devena prekṣitavya iti |)
yathā ca veṇīsaṃhāre
kañcukī—(saharṣaṃ) mahārāja, vañ‍cyase | ayaṃ khalvāyuṣmān kumārabhīmasenaḥ suyodhanakṣatajāruṇīkṛtasakalaśarīrambaro durlakṣavyaktiḥ | tadalamadhunā sandehena, iti || 281 ||
(5. nirvahaṇasandhau caturdaśāṅgāni)
atha nirvahaṇāṅgāni caturdaśa | teṣu—
51. (5.1 sandhiḥ)
mukhabījopagamanaṃ sandhirityabhidhīyate || 282 || (nāśā. 19.92)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ caturthe 'ṅke
vasubhūtiḥ ag‍nividravānantaraṃ rat‍nāvalīṃ vilokyāha — bābhravya, sadṛśīyaṃ rājaputryāḥ |
bābhravyaḥ— mamāpyetadeva manasi vartate |
yathā (ca) veṇīsaṃhāre
ceṭī— (draupadīmāliṅgya) ṇivattadu devī imādo maaṇavavasāādo | aaṃ kkhu pūridapaḍiṇṇābhāro ṇāho de veṇīsaṃhāraṃ kāduṃ tuvaṃ evva aṇṇesedi | {(nivartatāṃ devī asmānmaraṇavyavasāyāt | ayaṃ khalu pūritapratijñābhā ro nāthaste veṇīsaṃhāraṃ kartuṃ tvāmevānviṣyati)|} || 283 ||
52. (5.2 nirodhaḥ)
anyasyānveṣaṇaṃ yuk‍tyā nirodha iti kīrtitaḥ || 284 || (nāśā. 19.92)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ caturthe 'ṅke
vasubhūtiḥ— deva, kuta iyaṃ kanyakā?
rājā— devī jānāti |
yathā ca veṇīsaṃhāre
yudhiṣṭhiraḥ— (svairamuktvā bhīmasenamavalokayannaṃse parāmṛś‍ya) jṛyaṃdhara, satyaṃ kathayāmi | nāyamanujavairī | vatsa, bāṣpajalāt‍naritanayanatvānna paś‍yāmi te mukhacandram, iti || 285 ||
53. (5.3 grathanam)
upakṣepastu kāryāṇāṃ grathanaṃ parikīrtitam || 286 || (nāśā. 19.92)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ caturthe 'ṅke,
vāsavadattā— amacca! esā khu sāgarado pāvidetti bhaṇia joandharāaṇeṇa mama hatthe samappidā | ado evva sāaria tti saddāīdi | (amātya! eṣā khalu nāgarataḥ prāp‍teti bhaṇitvā yaugandharāyaṇena mama haste samarpitā | ata eva sāgariketi śabdāyate |)
vasūbhūtiḥ— (janāntikam) bābhravya, yathā vasantakasya kaṇṭhe rat‍namālā, (sāgarikāṃ nirdiś‍ya) yathā cāsyāḥ sāgarāt prāp‍tistathā vyaktameveyaṃ siṃhaleśvaraduhitā rat‍nāvalī, iti |
yathā (ca) veṇīsaṃhāre
bhīmaḥ— deva ajātaśatro! adyāpi duryodhanahatakaḥ! || 287 ||
bhūmau kṣip‍tvā śarīraṃ nihatamidamasṛk‍candanābhaṃ mayāṅge lakṣmīrārye niyuktā caturudadhipayassīmayā sārdhamurvyā |
bhṛtyā mitrāṇi yodhāḥ kurukulamanujairdagdhametad raṇāg‍nau nāmaikaṃ yad bravīṣi kṣitipa tadadhunā dhārtarāṣṭrasya śeṣam || (vesaṃ. 6.39) iti |
54. (5.4 nirṇayaḥ)
anubhūtārthakathanaṃ nirṇayaḥ samudāhṛtaḥ || 289 || (nāśā. 19.93)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ
vasubhūtiḥ—āyuṣmati ayi rat‍nāvali! tvametāmavasthāṃ prāp‍tāsi ?
sāgarikā—(sapratyabhijñam) tumaṃ pi kiṃ amac‍cavasubhūdī? (tvamapi kim amātyavasubhūtiḥ ?)
vasubhūtiḥ—sa evāhaṃ mandabhāgyaḥ |
sāgarikā—sā kkhu ahaṃ maṃdabhāiṇī | (sā khalvahaṃ mandabhāginī |)
vasubhūtiḥ—hā hato 'smi! (iti bhūmau patati|)
sāgarikā—hā tāda, hā (hā, tāta! hā,)
(vāsavadattā)—kiculaā kiṃ esā me bahiṇiā raaṇāvalī | (kañcukin, kimeṣā me bhaginikā rat‍nāvalī!)
kañcukī—devi, evam |
vāsavadattā— rat‍nāvali! samassudu me bahiṇiā | (rat‍nāvali! samāśvasitu me bhaginikā |)
rājā— kathamuṣṇāṃśurājavaṃśaprasūtasya siṃhaleśvarasya vikramabāhorātmajeyam |
vidūṣakaḥ— (ātmagatam) ṣaḍamaṃ evva mae jāṇidaṃ (rat‍namālāṃ parāmṛś‍ya) ṇa hu īdiso sāmaṇṇajaṇasya vihavo hodi tti | (prathamameva mayā jñātam, na khalu īdṛśaḥ sāmānyajanasya vibhavo bhavatīti |)
yathā ca veṇīsaṃhāre
yudhiṣṭhiraḥ— vatsa, anavarataṃ kathaya kac‍cijjīvati . . . ?
bhīmasenaḥ— nihatasakalaripupakṣe tvayi narādhipe jīvati bhīmo 'rjunaśca |
yudhiṣṭhiraḥ— punargāḍhamāliṅgya tāta! || 290 ||
riporāstāṃ tāvannidhanamidamākhyāhi śataśaḥ priyo bhrātā bhīma tvamasi mama yo 'sau balaripuḥ |
jarāsandhasyorassarasi rudhirāgādhasalile taṭāghātakrīḍālalitamakarot saṃyati bhavān || 291 || (vesaṃ. 6.40)
55. (5.5 paribhāṣaṇam)
parivādakṛtaṃ yat syāt tadāhuḥ paribhāṣaṇam || 292 || (nāśā. 19.93)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ caturthe 'ṅke
vasubhūtiḥ— āyuṣmati, samāśvasihi | nanviyaṃ jyāyasī te bhaginī duḥkhamāste | tat pariṣvajasvainām |
rat‍nāvalī— {(samāśvasya, rājānaṃ taṃ nirīkṣamāṇā, svagatam) kiāvarāhā khu ahaṃ devīe | ṇa sakkuṇomi se muhaṃ daṃsiduṃ | (kṛtāparādhā khalvahaṃ devyāḥ | na śak‍nomi tasyāḥ mukhaṃ darśayitum |} iti |
yathā ca veṇīsaṃhāre
bhīmaḥ—muñcatu māmāryaḥ kṣaṇamekam |
yudhiṣṭhiraḥ— kimaparamavaśiṣṭam?
bhīmaḥ— sumahadavaśiṣṭam | saṃyamayāmi tāvadanane duśśāsanaduryodhanaśoṇitokṣitena pāṇinā pāñcālyā duśśāsanasamākṛṣṭaṃ keśahastam, iti || 293 ||
56. (5.6 dyutiḥ)
1īrṣyākopapraśamanaṃ dyutimācakṣate budhāḥ || 294 || (nāśā. 19.94)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ caturthe 'ṅke,
vāsavadattā— (vasubhūtimapavārya), ayyaütta, lajjāmi kkhu ahaṃ imiṇā ṇisaṃsattaṇeṇa | tā avaṇehi se baṃdhaṇaṃ | (āryaputra, lajje khalvahamanena nṛśaṃsatvena | tadapanayāsyā bandhanam |)
rājā— (saparitoṣam) yathāha devī | (iti mocayati |)
vāsavadattā—(vasubhūtimuddiś‍ya) ayya, joandharāaṇeṇa attiaṃ kālaṃ dujjaṇīkida hmi | jeṇa me jāṇia ṇācakkhidaṃ | (ārya, yaugandharāyaṇenaitāvantaṃ kālaṃ durjanīkṛtāsmi | yena me jñātvā nākhyātam |)
1. labdhasyārthasya śama. nāśā. 19.94
yathā ca veṇīsaṃhāre
bhīmaḥ—rājaputri, alaṃ māmālokya trāsena || 295 ||
kṛṣṭā yenāsi rājñāṃ sadasi nṛpaśunā tena duḥśāsanena styānānyetāni tasya spṛśa mama karayoḥ pītaśeṣāṇyasṛñji |
kānte rājñaḥ kurūṇāmapi sarasamidaṃ madgadācūrṇitoro— raṅge 'ṅge 'sṛṅ‍‌niṣaktaṃ tava paribhavajasyānalasyāstu śāntyai || (vesaṃ. 6.41)
57. (5.7 prasādaḥ)
śuśrūṣādyupasampannaḥ prasāda iti kīrtitaḥ || 297 || (nāśā. 19.95)
yathā rat‍nāvalyām—
vāsavadattā— iaï(?) ehi ettiaṃ vi dāva me bahiṇīttaṇassa aṇurūvaṃ hodu | (ehi, etāvadapi tāvanme bhaginītvasya anurūpaṃ bhavatu |) (ityuktvā rat‍nāvalīṃ svairamābharaṇairalaṅakṛtya haste gṛhītvā rājānamupasṛtya), ayyaütta edaṃ | (āryaputraṃ . . enām |)iti |
yathā ca veṇīsaṃhāre—
bhīmaḥ— (veṇīṃ badh‍nan), bhavati, saṃyamyatāmidānīṃ kṣattriyakālarātriḥ kurupativighaṭitā veṇī |
draupadī— ṇāha! visumarida hmi edaṃ vāvāram | tā ṇāhassa ppasādeṇa puṇo vi sikkhissaṃ | (nātha, vismṛtāsmyetaṃ vyāpāram | tan‍nāthasya prasādena punarapi śikṣiṣye |) iti || 298 ||
58. (5.8 ānandaḥ)
samāgamastathārthānāmānandaḥ parikīrtitaḥ || 299 || (nāśā. 19.94)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ caturthe 'ṅke,
rājā—(hastau prasārya) ko devyāḥ prasādaṃ na bahumanyate ? iti |
yathā (ca) veṇīsaṃhāre ṣaṣṭhe 'ṅke, nepathye, samarānalaśeṣāya svasti tatrabhavato rājñaḥ
krodhāndhairyasya mokṣāt kṣatanarapatibhiḥ pāṇḍuputraiḥ kṛtābhi(ni) pratyāśaṃ muktakeśānyanudinamadhunā pārthivāntaḥpurāṇi |
kṛṣṇāyāḥ keśapāśaḥ kupitayamasakho dhūmaketuḥ kurūṇāṃ diṣṭyā baddhaḥ prajābhyo viramatu nidhanaṃ svasti rājñāṃ kulebhyaḥ || 300 ||
59. (5.9 samayaḥ)
duḥkhasyopaśamaścaiva samayo 'tha nigadyate || 301 || (nāśā. 19.101)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ
vāsavadattā— ayyaütta, dūre kkhu edāe ṇṇādiulam | tāni taha karedu jaha esā bandhujaṇaṃ ṇa sumaredi | (āryaputra, dūre khalvetasyā jñātikulam | tattathā kuru yathā eṣā bandhujanaṃ na smarati |)
rājā— yathāha devī | iti |
yathā ca veṇīsaṃhāre—
yudhiṣṭhiraḥ—bhagavān puṇḍarīkākṣaḥ vatsaḥ kirīṭī ca | bhagavan! kutastasya vijayādanyat, yasya bhagavān puruṣaḥ svayameva nārāyaṇo maṅgalānyāśāste ? || 302 || (vesaṃ. 6.43)
kṛtagurumahadādikṣobhasambhūtamūrtiṃ guṇinamudayanāśasthānaṃhetuṃ prajānām |
ajamamaramacintyaṃ cintayitvāpi na tvāṃ bhavati jagati duḥkhaṃ, kiṃ punardeva dṛṣṭvā || 303 || iti |
60. (5.10 upagūhanam)
adbhūtasya ca saṃprāp‍tirbhavet tadupagūhanam || 304 || (nāśā. 19.96)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ
vidūṣakaḥ— hī hī bhoḥ, hatthagada evva saṃpadaṃ vaassassa | (hastagata eva sāṃprataṃ vayasyasya)
sumati (vasubhūtiḥ) . . . .
yathā ca veṇīsaṃhāre (kṛṣṇaḥ)— ete khalu bhagavanto vyāsavālmīkijāmadagnya— jābāliprabhṛtayo maharṣayaḥ kalpitāśeṣamaṅgalāḥ nakulasahadevau dhṛṣṭadyum‍napramukhāśca senāpatayaḥ yādavamatsyamāgadhapāla kulasambhavāśca rājanyakumārāḥ stambhottambhitatīrthavārikalaśāḥ tathā(?) abhiṣekaṃ dhārayantaḥ tiṣṭhanti || 305 || . . .
cāsmākaṃcārvākanām‍nā rākṣasena viprakṛtaṃ bhavantamupalabhya bhagavato vyāsād arjunena saha tvaritamāgata iti |
61. (5.11 bhāṣaṇam)
sāmadānādisampannaṃ bhāṣaṇaṃ bruvate budhāḥ || 306 || (nāśā. 19.96)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ
vasubhūtiḥ—devi, sthāne devīśabdamudvahasi |
yathā ca veṇīsaṃhāre
bhīmaḥ— k‍vāsau dhārtarāṣṭrasakhaḥ puṇyajanāpasado yenāryasya mahān ayaṃ cittavibhramaḥ kṛtaḥ?
kṛṣṇaḥ— nigṛhītaḥ sa durātmā nakulena, iti |
62. (5.12 ākṣepaḥ)
punarvākyaṃ tu vijñeyaṃ yathoktakṣepadarśanam || 307 || (nāśā. 19.97)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ
bābhravyaḥ—devi, idānīṃ saphalapariśramo 'smi saṃvṛtta iti |
yathā ca veṇīsaṃhāre
yudhiṣṭhiraḥ—bhagavan, kiṃ nāma cārvākeṇa rakṣasā vayaṃ vipralabdhāḥ?
kṛṣṇaḥ—atha kim | iti || 308 ||
63. (5.13 kāvyasaṃhāraḥ)
varapradānasamprāp‍tiḥ kāvyasaṃhāra iṣyate || 309 || (nāśā. 19.97)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ
yaugandharāyaṇaḥ—deva, taducyatāṃ kiṃ te bhūyaḥ priyamupakaromi ?
rājā—ataḥparamapi priyamasti ?
yāto vikramabāhurātmasamatāṃ prāpteyamurvītale sāraṃ sāgarikā sasāgaramahīprāp‍tyekahetuḥ priyā |
devī prītimupāgatā ca bhaginīlābhājjitāḥ kosalāḥ kiṃ nāsti tvayi satyamātyavṛṣabhe yasmin karomi spṛhām || 310 || iti |
(rat‍nā. 4.21)
yathā ca veṇīsaṃhāre
kṛṣṇaḥ—tatkathaya mahārāja, kimasmattaḥ priyamicchasi ?
yudhiṣṭhiraḥ—kimataḥ paramapi priyamasti ?
krodhāndhaiḥ sakalaṃ hataṃ ripukulaṃ pañcākṣatāḥ pāṇḍavāḥ pāñcālyā mama durnaye patitayā tīrṇo nikārārṇavaḥ |
tvaṃ devaḥ puruṣottamaḥ sukṛtinaṃ māmādṛto bhāṣase (vesaṃ. 6.45) kiṃ nāmānyadataḥ paraṃ bhagavato yāce prasannādaham || 311 || iti |
64. (5.14 praśastiḥ)
nṛpadevādiśākti(śasti)śca praśastirabhidhīyate || 312 || (nāśā. 19.98)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ
rājā—tathapīdamastu—(rat‍nā. 4.22)
urvīmuddāmasasyāṃ janayatu visṛjan vāsavo vṛṣṭimiṣṭā— miṣṭaistraviṣṭapānāṃ vidadhatu vidhivat prīṇanaṃ vipramukhyāḥ |
ākalpāntaṃ kṛṣīṣṭa kramasamupacitaṃ saṅgataṃ sajjanānāṃ nirviśleṣāvakāśaṃ piśunajanavacovarjanāvajralepāḥ(?) || 313 ||
yathā (ca) veṇīsaṃhāre
yudhiṣṭhiraḥ—prītaścedbhagavāṃstadidamastu—(vesaṃ. 6.46)
akṛpaṇamaruk kāntaṃ jīvyājjanaḥ puruṣāyuṣaṃ bhavatu bhagavan bhaktirdvaidhaṃ vinā puruṣottame |
kalitabhuvano vidvad‍bandhurguṇeṣu viśeṣavit satatasukṛtī bhūyād bhūpaḥ prasādhitamaṇḍalaḥ || 314 ||
(4. caturthī catuṣṣaṣṭiḥ)
(lakṣaṇāni)
lakṣaṇāni catuṣṣaṣṭiriti yat prāgudīritam |
nāṭakādessphuṭaṃ lakṣma tadidānīṃ vivicyate || 315 ||
bhūṣaṇākṣarasaṅghātau śobhodāharaṇe tathā |
hetusaṃśayadṛṣṭāntāḥ prāp‍tirāśaya eva ca || 316 ||
nidarśanaṃ niruktaṃ ca siddhiścāpi viśeṣaṇam |
guṇātipāto 'tiśayastulyatarkaḥ padocyayaḥ || 317 ||
diṣṭaṃ caivopadiṣṭaṃ ca vicāro 'tha viparyayaḥ |
bhraṃśaścaivānunītiśca mālā dākṣiṇyagarhaṇe || 318 ||
arthāpattiḥ prasiddhiśca pṛcchā sārūpyameva ca |
manorathaśca leśaśca saṃkṣobho guṇakīrtanam ||
ākhyānamabhimānaśca yāñcā protsāhanaṃ spṛhā || 319 ||
paścāttāpo 'nuvṛttiśca yuktirnirbhāsanaṃ kṣamā |
guṇānuvāda ākrandaḥ kapaṭaṃ parivādanam || 320 ||
upapattiśca kāryaṃ ca pratiṣedho mṛṣodyamaḥ |
chaloktiḥ kākurunmādaḥ/thaḥ parihāso vikatthanam || 321 ||
yadṛcchāyogavaiṣamyapratijñānapravṛttayaḥ |
āśīranuktasiddhiśca priyaṃ vacanameva ca ||1
lakṣaṇāni catuṣṣaṣṭiṃ kāvyeṣvetāni nirdiśet || 322 ||
tatra ca—
(1. bhūṣaṇam)
alaṅkārairguṇaścaiva bahubhiryadalaṅkṛtam |
bhūṣaṇairiva vinyastaistad bhūṣaṇamiti smṛtam || 323 || (nāśā. 16.5)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ prathame 'ṅke yaugandharāyaṇaḥ—
viśrāntavigrahakatho ratimān janasya citte vasan priyavasantaka eṣa sākṣāt |
paryutsuko nijamahotsavadarśanāya vatseśvaraḥ kusumacāpa ivābhyupaiti || 324 || (rat‍nā. 1.8)
atra śleṣopamāpratyakṣādibhiralaṅkāraiḥ śleṣaprasādasaukumāryādibhiśca guṇairupetatā draṣṭavyā | evaṃ vakṣyamāṇeṣvapi guṇālaṅkārā yathāsambhavamūhanīyāḥ, kāraiśca niyamenārabhyante; sandhyaṅgeṣu tu guṇālaṅkārayogo nāpekṣyata iti |
1. 'āśīruk‍tiś‍ca siddhiś‍ca' iti rāghavaḥ | siddhiriti punaruk‍tam 12.317kārikāyāṃ paṭhitacaratvāt, anuk‍tasiddheḥ tyāgācca rā.pāṭho 'mānyaḥ | 12.457
(2. akṣarasaṅghātaḥ)
yatrārthairakṣaraiḥ śliṣṭairvicitrārthopavarṇanam |
tamatrākṣarasaṅghātaṃ vidyāllakṣaṇasaṃjñitam || 325 || (nāśā. 6.6)
yathā abhijñānaśākuntale sap‍tame 'ṅke,
(praviśya mṛnmayūrahastā tāpasī)— savvadamaṇa! saüṃdalāvaṇṇaṃ pekkha | (sarvadamana, śakuntalāvaṇyaṃ prekṣasva |)
bālaḥ—(sadṛṣṭikṣepam), kahiṃ sā ajjū | (kutra sā ambā?)
(ubhe prahasite) (ubhe) ṇāmasāriccheṇa chaḷido māuvacchalo |
(nāmasādṛśyena chalito mātṛvatsalaḥ |)
(dvitīyā) vaccha imassa mittiāmoraassa rammattaṇaṃ pekkha tti bhaṇiso | (vatsa! asya mṛttikāmayūrasya ramyatvaṃ paśyeti bhaṇito 'si |)
rājā—(ātmagatam), kiṃ śakuntaleti tasya māturākhyā? || 326 ||
(3. śobhā)
siddhairarthaissamaṃ kṛtvā yatrāsiddhaṃ prasādhyate |
śliṣṭā ślakṣṇā vicitrārthā sā śobhetyabhidhīyate || 327 || (nāśā. 1.6)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ prathame 'ṅke,
yaugandharāyaṇaḥ—evametat, kaḥ sandehaḥ?
dvīpādanyasmādapi madhyādapi jalanidherdiśo 'pyantāt |
ānīya jhaṭiti ghaṭayati vidhirabhimatamabhimukhībhūtaḥ || 328 ||(rat‍nā. 16.7)
anyathā k‍va siddhādeśapratyayaprārthitāyāḥ siṃhaleśvaraduhituḥ samudre pravahaṇabhaṅgamag‍notthitāyāḥ phalakāsādanaṃ, k‍va ca kauśāmbenaiva vaṇijā siṃhalebhyaḥ pratyāgacchatā tadavasthāyāḥ sambhāvanaṃ sarat‍namālācihnāyāśca parijñāyehānayanam? sarvathā spṛśanti svāminamabhyudayāḥ, iti |
(4. udāharaṇam)
yatra tulyārthayuktena vākyenābhipradarśanāt |
sādhyante nipuṇairarthāstadudāharaṇaṃ smṛtam || 329 || (nāśā. 16.11)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ, dvitīye 'ṅke, rājā vidūṣakaśca śārikāvacanaṃ niśamayataḥ | tato vidūṣakaḥ— (ākāśe) kiṃ . . . . . ayaṃ kāmadevo ālihido maha vi tādisī raï tti | bho vaassa, kiṃ ṇedaṃ | {kim (akāraṇe kupyasi | yādṛśastvayā) ayaṃ kāmadeva ālikhito tādṛśī mayā 'pi ratiriti | bho vayasya, kiṃ nvidam?}
rājā—vayasya, evaṃ tarkayāmi | kayāpi hṛdayavallabho 'nurāgādabhilikhya kāmavyapadeśena nihnutastatsakhyāpi pratyakṣijñāya vaidagdhyādapratibhindānayā sāpi tatraiva likhitā, iti || 330 ||
(5. hetuḥ)
yatprayojanasāmarthyād vākyamiṣṭārthasādhakam |
samāsoktamanogrāhi sa heturiti saṃjñitaḥ || 331 || (nāśā.16.14a)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ, dvitīye 'ṅke
vidūṣakaḥ— saccaṃ sabāmi bamhasutteṇa, jaï amhehiṃ īdisī kadā vi purā (diṭhṭhapuvvā) | (satyaṃ śape brahmasūtreṇa, yadi asmābhirīdṛśī kadāpi dṛṣṭapūrvā |)
kāñcanamālā—bhaṭṭiṇi, ghuṇakkhadaṃ vi saṃvadadi evva | (bhaṭṭini, ghuṇākṣaramapi saṃvadatyeva)
vāsavadattā—ayi ujjie, ayyavasantao eso | ṇa āṇāsi edassa vak‍kabhaṇidīo | (ayi ṛjuke, ārya vasantaka eṣaḥ | na jānāsi etasya vakrabhaṇitīḥ |) || 332 ||
(6. saṃśayaḥ)
aparijñātatattvārthaṃ yatra vākyaṃ samāpyate |
so 'nekatvād vicārāṇāṃ saṃśayaḥ parikīrtitaḥ || 333 || (nāśā.16.27)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ caturthe 'ṅke
vasubhūti:— (sāgarikāṃ nirvarṇya) bābhravya! susadṛśīyaṃ rājaputryāḥ |
bābhravya:—mamāpyetadeva manasi vartate |
(7. dṛṣṭāntaḥ)
sarvalokamanogrāhī yastu pakṣārthasādhakaḥ |
hetornidarśanakṛtassa dṛṣṭānta iti smṛtaḥ || 334 || (nāśā.16.12a)
yathā(ca) veṇīsaṃhāre prathame 'ṅke,
ceṭī—aï jaṇṇaseṇi! u (?) paṃca gāmā patthīanti tti ajja vi ede kesā ṇa saṃjamīaṃti, iti | (ayi yājñaseni! pañca grāmāḥ prārthyanta iti adyāpi ete keśā na saṃyamyante |) (iti bhānumatīvacasi buddhimatikayā ' 'khyāte)
bhīmasenaḥ—sahadeva, śrutam?
sahadevaḥ— ārya, duryodhanakalatraṃ sā |
strīṇāṃ hi sāhacaryād bhavanti cetāṃsi bhartṛsadṛśāni |
madhurā 'pi hi mūrcchayate viṣaviṭapisamāśritā vallī || (vesaṃ. 1.20) iti |
(8. prāp‍tiḥ)
dṛṣṭvaivāvayavān kāṃścid bhāvo yatrānumīyate |
prāp‍tiṃ tāmabhijānīyāllakṣaṇaṃ nāṭakāśrayam || 336 || (nāśā. 16.32)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ dvitīye 'ṅke, kadalīgṛhe citragatāṃ sāgarikāṃ nirvarṇayati rājani— vidūṣakaḥ—bho vaassa, kīsa uṇa esā oruṇṇamuhī ālihidā | (bho vayasya, kasmāt punareṣā ruditamukhyālikhitā?)
(etacch‌rutvā ' 'ha susaṅgatā) sahi, jaha ayyavasaṃtio maṃtehi taha takkemi bhaṭṭiṇā vi iha evva hodavvaṃ ti | (sakhi, yathā āryavasantako mantrayate tathā tarkayāmi bhartrāpīhaiva bhavitavyam, iti)
(9. abhiprāyaḥ)
abhūtapūrvo 'pyartho yassādṛśyāt parikalpitaḥ |
lokasya hṛdayagrāhī so 'bhiprāya iti smṛtaḥ || 337 || (nāśā.16.14a)
yathā mudrāvede(viddhasālabhañjikāyāṃ dvitīye 'ṅke)—
vilīyenduḥ sākṣādamṛtarasavāpī yadi bhavet kalaṅkastatratyo yadi ca vikacendīvaravanam |
tatass‍nānakrīḍājanitajaḍabhāvairavayavaiḥ kadācinmuñceyaṃ madanaśikhipīḍāparibhavam || 338 || (visā. 2.2)
(10. nidarśanam)
yatrārthānāṃ prasiddhānāṃ kriyate parikīrtanam |
parāpekṣāvyudāsārthaṃ tannidarśanamucyate || 339 || (nāśā.16.15a)
yathā mālatīmādhave
kāmandakī—ayi sarale, kimatra śakyaṃ bhagavatyā? prabhavati hi prāyaḥ kumārikāṇāṃ janayitā daivaṃ ca | yacca kila kauśikī śakuntalā duṣyantam, urvaśī cāpsarāḥ purūravasamailakaṃ cakama ityākhyānavida ācakṣate, tadapi sāhasakalpamityanupadeṣṭavyam, iti || 340 ||
(11. niruktam)
niravadyasya vākyasya pūrvoktārthaprasiddhaye |
yaducyate tu vacanaṃ niruktaṃ tadudāhṛtam || 341 || (nāśā.16.16a)
yathā abhijñānaśakuntalāyām
priyaṃvadā—halā saüṃdale, idha evva dāva muhuttaaṃ ciṭṭha | tue samīpaṭṭhidāe ḷadāsaṇāho via aaṃ kesararukkhao paḍibhāi | (sakhi śakuntale, atraiva tāvanmuhūrtakaṃ tiṣṭha | tvayā samīpasthitayā latāsanātha iva ayaṃ kesaravṛkṣaḥ pratibhāti |)
śakuntalā—adā khu si piaṃvadā | (ataḥ khalvasi priyaṃvadā |)
rājā—priyamapi tathyamāha sā || 342 ||
adharaḥ kisalayarāgaḥ komalaviṭapānukāriṇai bāhū |
kusumamiva lobhanīyaṃ yauvanamaṅgeṣu sannaddham || 343 ||(śāku. 1.21)
(12. siddhiḥ)
bahūnāṃ tu pradhānānāṃ nāma yatrābhikīrtyate |
abhipretārthasiddha‍yarthaṃ sā siddhiriti kīrtitā || 344 || (nāśā. 16.17a)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ caturthe 'ṅke, rājā—
k‍vāsau jalaṃ hutavahaḥ + + kiṃ nvidamindrajālam || 345 ||
(13. viśeṣaṇam)
siddhān bahūn pradhānārthān uktvā yatra prayujyate |
viśeṣayuktaṃ vacanaṃ vijñeyaṃ tadviśeṣaṇam || 346 ||(nāśā.16.18a)
yathā abhijñānaśākuntale—
prāṇānāmanilena vṛttirucitā saṅkalpavṛkṣe vane toye kāñcanapadmareṇukapiśe puṇyābhiṣekakriyā |
dhyānaṃ rat‍naśilātaleṣu vibudhastrīsannidhau saṃyamo yad vāñchanti tapobhiranyamunayastasmiṃstapasyantyamī || 347 ||(śāku.7.12)
(14. guṇātipātaḥ)
guṇābhidhānairvividhairviparītārthayojitaiḥ |
guṇātipāto madhurairniṣṭhurārthairbhavedatha || 348 || (nāśa. 16.19a)
yathā uttaracarite
lavaḥ rāmamuddiśya (urāca. 5.34)
vandyāste na vicāraṇīyacaritāstiṣṭhantu huṃ vartate sundastrīdamane 'pyakuṇṭhayaśaso loke mahānto hi te |
yāni trīṇyakutomukhānyapi padānyāsan kharāyodhane yadvā kauśalamindrasūnunidhane tatrāpyabhijño janaḥ || 349 ||
(15. atiśayaḥ)
bahūn guṇān kīrtayitvā sāmānyajanasambhavān |
viśeṣaḥ kīrtyate yastu jñeyasso 'tiśayo budhaiḥ || 350 ||(nāśā. 16.20a)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ dvitīye 'ṅke
rājā citralikhitāṃ sāgarikāṃ dṛṣṭvā ' 'ha—
vidhāyāpūrvapūrṇendumasyā mukhamabhūd dhruvam |
dhātā nijāsanāmbhojavinimīlanadussthitaḥ || 351 || (rat‍nā. 2.8)
(16. tulyatarkaḥ)
rūpakairupamābhirvā tulyārthābhiḥ prayojitaḥ |
apratyakṣārthasaṃsparśastulyatarkaḥ prakīrtitaḥ || 352 || (nāśā. 16.21a)
yathā uttaracarite rāmaḥ—
api janakasutāyāstac‍ca tac‍cānurūpaṃ sphuṭamiva śiśuyugme naipuṇonneyamasti |
nanu punariva tanme gocarībhūtamakṣṇo— rabhinavaśatapatraśrīmadāsyaṃ priyāyāḥ || 353 ||(urāca. 6.26)
(17. padoc‍cayaḥ)
bahūnāṃ tu prayuktānāṃ padānāṃ bahubhiḥ padaiḥ |
uc‍cayassadṛśārtho yassa vijñeyaḥ padoc‍cayaḥ || 354 || (nāśā. 16.22a)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ prathame 'ṅke
rājā vāsavadattāṃ pratyāha—(rat‍nā.1.19)
kusumasukumāramūrtirdadhatī niyamena tanutaraṃ madhyam |
ābhāti makaraketoḥ pārśvasthā cāpayaṣṭiriva || 355 ||
(18. diṣṭaṃ varṇakaḥ) (nāśā. 16.23a)
yathādeśaṃ yathākālaṃ yathāpātraṃ ca varṇyate |
yatpratyakṣaṃ parokṣaṃ vā diṣṭaṃ tadvarṇako 'pi vā || 356 ||
yathā rāghavānande—
aṅke nyasyottamāṅgaṃ plavagabalapateḥ pādamakṣasya hantuḥ kṛtvotsaṅge salīlaṃ tvayi/ci kanakamṛgasyāṅgaśeṣaṃ nidhāya |
bāṇaṃ rakṣaḥkulagh‍naṃ praguṇitamanujenādarāt tīkṣṇamakṣṇaḥ koṇenāvekṣamāṇastvadanujavacane dattakarṇo 'yamāste || 357 ||
(19. upadiṣṭam) (nāśā. 16.24a)
parigṛhya tu śāstrārthaṃ yadvākyamabhidhīyate |
vidvanmanoharaṃ svantamupadiṣṭaṃ prakīrtyate || 358 ||
yathā abhijñānaśākuntale—(śāku. 4.18)
śuśrūṣasva gurūn, kuru priyasakhīvṛttiṃ sapat‍nījane bharturviprakṛtā 'pi roṣaṇatayā mā sma pratīpaṃ gamaḥ |
bhūyiṣṭhaṃ bhava dakṣiṇā parijane, bhāgyeṣvanutsekinī yāntyevaṃ gṛhiṇīpadaṃ yuvatayo vāmāḥ kulasyādhayaḥ || 359 ||
(20. vicāraḥ) (nāśā. 16.25a)
pūrvāśayasamānārthairapratyakṣārthasādhanaiḥ |
anekopāyasaṃyukto vicāraḥ parikīrtitaḥ || 360 ||
yathā uttaracarite lavacandraketū parasparaṃ sas‍nehānurāgaṃ nirvarṇya,
yadṛcchāsaṃvādaḥ kimu guṇagaṇānāmatiśayaḥ purāṇo vā janmāntaranibiḍabaddhaḥ paricayaḥ |
nijo vā sambandhaḥ kimu vidhivaśāt kopyavidito mamaitasmin dṛṣṭe hṛdayamavadhānaṃ racayati || 361 ||
(urāca. 5.16)
(21. viparyayaḥ) (nāśā. 16.26 a)
vicārasyānyathābhāvastathā diṣṭopagiṣṭayoḥ |
sandehājjāyate yatra sa vijñeyo viparyayaḥ || 362 ||
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ tṛtīye 'ṅke,
vāsavadattā—haḷā kaṃcaṇamāle, sac‍caṃ evva mama vesaṃ karia sāariā ayyaüttaṃ ahisāraïssidi | (halā kāñcanamāle ! satyameva mama veṣaṃ kṛtvā sāgarikā āryaputraṃ abhisariṣyati |)
kāñcanamālā—kadhaṃ aṇṇathā bhaṭṭiṇīe ṇivediāṇi | ahavā cittasālāduvārammi uvaviṭṭo vasaṃtao evva de pac‍caaṃ uppādaïssadi | kathamanyathā
bhaṭṭinyai nivedayāni ? athavā citraśālādvāre upaviṣṭo vasantaka eva te pratyayamutpādayiṣyati |
(tataḥ praviśati kṛtāvakuṇṭhano vasantakaḥ |)
vasantakaḥ—(karṇaṃ dattvā) jahā cittasālāā duvāre paasaddo via suṇīadi tahā takkemi āadā sāariā tti | (yathā citraśālāyā dvāre padaśabda iva śrūyate tathā tarkayāmyāgatā sāgariketi |)
kāñcanamālā—bhaṭṭiṇī, eaṃ cittaśāliāduvāraṃ | tā jāva vasaṃtaassa saṇṇaṃ karemi | (bhaṭṭini etat citraśālikādvāram | tadyāvadvasantakasya saṃjñāṃ karomi |) (iti choṭikāṃ dadāti |)
vidūṣakaḥ—(upasṛtya, apavārya), susaṅgade ! susariso khu de kido kaṃcaṇamālāe veso sāariā evva vāsavadatte tti | (susadṛśaḥ khalu tvayā kṛtaḥ kāñcanamālāyā veṣaḥ sāgarikā eva vāsavadatteti |)
yathā cātraivāgrataḥ—
vidūṣakaḥ—(sasambhramaṃ, dṛṣṭvā) bho vaassa, parittāahi | esā khu devī vāsavadattā | attāṇaṃ ubbaddhīa vivajjaï | (bho vayasya, paritrāyasva | eṣā khalu devī vāsavadattā ātmānamudvadhya vyāpādayati |)
rājā—(sasambhramamupasṛtya) vayasya, k‍vāsau ?
vidūṣakaḥ—bho esā | (bho eṣā |)
rājā—(upasṛtya, kaṇṭhāt pāśamapanayan) ayi, kimidamakāryaṃ kriyate ?|| 363 ||
mama kaṇṭhagatāḥ prāṇāḥ pāśe kaṇṭhagate tava |
anarthārthaprayāso 'yaṃ tyajyatāṃ sāhasaṃ priye || 364 || (rat‍nā. 3.16)
(22. bhraṃśa) (nāśā. 16.27 a)
vācyamarthaṃ parityajya dṛṣṭādibhiranekadhā |
anyasminneva patanādāśu bhraṃśassa ucyate || 365 ||
yathā— veṇīsaṃhāre dvitīye 'ṅke, duryodhanaḥ—(vesaṃ. 2.5)
sahabhṛtyagaṇaṃ sabāndhavaṃ sahamitraṃ sasutaṃ sahānujam |
sabalena nihanti saṃyuge nacirāt pāṇḍusutassuyodhanam || 366 ||
kañcukī—(karṇau pidhāya) śāntaṃ pāpaṃ śāntaṃ pāpam !
rājā—kañcukin ! kiṃ vā mayoktam ?
kañcukī—(duryodhanoktaṃ paṭhitvā) tadetadviparītamabhihitaṃ devena |
rājā—kañcukin, prātarmāmanābhāṣyaiva bhānumatī vyākṣip‍taṃ me ceta iti |
(23. anunayaḥ) (nāśā. 16.28a)
ubhayoḥ prītijanano viruddhābhiniveśayoḥ |
arthasya sādhakaścaiva vijñeyo 'nunayo budhaiḥ || 367 ||
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ tṛtīyo 'ṅke
rājā sāgarikāvṛttāntāparādhe vāsavadattāyāḥ puro baddhāñjalistāmanunayannāha— priye vāsavadatte devi, evamapi pratyakṣadṛṣṭavyalīkaḥ kiṃ vijñāpayāmi ?
ātāmratāmapanayāmi vilakṣa eṣa lākṣākṛtāṃ caraṇayostava devi mūrdh‍nā |
kopoparāgajanitāṃ tu mukhendubimbe hartuṃ kṣamo yadiparaṃ karuṇā mayi syāt || 368 || (rat‍nā. 3.14)
(24. mālā)
abhipretārthasiddha‍yarthaṃ kīrtyate yatra sūribhiḥ |
prayojanānyanekāni sā māletyabhisaṃjñitā || 369 || (nāśā. 16.29a)
yathā mālatīmādhave—
makarando mālatīmuddiśya kāmandakīṃ prati—bhagavatī,
ślāghyānvayeti nayanotsavakāriṇīti nirvyūḍhasauhṛdaguṇeti guṇojjvaleti |
ekaikameva hi vaśīkaraṇaṃ garīyo yuṣmākamevamiyamityatha kiṃ bravīmi || 370 || (māmā. 6.27)
(25. dākṣiṇyam)
hṛṣṭaiḥ prasannavadanairyatparasyānunuvartanam |
kriyate vākyaceṣṭābhistad dākṣiṇyamudāhṛtam || 371 || (nāśā. 16.30a)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ dvitīye 'ṅke,
vāsavadattā—ayyaütta, mama pi kiṃ edaṃ cittakamma pekkhantīe sīsaveaṇā samuppaṇṇā | tā gamissaṃ ahaṃ | {ārya(putra), mamāpi kiṃ etat citrakarma prekṣamāṇāyāḥ śīrṣavedanā samutpannā | tad‍gamiṣyāmyaham |}
rājā—(vāsavadattāṃ paṭānte gṛhītvā) priye !
prasīdeti brūyāmidamasati kope na ghaṭate kariṣyāmyevaṃ no punariti bhavedabhyupagamaḥ |
na me doṣo 'stīti tvamidamapi vijñāsyasi mṛṣā kimetasmin vak‍tuṃ kṣamamiti na vedmi priyatame || 372 || (rat‍nā. 2.18)
vidūṣakaḥ— bhodi pasīeu | (bhavati, prasīda |)
vāsavadattā— sahāpehi sac‍caṃ evva me sīsaveaṇā samuppaṇṇā | tā gamissaṃ | {sambhāvaya satyameva me śīrṣavedanā samutpannā | tadgamiṣye |} (iti niṣkrāntā saparivārā vāsavadattā |)
vidūṣakaḥ—bho diṭhṭhiā vạdh‍ḍhasi, (bhoḥ, diṣṭyā vardhase |)
rājā— mūrkha, alaṃ parihāsena | ābhijātyād vinigụ̄dho na lakṣitastvayā kopo devyāḥ || 373 ||
bhrūbhede sahasodgate 'pi vadanaṃ nītaṃ parāṃ namratā— mīṣanmāṃ prati bhedakāri hasitaṃ noktaṃ vaco niṣṭhuram |
antarbāṣpajaḍīkṛtaṃ prabhutayā cakṣurna visphāritaṃ kopaśca prakaṭīkṛto dayitayā muktaśca na praśrayaḥ || (rat‍nā 2.19)
(26. garhaṇam)
yatra saṅkīrtayed doṣaṃ guṇamarthena darśayet |
guṇātipātād doṣād‍na vā garhaṇaṃ nāma tadbhaveta || 375 || (nāśā. 16.31a)
yathā uttaracarite
candraketuḥ sainikairabhiyujyamānaṃ lavamuddiśya, bho bho rājānaḥ !
saṃkhyātītairdviradaturagasyandanasthaiḥ padātā— vatraikasmin kavacanibiḍairnaddhacarmottarīye |
kālajyeṣṭhairaparavayasi kīrttikāmairbhavadbhi— ryo 'yaṃ baddho yudhi samabharastena dhig vo dhigasmān || 376 || (urāca. 5.12)
(27. arthāpattiḥ)
arthāntararasya kathane yatrānyo 'rthaḥ pratīyate |
vākyamādhuryasampannā sā 'rthāpattirudāhṛtā || 377 ||(nāśā.16.32a)
yathā rāghavānande—
kumbhakarṇo rāvaṇamuddiśya—
rāmo 'sau jagatīha vikramaguṇairyātaḥ prasiddhiṃ parām asmadbhāgyaviparyayād yadiparaṃ devo na jānāti tam |
bandīvaiṣa yaśāṃsi gāyati marud yasyaikabāṇāhati— śreṇībhūtaviśālasālavivarodgīrṇaissvaraissap‍tabhiḥ || 378 ||
(28. prasiddhiḥ) (nāśā. 16.33)
vākyaissātiśayairyuktā vākyārthasya prasādhakaiḥ |
lokaprasiddhairbahubhiḥ prasiddhiriti kīrtitā || 379 ||
yathā mahāvīracarite rāmaḥ paraśurāmamuddiśyāha—(mavīca. 2.36)
utpattirjamadag‍nitaḥ sa bhagavān devaḥ pinākī guruḥ vīryaṃ yattu na tadgirāṃ pathi nanu vyaktaṃ hi tatkarmabhiḥ |
tyāgassap‍tasamudramudritamahīnirvyājadānāvadhi— rbrahmakṣatrataponidherbhagavataḥ kiṃ vā na lokottaram || 380 ||
(29. pṛcchā)
yatrākārodbhavairvākyairātmānamathavā param |
pṛcchannivābhidhatte 'rthaṃ sā pṛcchetyabhidhīyate || 381 || (nāśā. 16.34a)
yathā rāmacarite hanumān sītāṃ dṛṣṭvā—(rāca. 19.51)
sthāne 'vasīdasi raghūdvaha ! kiṃ vidhātar asyāstvayekṣitamalakṣaṇamaṅgakeṣu |
adyāpi jīvasi daśānana ! he hanūman ! keyaṃ tavābhimukhavartiripoḥ pratīkṣā || 382 ||
(30. sārūpyam)
dṛṣṭaśrutādibhūtārthakathanādisamudbhavam |
sādṛśyaṃ kṣobhajananaṃ sārūpyamiti saṃjñitam || 383 || (nāśā. 16.35a)
yathā chalitarāme ṣaṣṭhe 'ṅke—hiraṇmayīṃ sītāpratikṛtimavalokya
lavaḥ—(sakṣobhasambhramaṃ) kathamambā ihānītā ! jānīma ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ |
yathā (veṇīsaṃhāre) duryodhanena (bhīmārjunau) hatāviti cārvākādākarṇya śokāc‍citāpraveśaṃ abhilaṣati sadraupadīke yudhiṣṭhare, (nepathye kalakalānantaraṃ) bho bhoḥ syamantapañcakasañcāriṇaḥ pravīrapuruṣāḥ kṛtaṃ kṛtaṃ vo maddarśanatrāsena | kathayantu bhavantaḥ,
ūrū kareṇa parighaṭṭayatassalīlaṃ duryodhanasya purato 'pahṛtāmbarā yā |
duḥśāsanāgrakarakarṣaṇabhinnamauliḥ sā draupadī kathayata k‍va punaḥ pradeśe || 384 || (vesaṃ. 6.35)
kañcukī—hā devi yajñavedisaṃbhave, paribhūyase saṃpratyanena durātmanā kurukulakalaṅkena |
yudhiṣṭhiraḥ—(sasaṃbhramamutthāya) devi yājñaseni, na bhetavyaṃ na bhetavyam | kaḥ ko 'tra bhoḥ ! saniṣaṅgaṃ me dhanurupānayata | durātman duryodhanahataka ! āgacchāgaccha | ayamapanayāmi to gadākauśalasaṃbhūtaṃ bhujadarpaṃ śilīmukhāsāreṇa | paśya re mūḍha ! || 385 ||
priyamanujamapaśyaṃstaṃ jarāsandhamallaṃ kupitaharakirātadveṣiṇaṃ taṃ ca vatsam |
bhavatu kaṭhinacetāḥ prāṇituṃ nāsmi śakto na nu punarapahartuṃ bāṇavarṣaistavāsūn || 386 || (vesaṃ. 6.36)
(tataḥ praviśati yathānirdiṣṭo bhīmaḥ |)
bhīmaḥ—(vesaṃ. 6.37)
bho bho rājanyavīrāḥ samaraśikhiśikhābhuktaśeṣāḥ kṛtaṃ va— strāsenānena līnairhatakarituragāntarhitairāsyate yat |
nāhaṃ rakṣo na bhūto ripurudhirajalahlāditāṅgaḥ prakāmaṃ nistīrṇorupratijñājalanidhigahanaḥ krodhanaḥ kṣatriyo 'smi || 387 ||
devi pāṇḍus‍nuṣe, uttiṣṭhottiṣṭha |
draupadī—kahaṃ pi ajja vi ṇa saṃbhāvemi cidāsamīvaṃ |
(kathamapi adyāpi na saṃbhāvayāmi citāsamīpam |)
yudhiṣṭhiraḥ—kaḥ ko 'tra bhoḥ ! saniṣaṅgaṃ dhanurupanayata | kathaṃ na kaścit parijanaḥ | bhavatu | bāhuyuddhasambhāvanayā vihastamenaṃ gāḍhamāliṅgya jvalanamabhipatāmi | (iti parikaraṃ badh‍nāti |)
kañcukī—devi pāṇḍus‍nuṣe ! saṃyamyantāmidānīṃ nayanapatharodhino duḥśāsanākṛṣṭā mūrdhajāḥ | astamitā saṃprati pratīkārāśā |
yudhiṣṭhiraḥ—na khalvanihate asmin durātmani duryodhanahatake saṃhartavyaḥ keśahastaḥ |
bhīmaḥ— pāñcāli, na khalu mayi jīvati saṃhartavyā duḥśāsanavilulitā veṇirātmapāṇinā | tiṣṭha tiṣṭha | svayamevāhaṃ saṃharāmi | (keśeṣu grahītumicchati |)
yudhiṣṭhiraḥ—(bhīmamāliṅgya) durātman bhīmārjunaśatro, duryodhanahataka ! || 388 ||
āśaiśavādanudinaṃ janitāparādho kṣībo madena bhujayorhatarājaputraḥ |
āsādya me 'ntaramidaṃ bhujapañjarasya jīvan prayāsi na padāt padamadya mūḍha ! ||
(vesaṃ. 6.38)
bhīmaḥ—kathamāryaḥ suyodhanaśaṅkyā krodhānnirdayaṃ māmāliṅgati ?
kañcukī—(upagamya saharṣaṃ) mahārāja, diṣṭyā vardhase | ayaṃ khalvāyuṣmān kumārabhīmasenaḥ suyodhanakṣatajārūṇīkṛtasakalaśarīratayā durlakṣavyaktiḥ | tadalamadhunā saṃrambheṇa, iti || 390 ||
(31. manorathaḥ)
hṛdayasthasya bhāvasya suśliṣṭārthaprakāśakam |
anyāpadeśakathanaṃ manoratha iti smṛtaḥ || 391 || (nāśā. 16.36a)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ dvitīye 'ṅke
susaṅgatā—sahi jassa kide tumaṃ āadā aaṃ so jiṭhṭhadi | (sakhi, yasya kṛte tvamāgatā, ayaṃ sa tiṣṭhati |)
sāgarikā—(sāsūyaṃ) sahi kassa kide ahaṃ āadā ? (sakhi, kasya kṛte 'hamāgatā ?)
susaṅgatā—aï aṇṇasaṃkide, ṇaṃ cittaphalaassa |
(ayi anyaśaṅkite, nanu citraphalakasya|) || 392 ||
(32. leśaḥ)
yadvākyaṃ vākyakuśalairupāyenābhidhīyate |
sādṛśyārthābhiniṣpattyā sa leśa iti kīrtitaḥ || 393 || (nāśā. 16.37a)
yathā abhijñānaśākuntale
sakhyau—(śakuntalāduṣyantayorākāraṃ viditvā janāntikaṃ) haḷā saüṃdaḷe, jaï ajja tādo saṇṇihido bhave | (sakhi śakuntale, yadyadya tātassannihito bhavet—)
śakuntalā—(saroṣaṃ) tado kiṃ bhave | (tataḥ kiṃ bhavet ?)
sakhyau—tadā imaṃ jīvitasavvasseṇa vi adihiṃ kidatthaṃ karei | (tadā imaṃ jīvitasarvasvenāpyatithiṃ kṛtārthaṃ kariṣyati |)
śakuntalā—apetha | kiṃ vi hiae karia maṃtetha | ṇa vo vaüṇaṃ suṇissaṃ | (apeta | kimapi hṛdaye kṛtvā mantrayethe | na vāṃ vacanaṃ śroṣyāmi |) || 394 ||
(33. kṣobhaḥ) (nāśā. 16.38 a)
paradoṣairvicitrārthairyatrātmā parikīrtyate |
aduṣṭo 'nyo 'pi vā kaścit sa tu kṣobha iti smṛtaḥ || 395 ||
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ tṛtīye 'ṅke,
rājā— (añjaliṃ baddha‍vā) priye vāsavadatte, prasīda |
vāsavadattā—ajjaütta, mā evvaṃ bhaṇa | saṃkaṃtā khu ede aṇṇahi akkharā(i) | {āryaputra, (mā) evaṃ bhaṇa | saṃkrāntāni khalu etāni anyatra akṣarāṇi}
vidūṣakaḥ— bhodi, mahāṇubhāvā khu tumaṃ | tā khamīadu ekko avarāho | (bhavati, mahānubhāvā khalu tvam | tat kṣamyatāṃ eko 'parādhaḥ |)
vāsavadattā— paḍhamasaṃkeassa vigghaṃ karaṃtīe mae evva eassa avaraddhaṃ | {prathamasaṅketasya vigh‍naṃ kurvantyā mayaivaitasyāparāddham |} || 396 ||
(34. guṇakīrttanam)
kīrtyamānairguṇairyatra vividhārthasamudbhavaiḥ |
doṣā na parikalpyante tajjñeyaṃ guṇakīrtanam || 397 || (nāśā.16.9u)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ dvitīye 'ṅke, rājā—(rat‍nā. 2.15)
dṛṣṭiṃ ruṣā kṣipasi yadyapi bhāminīmāṃ s‍nigdheyameṣyati tathāpi na rūkṣabhāvam |
tyaktvā tvarāṃ vraja tava skhalitairayaṃ tu khedaṃ kariṣyati gururniyataṃ nitambaḥ || 398 ||
(35. ākhyānam)
pṛṣṭairapṛṣṭairathavā nirṇayaḥ (kriyate tu yaḥ) |
tadākhyānamiti jñeyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ nāṭakāśrayam || 399 || (nāśā. 16.21u)
yathā uttaracarite, caturthe 'ṅke,
kausalyā—ammahe edāṇaṃ majjhe ko esa rāmabhaddakomāralihi (lac‍cī)sāvaṭhṭhaṃbhehiṃ muddhaḷaḷidehiṃ aṃṅgakehiṃ dārao amhāṇa (kha) loaṇāiṃ sīlaḷāvei |
(aho eteṣāṃ madhye ka eṣaḥ rāmabhadrakaumāralakṣmīsāvaṣṭambhai— rmugdhalalitairaṅgakairdārako 'smākaṃ locane śītalayati ?)
arundhatī—(apavārya, saharṣotkaṇṭham idaṃ nāma tadbhāgīrathīniveditaṃ rahasyakarṇāmṛtam | na tvevaṃ vidmaḥ kataro 'yamāyuṣmatoḥ kuśalavayoriti |) || 400 ||
(36. abhimānaḥ) (nāśā. 16.8u)
vā/dhāryamāṇāḥ subahubhirvacanaiḥ kāryayuktibhiḥ |
nāryo yannānutiṣṭhanti/nayaḥ paryavatiṣṭheta so 'bhimānaḥ prakīrtitaḥ || 401 ||
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ, tṛtīyeṅke,
kāñcanamālā—bhaṭṭiṇī karehi se pasādaṃ | eaṃ caraṇapaḍiaṃ ujjhia gadāe vaassaṃ avassaṃ pac‍cādāvena hodavvaṃ | (bhaṭṭinī ! kuruṣva asmai prasādam evaṃ caraṇapatitamujjhitvā gatāyā avaś‍yaṃ paścāttāpena bhavitavyam |)
vāsavadattā—aï apehi | ko paccādāvasaro iti | (ayi, apehi | kaḥ paścāttāpāvasara iti |)|| 402 ||
(37. yāñcā)
lābhopapattimākhyāya svayaṃ dūtamukhena vā |
prārthyate yatra kanyādissā yāñcetyabhidhīyate || 403 ||(nāśā. 16.22ṭi.)
yathā mahā vīracarite—(mavīca. 1.30)
kanyārat‍namayonijanma bhavatāmāste vayaṃ cārthino rat‍naṃ yat k‍vacidasti tat pariṇamatyasmāsu śakradapi |
kanyāyāśca parārthataiva hi matā tasyāḥ pradānādahaṃ bandhurvo bhavitā pulastyapulahapraṣṭhāśca sambandhinaḥ || 404 ||
(38. protsāhanam)
utsāhajananaissaṣṭairguṇairaupamyasaṃśrayaiḥ |
prasiddhairupagūḍhaṃ ca jñeyaṃ protsāhanaṃ budhaiḥ || 405 || (nāśā. 16.10u)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ caturthe 'ṅke vijayavarmā prāgvṛttayuddhavarṇanāyāṃ prāha—
yoddha‍uṃ nirgatya vindhyādabhavadabhimukhastatkṣaṇaṃ digvibhāgān vindhyenevāpareṇa dvipapatipṛtanāpīṭhabandhena rundhan |
vegād bāṇān vimuñcan samadakarighaṭotpiṣṭapattirnipatya pratyaicchad vāñchitāp‍tidviguṇitarabhasastaṃ rumaṇvān kṣaṇena || (rat‍nā. 4.5)
(39. spṛhā) (samā nāśā. 16.8 ṭi.)
dṛṣṭe śrute 'nubhūte vā vastuno rāmaṇīyake |
abhilāṣo bhaved yastu sā spṛheti prakīrtitā || 407 ||
yathottaracarite janakaḥ—(u.rā.ca. 4.19)
kuvalayadalas‍nigdhaś‍yāmaśśikhaṇḍakamaṇḍano vaṭupariṣadaṃ puṇyaśrīkaḥ śriyaiva sabhājayan |
punariva śiśurbhūtvā vatsassa me raghunandano jhaṭiti kurute dṛṣṭaḥ so 'yaṃ dṛśoramṛtāñjanam || 408 ||
(40. paś‍cāttāpaḥ)
akāryaṃ sahasā kṛtvā( ')kṛtvā kāryamathāpi vā |
santāpo manaso yastu paścāttāpassa ucyate || 409 || (nāśā. 16.33)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ tṛtīye 'ṅke,
vāsavadattā—kaṃcaṇamāḷe, taṃ tahā caḷaṇapaḍi(damayya) uttamavadhīraaṃtīe adiṇiṭhṭhuraṃ evva mae kidaṃ, iti | (kāñcanamāle, taṃ tathā caraṇapatitamāryaputraṃ avadhīrayantyā atiniṣṭhurameva mayā kṛtam | iti |) (rat‍nā. 3.17–18)
(41. anuvṛttiḥ) (nāśā. 16.34)
praśrayeṇārthasaṃyuktaṃ yat parasyānuvartanam |
s‍nehād dākṣiṇyayogādvā sānuvṛttistu saṃjñitā || 410 ||
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ tṛtīye 'ṅke
rājā—kathaṃ darśanamapi bhaviṣyati?
vidūṣakaḥ—bho kahaṃ ṇa bhavissidi jassa rā(de)ohasitaccuhatthadi (vihappadi)
buddhivihavo amac‍co | (bhoḥ kathaṃ na bhaviṣyati yasya ta upahasitabṛhaspatibuddhivibhavo 'mātyaḥ |)
rājā—na khalu kiñcinna saṃbhāvyata iti || 411 ||
(42. yuktiḥ) (nāśā. 16.36)
sādhyate yo 'rthasambandho mahadbhissamavāyataḥ |
parasparānukūlyena sā yuktiḥ parikīrtitā || 412 ||
yathā mālatīmādhave,
kāmandakī—tadidānīṃ vidarbharājamantriṇā satā devarātena mādhavaṃ putramānvīkṣakīśravāṇāya kuṇḍinapurād imāṃ padmāvatīṃ prati preṣayatā suvihitam |
apatyasambandhavidhipratijñā priyasya nītā suhṛdaḥ smṛtiṃ ca |
alokasāmānyaguṇastanūjaḥ prarocanārthaṃ prakaṭīkṛtaśca || (māmā. 1.13)
anyacca, makarandodyānavṛttāntena bhagavato vidherapyanukūlatāmavagacchāmi | vakulā— valīcitraphaḷakasaṃvidhānavyatikaraśca kamapyadbha‍utaṃ pramodamullāsayati, iti |
(43. nirbhāsanam) (nāśā. 16.26)
anekayuktimad vākyamanekārthaprasādhakam |
anekavācyasaṃyuktaṃ jñeyaṃ nirbhāsanaṃ tu tat || 414 ||
yathā mālatīmādhave
makarandaḥ—vayasya mādhava,
anyonyasambhinnadṛśāṃ sakhīnāṃ tasyā api prāganurāgacihnam |
kasyāpi ko 'pīti niveditaṃ ca dhātreyikāyāścaturaṃ vacaśca || (māmā. 1.36)
kalahaṃsakaḥ—(upasṛtya) edaṃ ca | (etacca) (citraphalakaṃ darśayati |)
(44. kṣamā)
pratikriyāsamarthasya pātraucityavaśena yaḥ |
apakāre 'pyupaśamaḥ sā kṣameti prakīrtitā || 416 ||1 (nāśā. 16.31)
1.–2. bhojopajñamidaṃ dvayam |
yathā uttaracarite
lavaḥ—(ātmagatam) īdṛśo māṃ pratyamīṣāmakāraṇas‍nehaḥ| mayā punarebhya evābhidrugdhamajñena, yadāyudhaparigraho vihitaḥ (prakāśam) mṛṣyantāmidānīṃ lavasya bāliśatāṃ tātapādāḥ |
rāmaḥ—kimaparāddhaṃ vatsena?
candraketuḥ—aśvānuyātrikebhyastātapratāpāviṣkaraṇamupaśrutya vīrāyitamanena |
rāmaḥ—nanvayamalaṅkāraḥ kṣatrasya | iti || 417||
(45. guṇānuvādaḥ) (nāśā. 16.13a)
guṇānuvādaḥ sa jñeyo yatrā 'bhedopacārataḥ |
gauṇīṃ vṛttimupāśritya vastuno rūpamucyate || 418 ||2
yathā śākuntale rājā—(śāku. 2.10)
anāghrātaṃ puṣpaṃ kisalayamalūnaṃ kararuhai— ranāviddhaṃ rat‍naṃ madhu navamanāsvāditarasam |
akhaṇḍaṃ puṇyānāṃ phalamiva ca tadrūpamanaghaṃ na jāne bhoktāraṃ kamiha samupasthāsyati vidhiḥ || 419 ||
(46. ākrandaḥ)
ātmabhāvamupanyasya parasādṛś‍yayuktibhiḥ |
tīvrārthabhāṣaṇaṃ yat syādākrandassa tu kīrtitaḥ || 420 || (nāśā. 16.19)
yathā mālatīmādhave
(praviś‍ya) buddharakṣitā—parittāadha parittāadha | esā khu ṇo piasahī amaccaṇaṃdaṇassa bhaïṇīā madaaṃtiā ediṇā duṭhṭhaśadda‍ūleṇa bhayaviddaviapariaṇā abbhiddavīyadi | (paritrāyadhvaṃ, paritrāyadhvam! eṣā khalu naḥ priyasakhyamātyanandanasya bhaginikā madayantikā etena duṣṭaśārdūlena bhayavidrāvitaparijanā abhidrūyate |)|| 421 ||
1. bhojopajñamidam |
(47. kapaṭam) (nāśā. 16.30)
adivyaṃ divyamapi vā kṛtvā rūpaviparyayam |
avidvān vañcyate yatra kapaṭaṃ tadudāhṛtam || 422 ||1
yathā mālatīmādhave
kāmandakī—vatsa makaranda, anenaiva mālatīnaipathyenāpavāritaḥ pravartasva pariṇayāyātmānaṃ nandanena | iti |
(48. parivādanam)
yad doṣairanyanāmoktaiḥ prasiddhārthaprayojanam |
anyatrārthena sambaddhaṃ jñeyaṃ tat parivādanam || 423 || (nāśā. 16.39)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ tṛtīye 'ṅke,
vāsavadattā . . . . .
rājā vidūṣakaśca . . . . .
bhāṣate— ajja vi dāva se ṇic‍caruṭ‍ṭhāe devīe vaaṇehiṃ kaḍuīkadā kaṇṇā tuhālāpehi suhāviantu | (adyāpi tāvad asyā nityaruṣṭāyā devyā vacanaiḥ kaṭukīkṛtāḥ karṇāḥ tavālāpaiḥ sukhyantu |) tato jñātāyāṃ rājā parivadannāha—dhiṅ mūrkha! tvatkṛto 'yamanartho '— smākamāpatitaḥ, iti || 424 ||
(49. abhyupapattiḥ) (nāśā. 16.35)
prāp‍tā(prok‍tā)nāṃ yatra doṣāṇāṃ kriyate śamanaṃ punaḥ |
jñeyā sā 'bhyupapattistu lakṣaṇaṃ nāṭakāśrayam || 425 ||
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ dvitīye 'ṅke;
vāsavadattā—kaṃcaṇamāle! aaṃ ayyaüto | iaṃ uṇa sāariā | tā kiṃ edaṃ ? | (kāñcanamāle, ayamāryaputraḥ | iyaṃ sāgarikā | tat kimetat?)
kāñcanamālā—ahaṃ pi evvamevva takkemi | (ahamapi evameva tarkayāmi |)
(rājā)— (apavārya), vayasya tvamevāsyā uttaraṃ prayaccha |
vidūṣakaḥ — hodi, appa kila dukkaraṃ ālihiduṃ ti mama vaaṇaṃ suṇia piavaassaeṇa edaṃ viṇṇāṇaṃ daṃsidam | (bhavati, ātmā kila
duṣkaraṃ ālikhitumiti mama vacanaṃ śrutvā priyavayasyenaitad vijñānaṃ darśitam |)
rājā— devi, yathāha vasantakaḥ |
vāsavadattā—esā pi jā tuha samīpe ālihidā, edaṃ kiṃ vasaṃdaassa viṇṇāṇaṃ | (eṣāpi) yā tava samīpe ālikhitā, etat kiṃ vasantakasya vijñānam ?
rājā—(savilakṣasmitaḥ) devi, alamanyathā sambhāvitena | iyaṃ hi mayā svacetasaiva vikalpyālikhitā | na tu dṛṣṭapūrvā | iti || 426 ||
(50. kāryam)
yatrā(/?/ā)saṅkīrtayan doṣaṃ guṇamarthena yojayet |
guṇābhivādaṃ doṣād vā kāryaṃ tadiha kīrtitam || 427 || (nāśā. 16.37)
yathā vā rat‍nāvalyāṃ prathame 'ṅke yaugandharāyaṇaḥ—(1.7)
prārambhe 'smin svāmino vṛddhihetau daivenetthaṃ dattahastāvalambe |
siddherbhrāntirnāsti satyaṃ tathāpi svecchākārī bhīta evāsmi bhartuḥ || 428 ||
(51. pratiṣedhaḥ)
kāryeṣu viparīteṣu yadi kaścit pravartate |
nivāryate ca kāryajñaiḥ pratiṣedhaḥ sa kīrtitaḥ || 429 || (nāśā. 16.23)
yathā vīracarite daśarathaḥ (janakamuddiś‍ya)—(mavīca. 3.30)
virama narapate! kathaṃ dvije 'sminnaviratayajñavitīrṇagosahastraḥ |
tava palitanirantaraḥ pṛṣatkaṃ spṛśati purāṇadhanurdharasya bāhuḥ || 430 ||
(52. mṛṣodyamaḥ)
prayuktārthavidhānāya mohād yatra pravartate |
nivartate vṛthā kleśassa vijñeyo mṛṣodyamaḥ || 431 ||1
1–2. bhojopajñamidaṃ dvayam |
yathā vīracarite—(mavīca. 3.24)
tapo vā śastraṃ vā vyapadiśati yaḥ kaścidiha vo sa darpāduddāmaṃ dviṣamasahamānaḥ skhalayatu |
arāmāṃ nissīradhvajadaśarathīkṛtya vasudhā— mṛtap‍tastatkulyānapi paraśurāmaśśamayati || 432 ||
(53. chalok‍tiḥ)
kāk‍vā śleṣeṇa vā yatra padaṃ dva‍yarthe prayujyate |
pradhānamatisandhātuṃ sā chaloktiḥ prakīrtitā || 433 ||2
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ
vidūṣakaḥ—hodi, sabāmi bahmasutteṇa jaï ahmehiṃ īdisī kāpi diṭhṭhapuvvā | (bhavati! śapāmi brahmasūtreṇa, yadi . . . asmābhirīdṛśī kāpi dṛṣṭapūrvā |)
kāñcanamālā—bhaṭṭiṇi! ghuṇakkhadaṃ vi saṃvadadi evva | (bhaṭṭinī! ghuṇākṣaramapi saṃvadatyeva |)
vāsavadattā— aï ujue, vasaṃdao khu eso | ṇa āṇāsi tumaṃ edassa vak‍kabhaṇidio | ayya mama vi edaṃ cittaaṃ pekkhaṃtīe sīsaveaṇā samuppaṇṇā | tā gamissaṃ ahaṃ, iti | (ayi ṛjuke, vasantakaḥ khalveṣaḥ | na jānāsi tvaṃ etasya vakrabhaṇitīḥ | ārya! mamāpi etac‍citrakaṃ prekṣamāṇāyāḥ śīrṣavedanā samutpannā tadgamiṣyāmyaham, iti |)
yathā ca mālatīmādhave prabhavati nijasya kanyakājanasya mahārājaḥ, iti |
(54. kākuḥ)
vākye 'bhidhīyamāno 'rtho yenānyatvaṃ prapadyate |
bhinnakaṇṭhadhvanirdhīraissa kākuriti kathyate || 434 ||1
yathā ca veṇīsaṃhāre, bhīmaḥ sahadevamuddiś‍ya — sandheyāste bhrātaro yuṣmākam | yathā cātraiva
1. bhojopajñamidam |
lākṣāgṛhānalaviṣānnasabhāpraveśauḥ prāṇeṣu vittanicayeṣu ca naḥ prahṛtya |
ākṛṣṭapāṇḍavavadhūparidhānakeśāḥ svasthā bhavantu mayi jīvati dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ || 435 || (vesaṃ. 1.7)
(55. unmāthaḥ)
asādhukāriṇaṃ kañcit paś‍yatassādhumāninaḥ |
sotprāsaṃ vacanaṃ yat syāt tamunmāthaṃ pracakṣate || 436 ||1
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ tṛtīye 'ṅke,
kāñcanamālā—sāhu re amacca vasantaa sāhu | (adisaïdo tu) e amac‍cajjoaṃdharāaṇo imāe saṃdhiviggahapītāe (ciṃtāe) | (sādhu re amātya vasantaka sādhu | atiśayitastvayā amātya— yaugandharāyaṇo 'nayā sandhivigrahacintayā |) iti |
(56. parihāsaḥ)
yadagrāmyaṃ bhaved vākyaṃ gurūṇāmadhikeṣvapi |
tathāvasaramāsādya parihārassa kathyate || 437 ||2
yathā uttaracarite,
rāmaḥ—asti cedānīmaśvamedhasahacāriṇī hiraṇmayī sītāpratikṛtiḥ | tatrāpi tāvadvāṣpadagdhaṃ cakṣurvinodayāmi |
sītā—dhaṇṇā khu sā jā ayyavutteṇa evvaṃ bahumaṇṇīadi | jā ayyavuttaṃ viṇodaaṃtī āsāṇibaṃdhaṇa jādā jīvaḷoassa | (dhanyā khalu sā yā āryaputreṇaivaṃ bahumanyate | yā āryaputraṃ vinodayantī āśānibandhanaṃ jātā jīvalokasya |)
tamasā— (sasmitas‍nehāstraṃ pariṣvajya) ayi vatse, evamātmā stūyate |
sītā— (salajjam) parihasidammi bhaavadīe | (parihasitāsmi bhagavatyā |) (iti |)
(57. vikatthanam)
saguṇotkarṣato vāpi karmaṇo vā 'padānataḥ |
ātmaślāghāparaṃ vākyaṃ vikatthanamihocyate || 438 ||3
1–3. bhojopajñamidaṃ tritayam |
yathā ca veṇīsaṃhāre (bhīmaḥ)—
sakalaripu/?/jayāśā yatra baddhā sutaiste tṛṇamiva paribhūto yasya garveṇa lokaḥ |
raṇaśirasi nihantā tasya rādhāsutasya praṇamati pitarau vāṃ madhyamaḥ pāṇḍavo 'yam || 439 || (vesaṃ. 5.27)
api ca,
cūrṇitāśeṣakauravyaḥ kṣībo duḥśāsanāsṛjā |
bhaṅaktā suyodhanasyorvorbhīmo vāṃ śirasā 'ñcati || 440 || (vesaṃ. 5.28)
(58. yadṛcchāyogaḥ)
yadṛcchāyā bhaved yogo yatrābhīṣṭena kenacit |
acintitassa dhīmadbhiryadṛcchāyoga ucyate || 441 ||2
yathā mālatīmādhave
mālatī—ṇāha tuhme uṇa kahaṃ | (nātha, yūyaṃ punaḥ katham ?)
mādhavaḥ—(salajjam)
tvatpāda/pāṇipaṅkajaparigrahapuṇya/ dhanyajanmā bhūyāsamityabhiniveśakadarthyamānaḥ |
bhrāmyan nṛbhāṃsapaṇanāya paretabhūmā— vākarṇya bhīru! ruditāni tavāgato 'smi || 442 || (māmā. 5.27)
(59. vaiṣamyam)
pratyakṣamiti yatraikaḥ parokṣamiti cāparaḥ |
manyate 'bhimataṃ vastu tad vaiṣamyamiti smṛtam || 443 ||1
yathā uttaracarite
(vāsantī)—kathamadyāpi nocch‌vasiti rāmabhadraḥ? hā priyasakhi sīte! vipattiduḥkhadagdhāmapi punaḥpunarmandabhāginīṃ dahasi |
sītā—apasartumicchāmi | eṣa punaścirapraṇayasaṃbhārasaumyaśītalena āryaputra— sparśena dīrghadāruṇamapi jhaṭiti santāpaṃ laghayatā vajralepopanaddha iva paryastavyāpāra āsañjito me hastaḥ || 444 ||
1. bhojopajñamidam |
rāmaḥ—sakhi, kutaḥ pralāpaḥ? |
gṛhīto yaḥ pūrvaṃ pariṇayavidhau kaṅkaṇadhaऱḥ sudhāsūteḥ pādairamṛtaśiśirairyaḥ paricitaḥ |
sa evāyaṃ tasyāstaditarakaraupamyasubhago mayā labdhaḥ pāṇirlalitalavalīkandaḷanibhaḥ || 445 || (urāca. 3.40)
sītā—haddhi, ayyaüttapparisamohidāe pamādo khu se saṃvutto | (hā dhik! āryaputrasparśamohitāyāḥ prasādaḥ khalu asyāḥ saṃvṛttaḥ!)
rāmaḥ—sakhi vāsanti, ānandanimīlitaḥ priyāsparśasādhvasena paravānasmi | tat tvamapi dhāraya |
vāsantī—kaṣṭamunmāda eva |
sītā—{sasambhramaṃ hastamākṣipyāpasarpati} |
rāmaḥ—hā dhik, pramādaḥ! || 446 ||
karapallavassa tasyāssahasaiva jaḍātmanaḥ paribhraṣṭaḥ |
parikampinaḥ prakampī karo (karād) mama svidyatassvidyan || 447 ||
(urāca. 3.41)
tamasā—(sas‍nehakautukasmitaṃ nirvarṇya) (urācaya. 3.42)
sasvedaromāñcitakampitāṅgī jātī priyasparśasukhena vatsā |
marunnavāmbhaḥpravidhūtasikta— kadambayaṣṭissaphuṭakorakeva || 448 ||
sītā—(svagatam) avaseṇa edeṇa attāṇaeṇa lajjāvidahmi bhaavadīe tamasāe | kiṃ ti kila esā tamasā esa maṇṇissidi eso paricayo(ccāyo) eso āsaṃho tti | (avaśenaitenātmanā lajjāpitāsmi bhagavatyā tamasayā | kimiti kilaiṣā tamasā maṃsyate eṣa parityāgaḥ, eṣa āsaṅga iti |)
rāmaḥ—(sarvamavalokya) hā kathaṃ nāstyeva | nanvakaruṇe vaidehi! na māmevaṃ parityak‍tumarhasi |
1.–2. bhojopajñamidaṃ dvayam |
vāsantī—deva! prasīda | svenaiva lokottareṇa dhairyeṇa saṃstambhayātmānam | kuto 'tra me priyasakhī ?
rāmaḥ—vyaktaṃ nāsti | kathamanyathā vāsantyapi na paśyet ? eṣa khalu svap‍na eva syāt | na cāsmi prasup‍taḥ | kuto rāmasya nidrā? iti || 449 ||
(60. pratijñānam)
na sādhayāmi yadyetadevaṃ kartāsmyahaṃ tadā |
ityuddhavādervākyasya tat pratijñānamucyate || 450 ||1
yathā makuṭatāḍite bhīmaḥ—
dhvastāḥ kṣubdhā dhārtarāṣṭrāssamastāḥ pītaṃ raktaṃ svādu duśśāsanasya |
pūrṇā kṛṣṇākeśabandhapratijñā tiṣṭhatyekaḥ kauravasyorubhaṅgaḥ ||
ūrū nipīḍya gadayā yadi nāsya tasya pādena rat‍namakuṭaṃ śakalīkaromi |
dehaṃ nipītanijadhūmavijṛmbhamāṇa— jvālājaṭālavapuṣi jvalane juhomi || 452 ||
(61. pravṛttiḥ)
evaṃ mayātra kartavyamiti yanniścitaṃ vacaḥ |
snehād dākṣiṇyato vāpi pravṛttissā nigadyate || 453 ||2
yathā mālatīmādhave kāmandakī—(māmā.4.5)
mā vāṃ sapat‍neṣvapi nāma tad bhūt pāpaṃ yadasyāṃ tvayi vāpi śakyam viśaṃkyam |
tat sarvathā saṅgamanāya yat‍naḥ prāṇavyayenāpi mayā vidheyaḥ || 454 ||
(62. āśīḥ) (nāśā. 16.28 pāṭhabhedena)
yadāśāstyarthasampannaṃ manorathasamudbhavam |
aprārthanīyamanyad vā vidustāmāśiṣaṃ budhāḥ || 455 ||
yathā mālatīmādhave kāmandakī—(māmā. 6.7)
vidhātā bhadraṃ no vitaratu manojñāya vidhaye kriyāsurdevā (naḥ) paramaraṇīyāṃ pariṇatim |
kṛtārthā bhūyāsaṃ priyasuhṛdi yat‍nairabhimataḥ prayāsaḥ kṛtsno 'yaṃ phalatu śivatātiśca bhavatu || 456 ||
(63. anuktasiddhiḥ) (nāśā. 16.40 pṛ.361)
prastāvenaiva śeṣo 'rthaḥ kṛtsno yatra pratīyate |
vacanena vinā 'nuktassiddhissā parikīrtitā || 457 || (nāśā. 16.40)
yathā śākuntale
rājā—bhagavān khalu kāśyapaśśāśvate brahmaṇi sthita iti prakāśaḥ | iyaṃ ca vassakhī tadātmajeti kathametat?
anasūyā—suṇādu ayyo | atthi kosio tti gottanāmado mahappahāvo rāesī |
(śrṛṇotvāryaḥ | asti kauśika iti gotranāmato mahāprabhāvo rājarṣiḥ |)
rājā—śrūyate
anasūyā—taṃ sahīe pahavaṃ avagacchadu mahārāo | ujjhidasarīrasaṃvạdh‌ḍhaṇādihiṃ tādakassapo se pidā | {taṃ sakhyāḥ prabhavamavagacchatu mahārājaḥ | ujjhitaśarīrasaṃvardhanādibhiḥ tātakāśyapaḥ asyāḥ pitā |}
rājā—ujjhitaśabdena punarjanitaṃ kutūhalam | āmūlācchrotumicchāmi |
anasūyā—purā tassa kila rāesiṇo ugge tavasi vaṭ‌ṭhamāṇassa kiṃ pi jādasaṃkehiṃ devehiṃ meṇaā ṇāma accharā ṇiamavigghakāriṇī aṇuppesidā | (purā tasya kila rājarṣeḥ ugre tapasi vartamānasya kimapi jātaśaṅkairdevaiḥ menakā nāmāpsarā niyamavigh‍nakāriṇī anupreṣitā |)
rājā—astyetadanyasamādhibhīrutvaṃ devānām | tatastataḥ?
anasūyā—tadā vasantodārasamae tae unmādayittaaṃ rūvaṃ pekkhia . . . (tato vasantodārasamaye tasyā unmādayitṛkaṃ rūpaṃ prekṣya) (ityardhokte lajjāṃ nāṭyati |)
rāja—bhavatu, parastādavagamyata eva | sarvathā apsarassambhavaivaiṣā, iti || 458 ||
(64. priyavacanam)
ādau yat krodhajananamante harṣavivardhanam |
tatpriyaṃ vacanaṃ jñeyamāśīrvādasamanvitam || 459 || (nāśā. 16.29)
yathā rat‍nāvalyāṃ, caturthe 'ṅke,
vidūṣakaḥ apavāryaindrajālikamāha—ā dāsīeputta iṃdajālia! kiṃ vā devehiṃ? jadi de ediṇā parituṭṭheṇa kajjaṃ tā sāariaṃ se daṃsehi | (āḥ dāsyāḥputra, aindrajālika! kiṃ vā devaiḥ? yadi ta etena parituṣṭena kāryaṃ tat sāgarikāmasya darśaya |) tata etad‍vacanānantaramagnisambhramādutthitaḥ rājā, na vasubhūtyādaya āvṛtā vahninā || 460 ||
etāni kāvyasya vibhūṣaṇāni 1prāyaścatuṣṣaṣṭirudāhṛtāni |
prabandhaśobhākaraṇāya tajjñaissamyak prayojyāni yathārasāni || 461 ||
udāhṛtā nāṭakanāṭikādāviyaṃ catuṣṣaṣṭicatuṣṭayī yā |
rasāvirodhena nibandhanīyā kathāsu kāvyeṣu ca sā mahadbhiḥ || 462 ||
bhaktīrdvādaśa tāḥ pṛthakpṛthagimāssañcintya śabdārthayoḥ sāhityasya ca śabdaśāsanavidā kāryaḥ prabandhe śramaḥ |
kīrttiryāvadanaśvarī hi viduṣāṃ rodogṛhaṃ gāhate brāhmaṃ lokalalāmadhāma tadamī tāvat kilādhyāsate || 463 ||
