nedṛśī spaṣṭatā 'nyatra dṛśyate nāṭyalakṣaṇe |
sanātano 'sya labdhyā svaṃ sāhityaṃ pūrṇamīkṣate ||
1. prāyaḥpadena sūcito lakṣaṇānāṃ nyūnādhikabhāvo 'pi | abhinavaguto 'pyāha—'lakṣaṇāni aniyata— saṃkhyānī'—ti | lakṣitāni svayaṃ nūtanāni 28 |
atha
śrṛṅgāraprakāśe trayodaśaḥ prakāśaḥ
ratiprakāśano nāma
tattvajñānānniśśreyasādhigatau mokṣaḥ1 | tamīhamānasya gārhasthye 'pi tadadhigamayogya— tābhimāno mokṣaśrṛṅgāraḥ |
dharmaśrṛṅgāre bhāratī vṛttiḥ, paurastyā pravṛttiḥ, pāñcālī rītiḥ, svakīyā nāyikā, dhīrodāttaśca nāyakaḥ, iti |
arthaśrṛṅgāre gauḍīyā rītiḥ, aụdhramāgadhī pravṛttiḥ, ārabhaṭī vṛttiḥ, sarvā nāyikā, dhīroddhataśca nāyaka iti |
kāmaśraṅgāre vaidarbhī rītiḥ, dākṣiṇātyā pravṛttiḥ, kaiśikī vṛttiḥ sarvā nāyikā, dhīralalitaśca nāyaka iti |
mokṣaśrṛṅgāre lāṭīyā rītiḥ, āvantyā pravṛttiḥ, sāttvatī vṛttiḥ, svakīyā nāyikā, dhīraśāntaśca 'nāyakaḥ iti |
eteṣāmapi nāyakaviśeṣāṇāṃ caturṇāmapi ca nāyikāviśeṣāṇāṃ vakṣyamāṇottamādisvabhedopabhedayogināṃ yathāyogamutpadyate ratyādiḥ, sa ca vibhāvānubhāva— vyabhicārisaṃyogairabhivyajyate || tatra—
1. raterabhīṣṭajanopavanavaramandirādaya ālambanavibhāvāḥ | ṛtumālyavilepanādayo— 'nubhāvāḥ | vyabhicāriṇastu sambhoge harṣadhṛtismṛtimatisvedaromāñcagadgadahāsādayaḥ; vipralambhe glānicintautsukyāvegavismayadainyāsūyādayo bhavanti |
2. prīterabhīṣṭarūparasagandhasparśaśabdaputramitrādaya ālambanavibhāvāḥ | tadupabhoga— samāgamasukhasmaraṇādaya uddīpanavibhāvāḥ | sarvendriyāṇāṃ romāñcasvedasvarabhedādayo vyabhicāriṇaḥ ||
3. harṣasya manorathalābheṣṭajanasamāgamadevagurubhartṛrājaprasādādaya ālambanavibhāvāḥ | bhojanācchādanādaya uddīpanavibhāvāḥ | nayanavadanaprasādapriyabhāṣaṇāliṅganalalita— tāḍanādayo 'nubhāvāḥ | hāsadhṛtismṛtimatigarvautsukyāvegacapalatotsāhajaḍatādayo vyabhicāriṇaḥ ||
1. prakāśa eṣa pade pade naṣṭamātṛkāṃśa: rāghave | 2. dra. pṛ. 614 ekādaśaprakāśārambhaḥ |
4. romāñcasya sparśabhayaśītaharṣakrodharogādayaḥ ālambanavibhāvāḥ | priyā— liṅganāyādarśanādayo 'bhiṣekaguṇakīrtanopakārasmaraṇādaya uddīpanavibhāvāḥ | priyāgātrasparśanavilokanādayo 'nubhāvāḥ | hāsatrāsavismayavitarkāvegaśaṅkā 'bahittha— vrīḍāstambhasvedavepathusvarabhedādayo vyabhicāriṇaḥ ||
5. dhṛteraṣṭaiś‍varyakularūpayauvanavidyābalādaya ālambanavibhāvāḥ | śrutavijñāna— śaucācāradevagurubhaktyādayaḥ uddīpanavibhāvāḥ | prāp‍taviṣayopabhogāprāp‍tānanuśocanā1— dayo 'nubhāvaḥ | tṛp‍tiharṣādayo vyabhicāriṇaḥ |
6. garvasya2 aiśvaryakularūpayauvanadhanavidyābalādaya ālambanavibhāvāḥ | bhartṛsambhāvanottamādarānurūpanārīprārthanāguṇapraśaṃsādaya uddīpanavibhāvāḥ | . . . . . praś‍nottarādānābhāṣaṇopahasanavāk‌pāruṣyadharṣaṇādhikṣepavyatikramādayo 'nubhāvā: | hāsotsāhakrodhacapalatāmarṣādayo vyabhicāribhāvāḥ ||
7. hāsasya pratijñāsaṃpralāpasaukhyadhāṣṭaryakuhakaparaceṣṭānukaraṇapaurobhāgyādaya ālambanavibhāvāḥ | nāyakasānnidhyādaya uddīpanavibhāvāḥ | bhajanadarśanasandarśanāsya— rāgapārśvagrahaṇādayo 'nubhāvāḥ | smitahasitavihasitopahasitātihasitāpahasitādayo '— nubhāvaviśeṣāḥ | premāśrucapalatādayo vyabhicāriṇaḥ ||
8. madasya madyopabhogādaya ālambanavibhāvāḥ | manorathāvāp‍tīṣṭadarśanagītavādya— nṛttavarṇanādaya uddīpanavibhāvāḥ paruṣābhibhāṣaṇavyākulavacanamadhuramukharāgahṛṣṭatanutrāsa— sukumārāviṣṭa/lalitaskhalitanayanaghūrṇanādayo 'nubhāvāḥ | aṅgaglānyasūyāśramamohaharṣa— dhṛtismṛticapalatāśrugarvautsukyanidrāmarṣastambhavepathuromāñcapulakādayo vyabhicāriṇaḥ ||
9. mohasya3 avalokanāvasthāvadhāraṇādaya ālambanavibhāvāḥ | saṃskṛ/stutapradeśa— darśaneṣṭaguṇākarṇanartumālyānulepanopanatiprabhṛtaya uddīpanavibhāvāḥ | guṇagrahaṇa— kākalīgītādayo 'nubhāvāḥ | nirvedaglāniśaṅkā ' 'vegaśramadainyacintāmatismṛti— capalatāvrīḍā 'vahitthajaḍatāviṣādonmādādayo vyabhicāriṇaḥ ||*
11. cintāyāḥ paradravyāpahāradāridrayeṣṭajanaviyogādaya ālambanavibhāvāḥ | prārabdhā— siddhisamīhitānavāp‍tideśabhramaṇādaya uddīpanavibhāvāḥ | śvasitasantāpadhyānādho— mukhyatanubhāvādayo 'nubhāvāḥ | śokabhayavismayaviṣādanidrānirvedaglāniśaṅkā— śramadainyamohasmṛtivaivarṇyādayo vyabhicāriṇaḥ ||
1. ॰nanu॰ = ॰nu॰ rā. | 2. garvasya rā., svedasya jo. | 3. jośerasaṃskaraṇe moho dvirnirūpitaḥ | prathamaṃ madacintayormadhye dvitīyaṃ vāraṃ ca vitarkakrodhayormadhye | dra. pṛ. 799 | *10. utkaṇṭhā nopalabhyate |
12. smṛteḥ svāsthyāpararātraprabodhasamānadarśanodāharaṇadaivādaya ālambanavibhāvāḥ | pūrvānubhūtaviṣayajñānādaya uddīpanavibhāvāḥ | śiraḥkampanabhrūsamunnamanaśūnyāvalokanā— ṅgulivibhaṅgādayo 'nubhāvāḥ | hāsaśokakrodhotsāhabhayajugupsāviṣādautsukyāsūyogratā— garvatrāsavitarkaratistambhasvedaromāñca vepathuvaivarṇyāśrusvarabhedādayo vyabhicāriṇaḥ ||
13. mateḥ śāstropadeśamantrādyairarthanirdhāraṇādaya ālambanavibhāvāḥ | vidyāvṛddhasaṃyogādhyayanā— dhyāpanatad‌vidyāvitsambhāṣaṇādaya uddīpanavibhāvāḥ | tattvābhiniveśadeśakālā— nusāraṇādayo 'nubhāvāḥ | grahaṇaśaktivikāsādayaḥ sarve vyabhicāriṇaḥ ||
14. vitarkasya sandehavimarśavipratiyattyādaya ālambanavibhāvāḥ | samānāneka— dharmopapattipratipattiviśeṣādaya uddīpanavibhāvāḥ bhrūvikṣepamantrasaṃgrahaṇādayo 'nubhāvāḥ | nirvedaglāniśaṅkāśramaviṣādavismayadainyacintāmohasmṛtimativrīḍā ' 'vegajaḍatāstambha— svedādayo vyabhicāriṇaḥ ||
15. utsāhasya vismayāsaṃmohāviṣādādhyavasāyaviśayasāhasādaya ālambanavibhāvāḥ | vinayabalaparākramadeśakālaśaktisampatpratāpādaya uddīpanavibhāvāḥ | gāmbhīryādayo '— nubhāvāḥ | krodhāsūyāmarṣacintāsmṛtigarvāvegaromāñcasvedogratautsukyādayo vyabhicāriṇaḥ ||
16. krodhasya ākṣepānṛtavacanopaghātavākpāruṣyābhidrohamātsaryādaya ālambana— vibhāvāḥ | tāḍanapīḍanapāṭanabhedacchedyapraharaṇādaya uddīpanavibhāvāḥ | nayanarāgabhrukuṭidantoṣṭhapīḍanagaṇḍasphuraṇahastaniṣpeṣādayo 'nubhāvāḥ | saṃmohotsāhā— marṣavegacapalatāgadgadādayo vyabhicāriṇaḥ ||
17. amarṣasya vidyaiśvaryadhanabalādhikārādhikairadhikṣepāvamānādaya ālambanavibhāvāḥ | svāvasthālokanamadhurālāpaśravaṇakāminīprotsāhanādaya uddīpanavibhāvāḥ | śiraḥkampādhomukhyadhyānādhyavasāyopāyasahāyānveṣaṇādayo 'nubhāvāḥ | krodhāsūyā— tāpogratā ' 'vegavaivarṇyāsrādayo vyabhicāriṇaḥ ||
18. asūyāyāḥ paraiśvaryasaubhāgyamedhāvidyādaya ālambanavibhāvāḥ | doṣakhyāpanaguṇo— paghātāccakṣuḥpraṇidhānādhomukhyabhrukuṭikriyādaya uddīpanavibhāvāḥ | avajñāparādha— dveṣaveṣakutsanādayo 'nubhāvāḥ | hāsyakrodhājñopahasitasvarabhedādayo vyabhicāriṇaḥ ||
19. īrṣyāyāḥ samānakulaśīlarūpavidyāvayovibhavabalaparākrameṣu sapat‍nīṣu ca krameṇa prītiprāsādasthānadānamānādaya ālambanavibhāvāḥ | amarṣādavalokanādaya uddīpana—
vibhāvāḥ | manyuvyalīkavipriyapraṇayakalahopālambhādayo 'nubhāvāḥ | krodhotsāha— vismayavitarkadainyajugupsāmohanirvedāsūyāmarṣavepathuvaivarṇyāśrusvedagadgadādayo vyabhicāriṇaḥ ||
20. ugratāyāḥ cauryābhigrahanṛpāparādhāsambaddhapralāpādaya ālambanavibhāvāḥ | dravyāpahārabhārābhiniveśā 'sahiṣṇutādaya uddīpanavibhāvāḥ | tāḍanapīḍanavadhabandha— bhartsanāsyarāgādayo 'nubhāvāḥ | krodhotsāhavismayajugupsā 'sūyāsmṛtimatimoha— capalatāharṣāmarṣamadāvegautsukyavaivarṇyā śrugad‍gadādayo vyabhicāriṇaḥ ||
21. jugupsāyāḥ suhṛdyapriyavācyāniṣṭaśravaṇadarśanaparikīrtanādaya ālambanavibhāvāḥ | tatsvarūpavikārakriyāvipariṇāmapariṇāmādaya uddīpanavibhāvāḥ | sarvāṅgasaṃhārākṣi— saṅkocamukhavikūṇanahṛllekhaniṣṭhīvanodvejanādayo 'nubhāvāḥ | vismayanirvedabhaya— glāniśaṅkāmohasmṛtijaḍatā ' 'vegaviṣādāpasmāravyādhiromāñcamadavepathusvarabheda— vaivarṇyāśrumūrcchāpralāpādayo vyabhicāriṇaḥ ||
22. vismayasya asambhāvyamānakautukamāhendrajālamānuṣakarmacitrapustaśilpavidyāti— śayādaya ālambanavibhāvāḥ | divyajanabhāṣaṇopavanadevakulavihāradarśanādaya uddīpanavibhāvāḥ | nayanavistārānimeṣaprekṣaṇabhrūvikṣepasādhuvādaprabandhahāhākārāṅguli— bhramaṇādayo 'nubhāvāḥ jaḍatāmohamūrcchādayo vyabhicāriṇaḥ ||
23. nidrāyā daurbalyamudaśramaklamālasyacintā 'tyāhārasvabhāvābhyāsādaya ālambana— vibhāvāḥ | manassantoṣaniścintatāviviktasthānalābhānukūlopakaraṇaprāp‍tyādaya uddīpanavibhāvāḥ | śirovedanagauravaśarīralolananetraghūrṇanajṛmbhaṇagātramardaniḥśvasito— cch‌vasitastrastagātratākṣinimīlanasarvāṅgakriyādayo 'nubhāvāḥ | dainyamohajaḍatā— 'pasmārastambhasvedasvarabhedavepathuvaivarṇyāstrādayo vyabhicāriṇaḥ ||
24. svapnasya(/sup‍tam) nidrādaya ālambanavibhāvāḥ | nidrādikāraṇānyevoddīpanavibhāvāḥ | akṣinimīlanotsvap‍nāyitādayo 'nubhāvāḥ | prāyeṇa tu sarve ratyādayo vyabhicāriṇaḥ ||
25. prabodhasya nidrācchedāhārapariṇāmasvap‍nāntatīvraśabdasparśādaya ālambanavibhāvāḥ | prāgdṛṣṭapadārthāvalokanārabdhasmaraṇamitrādikāryagauravācāraparipālanādaya uddīpana— vibhāvāḥ| jṛmbhaṇonmeṣanimeṣanimeṣākṣimardanaśayanamokṣāṅgavalanādayo 'nubhāvāḥ | utsāhacintāsmṛtimatisvarabhedāstrādayo vyabhicāriṇaḥ ||
26. capalatāyāḥ rāgadveṣamātsaryerṣyāmarṣaprātikūlyādaya ālambanavibhāvāḥ | padārtharāmaṇīyakamānotkarṣaprotsāhanāpakārasmaraṇādaya uddīpanavibhāvāḥ | vākpāruṣya—
daṇḍapāruṣyārthadūṣaṇādayo 'nubhāvāḥ | hāsakrodhotsāhavismayajugupsāharṣā— vegaviṣādogratātrāsāromāñcavepathusvedasvarabhedādayo vyabhicāriṇaḥ ||
27. ālasyasya garvamadamāndyanairāśyaśramaklamagarbhasvābhāvyādaya ālambanavibhāvāḥ | strastagātratādayo 'nubhāvāḥ | nirvedaśramaviṣādanidrādainyamohajaḍatāvyādhisvedavepathu— stambhādayo vyabhicāriṇaḥ ||
28. bhayasya mativrīḍāviṣādāvahitthatrāsavitarkaromāñcasvarabhedavepathuvaivarṇyādayo vyabhicāriṇaḥ ||*
36. svedasya dharmasampīḍanādaya ālambanavibhāvāḥ | krodhabhayaharṣādikāraṇānyeva uddīpanavibhāvāḥ | vyajanagrahaṇādayo 'nubhāvāḥ |
37. vyādheḥ ubhayānurāgādikāraṇasamānī (?) kopanipātasannipātavātapittaśleṣma— prakopādaya uddīpanavibhāvāḥ | vepanālasyaprabhṛtayo 'nubhāvāḥ | glāniśaṅkāni— rvedamadaśramadainyamohacintā ' 'vegajaḍatāvaivarṇyāśrupralayādayo vyabhicāriṇaḥ ||
38. unmādasya iṣṭajanaviyogavibhavanāśavyasanābhighātālābhāpathyasevanādaya uddīpanavibhāvāḥ | animittahasitaruditotkruṣṭapralayagarvaratyādayo vyabhicāriṇaḥ ||
39. śramasya ativyāyāmātibhārotkṣepaṇādaya ālambanavibhāvāḥ | jṛmbhaṇāṅgamardana— mandapadotkṣepaṇālasyādayo 'nubhāvāḥ1 | nirvedaglānidainyacintā vyabhicāriṇaḥ ||
40. śokasya śāpakleśavinipāteṣṭajanaviyogavibhavanāśavadhabandhanaduḥkhānubhava— vidravopadravādaya ālambanavibhāvāḥ | aśrupātālasyavilapitastrastagātratābhūmi— pātākranditaveṣṭitadīrghaniḥśvasitamukhaśoṣamadādayo 'nubhāvāḥ | stambhavepathuvaivarṇyā— śrusvarabhedādayo vyabhicāriṇaḥ ||
41. viṣādasya ārambhānistaraṇo upāyacintanotsāhavighātavaimanasyālasyādayo— 'nubhāvāḥ | stambhasvedagadgadavaivarṇyavepathuprabhṛtayo vyabhicāriṇaḥ ||
42. vevarṇyasya śītakrodhādaya ālambanavibhāvāḥ | ॰॰kāraṇānyevoddīpanavibhāvāḥ | nayanamukharāgavṛtti vaimanasyālasyādayo 'nubhāvāḥ | ॰॰vyabhicāriṇaḥ ||
43. dainyasya manastāpadaurgatyādaya ālambanavibhāvāḥ | sarvopāyabhraṃśopabhedajugupsānirveda— glānicintāmohajaḍatāviṣādanidrāstambhagadgadavepathuvaivarṇyāśruprabhṛtayo vyabhicāriṇaḥ ||
1. ॰lasyā॰ = ॰labdhā(?)॰ rā. | *29. 'śaṅkā, 30. trāsaḥ, 31. vepathuḥ, 32. vrīḍā, 33. abahitthā, 34 stambhaḥ, 35. glāniḥ' ityeteṣāṃ vibhāvādīnāṃ varṇanaṃ mātṛkāsu truṭitam |
44. svarabhedasya kāraṇānyevoddīpanavibhāvāḥ | tāramandramadhyaghargharagadgadavisvara— svanādayo 'nubhāvāḥ | hā . . .(vyabhicāriṇaḥ) ||
45. āvegasya vidyudulkānirghātapatanacandrasūryoparāgaketudarśanabhramaṇavātavarṣā— nikuñjarodbhramaṇapriyāpriyaśravaṇadussvap‍nadurnimittadarśanavyasanābhighātādaya ālambana— vibhāvāḥ | uktaviṣayakīrtanānubhavanasampradhāraṇādaya uddīpanavibhāvāḥ |
sarvāṅgasrastatāvakuṇṭhanākṣimardanatvaritagamanāṅgapīḍanapradhāvanacchannāśrayaṇadhūmā— kulanetratāṅgavidhūnanatvaritāpasaraṇapaścādavalokanābhyutthānāliṅganabhūmiśayana— paridevitavilāpākranditadevatānusmaraṇādayo 'nubhāvāḥ | śokabhayavismayaśaṅkā— śramacintāmohavitarkastambhasvedavepathuvaivarṇyāśrupralayādayo vyabhicāriṇaḥ ||
46. aśruṇaḥ śokakrodhaharṣadhūmāñjanajṛmbhaṇabhayānimeṣaprekṣaṇaśītarogādaya ālambana— vibhāvāḥ | kāryakāraṇānubandhaprabandhādaya uddīpanavibhāvāḥ | netrasammārjanabāṣpamokṣa— trividharodanādayo 'nubhāvāḥ | tatrotphullakapolāṅganimīlitāsramaparyāp‍tamuktāsram asvasthagātraṃ svanavadgataceṣṭaṃ saṃbhramipātaviceṣṭitavilāpaduḥkhajaṃ prasphuritoṣṭhakapolaṃ saniḥśvāsaṃ saśiraḥkampabhrūkaṭākṣādayo rodanaṃ cānubhāvāḥ | bhayanirvedaglāniśramadainya mohautsukya trāsavitarkasvedasvarabhedastambharomāñcavepathuvaivarṇyādayo vyabhicāriṇaḥ ||
47. (mohasya/s‍nehasya)1 avalokanāvasthāvadhāraṇavyasanābhighātabhayāvegavairasmaraṇādaya ālambanavibhāvāḥ | 2saṃstutapradeśadarśaneṣṭaguṇākarṇanarttumālyānulepanopanatiprabhṛtayaḥ uddīpanavibhāvāḥ | niścaitanyabhramaṇapatanaghūrṇanādarśanādayo 'nubhāvāḥ | glānipralayādayo vyabhicāriṇaḥ ||)
48. pralayasya mūrcchāśramābhighātanidrāmohamadādaya ālambanavibhāvāḥ | śramādi— kāraṇānyevoddīpanavibhāvaḥ | niśceṣṭatādayo 'nubhāvāḥ | glānijaḍatāstambhavaivarṇyādayo vyabhicāriṇaḥ ||
49. jaḍatāyāḥ iṣṭāniṣṭaśravaṇadarśanavyādhyādaya ālambanavibhāvāḥ | tadrāmaṇīya— kodvejanīya(uddīpa)navibhāvāḥ kāryāpratipattyakathanābhāṣaṇatūṣṇīmbhāvānimeṣanirīkṣaṇā— dayo 'nubhāvāḥ | nirvedaglāniśramadainyamohaviṣādanidrāstambha vaivarṇyādayo vyabhicāriṇaḥ ||
1. dra. sarasvatīkaṇṭhābharaṇe | 2. rāghavapāṭhastu—prakṛtadharmādharmakrodhāśāvajñādayaḥ iti | mudritastu pāṭho jośerapaṭhitaḥ | jośereṇa moho dviḥ pradattaḥ | s‍nehastu syāt |
50. nirvedasya adhikṣepakrodhatāḍaneṣṭajanaviyogavairāgyādaya ālambanavibhāvāḥ | sa sa(?) x x x x x ratāvibhāvana śāstrābhyāsatattvajñānādaya uddīpanavibhāvāḥ | ruditaniḥśvasi(ta) x x x x jugupsāśramajaḍatānidrāstambhaśamādayo vyabhicāriṇaḥ ||
51. śamasya tattvajñānādaya ālambanavibhāvāḥ | yogābhyāsādaya uddīpanavibhāvāḥ | paraṃ brahmopāstimatiromāñcaharṣadhṛtyādayo vyabhicāriṇaḥ, iti ||
uktaḥ so 'yaṃ vibhāvānubhāvasañcārisaṅkaraḥ |
krameṇa sarvabhāvānāṃ śṛṅgāreṣu caturṣvapi || 1 ||
vyak‍taḥ sa tairvibhāvādyaiḥ sthāyī bhāvo rasaḥ smṛtaḥ |
sambhogo vipralambhaśca śṛṅgāro 'pi dvidhā mataḥ || 2 ||
samavāye ya udbha‍ūtaściraṃ yaścāvatiṣṭhate |
bhāvaḥ sthāyīti sa jñeyo vyabhicārī tato 'nyathā || 3 ||
abhīṣṭāliṅga(na—prīta—prahṛṣṭa—cira—sa)—gate |
so 'smin sambhogaśṛṅgāro vipralambho viparyaye || 4 ||
vibhāvo dvividhaś‍cātrālambanoddīpanātmakaḥ |
eko 'nubhavasaṃskāre janako 'nyastu sa dvidhā/bodhakaḥ || 5 ||
(rajastamobhyāṃ sattvasya)prabhave 'bhibhave dvidhā |
antarbahiśca bhāve 'tra sahaiva vyabhicāribhiḥ || 6 ||
smṛtīcchādveṣayat‍nānāmantassantāna iṣyate |
manovāgbuddhivapuṣāṃ bahirārambha eva tu || 7 ||
janmānubandhā 'tiśayānuṣaṅgānugamaprasūḥ |
vibhāvaścānubhāvaśca vyabhicārīva pūrvake || 8 ||
vibhāvājjanma bhāvānāṃ uddīpanavibhāvataḥ |
anubandho 'nubhāvebhyaḥ prakarṣa upajāyate || 9 ||
bhāvāntarānuṣaṅgastu sthāyinopadrave sati |1
samparkastu tayostulyabalabhāvottaro( 'nugaḥ) . . || 10 ||
janmānubandhātiśayānuṣaṅgāt tataḥ paraṃ sānugamāt krameṇa |
bhāveṣu tallakṣaṇalakṣa/kṣyayogāt pañca prapañcān upavarṇayāmaḥ || 11 ||
1. itaḥ paraṃ 'samparkastu॰॰ upavarṇayāma' iti pādaṣaṭkaṃ jośerasaṃskaraṇe na dṛśyate |
